links_reviews_text: Great for when you don't want to carry a giant purse around. Holds just enough stuff! It's goes with everything since it's black, loved it!

Love this bag! It's the perfect size for what I like to carry: keys, sunglasses, small wallet, lip gloss, lipstick and phone. There is an inside zipper pocket for little things you don't want to lose and a big phone pocket just inside, too! Love that it's top handle and cross body. The leather is beautiful--very high quality. The only downside is that it's a little tricky to open and close. But overall, I love it! So classy!
The cutest handbag. Love the top strap and the details!

I was not familiar with this designer until RTR. I got the bag brand new! I do not like a large purse so this was perfect. I would have kept longer, but the purse is very narrow so it is hard to put your hand in it and see the contents inside. I love the crocodile look and felt like it upgrade even the most casual outfit.
a little stiff

links_reviews_title: Perfect for celebrating the holiday season
links_reviews_text: I love Christmas and these pants were the perfect way to get into the season. Comfortable and fit well!
But more red than the photos. Beware.
Too small on the hips so had to hike them up and got a front wedgie. Not sure if sizing up would help or just don't wear this if you have curves

links_reviews_title: Wasn't Sure About It - But Got Compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was ambivalent about this piece but got a lot of compliments from colleagues. These pants are SO soft and comfy - though not as warm as they may look. Overall, a fun rental.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, very small in waist
links_reviews_text: Loved these but waist way too small and I have a pretty small waist!

The color of these pants is more vibrant in person. They definitely have a festive feel to them, which is what I wore them for. The fabric is very soft and comfortable, but the waist and crotch was a bit tight on me (I have a 32" waist). I would have worn the next size up.

I was so excited for these trousers. When I put them on they looked great from the front, but when I turned around...yikes! The pants were high-waisted and due to the cut, they made my butt look about 10 yards long and just saggy. NOT CUTE. I really wanted these to work, but they just did not.
I noticed before I took it off the hanger that the zipper placket didn't cover the zipper. Looked like it wasn't properly sewn. Would be super cute if the bright silver zipper wasn't glaring.

the cuff at the ankle is a little slouchy, making these a touch more casual than i was expecting them to be. still suitable for work, and look great with a heel. i paired with a heeled, high-ankle bootie.

links_reviews_title: It was ok..the color and fabric is what made me want to rent it but fit wasn't so great.
links_reviews_text: Fit is more for smaller waists. I have a straight body type so the waist was too tight .
These pants were so cute and soft but were unflattering especially in the crotch...not sure sizing up would fix this though.

links_reviews_title: When I put them on and my husband and I both decided I would never wear something like them again
links_reviews_text: Too tight. Accentuated everything in the wrong way

links_reviews_title: Sized up and it was still too small
links_reviews_text: These are super cute and I was pumped to wear them, but they were so small. They fit in the waist, but rode up like crazy!
I liked that the material was super comfy and easy to pack (doesn't wrinkle). However, the pleats don't lay flat which really bothered me. Definitely more of a boyfriend fit
These are shinier and the color is brighter than I expected, but they were fun for a day. Heard "nice pants" all day, except from my daughter who said, "don't wear those out of the house!". Size up.
Tight in the waist. Looks like Santa pants. Didn't end up wearing
again the inseam is sooooo short on these. they are super fun and very soft so i was altogether bummed to not be comfortable in them.
I am normally a size 2-4 and these size 4s didn't even button. Couldn't wear them cause of the size.

links_reviews_title: The comfort of PJ pants but the look of luxury
links_reviews_text: Great fit, super comfortable! They are a bit short on me (most pants are) but I still got a ton of compliments.

Looked like a tasteful burgundy on the app but it was full mall status Saint Nick in person. Also runs very small - I got the 4 and it would barely button. The 4 would prob be comfy on a 25 in waist but no bigger.

links_reviews_title: Eye-catching pants that are easy to style
links_reviews_text: I liked these pants. They were comfortable and flattering.

I normally wear a size 2 but I read reviews that this ran small.I thought a size 4 would be a appropriate but even that was tight. I still worn them, but my flat abdomen somehow appeared large. Not flattering. Guess I need to be a size 00 to wear these. Pass.
Super cute and comfortable got lots of compliments
Great fit. I run 6 to 8 and was afraid the 6 would be too small. It fit perfectly and looked great. Definitely considering keeping these!
Didn't fit! Size up ladies! Held them up and said "wow- these look really small". Size up!!
Received tons of compliments wearing these for my son's school event and meet-up. They look so festive with any top. The waist was tight, but I just wore them higher and it worked.
Just awesome!
They were a little too baggy and though they were a beautiful color, they didn't feel very "put together".

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and soft, but runs a touch small!
links_reviews_text: these pants were adorable and super comfortable, but they do run a bit tight in the waist!! I'm usually a zero, and even the two was a bit snug. The legs are loose, but size up for the waist!

Versatile can wear with anything from dresses to jeans. Absolutely love this blazer! Great weight too, not too light. It's a bit A-line, fits great at the shoulders but fans out on the sides. Will be renting this again!

Such a great versatile piece for winter. Heavy matte fabric with POCKETS! Wore over a dress, again over a black turtleneck with jeans and again with leather leggings and a lightweight blouse. Great sub for a jacket too. Loved this and would rent again.

Absolutely obsessed with this blazer vest. I have already worn it 4 times in less than a week. I do not agree with reviewers saying that this item runs large. The look is meant to be oversized. Also the arm holes aren't large (they're not tight but if you size down they might be). Love love this. The only con is that, like any black clothing item, the lint is really visible. Want to purchase.
It was very cute and kind of changed my view on oversized styles. Great for every day look

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like it, but it was too long for my petite height.
links_reviews_text: The pockets were nearly down my thighs. It was just too long for me. Fabric and style were nice.

links_reviews_title: Obessed- kept for over a month!
links_reviews_text: This is so versatile. I wore it to work over tops or sweaters, or out to dinner, and to a family event. Small would have been better but the medium still worked. It's also a great layering piece during the winter since it's sleeveless there's no bulk around the arms/shoulders under a coat but it's VERY warm. I actually would took it off a few times in the office. It does attract lint and hair so be prepared to use a lint brush before or after wearing. Would buy this in an instant if cheaper.
This vest is heavy weight. It works well with a dress, over a long-sleeve tee with jeans, or dressed up. Nice to have pockets. The large was roomy.
Absolutely love this. I layered it on a black turtle neck and white pants with over the knee boots. Also with a long sleeve white top and black skinny jeans. Just love this look!
Love this. Super flattering and makes any outfit look put together.
It's amazing but made with wool and if you're not wearing a neck on the shirt underneath it, you can tell.

Wore this to the Phoenix Open (Golf Tournament) it was super cute and comfy for wearing all day in the sun. It does run short, the small fit better around my body but my booty was hanging out ( I am 5'7) so I wore the medium. It was a little lose around me but overall was still super cute and fitting. Would definitely rent again!
So cute! Form fitting and on the short side. You can adjust straps to two lengths and denim is stretchy & hugs curves. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: An all star I wish I owned!
links_reviews_text: I could not have lived this more! I paired it with a few different long sleeves and it was so chic, slimming and edgy all at the same time. Don't hesitate on this.

links_reviews_title: Great with layers for a winter look!
links_reviews_text: Wore a black T-shirt and tights with this dress for a cold weather look. Got tons of compliments! But this dress is short!
I wore this in Vegas while day drinking and walking around with my friends before my wedding day. It was perfect! It does run small but is comfortable with the right size.
Loved the fit and sizing of this! Not too loose, not too tight! Rented for Halloween in Vegas, I was Rosie the Riveter, and it was short, but not too short! Felt comfortable the entire night!

links_reviews_title: Loved by all! Lightweight denim just need safety pin to keep chest closed between button.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress and could not stop wearing it. If the price comes down I may consider buying it. The shoulder straps have two buttons for adjustable length the only thing I needed to work on was having a safety pin in between the chest buttons to keep that closed for more conservativism. I did not even need to wear a bra. Everywhere I went people asked me where I got that dress it was very lightweight comfortable especially still in the south where it is hot. The dress had some stretch to it as well.

links_reviews_title: DO NOT RENT IF YOU ARE 5'8" OR TALLER
links_reviews_text: So short you could see my butt when I walked. Also a little tight on the second from top bust button. It was stretchy and comfortable so it's unfortunate it was so damn short! I returned it immediately- but needed to review for my fellow tall ladies so you don't waste your time like I did

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Hugged all my curves. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The material is stretchy and perfect for a night out or any occasion. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit to see Kacey Musgraves and Ariana Grande!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jean dress! It really holds your curves but still comfortable! I thought the XS would be too small and that's all they had available but I'm glad I tried it!
Easy outfit, has a stretch and is fitting but not so fitting that it makes you look bad. It's a cute little dress worth the rental.
Loved it so much and the way it fit. I am normally a small, but gave the XS a try, since it was the only option available. I will order again when my size is available

This dress was super soft denim and cute as hell! I wore spandex shorts underneath because it was a little short to sit down in. Another little fit issue was that my right shoulder strap wanted to fall down occasionally, but other than that it fit like an hourglass dream.

Cute denim stretch dress. Runs a little small and is not very forgiving, so if you're at all between sizes, size up. It was really comfortable and easy to wear. I could have worn a small but didn't want to bother with exchanging it. Wore it with Samantha Sipos navy heart jacket and Tory Burch grumpy face backpack. @cocoknowsitall

links_reviews_title: I loved this denim dress so much, but it runs really small, so I had to return for a size small.
links_reviews_text: It runs small, so returned it for a small and I love this dress so much! It fits well in all the right places!
Im in between sizes so I sized up, but the medium was still a little loose on me. Other than that the dress was super cute and very soft. It is stretchy so easy to move in. Loved it.
A little shorter than expected and the straps at the top were a little too long (non-adjustable). Cute dress but didn't work out.
I enjoyed wearing this dress to an 80's party. It's cute and fun! Fit was good. Definitely fitted with little stretch.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, not too revealing. Can wear a shirt underneath with a jacket
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely!
Loved the dress but giving it four stars because it did gape a little bit in the chest area. I am a D so this is a bit harder to wear if you have bigger boobs

links_reviews_title: Wore this lunch and shopping and at night to casual dinner and jazz ensemble at neighborhood bar.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great-has some stretch. Comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: This denim dress needs to be a staple in my closet!
links_reviews_text: I love the stress so much! The fit was perfect and the quality of denim was excellent. I definitely am considering purchasing this to become a staple in my closet. I got so many compliments!
Sexy classy, would buy if not so expensive,

On a curvier body like mine, this dress doesn't look casual like on the model. This was a rly hot dress w Britney vibes. I decided not to wear the straps which i think made it even better. Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong as blue jean baby...
links_reviews_text: I got this in a M and S. I ended up keeping the S. Luckily, there are two button levels to adjust the straps which made the dress longer. The S was snug and a tad short, but I'm going for sexy. The M was a better length and comfortable fit, but way too large in the armpits. Comfortable and stretchy, hugging all the right places. Reasonable jean thickness. A+ Looking forward to pairing with boots or sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fit thick fabric great for cold weather
links_reviews_text: Very conservative dress with a comfortable fit
This dress looked great for date night and professional for work. The fit was a tiny bit off at stomach where there was extra cloth that bunched up.

Fits true to size. Looks stiff but fabric is actually soft and a bit stretchy so super comfortable. I think it's dark navy (not black)and hunter green, but I still wore with black tights/ shoes and thought it looked fine.
Was thick but has stretch for winter months and well sized in length and arm length for petite.
Good fit. Fabric is high quality and thick. Bodice and skirt are lined. Good staple for work.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern and nice stretch, quite short!
links_reviews_text: The fit on top is great, but it is too short (I am 5'10). Works ok with opaque tights.
The fit was perfect! I loved how it felt and I would definitely rent again!!

LOVE this simple dress - the cut fit me perfectly, and was flattering on my petite frame. The houndstooth pattern is subtle, and a nice detail when you see it up close. The fabric has some stretch in it, so it was very comfortable all day and didn't wrinkle even though I was sitting at a desk most of the day.

I brought this dress with me on a work trip, figuring it wouldn't wrinkle much. I was right and it was easy to slip on straight out of my suitcase after an overnight flight. I have short arms so the sleeves were too long on me so I pushed them up.

links_reviews_title: Too tight to be work appropriate
links_reviews_text: I sent this one back without wearing it. It's very firm fitting so only wearable if you have no body fat.

links_reviews_title: Not for those with broad shoulders.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric, but I have broad shoulders so it was too snug across the chest for me.

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a cold night.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, a little short for my work taste but made it work with some dark tights.
fit perfectly, great material will definitely wear it again.
works for parties or work or everyday. super chic.
Great, well made work dress with a very flattering fit! It was super comfortable and warm enough to wear in cold weather.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress with interesting, subtle houndstooth pattern
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for about 10 hours straight and was very comfortable in it. I am 5'3" and was surprised that the dress (size 2) hit the tops of my knees when wearing pumps with about a 2" heel. It may be too short for a conservative work event for taller women. The sleeves seemed disproportionately long compared to the rest of the measurements of the dress. Overall though, it's a pretty dress with interesting details and very solid construction.

I loved this dress. It fit perfectly except for long sleeves which I was able to roll up. It is a beautiful fabric and very warm. I wore it to give a talk at a professional meeting with tights and heels, and it was perfect. I was comfortable but felt professional and confident. I would consider buying this dress, and I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments at work today
links_reviews_text: Really cute and comfortable! The sleeves are a tiny bit short but I'm 6' tall so that's not too unusual
Fits perfectly, with some stretch so it's comfortable to wear all day. Length was appropriate for work and I wore with black tights.

links_reviews_title: Mint condition and perfect fit. Excellent dress for work!!!
links_reviews_text: Excellent fit. Perfect for Work. Length was just above the knee.
Ran small
Fit was perfect! I'll definitely rent this again!
This shirt is very hip and flattering. I love the sand color and the puffy sleeves. Would def rent again.

Shirt felt strong and supportive. You can wear this style with about anything and can dress it up or down easily. Tips for anyone wanting to wear it tucked into pants- I would order a size smaller than you normally do so the material doesn't bunch out at the top of your pant. If you don't wear it tucked in (also cute) it's totally fine and you won't hide the cute frills at the bottom!
So comfortable and versatile! Wore it both to work and out to dinner and it was appropriate for both. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too earthy barmaid for me
links_reviews_text: This is a very cute and comfy top, but too fairy tale romantic for me. Gives me Hansel and Gretel Madam Rosmerta. I would require a strapless bra for this, but the neckline doesn’t cover my bras. Maybe not for the larger chested.

links_reviews_title: I loved the natural look of the thick linen material.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, only thing worth mentioning was that the sleeves made it hard to wear a jacket or sweater because they kept bunching up underneath. I ended up not needing one most of the night so it wasn't a big deal.

I didn't expect much from this, but I was just quickly trying to fill my new order. I wore it to work for casual Friday and to drinks after by just dropping the sleeves down and switching bras. I got so many compliments! I was so surprised. Its a thick, linen material , looks very natural and boho but not scratchy at all. Some of the other reviews said it ran small, which I disagree with. Its supposed to be a tight shirt, so if you don't want a tight fitting top, this top isn't for you, even if you order up a size. Overall doesn't look like much in the pictures, cute on lots of compliments.
Headline says it all. Fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fashion top, comfort and classy
links_reviews_text: I loved it and got so many good uses out of it. With a larger bust it is important to have a good strapless because the square cut shows normal strapped bras.
Was able to style quite a few ways! Great piece to spice up a summer wardrobe
Nothing special. A bit short but not quite cropped. Paired with high waisted jeans and it was fine.

Got this for cold days in Georgia and was perfect for a casual Friday and heading to a friend's house this evening! It's definitely short, but still looks cute half tucked or untucked with skinny jeans! Love the color too, Go Tigers!
Soft material. A bit cropped but jut above the waist. Pretty orange color.

links_reviews_title: Literally feels like you are wrapped in a cloud
links_reviews_text: Super soft, amazing color- what more could you want!
The sweater with the perfect fit. I wore it to work with black flat booties and changed my shoes to what's in the photo to wear out to dinner. It's such a great piece to rent for the winter.

links_reviews_title: Bought it the first time I wore it!
links_reviews_text: Wasn't expecting much, but literally 14 complements in one day and I bought it! Put it on at 7am, owned by 7pm. Cute, well made, great color, shape, and soft.
Lots of compliments on this orange sweater! Great pop of color for winter.
I am incredibly short-waisted and even I found this sweater unwearable. It was cropped, but not in a cool way. Pass on this one.
Great fall color and fit nicely.
exactly what i was looking for - a cute sweater in a nice, bright color.

I got this a size up to wear it "oversized" but it's more cropped than I was expecting, so it ended up falling right on my jean line. Ended up wearing it tucked in the front. The color is really fun and it was so cozy.

I freaking loved this sweater. It is SO soft and comfy and incredibly versatile. I layered it on a recent trip, wore it all day traveling, and dressed it up for the office. I was nervous it would be itchy, but that was not the case. I loved the fun pop of color it added to my wardrobe. I regret not buying it!
So many compliments on this simple sweater. The colors is great and sweater is perfect
Rented this to wear while WFH and I'm glad I did. The sweater arm detail is super cute! Loved it.
I rented this for work (my office is very casual). Wore it with black high waisted jeans and black suede boots. Got tons of compliments!

Mixed feelings on this. Great quality, heavy weight, but very boxy and really short - it's supposed to be like this. I loved the mixed knits and easy to wear color combo. Sleeves were really long on me though with lots of "extra" under and around the arm area. Returned immediately, going to try the XS. If the fit is better in the arms, I'll likely wear with some high waisted bottoms (anything to elongate these short legs of mine!)

Love this sweater! Looks great with joggers and sneakers on the weekend, or with high waisted jeans and booties for a casual work day. Note- it's pretty cropped, even when you adjust the pull cables on the side, but I am only 5'2' so it worked perfect with high/ mid waisted jeans. Tons of compliments on this!

So cute and unique, but understated. I love the combo of sweater and sweatshirt, it really feels elevated and edgy and appropriate for dressier things (and creative office) than a sweatshirt would. Really cute with jeans but also any pants and skirts. Pretty cropped - will show your stomach when you raise your arms, but full coverage over a very high waisted skirt or pants. I'm glad I got the S instead of XS - it was a little oversized but not too, and I wouldn't have wanted it any shorter.

links_reviews_title: Fun, cozy, but a little too much volume.
links_reviews_text: Cropped sweatshirt. Went well with high waist jeans, but otherwise would be quite short.
Rented this in San Fran because t was sooooo cold! Wore it to Alcatraz ! I loved the draw string that way it accents the waist line

Love this sweatshirt/sweater! This crop sweater is definitely cropped and pairs nicely with high waisted jeans. I love the sweater sleeves with very soft yarn, and an incredibly beautiful design. This is a very comfortable top, I just wish is was slightly longer.
I love the weight and style of this sweater/sweatshirt. It was just too short on me, even with high-waisted jeans. Might try it again in Medium.
Got several compliments on this cropped sweatshirt/sweater combo. Definitely cropped, but adorable with high waisted pants and the easy neutral colors allow it to go with a lot!
Cropped well above belly button. Also the sleeves are smaller than I was expecting- it's a bulkier knit on the sleeves. Otherwise cute, wore it with high waisted leggings
I wore it so many times! Definitely recommend.
This fits like a true crop top. I loved the mixed materials! Super comfy for everyday
I could have sized down on this but it looked really cute with slouchy work pants and black booties! Would look cute with mom jeans too. Will be renting this again in a smaller size!
loovvveeee this sweater. definitely true to size, but if you want it oversized, just size up. the sleeves are thicker than i expected but it's super cozy and the length is the perfectly cropped

links_reviews_title: Size up if you don't want a super cropped top.
links_reviews_text: Nice comfy sweater with a twist
Pretty think fabric. Paired with leggings to walk around weho.

links_reviews_title: Casual funk, perfect from day to night.
links_reviews_text: Little short but I am long waisted.
Cute, comfy and super different. Loved wearing it, but pair it with high waisted pants since it's a bit cropped.
Great find! Very comfortable, warm, cozy, and yet a chic look with with almost anything you pair it with. Loved this great piece

links_reviews_title: Cropped fit not the best for my long torso.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Zero compliments from strangers though. Won't rent again. Didn't fit great with my long torso.
A little cropped and has to buy high wasted jeans BUT so cute.
Weird top. I was fine with the cropped fit but the sleeves were too long. I also didn't like how thick the sleeves were compared to the rest of the top. Overall not flattering

I'm usually a size small, but decided to get a medium for this. I really liked this sweater, but it was very short on me. I'm 5'4 and did not cover my lower stomach. Maybe if you are shorter this will work for you.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Perfect for a winter chic!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect, it's slightly cropped!
Loved this rental. I wore it to work on casual Friday and for thanksgiving and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very cute sweater!! Love the sleeves.
links_reviews_text: This is a very cropped sweater, a little more than expected but it was very cute. Also very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This works great with skinny jeans and boots!
links_reviews_text: Love the drawstring waist, to make the top more flattering. Warm!
I usually wear a medium but got the large because it's all that was available. It fit okay, but i would have purchased to keep if i had a medium. Very soft and warm. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Gave my everyday mom wardrobe a little kick.
links_reviews_text: Totally would've bought it if the price tag was better. Will rent this again.

Absolutely adored this cropped sweater. Brought to Montreal for a weekend getaway, and felt cozy and chic at the same time. It's quite warm and comfy. I tucked it into my navy jogger pants that had an ivory stripe down the side (matched nicely with the ivory sleeves). The quality was great, I figured there would be some wear on the wool but it didn't look like there was any. Going to keep to wear to work as well (can totally dress this piece up or down). Fit was a bit oversized but I would still go with your normal size

i wish the lining / inside of this were thicker or warmer or softer. note this is pretty cropped so you'll have to wear it with high waisted pants if you don't want any skin showing. the knit part of this sweater was nice and overall really comfy but just felt kinda plain once on.
Love the drawstring in the sweater super warm and very stylish
Sweatshirt is very comfortable and fits nicely

links_reviews_title: Different bc its part sweater, part sweatshirt
links_reviews_text: Was comfy but looked very cute with a mini skirt!

I love this sweater because I wore it to a party with a skirt one night and the next day I wore it with black yoga pants to the mall. It can definitely be dressed up or dressed down, and it is so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: New style for me. I liked it.
links_reviews_text: A bit warm for late summer
This sweatshirt is very comfortable. I like the extra details so it wasn't just a plain top.
Wore this a lot, but note that because it's cropped, you should be prepared to show some skin unless you're wearing high rise jeans.

The stretchy elastic top made this so comfortable! I wore it to church and a bridal shower! The daisy design is so cute for spring. It's a bit more narrow all the way down, not as flowy as I though, but still loved.

I am between a 10 and 12 and got the UK14/US 10 and it was still large on me. It's a casual dress and not very form fitting which was fine in the front but I didn't like how it bunched in the butt. Will try again in a size 8.

links_reviews_title: Comfy spring dress - dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Cute dress - sized up per recommendations and probably could've sized down one but it worked fine. I wanted to rewear again and again and again.
Loved this dress! Super comfy and easy to wear. I wore it 3 times! Cute print
I loved this dress, I wore it to work on a rainy day and got lots of compliments about brightening the day! I think I could have sized down so that the smocking worked a little more!

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress but size down
links_reviews_text: I was worried that this dress was going to look a little cheesy and childish but it was so cute. The smocked upper definitely runs big, would recommend sizing down especially if you have a smaller bust
Very forgiving/stretchy. Runs large. Can be dressed up or down - bow details make this feel dressy but can definitely be worn for daytime.

This dress is definitely pretty! I received a bunch of compliments at the baby shower I wore this to. I have a moderate sized chest (34D/ DD) and this dress was much bigger than I expected. I definitely could have sized down. Also a definite pro is that is has pockets!

Pros: print, high quality fabric, pockets!! The print is mesmerizing in person. Cons: bow sleeves are cute but tend to come un-tied, dress is structured so straps are extra curricular Fit: 90's style square neckline with the scrunch of a tube top. TBH didn't love the look on my bust, but very on trend.

links_reviews_title: It was a perfect vacation dress.
links_reviews_text: It was great! Loved it.
Didn't like how this fit. Made my boobs look really small (they're a C/D) and waist and body look huge (I'm a small person). Not a fan

I really liked this dress. I got it a size too big though. I plan to order it again for my next vacation but to get it at least a size down. Its fun and even a little quirky. The black though makes it easy to style. Perfect for vacation.
Absolutely loved this dress. Wore it to a baby shower and to the races for a casual day. Really versatile, great fabric and fit. Would definitely rent again!

I sized up based on recommendations and it was worth it. I wear a 6 in regular clothes and a 8/10 in designer but got a 14 in this. It was a perfect summer dress. So light but didn't wrinkle up. Because I'm 5'1" it was a maxi but I loved that.

This is a lovely crisp maxi dress for hot weather. When I put it on, my 2-yr-old said, "Pretty, pretty dress, Mommy!" It does, however, run large--I picked the 10 (English sizing; I am a small 6 in real life), and I would definitely size down to an 8 next time.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear this dress. I will rent it again.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, nice material.

Ordered it 2 sizes too big by mistake, but because of the smocking/loose overall look, it still worked under a jean jacket. Wore to a bridal shower and it got so many compliments! Recommend ordering in your true size—an 8 would have been just perfect!
Love this dress!! Amazing high quality fabric, pockets, perfect for casual Saturday with friends. Wore it with and without jean jacket.
Cute dress, but more maternity looking (despite being 6 months pregnant) than I was expecting. It's also longer than it appears on the model. Thin cotton fabric - very breathable.
Comfy
So flowy and fun to wear.

This dress runs true to size (maybe a little large). Top part of the dress is stretchy and the waist down is flowy and loose. The ribbons at the back of the shoulders are beautiful and overall quality of garment is very high - it felt lovely against my skin.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Such a great cut and SO cute! It is perfect to wear for vacation.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Such a great cut and SO cute! It is perfect to wear for vacation.

links_reviews_title: This dress for tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: The size I got was supposed to be equivalent to the 0 in American sizing but noticed this was still pretty large, though wearable! That's why I gave it 4 stars! Very cute though!

I love the print, length and pockets of this dress. My only complaint is the way the top part fit– it wasn't super flattering on the bust area and I wasn't sure how low or high to position it. But, with a jean jacket it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: My daughter asked me to keep this forever
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress with a jean jacket and black espadrilles - fun layering for the varied weather we have been having. I got several compliments wearing it. Love the pockets. Rented this at the pop-up in an available size - likely could have sized down 1 or even 2... the skirt portion was a bit too much material. IMO would make a great dress for an expectant mom.

This dress actually fits like a maternity dress on me. I would recommend the dress to those during their pregnancy looking for something on the nicer side of casual. It's very comfortable. But would not recommend it for someone who is not pregnant because the rouching on the bust and the way it ends on the bodice almost suggests or implies a pregnant stomach. Not flattering.
I got compliments and found the dress to be comfortable - a win!

Comfortable pants that can be dressed up or down. I didn't like the fake pockets and fly stitched in however, as I thought they created some unflattering lines. Also the leg opening is a bit wider than I was expecting for a legging.

Loved wearing these pants to work! They pull on, so no uncomfortable buttons or zippers. They have a great amount of stretch and held their shape all day at work. They are just as comfortable as leggings. Pattern is fun- neutral beige with a bit of red mixed in. I debated whether to get a small or medium since I usually wear 27/4 and small fit perfectly. Length hit right at the ankle.

I absolutely loved these. I only wore them once but I'll probably order them again or buy them! I have long legs but the length was a perfect ankle cut for me. I have no butt and the material was a perfect stretch, didn't lose its shape or get saggy like some fabrics do. By far one of my best RTR orders yet!

wore these to school. they're super cozy and perfect for winter! essentially leggings with a nicer fabric, although the waist was just a hair tight on me, so i probably couldn't lounge in these all day.
The print is a refreshing change from the ordinary. Fits tight like a legging with a generous stretch. has the look of a pant.
These fit extremely weird. They were baggy in the crotch and butt area while being right everywhere else. Lots of strange bunching. Unable to wear out
These are so cute with a cream colored top. I got my true size and they worked out great.
Cool in theory but ran a bit large so they weren't really flattering
These fit like a glove and were very cute. I don't have much booty, so I had to pull them up a few times as there was no way to use a belt but nothing bad. They were a big hit at both occasions!

links_reviews_title: love these - probably won't send them back! :)
links_reviews_text: great color - great quality - great fit - great price!
Love these! They were professional and still comfortable. Wore them for a 6 hour meeting and a 3 hour train ride, and still felt fabulous at the end of the day. 10/10 would rent again!
Super comfortable and passes as pants. Wore them to work with a slightly longer shirt and it was great.

links_reviews_title: Leggings that are dressier are brilliant.
links_reviews_text: I rented these because I rented the same brand and size in a different color last month and loved them. Unfortunately these fit larger (longer and a little baggy) which is not ideal for leggings.
Got these new and with the tags. Runs true to size. Comfy and not too tight. I rented a small and for reference I wear a size 26 jeans normally. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Comfy flattering take on a fall/winter trend
links_reviews_text: These were surprisingly really flattering - they look more like pants than leggings, almost tailored somehow. My butt looked great, and they were the perfect ankle crop. I wore with sneakers and a chunky cropped sweater
Cute comfortable pants. Love the plaid.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for spring on the way
links_reviews_text: Good fabric and good fit, this wrap dress can work for many different occasions. Many compliments came my way. The colors and patterns are good for spring.

links_reviews_title: I loved this and everyone else did, too!
links_reviews_text: This was a hit with everyone who saw it! I love the length, fit, vibe. Can't wait to rent again.

This is super well fitting wrap dress, the top gapes a little bit but not as much as many of the other wrap dresses I have tried. The fabric is a thin cotton that is a little prone to wrinkling, but is lightweight and comfortable. I'll rent this again for sure.
Really liked this. I was afraid the length would be awkward but it nicely
Flattering cut, I don't typically wear wrap dresses but this was a win.
A little too open at bust but great material and pattern

Great wrap dress. Wish I owned it. Love the pockets and length. Was a little wrinkly when I got it but not terrible. Gaped a tiny bit but was definitely one of the more comfortable wrap dresses I've worn.
The material and pattern were very fun and it fit well over my chest. I still pinned it just in case but loved the look with sandals.

links_reviews_title: Great coverage with flexibility of a real wrap!
links_reviews_text: This dress really hit on all the details, I got a TON of compliments, specifically that it was "the perfect summer work dress"
Fit well. Little gaping in the armpit area. Wearing a camisole cured that. Beautiful dress. Received many compliments at work. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Such an easy, pretty wear - with pockets!
links_reviews_text: We all love a wrap. We all love pockets. This one is easy to love. Fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a job interview. Got the job.
links_reviews_text: Doesn't have the cleavage problem a lot of wrap dresses have. Unique and classy.
It was a good fit. Not too much cleavage.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever.
links_reviews_text: This gorgeous wrap dress is a true gem. The fabric feels light for spring/summer weather but is sturdy and holds up against wrinkles. Very flattering for small waist and big hip girls. So many compliments. Will rent again.

I normally avoid wrap dresses. They tend to expose too much of my chest for my comfort, and are hard to manage in an outside (read: windy) commute. This dress might have changed my outlook on the style. Highly recommend!! The dress hits just above my ankle, but I don't think it's awkward at all. The way that the top attaches to the belt and skirt is genius. Rather than having the top wrap all the way across, it naturally stops in the front of my ribs (hard to describe but you can see in the picture). The belt, attached to more skirt fabric, continues so that the wrap of the skirt aligns with the side of my body. I tied a bow in the back. On a day with 30 mph winds, this clever construction kept me from flashing the world.
Great print, generous fit. Pockets! Easy summer dress.

I'm usually a 12 or 14 and was swimming in the 14. I ordered it for work but it ended up looking too casual (mostly because it was big) so I wore it over the weekend. Material was super lightweight and comfortable on a hot (80•) day. Fun to wear. Would rent again in smaller size.

links_reviews_title: fabulous print and well constructed - runs large!
links_reviews_text: loved this cotton wrap dress from tory burch. buyer beware - size down. it runs big and is SUPER long. i'm 56 and even with heels it hit just a few inches above the ankle. kind of odd. but the print is lovely and it's well constructed with pockets. will rent again in a smaller size for sure.

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress I've rented so far
links_reviews_text: So so flattering, I absolutely loved wearing this dress and may consider buying it.
Loved this dress! Fit true to size or a little big if between sizes. Could wear year round and style differently!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a warm weather vacation!
links_reviews_text: This is so comfortable and effortless. Will definitely rent again! I got an 8 because that was what was available; it was a tad too big for me, but as it is a wrap dress, it wasn't too much of a problem.
Fantastic dress w/ great contrasting color. Comfortable. Well-made and cotton fabric. A few compliments. Would consider renting again for spring.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant colors-lightweight fabric in a good way
links_reviews_text: Perfect for seasonal transitions
Wore this on nantucket during day and to work. Loved it! Fit to size.

links_reviews_title: Nice and neat. Little large in upper body part of dress
links_reviews_text: Nice coloring and detail. Con was a little big in chwsr area.

Non-stop compliments all day from this dress! I would've kept this longer if it wasn't so memorable. I am small-busted, so the top was just a touch looser than I wanted, but this is a beautiful summer dress!

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but too busomy for that
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for work but it would not have worked well with my DD boobs. The wrap goes very low and there was no way I could clasp it and not make it look weird. I ended up wearing it for date night and loved it for that. Great, crisp dress with pleats.
Wore to an outdoor luncheon and garden tour on a sweltering day. Felt cool, comfortable and stylish.
Looked like something I dug out of the back of my closet because I had nothing else to wear. Very short waisted. Wrinkles easily. Skip.

links_reviews_title: Love love this dress! Would buy if I could afford it
links_reviews_text: Fits well and well made
I sized down and it worked great for a meeting. It does gape in the chest so just pin or use seamstress tape to close the front.
Perfectly versatile summer dress. You could wear this to almost anything. I loved the colors and the cut, it was hard to return this rental. Would absolutely rent again.
Fit perfectly. The length is great for work. It does show a little cleavage but not too much for an office setting.

This was a cute dress, not one of my favorites, but nothing really wrong with it. My typical size 8 wasn't available - I could choose a 6 or 10 and based on other reviews, I sized down and went with the 6. Big mistake! This dress wraps and buttons at the waist -- I could make the size 6 work, but it was certainly tight at the waist. I did wear a white cami under it and I'm glad I did because it did gape a bit at the bust. Perhaps in my typical size 8 that would have been even worse? At any rate, it's not one of those dresses I will wear over and over, but it was fun for a few times.
Fun dress, it's a great fit and the wrap is very flattering. Lots of compliments!

This dress was great but I look a little like a 1950s house wife. Loved the pockets and the way it wrapped. It was snug around my waist but a bit big in the top. If I owned it I would have had the top altered to look right. With a cropped cardigan over it, the fit on top was hidden a bit.
Plenty of fabric to cover my ample bust without needing a pin. Fabric is cool and breathable. Waist has two buttons so it looks tailored. It hits closer to my ankle than knee (5'5")
This is a true wrap dress. Although it was very flattering in the waist, there was nothing to keep the top closed. I would not recommend for bigger chested girls.

This dress is bold and beautiful and classic. It is easy to wear and comfortable and versatile. I wore it with a collared button down underneath for work and it was super cute. I love the layered look and it made it have a more laid back professional feel. Got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: summery and love that its cotton
links_reviews_text: I am small busted so everything is a little big on top, but it was fine. I like a slightly longer skirt for the office.
I love this too- the color is an easy way to play with yellow while still feeling somewhat neutral. This runs true to size but has a lot of stretch so you can size down.

This was very comfortable. I typically stay away from jackets that tie at the waist because I'm very short waisted, but this one seemed to work. Got several compliments from random people on the street and in the grocery store. Would love to try it with the matching pants.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this out ... but tried it on
links_reviews_text: Ended up not being able to wear this out but I did like the pattern. The material is a little stiff but the cut is flattering. The belt is not removable it's sewn on in the back. It seemed a little dressier in person. Something about it just didn't fit me right... if I would have had more time I would have worn it. Took a little longer to style.
I wore this to work and then out. I had to wrap it closed, but it stayed that way all day. Great rental.

links_reviews_title: A HEAD-TURNER! The only outfit I've ever purchased!
links_reviews_text: I cannot express how much I love this suit! When it first became a part of RTR I knew I had to wear it and the pieces (in my size) were unavailable for MONTHS! I first got the slacks and instantly purchased them, then waited months more for the blazer and finally it became available after stalking the site! The first time I wore this suit to work it was a complete head turner! RTR needs more suits because I don't wear slack without a matching blazer - I'm all about the power suit!

This snake skin print is right on trend. This blazer arrived new with tags - always a plus. I liked the Belt to add definition. I almost bought this one to keep but I found the fabric a little stiff and it felt on the smaller size for a size large.
This is a little boxy but incredibly comfortable. I will absolutely be renting this again but likely in a smaller size.

Belt was sewn on and hit at an odd place so I had to figure out a creative way to tie it behind my back. Overall still very cute! Great fit for someone who usually struggle with blazers looking too big! Great fit!
This is a really great jacket! Comfortable but very snazzy.
Fun blazer. Very flattering. Worn with fitted back pants and black tank.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket for more petite women
links_reviews_text: This was a wonderful jacket made out of beautiful thick snakeskin python material. I wore it out and it looked pretty good. My only comment is that at 5'9", The belt and button hit me way above my waist like on my rib cage. Similarly the jacket was just a little bit short for where it should've landed. I think this jacket would look spectacular on a shorter woman - Not for the tall!
Loved this dress! Paired it with tennis shoes for a wine tasting weekend and received so many compliments. Would rent again!

This dress made me feel like a million bucks - the material was thick and stitched well, hung beautifully and fit like a glove. I wore this for thanksgiving in Florida and got so many compliments. I only wish I could have bought it! Worth noting, it felt a little snug for an 8 - I am usually a 6, so sizing up to the 8 was a good move... and I needed to use double sided tape around the neckline so the girls remained covered - a note for bustier girls like me!
Love this brand. Loved this print. Can be made casual because it's so comfortable, but dressed up too! Wish I could have purchased this one.
This dress was super cute and flowy...received lots of compliments. Needed to wear a cami under due to the low cut and my chest size.

As a woman with an hourglass figure- I love a good wrap dress. I read the reviews on this but I didn't want to believe them. Unfortunately, everyone else was right. They are made with pockets and those pockets hit right at the widest point of your hips- making you much wider than you are! Didn't end up wearing.'
You probably need to wear some kind of short underneath. I wore spanks even tho I did need them. Looked out well. A little low cut, but not too low. The sleeves are so fricken cute too!
Cute dress great for a cooler summer day or could be worn in the fall with booties. I wore this to work but wore a tank underneath as v cut was borderline too low. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect throw on and go dress
links_reviews_text: Can imagine wearing this dress everywhere! Went the casual route with flat sandals but can't wait to try it with something more formal!
I don't like showing too much cleavage so I did have to safety pin the wrap underneath but if you can rock that, highly recommend ! I wore it to brunch with white sneakers.

Unfortunately Coronavirus cancelled our plans. So my husband and I wore this on an inside "date" when the kids went to bed. It was lovely. The sleeves are so well designed. I would have wanted a cami underneath for modesty purposes, but that is just personal preference. The placement of the pockets (yes! There are pockets!) could make you look a little hippy, but it did not bother me because I am a small frame hour glass. I have recently been losing weight and the dress was very good at covering my belly where I have lost the least amount of bulk. It would be great for a woman who was pregnant. Especially early on. Truly a lovely dress.
a size too small
I wear DDs and the top was very low. Needed something under it. Very romantic.

links_reviews_title: This is a stunning and flattering dress. LOVED
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size

Besides the smell that came off of the dress as the day progressed (I didn't notice it at first), the dress was gorgeous and I received so many compliments, even from strangers. Loved the cold and the style minus the odor - again the RTR customer service was very helpful addressing this issue, but I developed a habit of smelling all my new shipments since this second incidents:$

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a Desert Rehearsal Dinner
links_reviews_text: The other reviewers assessment that the arms are snug is correct. I'm glad I sized up to a 10 instead of my normal 8 for dresses. The sleeves were slim and the fabric has not stretch but the dress fit great! It is super comfy and the cut is perfect for pear shaped people like me. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner in Arizona and the colors were perfect for the setting. Would rent again!

The print is gorgeous and it fits like a dream. Sleeve detail is beautiful. I wore it once with heels for drinks out and another time with flat sandals for a daytime event. Lots of compliments. I felt great in this dress
Could have sized down a couple sized but such a lovely conservative print dress

links_reviews_title: A true wrap dress, but stays put!
links_reviews_text: Such a dreamy, pretty dress, and I didn't flash anyone - hooray!
I really liked this dress but if you are large busted, this is very low cut.

links_reviews_title: Really wanted to love this...but not flattering for an hourglass
links_reviews_text: I was excited to get this dress: love the colour (check), wrap dress (check) and pockets! (double check)...so was super bummed when I put it on. It is comfortable and I wore it to the office but it turned my hourglass shape into a ginormous pear. This would be a good dress for someone with a more athletic/straight build as the cut will give you more of an hourglass shape. But if you have natural curves, would recommend staying away from this one. The flow added about 2" extra to my hips.

I have a full bust and usually wear a medium or a large-sized up to the 10. Didn't fit even in the slightest like not even close. Size up if you are full bust or broad shoulders-and when I say size up, maybe like 2 or 3 sizes? Zero stretch. Also would echo other reviewers and say the color is more muted in person-dusty rose almost. Overall a huge disappointment.
color not as vibrant as appeared in photo online. kind of drab color and long, fit big.
Very comfortable and flows. Lots of compliments.
A little too low cut for me, kept feeling like I had to check the neckline throughout the day at work. Would be great for day to night.

links_reviews_title: Tight in arms and not comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was cute enough, but I like a wrap dress to have a bit of give to the fabric. It had absolutely no stretch and was so snug in the arms that I couldn't comfortably wear it. If you have a larger chest or don't have Michelle Obama arms, size up. Way up.
This dress is beautiful, but it runs crazy small! Size up - 1 or 2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and keeps you warm
links_reviews_text: This is very comfy and keeps you warm. However I decided to return it due to a lot of pilling observed when delivered. It's perfect if you are getting it to be cozy at home.

Vince is the best for soft and cozy knits. This item also has the benefit of being cut high enough at back to show off the seat of your pants. I wore this on stressful moving day and it was like a warm hug:)

For me, this was an oversized but extremely warm sweater. I wore this on a cold wintry day and did not have to turn on my space heater because it felt so warm. Be forewarned, that it feels very balloon like in the sleeves and shoulders.
Can be dressed up or down and very comfortable
I didn't want to send this piece back. It was very warm and thick wool, which was wonderful for the crisp mornings. It's not the most flattering sweater, but the shawl and warmth made up for it.

This sweater was so relaxed and easy to wear. It was a lot warmer than I expected it to be. It has plenty of room, though it's also a lot shorter than I expected. The color is really beautiful and the fabric isn't itchy.
This is a comfortable sweater but does run a tad large. The tag is a little irritating to the back of the neck if worn with a cami. Wore it a couple times before returning.
This sweater is so soft and cozy!!! It does have an "oversized" look and it hits right at the the top of my pants which made it different and looked nice. It feels so comfortable I could sleep in it!
Love this. So comfortable and adorable fit. Wanted to keep but definitely not in my budget. Love Vince cardigans.
very warm
Great warm sweater, super cute, boxy. Arrived "pilled" and looked very worn, needed to de-fuzz it before it could be worn and otherwise would have sent back.
Shorter then I thought which actually worked well. So comfy and I didn't send it back with the rest of my things. I wanted to wear it more.
Love!!! Paired it with jeans and a tee and received so many compliments. So simple but the cut makes it feel special.

I didn't end up keeping this item or wearing it. The fabric was a little itchy, but a very pretty color. I felt it ran true to size, the sleeves were a bit short on me, but I have long arms. I would probably size up only for the sleeve length and to make it less of a cropped sweater
This was a cute color and cozy fabric, but very very cropped. I am only 5'3 and the sweater was too short on me (arms and torso). It looked awkward and i didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, fit, and style.
links_reviews_text: This sweater was so pretty. It was also much warmer than I expected!
It's oversized and great quality!
Loved this to jazz up my everyday work look.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and warm. Loved the color.
links_reviews_text: Great everyday item.
Wore this constantly. So warm and cozy and the green breaks up my neutrals nicely. Oversized yet cropped.
Super cozy, easy to wear sweater. Great hunter green sweater that fit true to size. I loved the cropped look with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting - cozy and soft
links_reviews_text: I rented this in the fall and just rented it again. To me, this is the perfect use of RTR - sweaters always seem overpriced to me and get pilly the longer you own them. Instead I rented this one fo two months and I can move on without the expense or hassle of owning. Cropped fit works well with high waisted work skirts and regular jeans.

This has a nice shawl collar with a cropped fit. Perfect to get me out of my duster length cardio rut. It was SO warm and cozy. Could totally be worn with a tank and still keep you plenty warm on a chilly night.

Love Vince sweaters! The quality was amazing and the green color was beautiful for everyday wear. The sweater was definitely oversized and I wished I would have sized down to an xs. It also was more cropped than i was expecting, but looked great when paired with skinny jeans.
Loved everything about this sweater. Got a size bigger and it was very cozy, comfortable, and nice quality. Very pleased with this.
Cropped unlike other shawl front sweaters I've tried so it's draped and cozy, but flattering. I usually hate this style because they're too long and look grumpy. So perfect I kept it for 2 months!
This was super warm! Maybe a little short for me at 5'8".

This is a great casual everyday sweater. I wore it to travel in November and i would recommend a light layer under it. It's very warm and perfect for using in place of a coat when traveling to and front the airport and such with a scarf and gloves! Not a summer piece for sure. Great knit! Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I chose this for a weekend getaway for fall colors and then everyday
links_reviews_text: Turned to this item quite a few times during the fall cold snap, very cozy, but the cut of it took away any bulky feel...

links_reviews_title: I loved the color, softness and warmth of this sweater!
links_reviews_text: The only con here is it’s a little bulky. Functions well light as outerwear or in a cold indoor setting. I’d consider renting it again!
Came to mid waist - unflattering, size up.

I loved this sweater. If it was cheaper, I might have purchased it. I do wish it was a pullover instead of a cardigan, in the end and it was shorter than I usually like my sweaters to be. But it's so thick and soft and cozy.
Terrific cardigan. Super warm. Very stylish. Color goes with many things.
Flattering fit, great color, wears beautifully

These pants are gorgeous in real life. The fabric, the details, the cut - all quite edgy. Nice, fluid silhouette. But, the pant legs are very long. I am 5'4" and put on 4 in heels to try on these pants. They still touched the ground. I am returning without wearing. Also, size large was a bit large in the seat and waist, which i knew might happen because i am usually a medium or 8-6 in pants.
Major middle school throwback pants with the tear away! Loved these! They were a bit long so they dragged a bit but were so comfy that they made up for it.

links_reviews_title: Kobe x Sporty Spice inspired office look
links_reviews_text: This is my first unlimited outfit. As soon as I put them on I was even more in love! The set is so comfortable! With the blazer off still looks chic but can be dressed down. Every person I came in contact with complimented the outfit. Men especially were quick to compliment. I'm 5'4" and was afraid the pants would be too long. I'm wearing a 3.5" pump and have no issues. I could probably get away with sneaker and still not drag. I would definitely consider renting again!

links_reviews_title: Chic, sporty pants that can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10 and these pants hit right around my ankle which I thought was short at first but this is how they are shown fitting in the picture on the model. The snaps up the sides can be unsnapped up to around the knee or can be worn totally closed. I wore them with a tee and a jacket and sneakers but they could be dressed up with a blazer for a more professional look. They were very comfortable I would definitely rent again!
Didn't wear. Just looked droopy. Also about an inch too long for 5"2'

links_reviews_title: A lot of compliments on this- it gets attention.
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this with and without the jacket. Fun, comfy, and makes a statement.

links_reviews_title: To funky for work, to work like for play.
links_reviews_text: I really liked these pants, but just never could find the right time to wear them. If I had a less conservative work place, these would have worked great. They fit well, good material, and still seemed like office dress pants in the fit... but somehow just didn't fit anywhere.

links_reviews_title: Flowy, comfy, stylish. Perfect for a day at the office!
links_reviews_text: Flowy, comfy, stylish. Perfect for a day at the office!

These pants are so cute, but unfortunately too long for me. I'm 5'3 and I tried them on with 4 inch heels which kind of worked, but I wasn't prepared to wear heels all day. If I was taller, these would be great.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress even at 32 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: Wanted a looser dress because at the time was 32 weeks pregnant this fit perfectly and would even love if I wasn't pregnant. Plenty of room and nice and flowy. Great for a day out, easy to dress up or down with. Great dress

links_reviews_title: Great maxi dress for end of summer
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit large at the bust and unfortunately didn't have adjustable straps. Heavier material so wouldn't recommend in the heat/humidity but was perfect for two weeks after Labor Day
Fit great!! And beautiful material!
So pretty and perfect for a summer outing. The fabric is very thick and heavy, it weighed a lot so it was kinda annoying to wear for a long day. But it looked very pretty!

links_reviews_title: Cute for a cool spring/summer day
links_reviews_text: The straps were about 2 inches to long but once I pines those to fit the dress was perfect! It's think material so it's not really Foley or cool but for a "summer" day in San Francisco it was great!
This is a BEAUTIFUL embroidered dress with pockets, but it was uncomfortably tight around my chest and I couldn't wear it.

Fit is definitely loose and easy; as other reviewers have noted, straps are way too long and will show your bra. I tied the straps together into a cross-back with a hair tie and covered it with a cardigan to be able to wear it. But I love love love the 3D flowers and pockets and swingy, luxe fabric. Really fighting the urge to buy this one.

Loved this dress! Plenty of room, I'd say it runs on the large size I could have used a L or 12, instead of XL 14, but still worked great! Great amount of length too. Love the pretty blue and white floral print/stripe and love the deep ruffle at the bottom hem. Great dress for spring/summer or vacation rental! I'd def rent again. Even thought about buying!

links_reviews_title: Not super airy as you'd hope!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way it looked but fabric was so hot. Not an easy, breezy maxi. Granted it was a hot hot day but I was dying in this.

Wow, I am so glad I rented this. I [almost] never go braless or show my arms because insecurities lol but I felt so comfortable and confident in this dress. It looked beautiful, effortless, and the detailing/stitching is sick!!! There was no belt with it but I didn't mind because imo the shape without any waist cinching makes it more high fashion. I will rent this one again

links_reviews_title: Stunning maxi - perfect for your next trip
links_reviews_text: I adored renting this dress during my maternity...I was 8-9 months too! Wore it multiple times, even though the top was a bit small on me. Size up in this one and bring on your next Nantucket vacation. So dreamy (and got tons of compliments on it!)

Can't get over the details of this dress! Just stunning. I got a few compliments in this dress, which is always a plus! My only complaint (and it's not a big deal while wearing a dress this beautiful) is that the dress is a bit heavy.

This dress is gorgeous, and it has pockets!!!! But, its shapeless without the belt that is pictured in some of the reviews. The fabric is heavy but its a very well constructed dress and I love the quality! I am small busted and where the straps are not adjustable, I had to wear a padded strapless bra to give some shape up top.

I loved wearing this Nicholas dress - for the most part. The other reviews are very accurate in saying that the bust runs small - especially given how full the skirt is. I typically wear a 10 in Nicholas, but I rented a 12 based on the reviews. The 12 was much much too large in the skirt, so I switched to the 10. The 10 fit better, but was slightly tight in my chest (I am a 36 B/C for reference). The dress does have a lot of fabric but if you are able to size down, it hangs beautifully. I wore this in Rome with temperatures in the low 80s and it was perfect. The amount of fabric makes it a bit heavier, but you can tell it's high-quality. I loved the length on me. I would definitely love to wear this dress again!

Fabric is thicker so it works well for cooler spring days with a Jean jacket. I'm 5'4" and it hit right at the ankle so felt too long to wear with sneakers. Sandals better. Make sure to wear the belt- it's a little shapeless without it

I rented this for a Mommy & Me photo shoot with my son. The dress is so beautiful and comfortable! The fabric is thick without being heavy or hot. The flowers are stitched on and give the dress a great texture. I would say that it does run a little big even with the belt, so I would size down. I may have to keep this one, it really is a timeless piece!

links_reviews_title: It was just a happy hour gathering event, but the dress was great for it.
links_reviews_text: Top was tight as other's mentioned. I wore it with a light jacket and it worked well.
Did not wear due to dress being too short (I'm 5'10"). Very pretty details on the dress though. Pretty color.

This is truly a beautiful dress; the fabric is heavy and has sweet flowered detail throughout. However, the sizing is off. I ordered a 4 and the top was so tiny that I sent back and chose an 8, which was slightly large, but I wore it anyway. The straps are super tiny and as a result of the heavy fabric did and have trouble holding the weight of the dress. There's a panel where the tags is that flips out. I wore a white tee under, so it somewhat helped.
Could have worn the dress the bust was really tight and decided to wear something else.
I wanted to love this sooo much but it was gigantic and unflattering so I never wore it
Flattering on chest. Photographs well! Heavier and extra material at bottom. Perfect length to wear flats

links_reviews_title: Probably works for many body shapes
links_reviews_text: Just the right length on me (5'3") with 2 inch wedges. Shape was a little different than most maxis, narrow (but not too narrow even on my wide ribcage) and gradually flares out; but maybe it just felt different because of the thick fabric. I wore it on hot days and wished it was a little thinner but it wasn't bad. Beautiful embroidery, felt more expensive than it is.

This dress is so tight across the bust and back ..and I am small chested and have narrow upper body. Extremely uncomfortable and looks terrible when you sit down because the fabric bunches up in the front by the straps. I don't know how anyone is fitting it this..it's shame because fabric is very pretty *Dress is very loose everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful details, runs small in the top
links_reviews_text: I was pleasantly surprised when I pulled this dress out of the bag because I wasn't expecting the stunning details and embroidery. It was so much prettier than I thought it would be. I was just so bummed that it ran really small in the chest, which is deceiving because it's very loose fitting and billowy otherwise. It squeezed me almost to the point of being uncomfortable and I'm very small chested. I think anyone larger than a B cup would need to size WAY up in this. The fabric does not stretch, so there's no give whatsoever. I wore it to dinner because it was too pretty not to, but I'll rent again later on and size up for comfort!

Loved this dress so much! Wore it twice. Once to drinks at a golf club and the second time on a date night. I am short and the 0 was the perfect length with some platform sandals but it was definitely on the fitted side over my 34A boobs. Definitely renting again but I'm going to size up for more comfort!
Pretty heavy fabric. Wanted to love, but too small in chest

Beautiful flowy, full Spring dress! I didn't end up wearing it bc it was too big but will try in a size down. The only thing I didnt care for was that it is not lined. It's got a loose hem that you may have to tuck in on top which surprised me. Otherwise, lovely!

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress--runs extremely SMALL in BUST
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but was unable to wear it because of the super small fit in the chest area. Would definitely recommend sizing up unless you are small-chested. This would be great for those looking for a tighter fit in the bust.

I rented this thinking that it was a flowly, light maxi dress. It's flowy and pretty, but it's heavy! I was thinking about taking it on vacation to Florida, but I think I would melt. The straps were long on me so I tied the straps together in the back. The overall look was the same, but it looked much better.

links_reviews_title: Tight across the chest, but gorgeous
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun with beautiful details. The only issue was the fit in the bust. The straps were long on me, but my breasts were completely squished underneath the top (and I am not large by any means). I ended up wearing it out, but it was quite uncomfortable. But hey, beauty is pain sometimes...

links_reviews_title: Cute but the top is SO TINY
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but couldn't wear because the top was so tight. I'm typically a 6 and ordered the 6 but my boobs wouldn't fit in this at all - I'm a 34D. If you're large chested, definitely size up - but the dress is very flowy so sizing up could make it massive. It also didn't come with the belt.
The reviews were right, it was way too tight around the vest area. Detailing is beautiful though.

It's a beautiful dress and I wish it would've fit properly. However if you are big chested this dress is not for you. It's very tight/slender on the top. I recommend going a size up if you've got big boobs.
The body of the dress is huge but the top fits tight. It's a miss for me
Reading reviews that this ran large, I thought I'd be ok with a size down. Although it's a trapeze style, the chest is small! I couldn't even get it over my girls .

The material is a bit heavy, the straps are a bit long (I cinched them with a ribbon), and the chest was a bit tight for me. The cut of the dress was relaxed and easy...and the embroidery was beautiful. Multiple compliments on the dress. I would consider renting again.

I really liked this dress but my husband said I looked like a curtain in it. I can see where he's coming from. This is def a dress that girls can appreciate but guys don't get, in my opinion. Still, I liked it. Tight in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Wayyyy too small in the bust
links_reviews_text: Dress is beautiful but it is not for anyone larger than a B cup. I wore once but the chest was super snug which is weird because the rest of the dress is so roomy. Rented as maternity option at 6 months and had ample room for belly but squished chest. Looked odd without a cardigan. From the reviews, it looks like sizing up may not help. Larger size would probably still be snug up top and even roomier below. Would look good on tall and slender with smaller bust.

I love the look of this dress, but it is extremely small in the chest. I'm a 32A (barely) and it barely fit over my head. The bottom is big and flowy which I don't mind at all, but would definitely recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE so many compliments
links_reviews_text: I can't wait to rent this again! Fit was spot on in all the right places, but I was really wow'ed by the construction, quality fabric, and seam details. Tons of compliments. Very classy dress for work, but maybe not dressy enough for cocktail/evening.
I loved this dress. I ordered a 10 (normally an 8), and it fit great! It was comfortable and very easy to move around in. I will definitely rent this stylish charm again!

links_reviews_title: Not great for curvy women. Too much cleavage for work
links_reviews_text: Way too much for work. The split in the front shows a lot of thigh and the cut shows a lot of cleavage. I would wear this on a date but not to work.

I did have to double side tape the front shut but other than that I thought it fit great and worked for curvy girls. I would agree the front is too revealing for work but other than that I would recommend!

The dress runs a little big in my opinion. I wore it anyway to work and got compliments but I felt like the dress was too big for me. I'll definitely size down next time. The bust area is very low cut so I wore a black bandeau with it to work, but if you are going out with the girls or your significant other, it would be really sexy! So it's a good work to night dress because all you need to do it take the bandeau off. May need help clasping the collar. But good material and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Professional but need to pin the chest area if going to work!
links_reviews_text: Material was very high quality and a bit on the dressier side. I had to ping the v neck in so I wouldn't be inappropriate. Other that that, I loved how comfortable the dress was and it was a perfect fit without being too tight and length wise hit my knee. I felt ready for my big presentation in this power outfit!

links_reviews_title: I don't want to send this back...
links_reviews_text: I rented this because I could tell it would be flattering but I had no idea I was renting THE most perfect LBD for a curvy gal. I'm sure it would look great on anyone though. It is fairly busty though so I imagine it helps to have some more voluptuous "girls" to fill that out. I ended up wearing it to a wedding and just felt classy and iconic. I will absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Versatile black dress that can be dressed up even more
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely dress. It has a touch of a business vibe due to the shape, but almost feels too formal for the office. I rented it to go from day to night and it worked well for that. The dress didn't seem too low cut or the slit too high like others have said. I was comfortable in the office with both. Maybe the black tights helped. The dress runs small in the hips and large on top. I sized up but think I shouldn't have.

links_reviews_title: Love! Just a little too big in the chest
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments and felt amazing but the top was a bit big so I had to wear fashion tape
The dress fit beautifully and I got so many compliments! Wish I could've kept it!

I tried the dress on and it fit beautifully however I did not wear it as the front was a little too low for work and the slit in the center was a little too high. It would be absolutely perfect for an event, just not for work. I mean, you could wear it for work but you would have to safety pin it, or wear a camisole underneath it, which I didn't think about it until now.
Sophisticated black dress for work or date but may need to pin cheat.

links_reviews_title: A bit dressy for work but very nice. Low cut- needs a cami.
links_reviews_text: Usually I'm a 16- but got an 18 because this label is sometimes a bit small. The 18 was spacious. Nice dress! A bit dressy for the office.
I wanted to love it, but it just kind of hung on me despite my sizing down and just wasn't flattering. I didn't end up wearing
Fabric seemed of good quality, but couldn't wear it because it was WAY too small.
Perfect for work. Very flattering. V neck was low, but I was able to keep it appropriate for work. Wish I could have also work it for date night.

As many others said, not a great work option, especially for curvy women. The neckline was too low and gaping so I needed to wear a black tank top with it. And the slit in front was way too high for work so I wore black tights. The ruffle in front covers the slit when you sit which made it workable. While I felt it was not conservative enough for the office, the collar and belted look wouldn't be my pick for a night out either. It was fine for a day, but I wouldn't rent again.
Overall very beautiful and I made it work with tape but the bust area is rather revealing due to being loose and I wear a 32/DD

I wore this as a day-to-night outfit to work and this totally fit the bill. I felt elegant and sophisticated all day/evening. Badgley Mishka's clothes fit me like a dream, and this was no different. I styled it with black tights and white reptile skin books. Simple jewelry since the neckline really does it all. However I did have to safety pin it closed since the V-neck revealed a bit too much cleavage for the office.
It fit well. True to size. Liked the fabric and shape of it.

links_reviews_title: Too big. Thought it would run small.
links_reviews_text: Too big. Will try to get smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Very professional and comfortable. Wore to day-long business meetings and highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: The skirt was ripped when I received it, but that did not affect wear. Compliments all day.
Tried on but didnʻt wear because it was too long for my height, unfortunately....so returning.
I ordered my normal size and I was swimming in it, especially top half. Will try again AT LEAST one size down, maybe two.

links_reviews_title: Nice for a wedding or reception
links_reviews_text: The dress is a great fit. I wore this for a work evening reception and it was perfect. Sexy but not seductive. The top was a little large for me and I added a safety pin to close up the clevege. Overall very nice dress and I would wear it again.
Would have worn this, but definitely night work outing not day. This left me feeling a little overexposed.

links_reviews_title: Very low cut and overall did not fit me well.
links_reviews_text: very low cut. knee length on me (5'4)

links_reviews_title: The front pleat below waste was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Busty ladies will need a camisole to hide cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Great fit but low cut for work
links_reviews_text: Great fit but low cut for work

The collar on the dress makes it look like it would be good for work but then the draping I'm the front makes it look like it's for a wedding, doesn't really work well in an office setting might work well for someone's grandma at a wedding. Also, if you are busty you'll be popping cleavage

links_reviews_title: classy and complementary to full figured women
links_reviews_text: love the material and how it falls
