Wore once. Def have to pin at chest. One reviewer mentioned a high slit, but I didn't feel it was high. And it's hidden by the front ruffle mostly. Could perhaps be an issue if it's tight and your sitting. I just didn't like the look. Felt frumpy or funeral appropriate

links_reviews_title: Great for work or a night out
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing!! It was a little low cut for work, but add a modesty piece in the middle and you're golden. It accentuates your curves and hides the little imperfections with the loose fitting style.
I was worried the material detail on the front would add girth and not look right...but that was not the case for me. Perfect for a special fancy dinner.

links_reviews_title: Fit tight in the bottom and the top was too revealing for work

links_reviews_text: Super cute, got a lot of compliments. Perfect day to night dress. Only issue is the bust, it gapes open and I feel like wearing a tank under it takes something away from the dress (but is totally necessary)

links_reviews_title: Not appropriate for work for curvy girls!
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear for work, and didn't realize that there is a long slit in the front of the dress. The slit made the dress incredibly inappropriate to wear to work! So disappointing because it's a beautiful and comfortable material.

links_reviews_title: Too high and too wide leg
links_reviews_text: It's limited show options w these pants. They were cute but nothing to write home about.
These are the type of pants you undo at your desk but you still love them.
Very stretchy material but also form fitting and extremely flattering! I got so many compliments wearing these!
so flattering and very warm!!
If you know how to style outfits then this pair of leopard pants won't be hard to wear. They are shorter than most pants, and although they aren't very stretchy, they were very comfortable!
Fits like most Levi's, size up
Loved the high waist! They had a nice stretch! They were a little long I'm 5'2". I would definitely rent again
Had a wider leg then I thought and they were a bit short so I found it hard to pair with shoes without it looking silly. Fun print and comfortable fabric but overall not that flattering.

links_reviews_title: I bought these pants. I loved them so much.
links_reviews_text: I am really obsessed with the way these jeans fit. I didn't think I would like the animal print as much as I did but it's really a cool statement piece. I rented for my recent trip to California and ended up purchasing. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Don't have a bad thing to say... everyone was telling me to purchase!
links_reviews_text: The fit description is spot on and I loved the corduroy instead of just being printed denim. It elevated the style and allowed for me to dress up or down.
These pants are so cool and easy to dress up a little with black booties or dress down with sneakers. Lots of compliments! They run small for Levi's, but sizing up worked perfectly.
Love love loved these so much, got so many compliments! My friends said I looked like a brats doll
I love these pants - they fit high on the waist, have a light stretch and look good dressed up or down. Will be buying based on the sheer amount of compliments I received.

These were such a vibe - the cords + cheetah pattern + slight crop were perfect. My only complaint - Levi's tend to be tricky with sizing and these were no exception. I'm a true 27 in 8/10 of my jean purchases/rentals - but these were just a bit snug through the waist and butt. If these were just a *little bit* more comfy, they woulda been staying with me!
I seriously almost bought these pants. I got sooo many complements on them. The high rise button fly corduroy was to die for. So in style this fall!!!
These fit great and I got tons of compliments wearing them.
I was so bummed I couldn't wear these. They run 1 size too small. If you wear a 30, get a 31.

These corduroys were such an easy way to have a fun look. I wore these with a black sweater and black ankle boots. The pants hit right at the ankle (I'm 5'9") so the ankle boot was the perfect combo. Very fitted through the waist and hips but nice loose fit through the thighs and knees. Not much stretch, but still comfortable. The pattern is a great way to take a jeans and sweater look up a notch. Happy with this rental.
Warm and comfy but they were a tad shorter then I wanted. Very fun!
Thinner than expected. Runs small! Size down
I loved the style of these but they were too small
These pants are so comfortable and truly high waisted just like I like it. I have long legs for 5'3" and they hit me right above the ankles.

links_reviews_title: Fun pants, with so many styling different possibilities!
links_reviews_text: These pants are super cute and flattering! They do run on the small side, since they are so high waisted, on me, they hit my low ribs, so I sized up. I was able to wear these twice, once with a simple white tee and the second time dressed up more with a black top. I received compliment after compliment. They were comfortable and fun.

I wore these to a country music concert with cowboy boots (no pic, sorry) and loved how high waisted they were. The material is a corduroy, so kind of cozy, with some stretch. So cute in the animal print.

links_reviews_title: The most fun/ comfortable pants of all time
links_reviews_text: I had very low expeditions and was blown out of the water. These are SO fun and comfortable. I have a bubble butt and was nervous there would be a weird gap up top but they fit like a glove l!
The fit was good but in the end the pattern just wasn't for me.

links_reviews_title: Super cute pants for a Fall weekend!
links_reviews_text: Wore these with an oversized neutral colored sweater during a casual day in Nashville. Received tons of compliments.

Very cute jeans!! Will deff be renting these again. They ran a little small, but pretty true to size. With most jeans, there's no stretch so if you don't want them so snug I would go up a size. I think next time I rent them I will go up one!
Unfortunately, I couldn't wear these, as they were so high-waisted, they didn't fit right around my waist and looked strange on my body type.
Loved these, but they did run small in my opinion. I am typically a 28/29 in most sizes but the 30R was quite snug in the waist and hip. I would not recommend for a pear or curvy figure.

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE but definately like ur waist training
links_reviews_text: Omg so many compliments and would work for so so many situations but SO tight in the waist
Loved the fit and cut and print of these jeans sooo much I may want to buy the next round. It is corduroy so it's a bit thicker than regular jeans
Fit but very snugly and that made it unflattering.
True to size. Hard to figure out where to have the waist sit, but overall beautiful and received a TON of compliments

This skirt was cute, warm enough, and in a nice, fun fabric. I had presumed it had black in it from the photos, so when I realized it was navy, I had more limited styling options than planned. This look was fine but a little more matronly than I would have liked overall, so I only wore it once.

links_reviews_title: It's knit-so if you want to hide curves (I'm not saying you need too) but if you want to-wear spanx.
links_reviews_text: I love the bold colors and heavy knit- but sisters- this will hug EVERY curve you have and then outline it. Also- this is navy not black - so heads up when you are outfit planning. Finally- it's crazy long! I'm almost six feet and I have it sitting really high so it hits above my knee. Petite friends, this will be a midi/maxi on you
The material is kind of stretchy but slinky. Colorful and fun. Overall liked it and got a lot of compliments but it wasn't a favorite.
Very classy and work appropriate but the bright colors made it so fun to wear
Comfy, though form fitting skirt. Had a nice weight and a little bounce. So fun to wear. Lots of compliments.

This skirt is comfortable and colorful!! It's a knit with a little bit of stretch, but a pretty snug fit at the waist before it starts to flare. I would say it still fits true to size. Loved it paired with a simple tee for work!
This skirt was so much fun to wear and the colors were on point!

links_reviews_title: This was a showstopper! Got countless compliments! I highly recommend this. Will surely rent again!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. The use of a blue top on made it outstanding and brought out the other colors. Sits very comfortably

I've been trying to rent this skirt foreverrrrr but it was always taken. I finally got to rent it for a work conference and I've never felt more confident. Pairs nicely with a blazer to dress up, and pictures truly don't do the material justice. Nice weight, vibrant colors, and flattering waist. I can't wait to rent again or hopefully buy. Tall girls this skirt is your best friend!

links_reviews_title: Not too long for shorter ladies!
links_reviews_text: This colorful skirt was perfect for a vacation! I was initially worried about the length (I'm 5"4 and have never done a midi skirt before). This wasn't too long! The fabric is thick and slightly heavy - definitely something to consider if you're thinking about wearing this piece in the summer or if you live in an especially warm climate. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved that this skirt was so vibrant and really colorful. Fit great too!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. I wore it at my high-waist. Very comfortable and loved the fabric quality.
Wore this for a work event and got so many compliments. It's thick but comfortable and the colors definitely stand out. Probably too hot for summer, but it was perfect for a spring day in the office.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and fun skirt, wore for several occasions
links_reviews_text: The skirt is a heavy material with pleats. The elastic had a little stretch and then it flowed out from there. I wore it with a crop top for a wedding shower and with a solid tee for work/ church. It was super comfortable, and the colorful stripes were trendy and fun!
Love love this! Fits amazing and it's super fun to wear. I needed something fun for a few work events coming up, and this fit the bill. It's going to be hard sending this back. Will rent again!
What a fun skirt! Bright and bold. Comfortable and stretchy with an elastic waist. Size medium fit well, so maybe this runs small. Can wear with any color because every color is in the skirt.
Nice fit and unique, but ultimately a little too over the top for me.
Great quality, can dress it up or down. Wore it with a t shirt for a fun casual look.
Loved this so much. Great thick fabric that hid bulges, super fun bright colors, and perfect for day to night. Got so many compliments and felt so good!
Great quality material! Loved the way it felt and looked. Very comfy!

links_reviews_title: Great piece to get in the Spring mood
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS- length is super flattering and the material is a little on the thicker side which makes it appropriate for the spring season. The only con I'd say is that it shows panty lines or any curve at the waist/hips.
Skirt is a heavier weight, might be too hot if you're going to be in the sun all day. Also I thought the stripes were black but they are navy. Very cute! I'm 5'4" and this skirt was midi length.
Material did have decent stretch around waist. I wore the skirt more as a high waisted skirt. Fun striped print and I received many compliments wearing this piece. Would probably rent again.
Paired this with a plain white T and white pumps for work. Tons of compliments! The material is very thick so it's nice for the cold early April weather!
Skirt was super comfy, great fit, tons of compliments

I was happily surprised with the fabric of this- it's a thick almost knit material. Beautiful! I took inspiration from previous reviewers and paired with black top, tights and booties. It was a great, fun work look.
This skirt is AMAZING! I wore it to work with a full coverage top and then out to dinner with the mid drift top. Disclaimer: the skirt is not black (although I wore black with it), but rather navy.

links_reviews_title: Loved and wish I could buy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt so much. I got so many compliments! The waistband is elastic and the skirt is so comfortable.

This is the perfect skirt to bring in spring with! It's on the thicker size so it's a great wait for the awkward period when there is snow on the grown but is 50 degrees. This is why rent the runway is great I would never buy this but was fun to take for a spin.

links_reviews_title: So fun for a rainy day at work! So many compliments before I got in the door!
links_reviews_text: I followed some of the other pics - and paired with black tank, leather jacket and booties. Seriously had been at work for 10 mins and everyone I ran into complimented me on this FUN, awesome skirt. So comfortable too!!!
Loved the skirt - it is clingy so I made sure to wear Spanx underneath. Medium was a good fit.

I wore this for a work presentation and received many compliments. The colors were fun and I loved giving it a lil twirl. Since I'm short, I rolled the dress twice around the waist to make it a better length for me.
Loved the fit and length. Got tons of compliments. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pop of Color Brightens Up Work Wear
links_reviews_text: Fantastic colors in this modest yet figure flattering skirt! It is very high waisted, snug at the hips, then flares out to create a lovely feminine silhouette. I wore it with a classic white shirt, tied at the waist and an obi belt to accentuate how tiny this makes the waist look! Another plus is how comfortable it is, I wore it on a plane twice, better than jeans! It's also quite warm, I stayed cozy in winter temps with tights. The fabric is heavyweight, high quality construction. As other reviewers have noted, the primary color is navy, not black. However, paired with black shoes and belt and it looked great. Many compliments including a 20-something man who stopped me on the street and said it was the most amazing skirt he'd ever seen and I looked gorgeous in it. That has NEVER happened in my life (I'm 52). You do have to step into the skirt, but it does stretch. Travels well, does not wrinkle at all. Will definitely rent again.
Rented this as part of my unlimited- so many compliments and so cute!

I wore this with a neon sweatshirt to work, a black wrap top, a chambray blouse, and a tucked in t shirt. It goes with everything. I wore it to work and out on a frigid night in Montreal with black tights. It's perfect! It has clearly been well loved because my skirt had a hole on a seam. I may have bought it if it were in better condition.

Great one and done rental as it is bright and memorable. Fun for winter to brighten up a dreary work day. Narrow fit at the top, a small fit me high waisted (just above my belly button), stretchy but will show every curve between your waist and bottom!

links_reviews_title: Guaranteed to put a smile on your face
links_reviews_text: This skirt is pretty in the photos, but AMAZING in person! The colors are so bold and beautiful, the fabric is nice and thick, and the cut is chic and flattering. Feels and looks like such a quality piece. I love it! Looked great with a black turtleneck, black leather jacket, black tights and booties. I think it could look equally cute with a graphic t-shirt and chucks...
Light knit and super comfy. Hit mid-calf for me (5'8). Wore casually with leather jacket and dressed it up for work with a cashmere sweater. Super flexible and fun!

links_reviews_title: Very nice, casual but dressy shirt!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a cocktail reception and dinner with a client at a conference. It was great and very flattering.
This top was cute. I like that it was a shorter length. I wore it with black pants. It didn't blow me away, but I thought it was a good top for work or casual events.
#ootd
Very comfortable, easy to wear, gorgeous color palette
Comfy but snug.
Love this top! Recommend! It's so cute and pretty!
I go between size 2 and 4 and ordered the 4. Shoulders have a slimmer fit. Nice top!

links_reviews_title: I love the way this fits! I will definitely rent again!!!
Super cute and comfortable! Wore with black pants.
links_reviews_text: Short. Definitely looks best tucked in.
Great for work or weekend. Very flattering. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Quality. Feels so soft and silky
links_reviews_text: Fits but have a puncher in the back. I ordered a size up and will wear that one.
A bit shapeless on me. The fabric didn't feel as soft as I expected - it was just ok.

links_reviews_title: Puffy sleeves and deep v neck
links_reviews_text: I needed to wear a camisole because this v was deep and low. The blouse is fun to wear with jeans and very comfortable though I wasn't crazy about how puffy the sleeves were at the shoulders.
This was a really cute shirt that I ended up liking more than I expected to. It has nice colors and fit really well. Not a show-stopper but a solid weekend shirt

links_reviews_title: cute but not the best fit
links_reviews_text: This pattern is nice and the fabric is soft. It fit everywhere but around my hips - it was too small there. I was looking for a kind of flowy vibe so that was disappointing. Other than that, really cute and can be worn tucked in
this fits so perfectly- not too fitted. i love the details of this - ties at the bottom of sleeves and little puff sleeves. fabric is so luxe too. i'd rent this again!

The fit was awesome on my petite, busty frame. The v neck allowed for a respectable amount to cleavage and the poofy sleeves did not overwhelm me. I wore this several times over a few weeks - on a date under a jean jacket, with a skirt to Thanksgiving and with nice jeans to a Christmas party. I would rent again!
Fit true to size. I liked that it was hip-length and not too long or short.
Great material, sleeves were really cute, a bit short and low cut...wore to work with a cami
This is a good everyday work top. It was easy to wear alone or under a jacket. The fabric is breathable and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Great top for work with jeans
links_reviews_text: fit well
Great fall color top with nice detailing
this was a nice pattern and style going for going out socially or work
Wasn't sure how to sum up the overall fit. The waist was fine, sleeve length was perfect, but the shoulder/neckline was large on me.
Super flattering cut and really pretty print. If it weren't so expensive I would have bought it!

This shirt was cute and definitely work or casual appropriate with how you dress it. It was just a bit short for my personal taste. Also you'll have to tie and deal with the sleeves, a small detail but if you hate ties then this shirt may not be for you.
I'm usually an 8 but had read that this runs small so I ordered a 10 and it was still a little tight through the chest! Super cute and nice quality but definitely size up one or two sizes!

links_reviews_title: cute, easy to wear top for fall
links_reviews_text: nice silky fabric, easy to wear. The tie sleeves make them adjustable and good for shorter frames.

This top may run a smidgen big. The sleeves are volumuness but not over the top. The ties on the arms didn't get in the way at all. The V neck was a little deep and I felt far more comfortable with a cami underneath. Solid rental.
Overall good fit. Cute and comfy top that still looked polished for a more casual work environment. Would wear on weekends as well.

links_reviews_title: lovely, comfortable top--dresses up or down
links_reviews_text: unlike others, I did not find the front too low, although if it were cold or I didn't want to show any cleavage, I could have worn a tank/camisole underneath. I liked that the sleeves tied, as often long sleeves are too long on me. I wore it to dress up jeans and it was light enough to tuck into dress black pants.
Pretty for work

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse, perfect for transition to Fall
links_reviews_text: Beautiful draping and details. Light fabric but darker colors, a good transition piece from summer to fall. I wore it with dark jeans and with black slacks, and both looked great .

Gorgeous blouse. The length is a bit shorter, but on trend. I think it is best with a high waist pant. The fuller sleeves are the are the standout feature with 3/4 length and lovely, diminutive ties that do not get in the way.

I likes this cardigan much more than I though I would like it. So soft and not scratchy. Superb quality, thick and cozy. Warm but not too hot. The color is perfect for fall. Can add a belt for more fun styling. Considered buying, but price wasn't allowing. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very warm but a bit heavy
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful color that goes with a lot more items in my closet than I expected. Sadly it didn't close at the front so I had to get another for when the temperature fell during the winter. Definitely worth having during the mid fall season.
This was exactly what I was looking for. It's a great piece for fall/cooler weather.
Very thick and cozy
This sweater coat is beautiful. Very well made and thick and warm. Great for late fall and winter wear.
Sweater was weightier than I expected. Definitely warm. Was a little challenging to layer due to how thick the knit is. Color was great and was able to pair this with my outfit almost daily.
Nice length and excellent weight. A bit too much fabric in the underarm area.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, not comfortable or flattering
links_reviews_text: I love the color of this sweater but the fabric itself was stiff and didn't settle well. It just looked bulky - and not in a flattering, fun shapeless way. The fabric was also kind of rough and since I have sensitive skin it had to go back regardless.
Definitely smaller than I expected in the shoulders and the over all fit. Also was not that comfortable as it was a little itchy

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: Loved this. It is very heavy and a beautiful color.
Fit was good for me (petite), good for weekends with jeans and on more casual days to work. Probably not the most flattering on but fun and very easy to wear, and great color

links_reviews_title: If you like big cardigans, you'll like this.
links_reviews_text: It's comfy. It's big. It looks nice at work or on the weekends for brunch.
This is more of a cost then a light cover up. It's perfect for the fall time. I wore it once because it was a tad too big. Would recommend sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Easy to pair with something casual during the weekend.
links_reviews_text: I am petite, so the sweater was a bit bulky but also comfortable. Slightly informal for work atmosphere, but perfect for the weekend.

Super thick material, didn't need to wear a jacket with this one! Since it is so thick, it made my shoulder and back look large but it was cozy to wear for a day. It also wasn't as soft as I expected it to be.

I rented this in the fall and didn't wear it because it was much heavier than I thought. Best for cold temperatures. Also, the color in the picture looks a little orange, but it was more of a brown in person.

Love this cardigan. The color is classic and will never go out of style. This is a really thick sweater though, and at 5'4'' it was below my knees. I might have bought this as an investment piece, but there are no pockets and no clasp to close it so for windy days its not ideal.
Really comfortable, it is a thick sweater so not a good fit for late spring/early fall. Wore multiple times to work and with friends. Easy to layer and wear. Will rent again!
I really like this sweater, note it is a heavy sweater it might be too warm to wear indoors, perfect for cool outdoor fall weather.

links_reviews_title: So comfy, I may never return this. Great hybrid of a sweater/jacket fore the pre-jacket season!
links_reviews_text: I love this so much I wore it over a black midi dress last night and with leggings today to get some errands done. I may not return this. It looks more mustard in the photo but I love how it can be a neutral with a little more oomph.

links_reviews_title: Great color / perfect for cool fall weather
links_reviews_text: Quality piece , thick and warm . A relaxed fit
I love this so much. The sleeves are perfect to my arms. I felt so cool and it represent autumn so well. I love this!
high-quality silk fabric wraps beautifully for a flattering fit. deep violet color and western details make this top unique and interesting. wear from work to date night, seamlessly.
It is very comfortable and good fit for bigger bust. The color is beautiful
I got SO many compliments on this top today. The jewel tone is so lovely and the cut is stunning. I can't say enough good things. The details are PERFECT!
Beautiful color, oversized fit but adjustable so the waist it's tight. Wear with high waisted jeans for a daytime look and heels to transition to evening. Fabric is luxurious
Though the color was rich and fun! The shoulders are oversized, but you can cinch the cause in to create a nice shape. Really nice fabric.

links_reviews_title: Cute top and the tie waist helps customize
links_reviews_text: Cute color

Such a great top - runs true to size but is a wrap so you can adjust it to your body. It is a little short, but nothing too noticable with high waisted jeans. The color is a really rich purple which is a nice change to the usual navy and black work wardrobe. Will definitely rent again.
I like this top, it is flattering and comfortable. I would say my only challenge was keeping the silky material in place. It is a cropped shirt so I wore high waisted jeans with it.

As other reviewers have said, the color is GORGEOUS. A beautiful royal purple. And the material is soft and lush. I didn't wear this because I received a shirt that did not have one of the ties, so there was not way to close the shirt. I also found this to be more of a crop top, possibly due to my long torso, but just as a word of caution to other long torso ladies.
Got a ton of compliments on this top. It was festive at holiday time, but could be worn year round. A cami underneath is a good idea as the satin ties are slippery.
Didn't fit very well. Too much trying to adjust to make it look good. Sent it back.

Quality was really nice, as is all Nanushka I've seen so far. But the design and style were a little odd. The sleeves were very big and the way you have to tie it shows off your side a little bit. Definitely need high waisted pants.

The fit of this was perfect, even though the size was too large it was still gorgeous and flattering. I should have ordered a L, but I wasn't sure because my boobs often are too big for wrap shirts so I got an XL which ended up having plenty of coverage. The fabric is luxurious and it FEELS expensive. Beautifully tailored and not too cropped, and purple is rich. Want to keep this one for a while!

Very comfortable and good for someone short-waisted, like me. Not great for long waisted. Fits well in bust- small size would be too tight for a busty gal. Overall, very comfortable and a fun upgrade for denim. Loved the retro styling.
Super-sleek, dressed up my jeans with this number and got so many compliments. The only complaint is that the tie would loosen a few times. Really had to knot it up to make it stay.

Great color. I love that it is a wrap but not low cut - so is fully work appropriate. The tie for the wrap is smooth material so definitely needs a double knot before the bow so you don't inadvertently unwrap. Is very short but looks great with high waist pants.

I was so disappointed when I tried this one on...it's a quintessential example of something that looks better on the hanger/model than on me. It was very short and runs very small in the waist, but huge in the chest and shoulders. The fabric was beautiful and felt luxurious...it was just not proportioned well for me. I was bummed, but it just wasn't wearable.
I rented AMO brand jeans previously and they were a perfect fit. This style is not. They are tights in the thighs and seat area. If you rent them, size up.

links_reviews_title: A good widelegged highrise in beautiful grey
links_reviews_text: Such a great jean! Perfect colour, good fit. Cropped, so runs a bit short when your legs are long. Nevertheless it goes with sneakers just as well as heels, boots. I am a 28 in jeans, sometimes 27. But this 26 fitted quite well. A bit snug in waist, so next time I'd try the 27 to be a tad more comfortable. I am a big fan of Rag&Bone.

Loved them. Loved the fit. However it's just that pant that stays so far up your ass. However I would rent again because that's how cute they are. I always have to go up a million sizes in citizens too.
Because they feel like pajamas. These are weird pants but I liked them. Very stretchy and generous at the waist. Styled as shown and I threw a navy and yellow plaid coat over the top for my commute.

I tend to stay away from high waisted jeans because of my mommy tummy and I'm short waisted. When I opened these I almost sent them right back because they have no stretch BUT ... that is why they work! Once you wear them around, you'll love them. The color is so on trend and I've been wearing them with everything all week. Give em a try! Ran tts for me. Hourglass figures may find the waist to run a bit big.
I will probably buy these, I loved them so much. They are so incredibly cool but require no styling to make them look that way. Comfortable and trendy but timeless at the same time. Loved them.

I saw these in the store and immediately knew I had to have them - I even tried them on although the smallest side they had was a 29. I ordered them in a 26 for my Christmas break - I didn’t want to risk them being too small and for vacation I was happy for them to be relaxed in fit (and potentially fitting a little lower/longer since it’s cold). The fit was exactly as expected - just barely slightly large. I will probably try them again in the 25 (which is my usual R&B size) and I would consider buying them. The shape is just so perfect and on-trend - high waist, very wide leg, short but not really a crop on a person of average height. Also I love gray denim and this wash is perfect.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't get them on, so N/A.
links_reviews_text: This jeans are really cute. I thought if I got the largest size I could squeeze in but nope! Wouldn't go over my hips. I'm a size 18-22 depending, and I'm a size 34-35 at Madewell. These jeans in sized 34 fit like a 14-16 or a 30 in Madewell.

links_reviews_title: Waist was a little large but love the color and wide leg trend
links_reviews_text: These jeans are great. Very wide leg and I have short legs so they were a little long. Otherwise cute

links_reviews_title: Wore these in every possible scenario
links_reviews_text: Ah these are so fun and flattering (with a top that is not baggy). I wore them to work and then with each possible friend group until I finally was out of new places to wear them.

Was excited to wear these and put them on and they were comically too large for me. They were overpoweringly large in every aspect - waist, hips, length, girth, and leg opening. I am normally a 24P in jeans so I expected big, but not like this.

I never thought I was long waisted.....but these jeans were miserable for me to wear after the first hour. I'm so sad because they are super cute otherwise. I even left the office early on casual day to get them off. They may be the perfect jeans though for someone with a little shorter waist!
Classy and feminine. Has some pretty sparkle when you're in the sun! Lots of complements. So flattering. Def will rent again

links_reviews_title: Sparkly comfort. What's not to like?
links_reviews_text: This skirt is both comfortable and stylish, and has maximum stretch due to the knit/pleating. I was iffy about the navy blue/black combo but ended up embracing it fully. Will rent again. Note that the skirt is sparkly, which I hadn't seen but loved.

links_reviews_title: Add a little sparkle to your life
links_reviews_text: This wasn't the most flattering for somebody with a poochy belly, but with the right top, the sparkle and flare made it worthwhile

Skirt is amazing. I'm a normal size 2 and the small fit perfectly. Specs of fuchsia sparkle in the stripes which add some flair. Not super heavy knit, but not a summer piece. Love it! Very flattering.

I know all the reviews said this was sparkly but I was still surprised by how much. I think this skirt runs a little large, and a small would have fit me better. Overall it's pretty thick and a good work skirt.

This skirt worked out really well for me and I wore it on a hot summer day to work. It is very good quality material and skirt stays where it needs to be but still super comfortable. Fabric has a slight sparkle woven into it but is not too much to wear to work or everyday. Not too tight on the stomach area but I did wear spanx with it bc that is my preference. I am looking forward to wearing it more casual with sandels and a tank top!
I honestly loved this skirt. It was a great fit and very slimming. I did not know that it was going to have sparkly purple stripes in it though. Odd surprise.
Loved this skirt! Work appropriate, but the purple shimmer makes it fun for other occasions as well. Very stretchy and comfy - elastic waist band. Thick material that doesn't wrinkle. :)

Looks better than I can selfie it. I felt so pretty in this skirt and people at work went out of their minds over it. I got so many compliments. I didn't need a slip, I didn't find it that sheer. I will rent again for sure.
This skirt fit well and was easy to style with pieces already in my closet.

links_reviews_title: Party? Yes. Work? Yes. Goddaughter's play? Yes.
links_reviews_text: This is such a versatile piece. I've worn it three separate times to 3 different events. Love love love it. It does cling and hug if you got curves but on the best way.
Beautiful skirt with fun pops of sparkle! The color is gorgeous and got tons of compliments when I wore it!

I rented this for a work party but ended up wearing it so many times. This skirt is super fun and versatile but also amazingly comfortable. Can be dressed up or down, looks great with a variety of shoes. Wore with heels and a cami to work party but also with a sweater and boots to the office. Really sad when I had to send this one back. Material is thick with plenty of give and super pretty in person. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my work event! This skirt was the right amount of classy professional and fun.
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and length. I'd consider making sure you have a half slip in case whatever you're wearing shows below. I wore this to a work event and also to church.
Loved this skirt. Hangs nicely and is very comfortable.
I wore this skirt several times and always got compliments. It's not too tight and is just the right length. The sparkle isn't over the top.
Not very forgiving. I ordered a small, but my pooch thinks she needs a medium. I'm a 6 usually, but should have gone up a size for a hip hugging style. Please rent though! Such rich color.

Loved this skirt! You can't really tell in photos but there is a really nice contrast between the black and navy stripes with the addition of the sparkle. Makes it perfect for holiday parties and work events. It's a heavy knit so definitely only for fall/winter. It's also technically sheer but I just wore opaque black tights with it and didn't need a slip. Will def rent again throughout the winter.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Almost bought it. It was warm, comfy, and fit well on my body.
links_reviews_text: This dress had a great fit! It was super comfy and versatile. I wore it with boots and with sneakers.

The sparkles and pleats made me feel special even though it was just a regular work day. I got tons of complements. It was beautiful, high quality and had a very flattering length and cut. I wore it with a navy turtleneck, polkadot black stockings and heels. I felt so comfortable and polished.
the fit was perfect and look was flattering
The only reason I'm giving 4, not 5 is the dress was overworn when I received it. Still it was a great skirt.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! This skirt is beautiful and feels great all day long.
links_reviews_text: Love the knit material and the pleats! The simmer made the skirt fun! The waist was flexible and felt great all day long. I will rent again or maybe buying it!

links_reviews_title: Awesome skirt! Sparkle adds an element of fun!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was an awesome fun piece to shake things up! The understated sparkle and flow of the pleats were really fun. The quality of the material was great - a thick, well made material. Not see through at all. I wore to work with a tight pullover sweater and leather jacket. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Ended up wearing on a date night rather than work as originally planned.
links_reviews_text: I thought the skirt was solid black but on delivery realized had red glittery accents.

Cute and comfortable with an elastic waist. I liked this a lot and my husband LOVED it on me. The length was more flattering than I expected (I'm 5'1"). Perfect for fall or winter and would also work for first trimester maternity.
Beautiful material. Size down!
Glamorous!

links_reviews_title: Loved this--a little more wintery than summer but cute with heels or sandals.
links_reviews_text: Great skirt--very flattering, can dress up or down.

This is so chic and sophisticated while being comfortable at the same time! I received so many comments while wearing this skirt that I may have to keep it and add it as a permanent staple to my closet!

I'm hit or miss with DVF because I'm not a toothpick shaped kind of lady, but this had enough give to make it fun. It was a little on the itchy side bc of the fabric, but was sparkly and cute, but not too ostentatious (I'm pretty low-key day-today, so it was a little outside my comfort zone being sparkly).
This had more matallic purple and was heavier than I thought it would be so I didn't wear it but plan on renting it again in the fall!
Pretty, vibrant color - great skirt!
So beautiful!
This seems like a typical skirt but it's so much more. It's absolutely flattering and the shimmer details are just subtle enough not to be obnoxious. Absolutely obsessed

links_reviews_title: I had no idea it had these glittery purple stripes. The picture was so different
links_reviews_text: No good for work

This skirt is so beautiful and versatile. I wore it several times--to work, on the weekend, and to a party. The shine is not too much, some people didn't even notice it until I'd been with them for hours. It's also super comfortable but still shows your shape.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, unique skirt - great for work!
links_reviews_text: Wore at mid-rise waist height, fit great, stretchy and comfortable. Nice, conservative skirt with fun metallic color in pleats. Was a little hard to pack without wrinkling some of the pleats but after hanging for a bit the shape returned. Would recommend!
Loved this skirt. Wore it to work, dinner and a party with a black body suit.

links_reviews_title: Worked for work and after work.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size and the length was spot on. The sparkle gave the skirt a lift but I dressed it down with a tshirt and it looked proffessional with a little casua element. Lots of compliments

I got this blouse to wear to work. Beautiful spring color. The attached neck scarf is quite long and the button around the neck is rather fussy and didn't lay smoothly. Otherwise I would have given it a five star. I wear size 0 and the size 0 fit me well.
Loved the color, sleeves were so much fun to wear!

This color of this blouse is as depicted online, beautiful turquoise blue. I found it to be small in the sleeves and shoulders. It wasn't so small that I didn't wear it, but if I were to rent again, I'd size up. I usually wear a large or XL, and this one is a 16 - well within that range. I also found the button at the top of the keyhole frustratingly hard to unbutton and button.
The color was kinda blah, neckline not as pretty as most ties and the sleeves just didnt work for me. Returned, didn't wear.
Good fit.
Loved the color of this shirt, and the embellishments we're compliment-inducing. Beware that it is very sheer, so I recommend it for warmer days or with a shirt underneath.
paired with a snakeskin bag to dress up my very average black pants.
Such a cute and comfy dress, got tons of compliments on it and will definitely rent again
If you are bustier I would size up or go without a bra if you can. This dress is thick, flattering, and chic. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Really nice fit in this OTT dress
links_reviews_text: Unlined and wool so it's very itchy, but can be managed with undergarments. It's short so I just wore it with leggings. It has a fun Austin Powers vibe. Baloony sleeves. I liked the mix of wool and silk.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. So comfortable! The fabric is thick enough to hold everything in but not too heavy. The sleeves are a silk fabric and hung really well! I would definitely recommend ordering this!
I wore this dress for a 60s themed costume and decided to go with the 4 instead of the 6 because although shorter, it fit better in the waist. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: So ugly it's cute - love how unique this dress is!
links_reviews_text: Have received so many compliments on this dress today. Totally love how 70s this is and how unique it is. A little on the shorter side but otherwise it's great!
I rented this for Thanksgiving. It was the perfect look for this holiday. I chose to wear the bigger size for more length. I also knew I'd be eating Thanksgiving lunch and dinner. It was a love!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely in love with this dress!
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a 0 but it wasn't available so had to go with a 2 and I'm glad I did. It runs a bit small and would've been much shorter if I wore a 0. The dress is an absolute beauty

Absolutely love this dress. Received no fewer than 10 compliments and have only worn it once! The length was work-appropriate for me, but I'm a shortie, so long-stemmed ones beware. That being said, this would be great as a party mini, as well.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress so much, I may buy it! It fit so well and was very comfortable/warm for a cool fall day. I paired it with leather leggings and boots since it was a bit on the shorter side for work.
The perfect fall dress! I received so many compliments on the fit and style of this dress. Runs a little short especially with long legs, but ok when worn with flats!
This dress fit me so well. The hem hits right at my thighs which is perfect for my height. But I caution taller ladies. Definitely where shorts or tights if you don't feel like mooning the world.
Love this dress. Perfect for the fall and well made! I travelled with the dress and it barely wrinkled. Can be dressed up or dressed down.
This dress is so cute! The middle part is wool material and it was not exactly cool out where I was so I did sweat a lot but for a cooler day it would have been perfect to pair with tights!!
I got so many compliments on this dress! Fit true to size and was super flattering. Will absolutely rent again!

Dress body is not lined so if you're sensitive to wool it wouldn't feel too good... the fit is as expected. My neck line frill wasn't pressed down so it looks a little awkward but overall pretty good!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments! Look really good for a museum day trip!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for SF weather in the summer, windy and cold when you walk in the shadow
I got so many compliments and definitely true to size! I didn't think it was itchy at all! Would definitely get again!

links_reviews_title: I loved the clash of greens in this dress. Got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: My butt made it ride up so it was a tad short. But fit great in the arms.

links_reviews_title: Vintage vibe. Perfect for transitioning out of winter
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress. Fit was great. Tons of compliments. The sleeves are silk so I wore a long sleeve shirt underneath and you couldn't tell.
Pictures don't do it justice. I loved it. So flattering, comfortable, and unique. Rent without hesitation!

links_reviews_title: This dress was worn for Easter Sunday church service & everyone thought I looked great!
links_reviews_text: Mustard & Olive Green, NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD! This dress was so comfortable and the mix of fabrics made it unique to most pieces in my closet. I loved the fit! #SEANEWYORK
So fitting. Everyone loved the dress!

This dress *looks* like it's going to be Too Much but it actually super wearable. The thick wool body is actually flattering and the satin arms keep you from feeling stifled. It's not scratchy — actually pretty cozy. I felt effortlessly chic all day. Fit wise. I could have gone for an 8 everywhere but the hips, which would juuuuuuust slip on with a little goading. If you're slim in the hip, choose a smaller size if you're between two. Definitely try it out while there are still some cold days left.
Great statement piece

I wore this to a st. Patrick's day parade and got stopped multiple times by people on the street who wanted to compliment my dress. All women, of course. My boyfriend wasn't a fan of the sleeves but I think they're a big part of what makes this dress so amazing. The fit is so flattering in an hourglass figure way. I almost sized down and I'm so glad I didn't; I just managed to fit my bust into my usual size.
This dress is so adorable and very flattering! But it's also very short!! Very well-made.

Pretty short, but very adorable. Not itchy. The sleeves are adorably puffy, but not so puffy that they are obnoxious or get in the way (too much). Perfect for a work dinner party in Paris. Well cut for a pear shaped body.

I wore this to an engagement party and everyone was talking about it! The dress was comfy and super unique. Because I'm 5'10, it was a little short, but so cute with tights. It was a tad bit big but still looked flattering!

I loved this dress and wore it to a baby shower. It fits a little large in the hips but I found it comfortable. It is short, I wore pretty opaque tights for winter and over the knee boots. Don't think I could have worn it to work.

This dress was super cute! The silk sleeves are really cute with the plaid wool body of the dress. Paired with sheer black tights and high boots for a dinner date with my husband. See more how I wore the dress on Instagram @an.unlimited.life
I loved the idea of this and really wanted it to work! The fit was boxy, so size down and the fabric is sooo itchy.

Very trendy dress with the plaid on plaid and the billowy sleeves. I'm between a size 2 and 4 and the size 4 was the right size. Size 2 would be too short. Must wear with tights in a work environment. It's not that itchy (as other reviewers stated) feels similar to a cashmere sweater on your skin. My complaint is that the silk collar did not stand up, so I used a pearl necklace to help keep the fabric up. Wouldn't rent again.

I got so many compliments on this dress and loved the look of it. But the material was outrageously itchy. As in, slightly uncomfortable at first but then halfway through the workday I was trying to figure out ways to get it off my body. I would absolutely recommend this dress, but you NEED to wear something underneath it so this material doesn't touch your bare skin!

This is something I wouldn't necessarily buy because it's definitely a statement piece. But it's so cute. It was extremely difficult getting this zipped up by myself. I'm normally a size 2, but I squeezed in to this for the sake of not sending it back right away. It's very true to size and has zero stretch. Would totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: I love the puffy sleeves and the short length.
links_reviews_text: A fun dress to wear! Shirt and sassy yet still acceptable to wear at work. I'd rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and lots of compliments but itchy
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. It was pretty short on me and I'm 5'3. It was stretchy and cute but very itchy. Beauty is pain I guess.
This dress is amazing. Fit perfectly! So flattering and fun.
amazing fit and got so many compliments!!

Definitely slightly itchy, but since I planned on wearing it in Paris over the holidays, I knew I could layer underneath it. The nipped in waist was more definitely form flattering. I thought it was a longer hem from seeing the measurements in the description, but I'm happier it was shorter since I wanted more of a minidress style. So happy with this rental. No wonder it's always out of stock! I styled mine with a collared shirt and a clip on velvet bow. Check out my blog where I style several RTR pieces! www.ragpepper.com

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Jumpsuit for my frame very well, not too long, not too tight. Can wear without a bra, and you can zip up yourself after the bathroom! Considered buying and I never like jumpsuits! Wore this during quarantine a bunch and felt put together even though it felt like pajamas. Felt it would be cute with a heeled sandal as well. Great rental!
So flattering and comfortable!
I kept this for 2 months - I loved it so much! So comfortable. Can be worn with flip flops, flats, or heels for totally different looks.

links_reviews_title: RENT THIS!!! YOU WONT REGRET IT!!!
links_reviews_text: This is the second (or third time) I've rented this. I'll be keeping it this time. Seriously, when I didn't have it there were a dozen times I wished it was in my closet. Fits like a glove. Has ruching in the back so it is a little forgiving. Fabric is chiffon but has an under layer so no need for a bra. Love, love, love it!!! I'd buy this in other colors if I could!

Perfect jumpsuit. Nicer material than I expected. Could work with flip flops for a casual look or could easily be dressed up with heels and nice jewelry. Will keep this awhile. I'm usually a 0 or 2 and the 2 fit well! I think the 0 would've worked too!
Love this jumpsuit! Wore it to a holiday party and it was the perfect mix of dressy and casual!

Rented for vacation and it was a breeze for travel - pretty munch wrinkle-free. Easy to wear. Thereʻs a back zipper, but not too high that you canʻt do and un-do yourself. I have rented Madewell brand in the past and this was another nice piece.
Great quality and fit, very flattering. If it wasn't for the price that is still pretty high would definitely buy.

links_reviews_title: Pretty jumper, but torso is short!
links_reviews_text: I had to return unworn because it was riding into my crotch.

I've never worn a jump suit before, and was very hesitant but love Madewell so I decided to give it a go. This was really comfortable though the straps kept slipping off my shoulders which was annoying. The neckline hangs low and because I'm large chested, it was a little bit uncomfortable so I mostly wore it underneath a jean jacket.
I am buying this. It is so cute and flattering and yet very comfortable. And machine washable. And.... pockets. Mine.

links_reviews_title: Finally a good jumper/romper for tall girls!
links_reviews_text: Straps were a little tight and too a little small for busty women. But it is the first jumper/romper that I've ever actually worn outside the dressing room!! Being a tall girl with a long torso is a struggle to find one that doesn't ride up the front and back (if you know what I mean!!!)

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit! First time wearing a jumpsuit type of dress and was hooked!
links_reviews_text: Dress up or dress down! Great for any occasion!
Wore this at 23 weeks pregnant, one size up from my pre- pregnancy and it fit perfectly. So comfortable and so flattering!

I liked wearing this on vacation. I'm pear-shaped, usually wear a size 12; but the size 10 fit my bust best and the wide legs had enough accommodation to work in the smaller size . It's not the most luxurious fabric; but it will still elevate a casual style.
I would highly recommend a bralette or strapless with this one!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this jumpsuit so much. So soft and comfortable. Made from a nice material. Pockets!
links_reviews_text: So soft and comfortable. Made from a nice material. Pockets!

links_reviews_title: Great romper. I bought one in red! :)
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and flattering. The perfect romper.

links_reviews_title: Perfect everyday jumpsuit to have in your closet
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit! I fit perfectly on me and I wore it three times. (I'm pear shape so ordered in my jeans size, not my dress size!) The fabric is perfect and can be dressed up or down. I wish I could have purchased this one.

I am not normally a jumpsuit person, but tried because... why not with RTR?! I'm so glad I did. A very comfortable and versatile piece. Wore to work under a cardigan and also to a baby birthday party on a Saturday afternoon. I'm 5'4" and the legs went to my ankles rather than calves, but still a cool look and good for summer
It fit well. It's stretchy in the back, so I was able to slide it down to go to the bathroom rather than fight with the zipper. Very light & airy so it's perfect for summer!
Comfortable. Easy to wear with strapless or no bra since double lined on the top. Doesn't wrinkle so good pack for travel.
runs big, go down a size
This jumper is fabulous. the feel is amazing. I wore dressed up to work with a blazer and also to a picnic with a jean jacket. Will rent again.
This fit well and was very comfortable. I would suggest sizing up if you have a long torso because the inseam seemed a bit short.
Loved this. Stretchy comfy and cute. Slightly a-line. Recommend!
Great skirt w/ stretch, size down. I'm 5'3 hit right below knee. Easily dressed up or down. Vibrant colors.
I have rented this skirt like three different times because I love it so much! Seriously considering buying! Such a great fit, high quality material and can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Very thick, knit material! Stunning piece!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it. I wore it twice... one with heels and it was gorgeous! Amazing colors! Then 2nd time styled with a Tee and some combat boots and loved the edgy look! Sneakers will even do! Absolutely gorgeous skirt and well made! 5 stars for me!

Loved this skirt! I got a large because I was scared it would run small like a designer size, but I should've gotten a medium. It felt bulky on me. My only issue was that I was sent a damaged skirt that had a hole in the waist. Luckily I camouflaged it nicely.

links_reviews_title: Great warm skirt that runs snug
links_reviews_text: The material is thick and stretchy, but the waist band runs small- it's elastic so it is stretchy, too, however even though I have a small waist/hourglass, I was able to pull it off even though I probably could have worn a Large size more comfortably. Size up if you're bigger around the waist in comparison to your hips or you want a more comfortable look. Keep your usual size if you have an hourglass figure and like a VERY fitted look.

I rented this skirt for a couple weeks, and wore it to work, a family event, outdoor brunch, and nice dinner. It is super versatile, very comfortable, and a cool pattern. I received a lot of compliments on it. Fits true to size, lots of stretch. The only negative was that it seems like the material will wear out and pill pretty quickly. I don't think these skirts will be in great shape for very long.
liked the fit and fun pattern
The skirt looked great. XL is not my typical size. I am usually a M or L, but the reviews cautioned that this ran small. The XL worked well for me.

links_reviews_title: Doesn't rapper or flare the way you would expect it to.
links_reviews_text: The material and pattern of this skirt are great I just have very large hips and this skirt was not flattering, it would be more flatting for someone that was straighter or taller than I am.
LOVED this skirt. Paired it with a dark blue top and tan pumps for a holiday party. The second time I wore it I paired it with blue pumps. Would rent again!
This was a fun and easy to wear skirt for work (w/black boots and a white bomber jacket). The M was a bit loose, so I would try the S next time for a more sleek/shapely fit.

Came brand new with tags. Cute and roomy. Color is a vibrant red. Good size. My only con is that the strap made a lot of noise lol. I just remove them and use the handle only. Def would rent this one again.
Love the bag. Would buy.
The red is a little orangey....but overall this is a very cute bag!! It arroved clean and perfect! I will be sorry to see it go!
I think i might have been more comfortable in a size 8 just for that extra inch around the waist and length. Was a little short for work but when for it anyway. Very petty pattern.

This silk dress is fully lined which is quite nice however the lining is black and kind of shows through the white silk panels. The floral pattern is feminine and the dress hangs really nicely. I'm typically between as 6 and 8 and the size 8 was a little loose on me but helped make the more conservative for work given that it's above the knee.

links_reviews_title: If you love Tory Burch, you'll love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It was perfect for work. Kinda baggie so the pattern is offset with a conservative fit. Loved the quality and comfort.
Not a fan. A little too loose fitting and matronly for my taste. Looked cuter in the picture online.
The dress is very small especially in the chest area. I would recommend going up a size or two if you're planning on renting this
I am usually a size 10, but this dress in the size 12 was way too small for me. Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, runs a little small
links_reviews_text: Good for work or casual occasion

links_reviews_title: Too tight and couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Tight for hips

So this dress fit fine while standing but when sitting the buttons at the bottom would pull. I was glad I wore leggings underneath otherwise it would have been way too revealing for work with the buttons gaping. Nice material, great pattern and colors. Probably a better summer pick than winter but my office is 80 degrees on Mondays so I decided to give this a try.

links_reviews_title: It was okay, but should have ordered a 4
links_reviews_text: Cute but runs large
This was a really cute dress and fits well. It's a little on the short side, but was still wearable for the office.

links_reviews_title: it was so flowy, but not too flowy, very flattering neckline and cut.
links_reviews_text: a bit small at the bust area so definitely size up! and size up for the length if you're wearing it to work!!

links_reviews_title: Flattering shift dress. Loved the colors.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. The material wrinkled very easily. The dress was lovely, but just didn't hold up well for a full work day.
The fit is tighter than I was expecting around the hips. It fit very well, but just be cognizant of that--I certainly wouldn't size down, despite the image of a sheath-like style.
I wore this dress to a friend's wedding shower and High Holiday services and got so many compliments! The pattern is great and it's comfortable and forgiving. I wore it with bright colored heals.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: Sadly, this dress arrived missing some buttons. But it is lovely in person. A great mix of prints.
Nice shift dress for work. Good length and not clingy. Pretty pattern. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Tried to wear to work with nice heels !
links_reviews_text: Beautiful material and not sheer which is AWESOME but it wasn't as loose/tunic-y as I thought. Perhaps better for a date night vs work. Smaller fit than expected

links_reviews_title: It was ok. Not as flattering as I had hoped.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little short in the sleeves. I have a larger chest and it was a bit tight there. Otherwise it fit elsewhere.

links_reviews_title: Ordered for work at Elementary school thought it would be fun.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit odd, the top was big and bottom small. It is a button up shirt dress. I am not curvy so that was a strange fit. The print is much louder in real life than it appears online.

Admittedly, I'm not someone who likes pattern very much, so probably my bad for renting this. I thought it was cute on the model, but it was too much for me in person with the different types of floral and stripes. Was almost a patchwork vibe.

links_reviews_title: So pretty! Runs a tad small.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute! It runs just a tad too small so I won't be wearing it but I look forward to renting it again in a month or so.
This dress is absolutely adorable but it was just a bit too small. I was expecting it to fit like a loose shift but it definitely did not. I got my normal size but it was just too tight.
Perfect for the weekend comfies. Sleeves were a little short and it was more of a crop top. This fit was an XL on an XL girl. But I think I pulled it off anyway

links_reviews_title: home in NYC with the perfect sweatshirt.
links_reviews_text: super comfy, looked brand new. true to size but I was able to layer a chambray shirt underneath without bulkiness.
This was such a simple sweater that grabbed attention. I enjoyed wearing it. I would rent it again but might go up a size

This is a sweatshirt that says New York on it as advertised. Nothing to write home about but I definitely enjoyed wearing it. The XS fit me well. The sleeves are a little off, not long enough to be long sleeves so I had to keep pushing them up a bit to get the appropriate look. I kept wanting to pull them down when I was cold but alas they go to just above my wrist and that only gives the look of "I'm wearing a kid's sweatshirt that doesn't fit right." Otherwise this is a lovely little sweatshirt great for casual cool. Plus New York is one of the only places I proudly advertise for. :)

links_reviews_title: Loved it I found one to buy
links_reviews_text: It was comfy and fit super well! I love this sweater!
Cute, casual sweatshirt to add a flair to a casual day. I received a lot of compliments.
love this classic look. Major plus: neckhole big enough not to pull my ears off, yet still small enough to look tidy.
So cute and casual

links_reviews_title: Saw it, liked it, bought it!
links_reviews_text: I had been looking for a classic New York logo sweater. This one was perfect. Everyone loves navy blue and the white lettering is just perfect. Thick letters which makes the top look more fancy. I pair this with jean capris and white chucks. Perfect for Spring! U shouldn't need to wear an undershirt with this.
Great low key sweater. Love that the letters are embroidered. Almost purchased this!
A very cool sweatshirt that was smaller and less comfy than I imagined it would be.

My boyfriend loved this as an alternative to my usual come home after work and throw on leggings and a baggy sweatshirt habit. Really cute and fit me well. I am very tall and it fit a bit cropped in the arms.
Cute sweatshirt I wore for traveling and everyday wear. It was just okay, fit was a little odd and material wasn't very soft.
Chic sweatshirt to dress up your weekend look! Wear w jeans and kitten heels. Originally rented the S but it ran a tad too small. Rented M this time and fits perfect

links_reviews_title: This is my go to sweatshirt!
links_reviews_text: I can't say enough good things about this shirt so...I bought it! It fits great, maybe just a slight bit under a normal XL but still so comfy. My daughter has already asked that I rent one for her as well. Got lots of "love that shirt" comments so it was a keeper.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much, I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect comfy sweatshirt for Saturday errands and coffee.
Thick material and a nice deep navy.
I wore this on a road trip and I was incredibly comfortable the whole time - not to mention I looked great. ;) LOVED it. I probably would have bought it if it was $10 cheaper.
Cute and comfortable, 3/4 sleeve (which was unexpected) but really happy with the fit. Didn't make me feel boxy and not overly form-fitting.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments - had no idea this sweatshirt was so coveted!
links_reviews_text: Kind of a cropped/short fit, and being that I'm a size 16, the XXL actually fit me perfect. The XL would have likely been too short.
Perfect fit, not to thick and really cute with jeans.

The sweatshirt itself was ok. I like the emblazoned "New York" (I work/play in NYC), but the sleeves are so oddly short. I kept having to pull them up so I didn't look like I was wearing a sweatshirt too small for my body. Otherwise, this was just ok.
Sleeves were short.

links_reviews_title: Great material and well put together sweatshirt
links_reviews_text: Really liked this sweatshirt. It ran small.
Cute look

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jacket! Oh I love it and got sooo many compliments. Super sharp and sassy

links_reviews_text: This was fun to wear and I got lots of compliments. I loved the strong shoulder shape. A little hot for NYC summer even in an air conditioned office. Will rent again when it gets cooler.

I rented this for a work meeting and and totally in love with this jacket! I've already worn it 3 times and plan to wear it at least once more before I return it. I've worn it with navy pants and white under shirt, jeans and black undershirt, no undershirt! So versatile! Would buy it wasn't so much $$$$

Beautiful blazer. I wore this to work and everyone loved the white suit effect. The blazer does have stronger shoulders. The material is a little heavy so it's more of a spring blazer then a summer blazer, especially if it's summer in New Orleans (sunny, humid, hot)

links_reviews_title: Power player, but fit is off
links_reviews_text: I think this blazer runs a little bit big. It fit pretty well in the shoulders (and I loved the powerful look of the shoulder pads), but it felt a little big on my chest (32A) and very long in the arms, even though the length of the body was good for me (5'2", with a long torso). It didn't look *too* big, but only just barely so. The sleeves were the main issue for me - they're just kind of long! I had to scrunch them up or make sure I was holding my arms just so, so that they wouldn't fall down and graze my palms. The fabric was also not what I expected. Not necessarily a bad thing - it felt like a really nice thick jersey-like knit, rather than a crepe as listed. It does feel weighty and like good quality. Definitely a cool blazer that can go from office to weekend. I really like the look, and the slightly off-white color is versatile, but it was just a bit big on me.

links_reviews_title: So, how long can I keep this?
links_reviews_text: I've been wanting to wear a Veronica Beard blazer having them seen in my local Nordys store but I did not want to pay the high price. Finally got my wish, thx RTR! Great details (5 buttons at cuff, stitching, shoulder pads) and really nice quality fabric. Can't wait to pair this with skinny jeans & dresses. Fabric is a bit heavy so I'll have to draw the line at wearing this with shorts but I would if I could!

I don't usually wear my rent the runway unlimited items more than a couple of times. I have kept this jacket for weeks now. I wear it every time I don't think that I've seen somebody in it already! I've gotten so many compliments. The sleeves are a little bit long so if you're short armed it probably won't work.

links_reviews_title: Sharp looking, comfortable, nice for early spring
links_reviews_text: As a busty blazer lover with average-sized shoulders, it's sometimes hard for me to get a great fit. This one is just about perfect. My arms are of average proportion to my size, but these sleeves are about 4" too long. The good news is that the jacket still looks good with the sleeves folded up. The weight is just right for early spring, because the jacket is warm enough for outside on a cool day, but still comfortable indoors. It would be fine in summer for an air conditioned office, as well. The white is a true but soft white, probably good for a lot of complexions since it is neither super bright-white or ivory. The trim stitching is a light brown; not noticeable enough to be a color issue. Overall a very nice, high quality, flattering jacket.

links_reviews_title: Mildly obsessed with this blazer, so chic, perfect slightly oversized fit, and looks expensive!
links_reviews_text: Perfect slightly oversized fit, could wear with jeans suit pants, or over a chic dress. The shoulder pads give it that expensive tailored blazer shape. I am y’all, so if you are short size down!
Super flattering & gorgeously cut coat Perfect for work or dinner! Has a little room to the size as well
Great double-breasted blazer with a slightly boxy cut. High quality material and beautiful fit! Could wear with jeans or dress slacks.
Obsessed with this jacket. Such a great tailored fit, perfect snug in all the right places. Will rent again for sure!

Perfect spring jacket, works for business, weekends, and nights out alike. Pretty thick fabric makes it good for transitional weather, probably too hot for summer. Great cut and goes with everything. One of my favorite rentals.
Stylish jacket in comfortable wearable fabric. Easily paired with denim or dresses. Love the stitching and color overall.
Blazer is really comfortable. The piping though made the jacket on the more casual side. I like it.
Great fitting blazer with nice details.
Beautifully tailored jacket. Wore to work and it paired really well with jeans.

I rented this very nice jacket to wear at a work function. I wore this with a Vince romper which I also rented here. The material is nice and stretchy and thick. Very comfy - I would totally buy this if it wasn't for the price. Definitely keeping for a while.
So many complimets. Fit perfect except sleeves a little long. I just used double sided tape and tucked them in.

I love a VB blazer and the cut and quality of this one was no exception, however it was a little thicker than I wanted for Florida autumn weather (hot) and also on me it felt a little lab coat-y for some reason. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket with brown stitching dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Really smart looking on and stylish. Material has a nice stretch

links_reviews_title: This jacket wore beautifully. A great piece to wear to an important meeting.
links_reviews_text: A wonderful fit. The shoulder pads were a bit tough to get used to but after I wore it a few times they seemed non-existent. I wore it unbuttoned and it created a unique and flattering silhouette. I will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: love this- second time Ive rented- chic chic chic
links_reviews_text: true to size

links_reviews_title: Veronica Beard Blazers are the best
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with the blazer and every other Veronica Beard blazer that I have rented. I have wanted to buy them all. If the price tag wasn't so steep I definitely would. The structured but comfortable fit and amazing material is why I love it

I'm 5'1" , 130 lb. hourglass shape. I have a long torso so the jacket length was fine. But, 1. The arms are very long so I had to turn the cuffs up inside the sleeve which was sad because the sleeves have a nice look to them., 2. The interior button was missing so trying to wear it closed didn't work well., 3. The interior zipper didn't work for me because I'm too hourglass to have that work well around my hips. All in all, I wasn't thrilled and it wouldn't have been something I'd have bought from a store if I had tried it on.

links_reviews_title: This helped dress up a nice pair of jeans for work
links_reviews_text: Fits lovely, has a tiny bit of stretch but is mostly structured. I really liked this!
Very stiff material and boxy. Not a great look.
This blazer was cut very nicely and was very high quality. It was a fairly heavy material so I would wear in the cooler fall/spring months. Looks very sharp on!
Followed the apps advice and went a size or too larger than normal. That was a mistake. Nice jacket tho!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable! But bigger than preferred.
links_reviews_text: Fit larger than preferred. If you're between sizes, size down. Really heavy fabric and super comfy.

Would buy this is if I could afford its pricetag! Very comfortable material that's thick but still wearable in the office for the summer. Very tailored chic/structured look. Looks great with dresses and pants alike. Lots of compliments from coworkers.
Runs a little big. If you're in between sizes, size down.
I initially gave this a so so review because it looks unexceptional on the hanger and I really thought I'd just send it back, but I tried it with black pants and loved it!
I could not wear this in 80 degree weather. Material is thicker than it looks so not suitable for summer. Otherwise it'll be a great work jacket. Fit was good.
Loved this blazer- fits super well, so comfortable, I got so many compliments!
Shoulder's too padded. Did not like the look on me.

links_reviews_title: The blazer isn’t solid white. It has a brown stitching on it.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Too large in the shoulders and arms also too long.
links_reviews_text: Great quality, but didn't wear because it was too big in the shoulders and arms too long.
Great fit with luxurious fabric. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Wonderful blazer! Fit great, did not crease or wrinkle at all. Great for work travel
links_reviews_text: Amazing blazer! Very soft, expensive look and feel

links_reviews_title: Not perfect, but great color and style
links_reviews_text: This was a pretty blouse that I wore to work. There's a fairly deep V, so it would probably have been better to wear a tank beneath it for work. The fit was ok.

This blouse is pretty and feminine. I especially like the length. I have a long torso and tops tend to be too short on me. The color is very purple, which is pretty. The size is just a bit large on me. I probably could have gone down a size.
Comfortable, professional, and feminine. I’d rent it again !
Seriously considering splurging and buying. Zipper allows it to be fitted around the waste and color/print makes it more interesting than usual work top. Will rent again

Fitted in the bodice area, with a zipper to get the girls in there. Good fit, flattering for full size women. However, the sleeves are super long with no way to easily make them shorter--they won't stay up.

The color is more purple than burgundy. Fit is generally large, but there is a band of fabric that nips in the waist and doesn't stretch that gives it a somewhat tailored look while still remaining baggy. It's a bit weird but nice enough. Not freaking out about it.
Easy to wear, looks great. Love the pattern, received compliments

This blouse is very well made, but was a little awkward. It has a side zipper that makes the blouse nip in at the waist so it has a more polished look, but it weirdly blouses out A LOT in front and back. I will give this another shot but will go down a size.
Pretty blouse, nice shaping, generous cut on the top. Sleeves very long.
Feels great! Has side zipper that allows big chest to have its space but emphasizes the waist. Sleeves are a little long but not bad. Fabric is thin and light.
Not comfortable at all and I returned it.

links_reviews_title: It's a pretty print but not meant for small chested ladies/petite
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are so long and the bust if you can't fill it out falls kind of strangely. Not my favorite. Wearable but not super ideal for petite women with a smaller chest.
This was a nice shirt, but it was massive on my small frame, so I couldn't wear it. I have narrow shoulders and normally wear a size xs, 0, or 00 up top.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color but a bit weird fit on top
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful color. I paired it with white trousers which went great. Only issue is that there is a cinch at the waist (which is fine) but that causes the blouse to balloon up/ puff up in the chest area making that bulky. So it looked ill fitted on top

This pattern and slightly embellished sleeve definitely spoke to the inner flower child in me but it was very professional and comfortable for the office environment. I paired it with black pants and heels and got lots of compliments
Overall this blouse for me Was just ok. Color was pretty but I didn't care for the fit all that much. It fit fine it just had a little bit tighter fit around waist
There's a zipper that keeps the shirt tight to your waist, so it's great for the hour glass type figure. Really cute folds in it, beautiful print. Felt confident working in this shirt.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, nice cut; runs large
links_reviews_text: The RTR recommended size ran quite large, and the sleeves were very long. I still wore it to work and got a lot of compliments even though it was baggy; with a good fit I think it would be very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice feminine work shirt! I'd rent it again
links_reviews_text: There's a zip on the side to help you get in and out. It's a little snug on the waist if you have more tummy
The shirt was pretty but way too big.
Was form fitting until the bust area and it was big there which was odd based on my sizing.

links_reviews_title: feminine, love zipper on side so it accents your shape. I wear with a shirt or pants...
links_reviews_text: zipper on side completes perfect fit...such a PRETTY feminine blouse!! LOVE.
This was fun to wear - nothing I would have normally chosen. The fit was very flattering, even for a larger bust. The material wasn't the most comfortable, though.
This blouse is so flattering with the back detail and side zip it accentuates you're waist with a beautiful billowy feel.
runs very small and short. typically wear Size 18 or XL but couldn't wear this
This was a great shirt to pair with straight black pants and purple heels. Got compliments at work. The tie in the front makes it less formal and adds some nice playful flair

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse for certain body types
links_reviews_text: The blouse was best for people with a large bust and small waist, which is not me, but because of the way it drapes it looked nice anyhow. The other item about this blouse is that the sleeves were VERY long. They probably would have been fine if I was 7 feet tall! I wore this blouse to work before our office party in the afternoon and I had to keep rolling the sleeves up to get my work done.

links_reviews_title: Great over black pants for work. Truly fitted waist and bodice...nice long sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Great fitted all over.

links_reviews_title: Flowy shirt in a pretty purple pattern
links_reviews_text: This is a flowy shirt with a beautiful purple and whit batik pattern. It has a fit around the bust that was strange and didn't quite work for me. I can't actually figure out why I didn't like this shirt, but it wasn't very flattering and I wouldn't order again.
