The blouse is pretty. However, it is for someone with a longer torso. I have a short torso, and it billowed out in an unattractive way -- especially in the back.
The sleeves are a bit long, but this is a really comfortable shirt.

links_reviews_title: pretty print, but didn't like the fit
links_reviews_text: sleeves are very long
I like this blouse, the fit and cut are very nice. The sleeves are a bit long, but overall I really like it.
This was a very pretty top - really liked it. But it was too big and the v-neck was quite deep ; I had to wear a tank top underneath it.
Completely worth wearing, while kind of unremarkable. Not flattering but fine
I wore once to work, by I didn't love it. Great print though. Probably better for bustier women. It needed to be longer for me. I'm 5'8" and very top tall.

links_reviews_title: My most favorite shirt so far! I wish it wasn't so pricey to buy. I will keep my eye on it though.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!

SUCH a flattering dress for those with heavier busts and so so so comfortable. Really unique color and is such a showstopper while still being something you can wear around all day/night. This is my first RTR review because I loved this dress so damn much! Pics don't do it justice!
Does fall down a bit if you have a bigger chest, however it also accentuates your chest in the best way! Super comfy and cute!

This dress was super fun for a late summer wedding. I will say it was a little low cut, but that didn't bother me too much. It definitely wrinkles easily as well, but was such a fun dress that I didn't mind.

links_reviews_title: Only took off one star because it wrinkles!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. Yes, it wrinkles but I ironed it when it arrived from RTR and it was fine. Even in this photo I'd been wearing it pretty much all night for a Christmas party (it was 50 degrees that night) and it still looks good. Love the off the shoulder look - it actually stayed down! Most off the shoulder dresses don't stay actually off the shoulder. The color photographs gorg. I like it because I like my legs and collarbone area but hate my stomach so it covers all manner of sins there.
Runs TTS. As others have mentioned, it does wrinkle. But I didn't mind! The fabric is thick and it stays up so I wasn't yanking it up all night. It's super boobie though so just know that!

This dress is so different from anything I've ever rented or worn! The color is super bold and the fit is very flattering! So happy I rented this for my vacation and would definitely rent again. Fits true to size, but has some stretch so i could have probably sized down and been fine.

links_reviews_title: I'd have bought this dress if I'd found it earlier in the season. Wore it 3x in 4days!
links_reviews_text: Fun, flirty, tons of compliments (a lot of cleavage)

"Green is my signature color"! Wore this dress for my 40th birthday bash. This dress was so comfortable. The fit was amazing. I didn't have to pull or tug at all with it being off-shoulder and busty! Highly recommend!!!

I love this dress. I wore a size 6 because ALC tends to run small in the bust (I'm only a 34B) and it was the perfect size. The sleeves are such a fun statement and make this a perfect dress for a night out or daytime with heels or flats.
Loved this dress, I normally wear an 8 in bottoms and a 4-6 in the top. I sized down to the six and I was glad I did because the bottom half of the dress is very roomy so it fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Great if you need a stylish hospital gown
links_reviews_text: I don't know where to begin. I love the color of this dress and the idea of it. But when you put it on you are immediately transformed into a garbage sack shaped hospital gown. I walked down the stairs and heard three people say at the same time "what's up with that dress?" Needless to see I never left the house in it. But I did take this picture. With the correct cropping it doesn't look so bad, but trust me....

links_reviews_title: well corona virus cancelled my event, so I ended up wearing it around my house and will rent again!!
links_reviews_text: fits true to size, good length

links_reviews_title: Was going to be tinker bell.... runs HUGE

links_reviews_text: I really want to like this dress and I was hopping to wear it on my next vacation to Cancun but this is not for large bust. It is flattering on the bottom but minimal coverage on top.
The color was beautiful but the fit was terrible and the fabric wrinkled very easily.
Loved everything about this dress. Perfect amount of coverage up top. Super comfortable. Only issue is the wrinkling. Still- loved it. Will def tent it again.
Wow! Alc is on point right now. This dress is gorgeous. I wore to brunch and it was perfect.
Fit perfect. a little stiff but that helps with a little tummy. I received lots of great compliments and the color is beautiful!
Great fabric, love this dress!

Very cute. It gives all kind of boob. If you are modest then don't rent. Lol. Will garner lots of comments from men. The length is good for so much boob showing so you don't look slutty. The worst part is it wrinkles like no ones business. I wanted to take on vacation but photos won't turn out because of the many substantial wrinkles.
Loved this the second I put it on, great color and adorable fit. Very comfortable to wear also!

In love with the dress, will probably keep longer. Have worn multiple times for long days at work. Super comfortable. It is very Lightweight and would be good for warmer weather. Needed to wear tights and a top. Liked it better with an undershirt and the top button undone. So glad I rented!
Cute dress but needed to be belted and safety pinned to work for me

links_reviews_title: Great dress, needs camisole and tights
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but it's one wrong move away from a wardrobe malfunction. It's an easy fix with cami and tights under it, then it's the perfect work wear with a hint of edge.

This dress fit well, but like most reviews stated: it doesn't stay closed very well, so I strongly recommend wearing a cami and tights underneath. I wore it like a skirt on a cold day and it was super comfortable! Felt very chic.
Perfect for work to fancy night out, then even if you're feeling crazy and don't have time to go home, brunch the day after.

I tried this dress on several mornings and ended up returning without wearing. It's a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen. The entire dress is held closed with two teeny buttons -- one on the inside of the wrap, and one in the bust area. Literally if either one comes undone you will be naked. But beyond that, it just didn't look great on me: big in the waist and I couldn't get the folds of the front to lay right. Oh well.

Cute dress for work and fit well. I wish it had more buttons on the chest and skirt. It kept flying open when I was walking around, and my bra was somehow peeking out when I was on the subway. Would suggest pinning it before heading out of the house!

This dress was fun to try. I'm usually a 6 and the dress definitely fit true to size but there was an odd gaping under my chest where the material wraps. I also had to be mindful of the slit when walking (especially in the office) because slight movements and any wind caused it to blow open. Very comfortable and lightweight.

This dress was really fun to wear. The pattern and color were really nice in person. The wrap part was hard to figure out, and I had to put some double sided tape at the opening to keep it from flying open at work. Other than that, I had a good time wearing it and he got was really nice.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and great silk fabric
links_reviews_text: Excuse the wrinkles - the picture is taken straight out of the bag. Also without the usual slip, tights, spanx, etc. This is a very flattering dress. It needs a slip and a bralette to be work appropriate, but it is totally doable. The fabric looks gray, but it is black and white print, where the prints are basically negatives of each other. I really am loving everything I get from this brand. I usually wear a size 8. The 6 fits fine, since I have a small waist. I think the 8 would have worked also, so the sizing is flexible.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress pattern for work - received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress pattern was so nice but the fit felt odd. I felt like the buttons clasped funny - particularly the one for the chest area. Other than that I loved it - I paired it with a leather moto jacket and cute mule heels.
Work chic, runs a little bit large and I wish I had worn with a belt but the silhouette is elegant.

links_reviews_title: This is a great dress that looks good with a layer or without.
links_reviews_text: But, oh, the static! Really could not wear again. Even with a slip it crawled up my legs when I walked outside.
There is a top sho show button but I wore a Cami under to avoid any wardrobe malfunctions. Gave me the easy cool work vibe I was going for.

Loved this dress for work in the winter - paired it with black tights and black ankle boots. The waist is definitely missing something so I added a belt which totally transformed it. I like that there is a chest button so it was not low cut. Hit below my knees and felt true to size. Loved the unique print and the way the dress hung. I even wore it twice!!! Cons- would only recommend this for taller girls with small to medium chests. Since there is only one chest button, I'm sure gaping would be an issue (as others have mentioned). The dress is also very staticy :( lastly I can see the the bottom flapping open in windy weather which might be annoying.
True to size. Great for the office or drinks after. Fun pattern.
Such an easy dress to wear to work. So flattering. The fabric was DELICIOUS! I try not to repeat rentals, but I'd get this one again. Loved it so much!
I wanted to love it but I think it would look better on someone taller and maybe if I had gone with my normal size instead of sizing up one! A bit too baggy but still cool.
This dress has such a nice print and the material feels so good. Very comfortable. I added a belt to emphasize the waist more but it was also pretty without it.
Fit perfectly and traveled well

I absolutely loved this dress. It's so unique, feels great, and looks amazing. My only complaint is that it doesn't fit large breasts (38 DD) but honestly R+B usually doesn't fit larger boobs. It was great to wear but I had to return. C cups and below would look slamming in this!
At first, it seemed too big and sack like, but it perked up with a cute belt and short boots. I expected it to be more jazzy due to the print, but later loved it!

This dress was gorgeous on the hanger. It fit my waist perfectly, but the fit on my chest was crazy. One side for, the other side gapped in a really unflattering way. The buttons are far apart, and the fabric hung off the front of me such that my bra was visible on that side through the dress. Gorgeous fabric but impossible to wear.
High quality, lightweight fabric. Blousy in the front (not fitted), but still flattering. To avoid indecent gapping, wear a cami underneath.
This dress is very flattering, and I got compliments on it. It has an interesting construction and is very well made. But the static! Maybe it would be a better choice in warmer weather?
Work chic with belt and heels
Fit very well and nice material
Great dress

links_reviews_title: Flattering, professional dress for the office!
links_reviews_text: I honesty wasn't sure if I would love this dress. I wasn't sure about the scrunching in the front, but it is honestly so flattering and flows beautifully. Great to wear to the office and can transition to go out for dinner afterwards. I will definitely rent again!

I really loved the way this dress flowed. Fabric is a little weird - looks like half the dress is inside out - but it hangs nicely. Probably fits a bit on the larger side so if you go back and forth between a 6 and an 8 go for the 6. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: wanted to love this but it was too baggy around the chest for my tiny bust.
links_reviews_text: Lovely print & fabric but not flattering on straight, small-chested me.

links_reviews_title: Sexy sophisticated and still professional for work due to the length.
links_reviews_text: The mix of gray print make it fantastic. Understated but still has a pop. If it wasn't so expensive I would certainly purchase.
This one felt kind of frumpy to me and I ended up not wearing it. The fabric was too big in the stomach area and kind of sat awkwardly. Was an odd fit. It ran kind of big, or at least on me.
Great fit, needed to pin neck and around one, great fabric. Wrap dresses can feel skimpy, this one did not. Considered buying but so memorable I did not.
This dress was so great. It was so easy to wear. I wore it to two works events and got many compliments.
A little loose but very flattering, lightweight and flirty. Work appropriate, may want to layer over a tank or bodysuit for extra modesty.
Very flattering. Got so many compliments! Fits perfectly & accentuates waist.

links_reviews_title: Wear anywhere modern twist on a classic shirtdress
links_reviews_text: Bustier ladies will need a small safety pin up top for the office and I sized up and belted to accommodate post partum larger top half. Perfect desk to drinks option. Light as air for humid NYC subway commute and also rolled up the sleeves to take this from work to weekend. Dream dress, and not too memorable to get a few wears out of.

I wanted to love this effortless, cool dress with its chic mixed pattern and midi length, but the odd cinching at the waist was all wrong. I made it work for a minute, using a thin belt, and sort of tucking some of the extra fabric in, but nothing that would hold for a long work day. Ultimately, I returned it, unworn. Loved the fabric and pattern, hated the waist.

Wore this to work. Liked how light it felt and the coverage, but extra fabric in the front chest and it only has three buttons (two in the wrap and one on the chest) and thus felt like it kept opening. It fit around my waist so not sure it was the fit.

Heavy 100% cotton fitted loose so size down for a formed fit. It was slightly sheer but a beige bra did just fine. I considered buying the XS but purchased the small. My usual size is 4 and small in tops.

This was the perfect shirt to pack for vacation. Wore it with jeans and heals for a night out, wore it open with a cami underneath and leggings on the plane, wore it tied up over my bathing suit to the beach. It's the perfect crisp white shirt and the material was so much nicer than I even expected - it's thick and almost ribbed with a nice structure to it. Really wanted to keep this one!

links_reviews_title: Nice material but a bit see-through
links_reviews_text: This shirt is comfortable and a nice material. I wore it with slacks for work. I am usually a medium and a small fit well, even roomy. It is a little see-through though - you could see the outline of my nude bra, so I recommend a cami under it.
Fabric is not as crisp as it looks in the photo, almost is a waffle/gauze like material. Runs large. I'm a true medium and the medium had almost too much fabric to tuck in.
Very comfortable fit... loved it!
It's a thicker cotton than expected but felt good and very comfortable. The texture makes it not so plain.
Cute causual top, material thicker than I thought. Not a light weight top, definitely more for winter.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, cute, can worn tied up or buttoned down, nice light material.
links_reviews_text: Not too tight or loose

beautiful 100% cotton fabric, nice cut. It was slightly small through the upper back and shoulders, but I'm a little more muscular than most women in that area. Unfortunately it's still too expensive or I would love to purchase it!
Such a comfortable white button down. So soft and great for everyday
I loved this top! I wore it twice - once to work in a business casual setting and once out for the weekend. It fits really nicely - super flattering, true to size, comfortable. I recommend!
Thicker material, so not light enough for summer days but it's a perfect fit and really cute paired with casual skinny jeans for Friday work days.
This dress is so pretty and soft! Very flattering and neat look. Mine had a little rip at the slip. Otherwise, I probably would have purchased it. Just loved it!

I thought it was a unique dress so I decided to rent. What a great decision! The silk is amazing and it is loose and fitted in all of the right places. The denim look detail is fantastic and no one believed it was silk until they felt the fabric. Wore it 3 different times, once to dinner, once to church and one to work as seen here. Didn't want to let it go but I will likely rent again!

Silky pretty fabric. Static clingy driving me bonkers though and the pockets stick out, even though it's not tight on hips. Maybe runs slightly large. If between 2 sizes, size down. If a solid size, stick with it
Beautiful and flowing, runs a little large but is very comfortable for all day wear. Cool print, asymmetric hem and silk screened letters on the sleeve make this an edgier choice. Highly recommend!

Loved this dress. It looks JUST like denim when you look at it in person but it's soft beautiful silk to the touch. Was very flattering and comfortable. I would definitely buy if I was able. Would rent again! The cut is forgiving so while I can be a 10-12 the 10 was perfect.
I rented this to wear to my family thanksgiving dinner. It fit beautifully, I don't want to return it! I loved the asymmetrical hem.

Strongly considered purchasing. Felt so good on my skin. Very figure flattering for hourglass. Glad to have tried in fall with leather. May try again in spring with sandals and brighter accessories. Try it!

links_reviews_title: Prettty and flattering but didn't really work
links_reviews_text: This is a super cool idea, but unfortunately the optical illusion is executed too well and it simply looks like you are wearing a grungy denim dress - I don’t think anyone who looks at it would even guess that it’s actually silk. Now if you find denim stiff, unbreathable, and uncomfortable as I do and prefer silk, it’s great. But it doesn’t really work for anything dressy. True to size or a little large but belt can be cinched as tight/small as you want. I also didn't love the slit, which seemed unnecessarily high.

links_reviews_title: Cool dress best for warm weather
links_reviews_text: This arrived almost unsalvageably wrinkled, but was otherwise a great casual dress. Material is extremely lightweight, would better for July than November, when I rented it.

I found this to be absolutely beautifully made and very interesting. However I did not find it to be flattering. I think I could've worn a 2 easily but I'm not sure that would've made it flattering it just would've had a less puffy fit. The sleeves as you can see from the picture are an odd shape. The fabric is all silk. As I frequently find a few more inches on my 5'4" torso might make just the perfect difference. I am curvy and when the dress curves too much it generally doesn't look great.

Photos do not do this dress justice. It is a stunner in person! The material is light, flows and hangs in all the right places. You can cinch in the middle to create a more hourglass shape. It's really comfortable too. It runs a little big but I was happy with the 4, which is my normal size. Highly recommend renting!

links_reviews_title: Wow just wow! It fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: Very soft material. Sexy yet covered. Leaves a lot to the imagination. Hugs every curve. Detail detail detail. Would rent again. Would buy. Can dress up or down. You're gonna love it. Runs true.

Love this dress, owlish I could afford to buy it! I wore this to work and got so many compliments! It's a soft light material that's airy while still drapes nicely. Got this during the early fall season but could definitely be worn in the summer. Will rent again!

Love this dress so much!! Fits and hangs beautifully. Lots of room for larger chests. Silky material. Great for work or after work events. I sized down one size and it fit great. Wearing again before returning.
So who would have thought of denim print silk? Not me! But it's so cute. Great flow, very comfortable, and the silk feels wonderful. The belt and waist is flattering.

I love it so much I'm renting it for another month. The material, quality and fit are great and the sizomg is TTS. I can see myself wearing this until the cooler fall days. My husband noticed it immediately and commented on how stylish it looked, so bonus :-)

One of my absolute favorite rentals ever. Comfortable, flattering and fun, this dress was a hit the 5 or 6 times I wore it. My husband just loved the silky fabric. It felt great even on 90+ degree days here in Florida. I wore this thing everywhere! Lunch with friends, a museum with my mother-in-law, a work event, and even running mundane errands! It was appropriate and stylish in every situation. I cannot wait to try it again which boots when it gets a little cooler.

Very cool trompe l'oeil effect - this is lightweight, flowy silk but it looks like denim. Fit is oversized and the top was very baggy while the bottom was comfortable. The arms are ENORMOUS so I kept them rolled up. There's elastic at the back and a front belt that was kind of awkward for me- it wouldn't really stay at a flattering place. I might size down next time but I don't want the hips to be tight. The slit in the front was not a problem, it mostly stayed put on a windy day. Overall I wouldn't call this a flattering dress for a short gal but it's a look!
silk was nice
Awesome dress! Looks like denim but is made of silk. Only issue was very bad static cling.
Wore this dress on a trip to London. The style is different, but gray to wear. Comfortable to wear all day. Loved this dress.
Great dress, loose fit. Belt was an over designed feature and the rings weren't that nice. Dont think dress needed as the print was really cool (overdesigned)
Like everyone else says, this dress is so comfy and fashion forward. Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Compliments galore. A fun silk dress made to look like jeans
links_reviews_text: This is a flattering and comfortable dress that can be styled to be dressier or more casual. Fun silk made to look like jeans, so it's a bit trendier--but exactly the kind of piece to get on RTR.

links_reviews_title: I don't get it--mom jeans and staticky
links_reviews_text: Why all the positive reviews? I don't get it. Thin fabric that stuck to my back and legs even though I literally carried a dryer sheet around with me all day to combat static. Also, must be a fan of mom jeans.
The print on this dress is absolutely stunning. The silk is light and well-suited for warmer days. I rented it just at the start of winter, so it didn't work well for me for this time of year.

links_reviews_title: Denim print without the heaviness. What's not to love!
links_reviews_text: Loose fit. 100% silk dress with denim print. Lots of compliments. Lightweight. Dress up or down.

I rented this in October - it ended up being too thin. I am a 0/2 and I felt the 0 was way too small. Short arm length and just felt constricted in the bust. I would size up -- it's a beautiful print/fabric, but very thin. Just to keep in mind if wearing in colder weather. It looked silly with tights on me. So it was bare legs or nothing. I ended up returning without wearing.
Insanely soft and comfortable! Lots of compliments and super funky look!

links_reviews_title: I spent the entire day being complimented left and right.
links_reviews_text: Formalized comfort. Silky denim dress with artistic cut. Loved this item would rent again
Definitely size down or 2. It is a really nice silk with denim pattern. Can be dressed up or down.

Really nice material for summer, very enjoyable - I didn't wear because I wasn't expecting the jean print to be so western like. The cut was flattering and I think it can be styled really nicely with some white boots.
Runs large definitely size down! The silk material is great and easy to breathe in and did not seem to wrinkle too easily which was nice for wearing at the office all day.

Silk but printed to look like a denim dress i.e. wearable trompe l'oeil. Very lightweight- good for end of summer/beginning of fall. Hangs beautifully. Looks casual but feels very deluxe. Runs big- if between sizes, definitely size down. Really loved the whimsy of this piece. Great rental.
Love this dress. Very pretty and comfortable. I am a 4/6 and the 6 fit perfect. It's flattering and body conscious, but not skin tight.
I am normally a size 12. My size wasn't available so I went with a size 10. I could get away with it but it was a bit snug. Perfect for my event! Definitely want to buy this one!

Love love love this dress! I really felt like a million bucks. It's a dress but looks like a set of perfectly paired separates, I didn't want to wear tights with it so I wore suede over the knee boots. I'm usually between a size 4 and 6, the 6 here was perfect. The fabric of the skirt was very lux and the top was very fitted without feeling skin tight. I don't want to return it but can't afford to buy it :(

links_reviews_title: Beautiful classy but sexy dress. Fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering to the body and fits pretty well except the waist does not have much give so I found the waistband folding over on itself after extended wear. I loved the colors as it is so appropriate for the holidays.

I adored this dress and had been stalking my size for like a month! I was beyond excited when I received it, and I wanted to love it, but there were some big cons for me. I recommend going up one size. Pros: Elegant Audrey Hepburn look Great for a daytime dressy professional look Makes bust look perfect & waist look tiny Cons: Made my hips look a size bigger Zipper is really hard to use without help Not much give at the waistline, so I felt nauseous when I sat down Long on petite figures
Very fitted but comfortable. Well made. I love the long sleeves and colors are perfect for Fall.
Wore this to the office and to show some properties. Absolutely loved this one. Flattering in the mid section. Would buy it if I wasn't poor. Top ten rentals in the last few years.
Fits perfectly! 5'2, 158 lbs.
Very professional dress but did not fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, runs small in top
links_reviews_text: My rib cage is huge (36 around chest) so I sized up for this one but even then the 8 was tight as the waist line hits higher than usual (right around the rib cage). That said quality was great and would rent again
The dress was flattering everywhere. It looked festive without overdoing it!

The fit on this dress is perfect! I wore it to work and not sure I've ever loved a work dress more. It was a great combo of completely professional with a hit of sexy. Very comfortable as well. Can't wait to rent it again (something I've never done before).
Great for a work event that started at 6--- went straight from work to the event and it was the perfect thing to wear. Super flattering.
Would probably work on someone with a long torso.

links_reviews_title: Rented for our family photos. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color contrast and fit (fabric has a little stretch). I'm usually a 14 but I'm glad I took the RTR advice and sized up

links_reviews_title: Runs very small. Unlike other dresses from this brand, the material on top is thin and feels cheap.
links_reviews_text: The mid section is so small, I can't wear this dress.

links_reviews_title: interesting design, great color but not a good fit for tall / long-waisted figures
links_reviews_text: Loved the idea behind this dress but since its a one-piece, the skirt "hem line" hits far too high up on a tall figure - not flattering
This dress was so fabulous, I had to take it out to a nice dinner. I wore it to work and felt like a boss. I am very happy with it!

links_reviews_title: i didn't wear it because it was too large in the waist
links_reviews_text: i didn't end up wearing it because it was too large in the waist where it would normally be form fitted. Very thick, quality material
Great dress. Fitted style, great fall colors, very polished corporate look. Soft and comfortable. Plan to rent it again.

links_reviews_title: It ran small so I didn’t have a chance to wear it
links_reviews_text: It’s very well made, not quite my style but wanted to give it a shot. Ran too small

This dress is beautiful and so well made. The only size available was an 8 and unfortunately it was too large for me. The bottom would have been fine, but the top portion was so big that it gathered up around my waist. The top is a stretchy material that probably looks gorgeous and very figure flattering if sized correctly. I'm hoping to rent it again if a size 6 becomes available.
Love it ! Well made
I loved how these looks like separates but is one dress. It was really comfortable to wear and I got a lot of compliments.
Nice fitting dress, its conservative yet the fit is sexy. The dress runs true to size, I typically wear an 8 but rented the 10 spot it was loose, but still beautiful!
I liked this top a lot; I found it looked a lot better under a dress instead of by itself. The sleeves really made it a statement piece and I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves - white blouse with a twist
links_reviews_text: Sleeves & fabric are amaze, cropped style works well with high waisted pants.
Nice classic white button down with flair - great top!!
sleeves for days. more cropped than expected, but in a good, easy to pair with high-waisted bottoms way. a simple, structured staple.

I would normally have gotten a M, but only L was available. It fit great though, so I recommend to size up! It's very crisp and a good length; you can tuck it in without having tons of fabric to deal with. Loved the big sleeves and big collar.

A basic white shirt with so much pizzazz - huge puffy sleeves and exaggerated collar are both perfect. The fabric has a great heft. Fit is tts but the sleeves are slightly shorter than I would prefer and also the neck when buttoned is incredibly tight. It’s fairly short but looks best tucked in.

links_reviews_title: Sisterhood of the traveling Hunter Bell top.
links_reviews_text: This shirt is AMAZING. All of my roommates wore it out because we were all so obsessed it it. The sleeves are the perfect size and the collar is to die for. Really wish i bought this top. Will rent again!!!

I wish i had a better photos for this but here you go. This is a super cute shirt that you wont want to miss to wear at work. Definitely put some black skirt, brown skirt or a high waist jean/pants to pull this off though. A sort of buttom that covers up your stomach/the shirt will help complete the look for everybody- otherwise there is a chance that you may look unstylish

This shirt had a dramatic sleeve (more than what's pictured) and was a bit extra, but I loved it! I felt super chic in it and got tons of compliments. I plan to wear again styled down with some distressed jeans.

Absolutely loved the big collar on this shirt... Gave the white shirt under my suit much more personality. The sleeves are as advertised... Very big and puffy. Many people can wear them and pull it off, but I wasn't comfortable so I kept the sleeves under my business jacket. Very light and breathable fabric for summer or layering. I usually wear a medium but ordered a large to be safe since I'm busty. Should have ordered the medium but since I was tucking in the shirt and layering, the large was fine.

I liked the idea of this style, but the fabric felt kind of cheap and attracted every spec of lint/dust around me. It was also really hard to keep from wrinkling. It looks great on and I got lots of compliments - especially on the dramatic sleeve, but the length was a bit too short. Not sure if that was supposed to make it less bulky to layer, but I found that it kept popping out of my bottoms for that reason.

links_reviews_title: Fun upgrade to your basic white button up
links_reviews_text: This was a great twist to my work wardrobe and was also fun to wear during the holidays. With the big sleeve your can't really wear a jacket but the shirt is great by itself. I normally don't like the cropped fit but this was long enough to be work appropriate. The fabric was thick enough that I didn't need to wear a undershirt and was warm even in December. Would rent again.
The sleeves are fun and was a great bust fit for me as well
Nice blouse

I rented a medium and it was definitely large (I typically wear an xs) but it was wearable. I got a ton of compliments and definitely felt like a trendy pirate or a founding father - but in a good way!

links_reviews_title: The reason why I give it a 4/5 is that the price is too high in my opinion.
links_reviews_text: I should have gotten a small instead of a medium but that wasn't a huge deal. I do love this shirt and how it was the design however the price doesn't match the quality. The quality is great, it's not see-through but I can't justify the retail price but it's good for renting!

links_reviews_title: Ironing something that you like to do for your $160 a month?
links_reviews_text: Then this white cotton shirt with sleeves belonging to a pirate or schoolmarm costume is for you! Liked the clothed covered buttons, large lapels, and shorter than usual length. Lotta puff on the sleeves.
Full sleeves and long collar. Runs a little short.
Cute and perfect for work

Didn't wear this. Would be a cute shirt if sleeves weren't so wide! (They are much puffier than picture depicts). I felt like a pirate -- my roommate immediately compared me to Seinfeld's puffy shirt episode. Could not wear to work!
Second my boyfriend saw me he pulled up a photo of the Seinfeld puffy shirt and said I looked like a pirate lol Had to change right away

links_reviews_title: Very cute and sweet sweat, make me feel like character in candy land
links_reviews_text: Normally 2/4, got M. it is a little big S would be more fitted but I enjoy loose fit so worked perfect for me

I loved this sweater because it is so fun and bright! I wore it to work and all of my colleagues loved it. I also got a compliment on it from a bartender later that night. I wore it with white jeans but I'd rent it again in the summer and pair it with cute shorts. Love this sweater.
Playful, soft, chunky sweater that I never would have thought to buy but am so glad I rented. Feeling my most whimsical self!

links_reviews_title: Super girly & cute sweater but definitely oversized!
links_reviews_text: At first, I wasn't going to wear this since it was SO oversized (I'm usually size 4/small but I ordered the medium since it said size 4-6). But then I looked at the pictures on the model, and the fit is exactly the same so I guess that's the look of it. You can probably size down if you don't want your sweaters too oversized, but medium worked as well. It is slightly itchy so I would recommend wearing a cami/tank underneath. There was definitely some pilling on the sweater but not bad. Very feminine!

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater I wore to thanksgiving
links_reviews_text: Very cute and in good condition

This dress is great for colder weather, because it has sleeves. The fabric has some stretch to it. Love the print! Hugs the body nicely. Wore it several times, including a Christmas party. Long enough for in-laws house.

Loved this dress! The shape is fitted and very flattering. The material is pretty thick so perfect for the winter with a pair of tights. I was a able to style this for both work and a night out. I received so many compliments on this dress.
Great fit. Very cute design. Thick material without being stiff. Absolutely love!
Great fabric that keeps its shape all night. But it does run small.

This is a very form fitting dress- a little too much so for me. The sleeves were a bit short on me and I am petite. You'll want to wait to do hair and makeup after you put it on as the collar does not stretch much.
The dress is stylish and warm. The material has a rougher plastic feel - I wish it would have been a little softer. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wore it three times in one week!
links_reviews_text: When I initially tried it on, I thought it would be too short for work - but add opaque black tights and some sock booties, so fun and chic. I wore it to my office, then for an all-day training I taught in another city, straight into the airplane home, and then finally for a breakfast event at an urban art therapy program.

This dress is cute for work or a casual event. The fit is true to size although it's a little snug on the belly, making it hard to hide a mommy pouch. Overall, I got a lot of compliments and will wear it again before the month is up.

links_reviews_title: Awesome fun dress but a little tight!
links_reviews_text: Really loved this dress!! I wore it to a conference and got so many compliments. It fit like a glove but a little tight and I'm a small but relatively true to size. I wouldn't recommend sizing up but just be mindful as I'm small chested and didn't wear a bra. Will definitely rent again!

Rented this dress for work and it's definitely a little tighter (in terms of how it hugs your body) and a little more casual than I anticipated, but it was OK for a Friday. It's got a body con dress feel, but with warm sweater material and a turtle neck. It's very comfortable, flattering, true to size, but probably better as a casual day dress than for the office.

links_reviews_title: Conservative enough for work, and ready for happy hour!
links_reviews_text: Good quality fabric. It was comfortable, and I felt flirty and confident in it. I usually wear a small, but listened to the reviews and went with a medium. I’m glad I did, because a small would’ve been way too tight!
The pattern was beautiful and it fit just right. Received lots of compliments but didn't love the material and how it felt against my skin.

Tough, tightly woven fabric doesn't give much. Lovely print. Too short for me to wear as a dress so I treated it like a tunic length top and wore it with leggings & pants. Interesting choice for work.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern with a flattering look!
links_reviews_text: It might be a bit tight for some taste, yet I really enjoyed it with tights and boots. It was comfortable and I will be sure to rent again. Such a detailed and impressive pattern.
Between the tight fit and the length, I wasn't wearing this one out.
Lots of compliments. Very interesting print and vibrant colors. Pattern around the stomach is very flattering! Hides imperfections. Will rent again.
This dress runs small. Typically I am a S or Xs but had to size up to a M for this dress. Otherwise cute for every day and/or work!
Amazing dress- I loved the feeling of the dress and it fit like a glove, but not too tight in any particular spots- also loved the colors
LOVED this dress. Very comfortable. I think the pattern makes it very forgiving even though it's a tight dress! Wore to thanksgiving.
Wore this to work and it was super comfortable and a good temperature for winter and office A.C. I also ended up wearing it to Saturday matinee at the theatre. Top marks

links_reviews_title: Perfect thanksgiving dress! Warm thick fabric that sucks you in.
links_reviews_text: Love the colors for fall. Turtle neck is a bit tight so do you makeup and hair after you slip this on...
Fit perfectly!
Super comfortable, great colors, tons of compliments. Ran a little big but overall good fit

I really liked this dress. 3/4 sleeve and a good length considering how tall I am! I've been dying to do the colored stocking trend this year and this gave me the chance! Really comfortable for a thanksgiving meal. Paired with a patent block heeled bootie!
I enjoyed wearing this and felt is was very flattering. The only issue is it's not as warm as you'd think. Loved the fit.

links_reviews_title: "Ugly Christmas Sweater" of dresses but super flattering
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work. I didn't really care for the colors/patterns, and they reminded me of an ugly Christmas sweater, though the material is more nylon/cottony and not at all itchy. I loved the fit. I'm usually a 2 or 4 and the Small was perfect. Got compliments on the neck line specifically
Lovely fabric and fit

From day to night. I loved this dress. Wore it to work, to date night and to the theater. It was warm for a chilly fall evening and super flattering. The print made it different and visually interesting. I considered keeping it.
Good length, fit like a glove, nice fabric. All around win, great for fall!
Really comfortable and flattering
This sweater dress was nice thick material, but I ended up not wearing it because it was too tight.
Sleeves are just over 3/4-length, so there's room to accessorize with simple statement pieces. Pairs fine with leggings.

links_reviews_title: Super cute pattern with a fun ruffle
links_reviews_text: I rented wore this dress at 24 weeks pregnant. I ordered one size up from my normal size and I think it fit perfectly. There is plenty of stretch but the fabric is thick enough to smooth lumps and bumps. A couple of things to note. The dress is on the shorter side. I'm 5 2 and it hits several inches above my knees. The ruffle kind of starts mid butt. I think the length/ruffle is flattering. Also, the pattern is more colorful than it looks online. The stitching is red, blue, yellow and purple.

WOW- ordered a large since it said it runs small. Could barely get my head through the opening of the dress and just forget about getting it on. It clearly has shrunk; the large is probably a size 0 at this point, maybe smaller.
Nice sweater dress

links_reviews_title: Not flattering for pear shape or if you have a tummy
links_reviews_text: I tried it on and promptly packed it up for return. The dress was interesting but not flattering if you have larger legs. It's designed for someone skinny and average height. The dress was also too short for work. Perhaps with spanx this could work but not worth trying for me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for an NYC bridal shower in February and it was perfect! Received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It's definitely a tight fit and the neck is a little itchy but overall really loved the dress.
The arms and length were extremely short on my frame. It felt as if I were wearing a dress for petites.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but very form fitting
links_reviews_text: I loved the heavy high-quality knit of this dress, but it was a little bit too form fitting around my middle section. I wore it anyway, but felt a little self conscious. This would probably suit a straight figure better than a curvy one.
Loves everything about Tim his dress. It was very flattering and comfortable
Rented the large bc it was the only size available so it was def big on me but it was super comfy and soft on the inside. So cute too

Great style, quality seemed really good. Wish it had fit baggier on me, the bell sleeves were long and cool but just not quite the same effect on me as the model. (Duh, what is wrong with me, of course, she's a model! But ya gal was hopeful.,..)

I didn't LOVE this sweatshirt. It was cute enough for running errands on a Saturday, but the fit was a little off for me. It was really big in the arms but shorter and more fitted in the body (but still roomy).
Nice and comfortable. Fits great
Really comfortable and casual
Lightweight, yet warm. Great for Friday casual in the office. Got lots of compliments.
Compliments galore. Cute, comfy and casual but it ran large. I rolled the sleeves up a bit but I'm a shorty :) I would definitely recommend this.
Fun luxe sweatshirt that has long bell sleeves which give it a more fashion forward vibe!
Super comfortable. Runs large. The XS fit like an oversized medium on me. Great piece for layering.
so comfy

links_reviews_title: I can't believe the price point for this.
links_reviews_text: I can't imagine anyone spending more than $70-$80 on this sweatshirt, and even that's a stretch. Don't get me wrong it's a great 'throw on' piece but nothing about it is luxurious. Glad I'm about to wear it once, send it back, and swap it out.
One of the best pieces I've rented! It's so cute, and easy to wear. Only thing is it's not as oversized as I was expecting, but still so great for everyday!

I loved this sweatshirt, but that's exactly what it is: just a sweatshirt. Who on earth would pay $400 for this? Am I missing something? It was good for going to Costco, a kids birthday party and pushing my kids on a swing. Like I said, it's a good sweatshirt.

There is something off about how this shirt fits - it definitely doesn't fit as shown in the picture. The sleeves were a little too short and wide at the bottom, and at 5'7, it was a little too short - if I lifted my arms, my stomach showed. Definitely a comfy shirt to lounge around in, but not something I'd rent again.
Would NEVER spend the money for this sweatshirt but got a ton of use out of it. Totally jazzed up several weekend days worth of leggings and felt like a star compared to the usual non descript tops.
Comfy. Fashionable. Wore it multiple times before returning. Fit perfectly.
The boxiness is better suited for a narrow frame; so not flattering for me, but it was warm and comfortable.
I liked this a lot, though I don't think it looks like the stock photo. It's smaller in person than that, and the lettering is very strong. But I really dig the look overall.
Lots of compliments on a sweatshirt :)
I love how comfortable it was. Good rental for everyday attire.

links_reviews_title: Cozy designer sweatshirt so you don't feel like a total shlub
links_reviews_text: Didn't run as big as I was expecting but the size Small was still roomy and cozy - especially since the sleeves are big. Doesn't run as long as anticipated. Overall, a super soft sweatshirt that's stylish enough to count as an outfit.
boxy

links_reviews_title: Comfy sweatshirt to wear on the weekend
links_reviews_text: The arms were a bit wide, but other than that, a fun sweatshirt.
Random design on front made it fun
It's a cute sweater and everyday casual look
I didn't end up wearing this. It was a little too short, and I wanted to wear it with leggings.

Despite prior reviews saying this fits large, I found it to be true to size. Slightly cocooned shoulders and metallic detail make it a unique twist on the everyday sweatshirt and it got a couple of compliments.
Ran a little small in the torso length but the arms were too long. Would have liked this more in a size up.
I absolutely loved this sweater. Super comfy !! Stitching was great fit was perfect. No complaints ...
Loved this distressed sweatshirt with coasted jeans and boots. I wear a 4 and got an an XS for a closer fit. Sleeves are long but I just rolled them. Warm and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Really cute but much shorter than pictured.
links_reviews_text: Was not a flattering length for me, sadly. But I would definitely rent again and just size up for length.

Loved this sweater. I wore with Grey rag & bone jeans and received so many compliments. The sweater itself does not run large in my opinion. The sleeves are bells but can easily be cuffed and look cute. The sweater is short so I would recommend sizing up if you want it longer but don't size down for fit
Love the sleeves and cute cropped length. I'm tall so this would be quite oversized on a short person but loved it with high-waisted jeans

links_reviews_title: Not as oversize as the pic shows
links_reviews_text: if you want it to be oversized, size up. I'm about a size 8 and the medium fit like a regular sweatshirt (doesn't cover my butt). Will try the large next time.

Usually a m/l in tops. Since I saw this look really oversized I went with the medium (large wasn't available). I figured it would fit just fine. Nope. It was actually tight on me. It went right back in the bag.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: It fit well, slightly cropped, but in a flattering way. The neck line was a crew neck t hat wasn't too constricting but didn't show the undershirt. The sleeves are a bit wide, which I like the look of but do get annoyed of.

links_reviews_title: Fashionable & current design. Soft comfortable & cozy
links_reviews_text: Wore multiple times. Was comfortable and cozy. In fashion design made this a great sweater shirt to wear out and about.
I would have kept this forever if I didn't need to swap it out for a vacation piece. So cute.

Although 5'11", I am always a true size 4/small. Since reviews said the sweatshirt is oversized, I felt safe with a small. The sleeves were perfect and long, but the body was too short and fitted for being oversized. Odd fit for a tall girl; probably perfect for everyone else.

I had planned to wear this out and about on a weekend but the fit was a bit off. Sleeves were long, body was short and cropped. I'm 5'10" and the sweatshirt did not look like the photo. Either way I still wore it with leggings as a lazy day outfit and enjoyed it. It was extremely comfortable and perfect for lounging.
Very warm, but also very big. Be sure to size down a size or two depending on the look you're going for
Definitely an over sized look so keep that in mind. Comfy and cozy though!

links_reviews_title: I basically wore this four days in a row.
links_reviews_text: It's just a sweater, but I really did wear this off and on Saturday through Tuesday. I put it on when I was cold over the long weekend and then wore it to work Tuesday. Perfect oversized true to size. No need to size up, in my opinion. This sweater made me happy. Again, it's nothing amazingly special but I really enjoyed wearing it and that's all that matters.

I rented this on a whim and I loved loved loved it. It's oversized with a graphic print and it's so adorable! I paired it with skinny jeans and I didn't want to send it back. It's long and cozy and not itchy. Wanted to purchase!
Oversized fit, wore with leggings but was still a bit boxy and I would have preferred a little longer/slimmer. Cute though for every day! Nice quality.
Talk about a conversation piece! Wore this to work and over the weekend casually and people commented and asked about it all day.
Definitely runs oversize but in a good way - I loved wearing this and it was really comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Fun and well made, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Oversized and comfortable, dressed down for a day hanging out in the city and dressed up for a day in the office
I typically wear a size small but I enjoyed this oversized sweater. It was very chic and I loved how warm it kept me.
Wore this out and about on a super cold day and it kept me warm. Comfortable. True to size. Easy.

I had so much fun with this sweater as part of my RTR unlimited rental. I wore it with leggings one day, and with a leather skirt another. I am 5'1" 130 lbs and the size small fit perfectly (large - but that's how it is supposed to be!) It hit right below the bum, had an oversized fit, but the sleeves were not too long at all. i got compliments everytime I wore this sweater. Great for cold winter day, especially during those holiday weeks when you want a little extra coverage from all the eating & drinking that happens in December!
The fit of this is big, but I'm tall and that's kind of the style. It would be good for a baby bump. I got a bunch of compliments. The sleeves are definitely long.

Wore this to cook Thanksgiving dinner, Black Friday shopping and drinks later that night.... goes perfectly with black jeans or black leggings to chill or can be dressed up with a leather jacket. 10/10 would rent again.
Wanted to keep it
This sweater was amazing!! It was big warm cozy oversized. I loved it. Great for a fall stroll.

This sweater got me exactly 3 compliments within the first 10 minutes of arriving at the event. I paired it with a faux leather mini skirt and chunky black booties --I was in love. Seriously thinking of buying it because it was so hard sending it back. Perfect fit and amazing quality. @imvictoriafratz
Runs big. A little itchy but not bad. Very warm. Wore this at least 3 times with leggings, jeans and to work. Love love love!!!
Picked this up at San Francisco RTR store during last minute visit to California. Kept me warm from the chilly mornings. The sweater was warm and cute!
The sweater is cozy but chic. Paired with skinny jeans or leggings and boots, it looks cute and put together. Complements galore!
Thick, scratchy, fun!

This is super cute and fun. It's a little scratchy and definitely oversized but not in a bad way. Thicker than I expected so I wish I had waited until it was cooler. I wore with leggings and funky sneakers and got several compliments!

links_reviews_title: works with leather leggings or casual
links_reviews_text: wore this 2-3 times...I never do that!
Runs big and not a particularly flattering shape especially with the wide design.

This sweater is simply amazing. It's so basic but it transforms into something subtly chic when you put it on. IT IS OVERSIZED- ITS SUPPOSED TO BE. It hides all the extra pudge without looking like a sack. I wore it for a Valentine's Day party at work and every single person complimented it. Yes it's a little itchy, the feeling goes away after a few minutes. It's a great chic sweater.
I loved this sweater with the unique saying 'you and I' in French. It's a heavier sweater but perfect for cold winter days. This does run quite large so size down 1-2 sizes. I'd rent this again.
Wore this a few times and wanted to keep it!
A great oversized sweater but nothing special. Not especially soft.
Rented for fall European vacation and loved it. Comfy and easy to wear - once with leggings and once with jeans. It is pretty oversized but true to size in my opinion.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, classic and standout all at the same time.
links_reviews_text: I have rented this sweater multiple times and plan to do so again! Great weekend attire or casual day at the office.

This sweater was really fun to wear. I had to always wear a long sleeve shirt underneath it so that it wasn't itchy. Which was fine as the weather was cooler when I rented it. It felt really cute with jeans and a little heel. I don't have any pictures in it because this really was just an every day rental. This is definitely the kind of sweater I would never buy as I tend to buy basics. But I'm absolutely loving the rental unlimited for being able to get pieces like this wear them a bit and then send it back. Very satisfying :-)

Warm and cozy sweater. It looks like it is meant to fit loose and baggy, however I rented a large (I am normally about a size 10 with 36D to DD) and it was rather shapeless. I still enjoyed wearing it with skinny jeans and leggings, but I would consider sizing down, especially if you are in between sizes.

links_reviews_title: LOVE IT! Super comfy and cute.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 and ordered size M. The sweater hit mid thigh. The sleeves were slightly long but with one fold at the wrist it was perfect! It was comfy and cute! Very easy to wear with jeans and/or leggings. The material at times became itchy but nothing that was unbearable.

links_reviews_title: sweater is too big but cute.
links_reviews_text: runs really large.
It's oversized which I knew and expected, but it's so itchy!!! Wore once then returned not renting again.
Paired great with leggings.
Wore with leather pants. Oversized and fun. Unique sweater I would not want to own but loved to rent!

links_reviews_title: Super cute stand out oversized sweater
links_reviews_text: I decided not to wear because my large bust... It just isn't flattering on me. I'm a 36F. I imagine it would love fabulous on someone smaller. Is a bit itchy though.
I sized down and this was still really big! And slightly itchy. But it was fine for one day.
Runs large, very comfortable.
Oversized, baggy, bulky. This is an item I would not rent again.
Fits nicely, very cozy

I don't understand why I fell in love with the sweater but I had one month of rent the runway and ended up keeping this all month long, I wore it every couple of days with jeans or leggings, it was comfy and soft and I loved it and it surprised me!
It's so soft and fit so well. It was surprisingly flattering too
I wore this so much because of how comfy soft it was. Very basic sweater that can be pulled over most outfits but love the meterial

links_reviews_title: Was very soft and cozy, wore it several times.
links_reviews_text: Very comfy.
Cute easy to wear sweater. Comfortable. Nice and casual.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, but it sheds- don't wear black pants
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater- wanted a loose fit so went up a side, should have stayed in normal size. Biggest compliant is that it shed all over my black jeans.

Loved this hoodie/sweater! It's unique, comfortable (not itchy!!) and looked great with a pair of jeans and booties. The medium fit true to size, so there was plenty of room for my Friendsgiving dinner.
This is great for the weekend to just throw on with jeans.
Easy, casual sweater to throw on for a relaxed day at the office. Not itchy at all. Found the hood to be kind of annoying.
a little frumpy but very comfortable.
Fit is meant to be loose and the material was very soft!
Cute hoodie that's great for fall
I liked this sweater and only wore it once, but the material was a lot thicker than I anticipated

links_reviews_title: A unique and easy everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: I was obsessed with this is got a TON of compliments. It's sculpted and fitted in appearance but doesn't feel too tight or uncomfortable at all. The fabric has a ton of give and moves perfectly with the body. I loved the unique design. It was hip and trendy and so fun! I can't wait to rent this one again!

Picked this up for a trip and it didn't come in time, but I was able to wear it twice when I came back - once over the weekend for drinks with a friend and once to work with a high-waisted skirt. I love that it's cropped but still warm; perfect for the fall transitional season. The martial is thick and seems odd at first, but it's nice and structured and doesn't feel or look weird on. Very comfortable and interesting with the detail at the hems. I'm usually a M in tops and the M fit me perfect.
Loved everything about it.

The fabric is thick but it breaths! So cute and felt great in it! I have a shorter torso and still slightly cropped. The sleeve and bottom detail (wavy like the pattern) was a great touch! Wore it a couple times. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but edgy; fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Wore this as an everyday top for a trip to San Francisco. Was great for adding some fun yet somewhat edgy flare to a pair of black or white jeans!
I loved the fun fit of this cropped long sleeve. I wore it on cooler spring days. It felt like it was made of bungee cord, in a good way!
Great fit and structure. Incredibly flattering. Perfect with high waisted jeans. Only shows skin when you raise your arms.
I took this out of the RTR bag and was a little skeptical based on the material. I put it on and it's SO comfortable. I thought it would be stiff but that's exactly the opposite. It's amazing!
Is a nice thickness of cropped sweater and surprisingly looks good on my busty chest. Too itchy if I don't wear undergarment under it which makes the sweater too tight if I do so.
A medium might've been a smidge more comfortable - couldn't lift my arms. otherwise, cool piece! the material was really comfy and nice.

links_reviews_title: Cute w velvet pants for holiday party
links_reviews_text: Very tight in arms (I am typically Medium), but very flattering and well cut. I'm 5'2" and it just covered by bellybutton, so is definitely short for taller people. Loved this!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit! I got sooo many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved it! Thicker than you expect, kept me very warm! Loved how flattering it was!
So so cute! Fitted and cropped at belly button (I'm 5'2)
Fit great. Loved the cropped top

Typically I am an XS all so I'd say this runs small since I got the small size and it was still super short but maybe it's supposed to be ? Anyway a little boxy for my liking Definitely unique fabric feels like you are wearing a rug- thick not itchy Wore with high rise pants and my stomach still showed but I have a super long torso

links_reviews_title: Great way to dress up a pair of jeans
links_reviews_text: Long enough in the arms and very flattering on.

Absolutely loved this shirt, and I got so many compliments. It is cropped but not much shows with high waisted pants or skirt. It could even be work for work if you have a skirt or pants that are high waisted enough. I am a little busty with slender shoulders, and the small was almost too loose in the shoulders. Could have warn an XS but the small fit well.

This piece is super cute and fantastic quality. It's thick and unique texture gives it a little extra something. It is definitely cropped, but I wore it with very high waisted jeans and it created the perfect look for a first date.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and flattering top. I was impressed by the weight and quality of the fabric.
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered this top for work, but ended up pairing with booties, gray wash jeans, and a leather jacket for a night out instead. It is a bit short, but not crop top short so can also be paired with high waisted trousers or pants for the office.

links_reviews_title: Extremely comfortable and awesome 3d knit technique on the sweater.
links_reviews_text: Itʻs a bit cropped so I had to be considerate of the pantsI wore with this. It looked good with high waisted skirts as well.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to dress up and down!
links_reviews_text: The shirt was thick, but not too warm for 65+ degree day. It doesn't have a ton of give, however, so make sure to consider that when sizing!
Really cute but if you are tall this is extremely cropped even with high wasted jeans

links_reviews_title: Crop top at just the right length!
links_reviews_text: Cutest top ever, worn with high waisted black denim (was able to pull it off at work even). Loved the thick material!
Very high quality thick fabric. Wore with high waisted black culottes
Fitted and cropped looks great and has a lot of fun texture. Quality piece!

links_reviews_title: This piece matched the skirt I rented perfectly .
links_reviews_text: This piece was true to size and very comfortable. The fabric felt very nice.

links_reviews_title: Perfect mix of style and comfort
links_reviews_text: Extremely high quality thick material! And fits perfectly. Loved.
The fit was great and material was very well made. It's definitely heavier than your average top. Super cute dressed up or down.

It is very short, which I like since I have a very short torso. I could wear this to work, but it would expose too much (for work) on someone with a normal torso.I thought it was very flattering since it came in right at the waist.
+ flattering fit + unique texture
I didn't love this as much as I thought I would. A bit snug in the arms and could be too cropped if you have a larger chest. It was fine but probably won't rent again.
Loved this top. Fit super well and looks adorable. A little cropped but not too much. Would have bought if it wasn't so expensive.
Fits tight so I sized up to a L instead of my usual M. Really cute top. Great pattern
A bit surprised with how warm this sweater was, but really loved the print and design. It's very cropped (I wore over a slip dress) but is very flattering.
This was a super cute crop top. The black and white stripes have a bumpy texture, which I wasn't expecting. But it didn't add bulk and was overall very cute

links_reviews_title: It was such a great thick fabric
links_reviews_text: It ran very large. It wasn't fitted. The shoulders were extremely wide and very large in the waist and long in the arms. If it fit right.....the material is quality. Maybe a no if you are petite like myself.
Such a cool, fun top. It's pretty structured, not a cotton sweater. I listened to the reviews that said it ran small and ordered a medium but it was too big.
Great sweater and very warm even though it is a crop.
Cute, flattering crop.
This dress is adorable and easy to wear, Especially on cold days!

I have a full figure so the dress does not hang like it does on the stock photo. I am 5'1" and this was short, but I paired with leggings and it was absolutely fine, I rented an XS. The bottom color is more navy than black. Would rent again!
Loved this so much I wore it 2 or 3 times before returning. Great for work or a winter date night depending on how you wear it! Very flattering, very comfortable. Definitely rent!
Chic, easy, comfortable and warm - fit TTS!
Super easy to wear. Casual piece that I wore with boots. Very comfortable since isn't form fitting. Runs large IMO. Recommend this sweater dress.
Sweata weatha = this dress. It's excellent but runs small so size up! I'm wearing the large!

It's comfortable but runs very big, which makes it even more shapeless. A top especially was huge. I'm usually M but probably needed XS. Length was ok. My husband said it made me look huge. That being said, it worked out well as weekend, stay home lounge wear.
Absolutely love this sweater dress. It's soft and cozy yet flattering and stylish. Will definitely rent this again!
This sweater dress is mega comfortable. I was so cozy wearing this! I was so close to just buying it. I may still!
Loved this sweater dress! Not itchy, but its also not very thick so better for mild days. Colors are bright and vibrant.
I got this for brunch/day drinking with friends and it was perfect!
Didn't end up wearing this. The sleeves are super large and hang down. You can't really tell in the model, but it was very big and awkward. This was in the smaller size too. I sent back.
I got so many compliments on this sweater dress. It was so comfortable and it wasn't too tight. Would definitely rent again!
This was so cute and comfy! Loved this! Great shape, not itchy, and fit well.

links_reviews_title: A very comfortable dress that give style to a sweater dress.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and was very comfortable. Wore it with skinny jeans to work. I got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: Size up if you don't want to show off your booty
links_reviews_text: Loose on top but will hug your curves on the bottom
The dress was comfortable and good for a casual office setting or everyday. It did seem a little on the short side for a 5'7" girl at work though.
So easy to wear loved it

links_reviews_title: Super cute with tights and boots!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress a few times - it was perfect with tights and boots. Great for those colder days. The pattern looks even better in person, and the fit is really flattering. I received several compliments from complete strangers while wearing this!
The dress runs a little large. Nice long sleeves. I wish the dress was slightly shorter and tighter. This would be great on someone tall and curvy.
i wore this to ALL of my family holiday events. it is so comfortable and cute and i got tons of compliments. it also fit perfectly. i had a hard time sending it back

Cute, true to size, and not itchy. Unlike most sweater dresses which cling to the stomach region, it is soft-belly friendly. However, it didn't really dazzle me either. Perhaps just not my style after all.
Fits true to size, comfortable, and I got so many compliments. Easy to wear!
It's fine nothing special. A little more form fitting than I expected around my hips, so maybe this would run small on some people.

links_reviews_title: Wore it around casually and it kept me warm during the rainy winters of SF!
links_reviews_text: It's super comfy and I love how the sleeves came up to my palms. This dress wasn't super boxy like most sweater dresses I've come across. :D
Great with boots
It fits great and is very comfortable. I thought it was showing some wear and tear though.

links_reviews_title: Cute but didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: Very cute and soft material, but unfortunately, for me, fits weird. I am 5'4" and it was very short on me to the point where I would have been uncomfortable wearing . It fit okay up top by VERY clingy on the bottom and not in a good way! Probably meant for someone who is not on the curvy side!

It was too warm the week I rented this dress so I didn't get to wear it. I did try it on though, and the medium fit perfect. I have a small waist and ample booty (size 10/12), so in my opinion this runs large. It would be really cute with navy tights and boots. Could be dressed up or down. Really cute and I would rent again.
Great soft & cozy sweater dress. I ordered a Large because I like sweater dresses to be comfy. Paired with cute brown boots and leggings :)
It was comfy
The fabric was soft and not itchy at all. The colors are vibrant. I received countless compliments each time I wore it. It's a good length for tall boots like the model is wearing.

I loved this blazer. I wouldn't want to own it because it is pretty memorable and would be hard to wear frequently. But perfect rental. It was a fun heavy tweed type material, it felt very "holiday" to me. Very comfortable and fun, more casual type blazer.
You can't go wrong with a Veronica Beard blazer. Fully lined.
I loved the design and look of this. Half a star off for it being a bit stiff in the shoulders (like many blazers), and having a tiny duck tail that stuck out in the back.
Beautiful tailored fit, true to size but order up if borderline.
Wish I hadn't returned this! Hands down best blazer I've ever worn, fit was incredible and received so many compliments. Can't recommend this rental enough

links_reviews_title: Love! Got several wears out of.

links_reviews_text: LOVE this blazer. I wore to work over a dark navy dress, could also see pairing it with a tee and jeans. Not ready to return this one yet!

I've worn this four times already - mostly to work with a red silk shell and navy pants, but also with jeans on the weekend. The fabric is more colorful than it looks on screen, and is super warm and flattering. Great blazer for winter.

When I first got it, I thought it might be too bold in its pattern, but I tried it on. And it looks great on! The fabric is heavy, so good for a chilly office and running from one building to another during my workweek. It runs small, so based on feedback from other reviewers, I got size 6 even though I normally am size 4. Glad I did - 4 would have been too small.
This is an easy, flattering and comfortable jacket. It fits true to a VB size 4, which is the size I wear in most brands with the exception of Reformation and HVN where I size up to a 6.

links_reviews_title: Great colors; flattering fit; sleeves very long
links_reviews_text: Fit is flattering. The colors are rich and vibrant. Material is thick but good for cold weather. Sleeves were extremely long for me, but I wore it anyway and turned up the cuffs.

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with Veronica Beard
links_reviews_text: Love the style of this on trend piece. If you are busty, it may look better left open. Quality fabric and great detail. I have worn with jeans and with leather pants.

links_reviews_title: Heavy fabric that is very beautiful
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and a pattern that can mix and match. Arms and shoulders were tight.
Thick material so warmer but loved this! Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Came new with tags on, what a thrill! Love all Veronica Beard jackets, this was no exception.
links_reviews_text: It was very snug for a size 10 but had a great fitted appearance. Would be great with the suggested skirt as a suit. Also wore with a dark denim sheath and dark jeans. Great jacket.
Classic fit and pattern for fall. Wearing it for the first time today and I love it!

links_reviews_title: So cute, thick and warm for fall
links_reviews_text: I loved this but the shoulders just fit too tightly for me to be comfortable.

Cute dress for a chilly March evening in Vegas. Wore with OTK boots because it hits mid-thigh and that's a little short for me. Might want to wear a camisole underneath if you're not ok with a deep v-neck - it was Vegas so when in Rome...

links_reviews_title: The cutest, most flattering and fun work dress
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress so much! Got so many compliments on it! I wore it with tights and i think without tights it would be a little short for work but would be perfect for a night out or date night! The dress was super comfy for al day at work but still very pretty and stylish
Almost sent this back without wearing it. Put it on for work yesterday and immediately knew I was going to buy it. You'll definitely want to rent this.

links_reviews_title: You need to wear this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this just to work and am absolutely in love with this dress! I don't want to give it back!
Very cute and elastic waistband. Snap can come undone easily, so wear a camisole or cute bra underneath.
Fit was good except small snap at the bust never stayed buttoned. I have a small chest and I imagine anyone with a larger bust might have an issue.
This dress was fun, but casual enough to be comfortable at a friend's birthday party. I'm often a M or a S, but the small worked fine (and was not too tight).
Fit great, very flattering! The pattern is subtle but still fun.

links_reviews_title: Fitting for all types of events
links_reviews_text: I love this dress I don't want to send it back! I got so many compliments on it and wore it to multiple events (thanksgiving dinner, going out in NYC, and a bridal brunch in December). I'm 5'4" and 130 lbs usually wear a small but the xsmall fit perfect with this dress!

This dress is adorable! It's lightweight, comfortable and flowy. It has an elastic midsection so it can adjust slightly to your size. It snaps closed perfectly at the chest. Perfect length for me. Pattern is pretty with a little hint of red. I wore it to a Friday evening event and a casual holiday party in a friends home. I paired it with polka dot tights, tall boots a red purse. Totally recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress so much I don't want to let it go
links_reviews_text: I literally love this dress so much I don't want to return it. I've worn it for work a couple times and it's so cute and I've gotten a lot of compliments. Chest area a little big, but I also have a small chest.

I typically don't wear dresses like this, but I love the look for early fall. Paired with tights, it worked to go from work to date night. Only 4 stars because the extra fabric didn't exactly flatter my figure, but I'd still rent again.

I had zero issues with this dress! The fit was perfect on my very straight build. Perfect transitional piece from summer to fall. Still very light and airy, you can pair it with a leather jacket and some black booties for a night out. I wore them with my Gucci loafers for work. Does have a button in the center for ladies who want to be more covered.
This dress is adorable. I've received a ton of compliments. The one thing I have to say is that it runs a bit large.
The front must've popped open 50 times when I wore it. A little tight in the arms. I wore to a concert because it would've been too risky at work with the front button. Cute dress but not practical.
I have a larger bust and found that this dress would snap open when I moved around. Not the most flattering around the hips either!

Loved this dress. Fit was true to size. A little short so might not work for those of you with long legs. And if you have a larger bust I would be worried the snap wouldn't stay closed. But very comfortable. Would rent again.
a cute dress- just hit me all wrong.

I loved this dress! I was very nervous when ordering that it would be too small for my bust - but it fit nearly perfect! It has a small clasp in front and only once did I wish it had a tad bit more forgiveness. However, I ordered a large just to be safe and it was too big. I would recommend this dress to anyone!

links_reviews_title: Got for work but too short
links_reviews_text: Should've looked into the reviews a bit more, the dress was too short for work for me.

Really flattering! Paired it with a belt and black booties; perfect for work and then you can unbutton the clasp for a transition from day to night. Comfortable and thin, perfect for fall weather. The skirt portion was a little loose so I probably could have done an XS but overall very cute.

links_reviews_title: I love this brand - love this dress! It's super cute with booties.
links_reviews_text: Fit really nicely. I want to own it!
Love this dress! It's so forgiving and perfect to either dress up with heels or dress down with a flat or loafer. It's extremely flattering!
Fits large overall, especially the chest and arms (and I have wide shoulders). Would size down next time, but paired with a waist belt and combat boots - it was adorable.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress and easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size - great length (mid to lowish thigh). Super cute with knee high boots or wear with tights for work! Awesome fall dress - will definitely rent again!
Perfect dress for the transition from summer to fall. I wore to work, and on a date and received lots of complimnets

links_reviews_title: Cute and flattering but runs very small
links_reviews_text: Very difficult to take on and off, but comfortable once on
It was really cute but for my height it was so short. Couldn't wear to work
Loved this piece! Fit great and was so stylish. Got several compliments on it. Goes with everything. Wore it to work and to post-work drinks.
The fit was lovely! It came without the "belt" ribbon but i used this boss belt instead and loved it too. Beautiful, relaxed but chic look. Used a size 4r and it was perfect.
This looks great and is very versatile. Casual due to tshirt too but fun with layers on bottom and easy to dress up or down. Flattering also.

This is the third time I've rented this dress - I absolutely love it. Casual enough to wear every day but easy to dress up. It's super flattering thanks to the layered high waisted skirt (hides the tummy/hips etc). Very comfortable too. Can't wait to wear it again!
Loved this dress as a casual, everyday dress. It was a great fit and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: If Whimsy and a White T Shirt had a baby
links_reviews_text: Just fab! True to size, white t shirt on top and whimsical flow on the bottom. Not see through. Super comfortable and I used a red belt as my dress came without one!
Professional but still stylish! Received a bunch of compliments

links_reviews_title: Cute and funky, a little hard to zip on wide ribcage
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a casual work party with nude heels and a funky necklace. I got lots of compliments. It was cute and easy to wear as well as comfortable. Even though it fit very well, I had a little trouble zipping it over my wide ribcage but once zipped it was fine.

Such a fun, easy dress for a beach vacation. I ordered it for a 3-day high school reunion weekend in Florida.
