Wouldnt work for work as it hit right above my waistline so occasionally showed my belly if I moved a certain way. Super cute and easy to wear though! Got tons of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Very cute - Short for long torso
links_reviews_text: Very cute. Wore my highest waist jeans and it still showed skin. Short for tall people. ADORABLE

Very cute sweater. I loved the bell sleeves and the color was very pretty. It was pretty warm too. It is more cropped than I expected but it looked cute with high waisted black jeans. Excited to wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Really cute and the color was great
links_reviews_text: Perfect with high-waisted pants
This sweater was so cute but it came unexpectedly short. The fit was above my bellybutton so unfortunately I couldn't wear it to work, which is what I rented it for.

links_reviews_title: Very warm in the cool Utah night air!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a little long on my frame, but I expected that since I am short/petite. The sweater hit me at my belly button, but didn't show too much skin with my mid-rise jeans.
Loved the color and weave of fabric. The puff sleeve was an awesome touch and added a lot to the look. Not great for warm months -- pretty warm sweater. Will rent again in the fall probably.

links_reviews_title: Super casual but the crop and the arms give it an interesting twist.
links_reviews_text: The material makes it a little itchy but I wore an undershirt and that made it better. I wore it with high rises and that made the crop cute but not too sexy if paired with an undershirt, for wearing to work.
Nothing earth shattering but very wearable, cute with a little flair
The sleeves were very long on me
Super cute sweater. It is cropped so needs to be worn with high waisted jeans. Perfect for a night out or dinner.
Cute, different sweater!
Slightly itchy but cute overall. The flared arms give it some fun style and the crop while short hits just right if wearing high enough jeans.
Nothing special but cute and comfortable and good for every day wear.
It was really cropped but it was a nice cozy transition sweater to spring
This is definitely a cropped sweater and goes best with a high waist pant or jeans. Loved the color and the voluminous sleeves.
I didn't end up wearing this. I wanted to love it, but the sleeves felt ridiculous on me when trying it on.
Soft sweater, gorgeous color. Unfortunately I didn't wear, as it was far too cropped for me.
This fit well and looked perfect with high waisted jeans!

links_reviews_title: it was fun, the color is cool. Received good feed back.
links_reviews_text: I wore it with a high waisted pencil skirt. It would go nice with high waisted jeans as well.
Slightly cropped bell sleeve sweater, size small fit perfectly. Hard to wear with a lot of jeans. I wore it with skirts for work and received a TON of compliments. I may end up buying it!
I wish that I could have worn this sweater because it's sooo cute but I am only 5'3 and have a really short torso and it was still above my belly button with any movement.
Pretty dress but expected the quality to feel more luxe. Top kept gaping and material didn't feel very high quality
I wore it with a sweater for the fall weather but it's great alone too - I had to wear a cami underneath as I have to with all wrap dresses.

I loved this dress! I wore it for a dinner while on vacation. The material is casual, but the print and cut are a little dressier, so it was the perfect amount of fancy. Loved the ruffles at the hemline. The only issue was that it was a tiny bit big in the shoulders. Tying the wrap tightly helped with this, but I was still a little annoying

links_reviews_title: Wrap dress that is beautiful, but challenging for busty women
links_reviews_text: I had a daytime, bayside event in tropical weather. This dress hit the floral theme so well! However, I did have to use two safety pins for the front wrap part for fear of showing a bit too much.
Got lots of compliments. Showed a lot of chest; I'm a C cup and I had to pin the chest AND wear a camisole underneath. Very cute though.

I normally wear a size 6 or a medium, but I ordered a small in this dress and it fit perfect. The dress was wrinkled when I received it, however it's really easy to iron, and looks fine after. I received a lot of compliments on the print, and I think the cut really complimented my figure (pear). I wore it at night in 60 degree weather and was pretty warm. The only downside is if you look at the material up close it's kind of faded. Too many washes.

The print of the dress was absolutely beautiful. It felt like I was walking around wearing a painting. The dress was very comfortable but the bust was a bit large. It's a wrap dress so of course it was easily adjust in the hip/waist but the bust seemed to open up and even worse when I was sitting. I ended up having to safety pin it to feel secure so I wasn't tugging at the dress the entire wedding.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner. I fell in love with this print! I was worried the cotton would make it too casual for the occasion but the wrap and hemline made it appropriate. I usually wear an 8 or 10 depending on the fit through the hips and the medium fit well. One of my favorite rentals this summer - highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a daytime wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a daytime wedding in early fall. I wasn't sure what temperature to expect, but it turned out to be a very hot day with an outdoor reception. This dress was perfect because the cotton is very breathable. The wrap skirt felt relatively light and airy. Best of all, there is a hidden inner tie in the skirt that prevents wind-related wardrobe malfunctions. This dress literally cannot blow open as long as you remember to tie it. Lots of compliments in this dress; would rent it again!

I wore for two weekends out and it's such a beautiful dress with a flowing skirt and lovely print. I couldn't figure out how to tie it at first but figured it out eventually. Had to wear a cami under though, as usual with wrap dresses and deep V's in the front. Rent this dress! Nice enough for a wedding with heels.
Super comfortable and gorgeous on. My only complaint is that it does wrinkle easily. I like it so much I'm tempted to buy though!

So many compliments on this dress.... was tempted to buy it. Could be dressed up with heels or down with flat sandals. Cons: arrived a wrinkled mess. Luckily i own a steamer. It's low cut for my petite build and needed a cami. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but might need under shirt
links_reviews_text: #workootd It's a wrap dress so be prepared for a low v neck and a loose fit up top if you don't have a larger chest. Otherwise very comfy and great for these last few hot days before autumn!
Love this dress!!!

So fun to wear with the ruffle at the bottom! Fits a bit big on top through bust, shoulders and arm holes, but I was able to get away with it since it wraps. Feels really well made. The pattern and colors are beautiful.
As good as all of the reviews say! Perfect at a fancy outdoor party and a mini-after-date at the nearby Broadmoor resort.
This dress is fabulous! Breezy, yet classy. I worn both at the office and to a pool party, and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: What a sad and wrinkled mess!
links_reviews_text: This dress could have been cute but it was so wrinkled when it arrived! The fit was good, even though it was a little low cut for work.

links_reviews_title: I was hesitant when I first saw it but on it looks great! Needed to be ironed!!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Long, so pairs well with a high heel.

Overall a great dress. V neckline is a little deep for work but pinning it was a quick fix. Their is an extra inside tie to prevent the wraparound skirt from blowing open. Cotton material is very lightweight and great for summer without looking cheap. Ruffles on the bottom bring the right amount of fun while still being appropriate for work or daytime event. I wore it on the plane for a work trip after a day in the office and was still comfortable at the end of the day. Fits true to size. Ordered a large and normally wear a 10/12.
A pretty pattern with rich colors. Really nice fit and soft fabric. I have a small chest so it was a tiny baggy for me in the chest so I pinned up the shoulders so my bra wouldn't show.

This is a lightweight cotton summer wrap dress with a really nice fit. So easy to wear just about anywhere and can be dressed up or down. Like most wrap dresses, it gaps a little in the chest when you sit down and I'm a D. I wasnt sure how much i loved the print but the dress is definitely flattering and good for work or play on a hot day.

I liked, but didn't love this dress. I think if I had filled out the top a little more, it might have been better, but on the other hand, those who are curvier might find it too low cut for work. I think this can go to the office with a tank or an evening out if you fill it out better than I did!

I really liked this dress. I just wish the top fit a little better. It was just... off. There's no way I could have worn this without a navy tank top. The skirt is flowy and fun. Easy to dress up or down depending on the shoes and jewelry. The print is a great color combo.

I loved the print on this dress and the high low was good for someone on the shorter side. It is essentially made it a maxi dress for me. I will say however, that I can't see anyone wearing this dress alone without some sort of bralette underneath. There are no darts in the bust, so it's really wide at the top part of your chest and sort of sticks out on the sides of your armpit holes so it would be pretty revealing regardless of your bust size. That didn't bother me too much, so I just threw a black one on and when I'm on my way.
The print on this dress is beautiful. It's cotton and it provides a lot of structure. The wrap accentuates the waist and the hemline is dramatic. Definitely makes a statement.

links_reviews_title: Kept trying to close the bust
links_reviews_text: Maybe I'm just bad with wrap dresses but when I sat the top seemed to gape open. I love the print but I couldn't make the top work comfortably.

I wore this for an outdoor rehearsal dinner and it was super comfortable and fun. It was a little large in the bust area so I needed to wear a tank top underneath since the wrap dress does open a little. Overall it was a super cute dress though!
The dress would be perfect if the fabric wasn't faded. Super cute otherwise.

Beautiful dress that magically fit a 5'1" frame. It was perfect. The wrap makes it easy for you to get it snug around your waist and because it's hi lo, I just wore wedges and it was perfect. It's classy and tropical. I would wear it again and again. I did have to safety pin the front closed but I imagine this all depends on your bust.

Beautiful print but awkward wrap and the asymmetrical hemline made this dress not the most flattering for me. I couldn't find the right jacket or cardigan to pair with this dress without making it look strange
Pretty enough, but a very casual fabric. Required almost an entire additional outfit underneath and very unflattering on me.

links_reviews_title: My first RTR piece and I got a compliment from a sranger!
links_reviews_text: PERFECT FIT
Lightweight and flattering for beach trip
If I were going somewhere more casual, I could pair a cute bralette with this and it would be perfect. Unfortunately I needed something more formal. Other than being low cut, it was true to size.
I loved this dress, but actually didn't wear it. The hemline didn't look that good on me, but would on someone with great legs!

links_reviews_title: Tory Burch never fails me, this one is another lovely dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my hubands bday celebration and I love how comfy and pretty it is!
Everything about this dress was so flattering, from the print to the wrap and silhouette. Contemplating keeping this one.

This dress is the best dress ever. It was light but not flimsy it really flattered my figure. While it was extremely low cut I just work with that Cammie and it didn't look awkward at all. I would super recommend it to anyone looking for a good dress for a daytime event or work that is if you dress up for work.
This dress was lovely, the movement of the dress with the ruffles was very elegant, however, if you are busty girl, you will be popping out of this dress obscenely without a tank underneath

links_reviews_title: I want to keep this forever!
links_reviews_text: Super cozy and warm! I've been wearing this everywhere and have received tons of compliments! Great for layering because it runs a bit oversized - I still stuck with my usual medium and was happy with the fit!

Need to own this. I love how this isn't super feminine. Definitely oversized so size down if that's not your vibe. It's an easy way for you to spruce up a casual errand look in a way that's not your average sweatshirt and leggings. Def recommend.

I've said it before, I'll say it again- I love every single rental from Sandy Liang and she can do no wrong!!! This fleece is obsession worthy- warm enough to wear during deep winter, unique among all the other basic betch fleeces, SO many pockets, perfect oversized fit, the list goes on!
Jacket was oversized and fit just right. Was thick enough and felt great in 50 degree weather. Got so many compliments and the camo print was so cute!
The jacket is not supper warm but it is big and cozy.
I loved this jacket! Super comfortable and warm. It buttoned all the way up and over the neck and fit well. Recommend!
I had a monthly plan so I just added this jacket. It was warm even for 35 degree weather. I didn't like the buttons because they don't snap so it's annoying to take it off and put it on

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - and I MEAN every. Single. Day.
links_reviews_text: Rented for "everyday," wore every day. I don't want to give this back!!!! I've never felt cooler. This jacket is everything I could ever want, comfy cozy with such a fun pattern/pop of color. Runs large but that's the look. You'll have to pry this one out of my hands! more on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com!
na
Loved wearing this with leggings, sneakers and blingy earrings. Such a fun piece!
Great design, love the print, super cozy and oversized. Total win! The only drawback is the button closure. It's not a zipper, if that matters to you.

I sized down in this and the jacket fit across the chest. The arms are absolutely massive and bulky though. I felt like a bear. It didn't end up looking very flattering to me and just a tad too trendy than I would like to pull off

Loved the style and it was very warm but it was absolutely HUGE! I recommend at least a size down if not more for this one. I rented a Small but would have preferred an XXS. Will try to rent again though
Fit very large and would suggest to size down
LOVE this fleece zip up! Trendy spin on a classic jacket. Super comfy, very cool, and oversized. If it wasn't so expensive I would keep it!
Such a cool jacket.
Reviews are spot on about the tight top - and I am pretty small chested. Otherwise, it's padrisimo!
So tight in the bodice, I'd be wary if you have a bigger chest.
Love this dress! I rented it for a sunset sail work event and it was perfect. Comfy, cute and a great color. I got tons of compliments all night. Another Kate Spade knockout.

links_reviews_title: so cute! easy to dress up and down
links_reviews_text: length is a smidge long but otherwise super comfy and cute
Love this dress. Got tons of compliments, love the way it moves. However the structure bone was a bit uncomfortable. Waist was also a bit snug

links_reviews_title: Cute & bright but not for short torsos
links_reviews_text: Wore for pregnancy announcement photo shoot. I usually wear a 4 in this brand but tighter stuff is uncomfortable in my condition. Probably should have tried the 4 though: the 6 felt a little long and just big. My waist was totally erased- I'm not showing as much as it seems in this photo, there's just a lot of fabric on the top! Design would work better for taller, slimmer girls.

I wore this to my HS reunion. It was SO FUN!!!!! This would be great for a wedding, too. Ultra bump-friendly. It was pretty tight on top, though. It does that thing where the zipper is SUPER hard to get over the seam. I couldn't actually get it on myself (I couldn't even put it on backwards and spin it around), my husband had to do it for me. If you are big on top, this may not be the best for you. But still...fun and flirty and sassy and great.
Wore this for my friends rehearsal dinner in Mexico - such a fun dress, but a little long for someone who is 5'2. I wore it with heels to help!
Tiny on top! Ok for one night if I don't need to breathe deeply but wish i had sized up.
Loved the colors but this style just wasn't flattering on me.
Fit was tailored yet still flowy. Has internal boning and elastic with hooks for added support. No stretch.

Still loving the print of this dress, but it's a bit tricky for big chested women, as most bandeau dresses are. The Upper Layer made sure I didn't look pregnant but it's not the most flattering IMO. Still a great dress to rent, especially for going on vacation!
So many compliments on this dress. I loved the built in bra. It worked great for my smaller chest. The colors are fantastic. 5'9 128 34a

The dress ran a little small, I originally ordered size 2 but my chest was too big for it and easily exchanged it for a size 4. I wore this in Cartagena Colombia for a bachelorette trip. It was beautiful and so fun! I felt amazing salsa dancing in the Cartagena bars.

So there's not much give in the fabric, and the dress I had was a little worn so the boning kept poking me BUT I loved this dress. I wore it to work with a cardigan and got so many compliments. I, like a lot of larger chested women, wore this without a bra and I didn't feel like I was going to pop out. I'll definitely rent rent again.
Pretty dress! Tight in the chest.
Loved the dress! It has an internal bra strap piece so I was never in fear of it falling or slipping down. Got so many compliments!

I love this dress by Kate Spade! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for A to C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’3”, the length hit at knee length on me. The dress is amazing in person. You can pair this with black heels if you are going put and or flats to make a cute casual look!

links_reviews_title: Soooo cute! But runs so incredibly small
links_reviews_text: I mean this when I say it: it runs soooo small that I would recommend ordering up at LEAST 2 sizes. I got the zero thinking it was a dress that was stretchy, but it's a zipper near the rib cage and bust and it runs small. Sent the 0 back, got the 2 and it fit well, but if you're on the fence go up again.
Great fit.. picture does no justice for vibrate colors ..

I am between a 4 and 6 and the 4 was way too tight, so I needed to return and size up. The zipper and chest area is a bit tight. This dress is amazing and I received compliments all night long. The colors and overall quality are amazing. I am short and this was definitely covering my knees- wish it was a little shorter. The top is secure and does not fall down. Loved this dress!

My birthday dress and i'm loving it! This was easy and fun! I felt like I should have went dancing. The elegance of this dress mwith the colors and style, made the tropical environment even more authentic for me. This dress is so chic and vacation ready. I also love that there is a extra strap that goes around you like a bra that helps keep the dress up. Would definitely recommend. Can see all my rentals pictures and videos on my Instagram @mrs.chicchanel

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Not flattering for me
links_reviews_text: Bright, lovely colors! Nice material & ruffles. Not flattering on my body.

I love this dress! Finally a strapless dress that you won't tug on because of the brilliant design. There is an extra cross strap in the back that keeps it in place all day long. The colors are so vibrant and I received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was a fun dress to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress for perfectly and was comfortable to wear. I did not want to send it back.
Worked great for our trip to Columbia. A bit tight in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Fun, unique style, comfortable and great for vacation
links_reviews_text: Pros: the color and print on this dress are fabulous and unique. The fastening in the top, and extra layer means you don't need to bother with a strapless, bonus! There's also grip on the top, inside the dress which prevents any slipping down. Cons: the extra bra support strap is impossible to do by yourself, and WILL come undone. Not the end of the world, as there's a zipper on top of it, you won't be exposed, just a hassle.
I loved this dress. Great fit for small bust and was roomy through the waist and hip. A knockout for a fiesta party.

links_reviews_title: Kate Spade is always my go to...
links_reviews_text: So I loved this online, which was the main reason I actually signed up for RTR. Though I do like it, I'm not certain I'm going to wear it bc it makes me look larger than I am. The design, color, and overall look is great, but I'm not sure it's for me.

links_reviews_title: Too big - so I wore it a little different
links_reviews_text: Super cute, love the extra support for the strapless. Very comfortable- the 12 was just too big.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't get it zipped over my boobs (I do have large ones, tho), so I couldn't wear it!
links_reviews_text: The waist fit perfectly, but when it came time to zip it around my chest, it wasn't happening. The dress was beautiful tho! I can't wait to reorder in a size 16.

Love this dress. It has silicone around the top to help keep in place AND added elastic inner wraps (kind of around the backside, hooks like a bra). This dress stays put! It does poof a little bit making any woman with larger hips look a little larger but it flows so well, can't help but feel great in it anyway! Almost bought it!

Fit perfectly. A little tight through ribs and chest, but for a strapless I guess that's necessary and was able to go bra-less. Someone with a larger chest than my tiny mom 32-A/B boobs would need a size up! Very flowy and fun. Even got a comment from a group of guys that I looked "festive" :)
Fun, flirty, and forgiving--I loved this dress! Wore it to a baby shower and ate and drank everything and still felt perfect in it. Received tons of compliments too. Ran TTS for me.

Rented this dress for a vacation in Austin. Perfect themed dress and a beautiful vibrant color. Rented for the style, but definitely not a flattering fit on my 4'10" frame (I knew that going into it though.) Still, beautiful dress that I loved wearing and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Eye catching but not very figure flattering
links_reviews_text: This dress looks so gorgeous online and I wanted to love it, but as some of the other reviews state, it's not very figure flattering. I have a boxy shape, so the cut of the dress just made me look even more boxy. Wearing a cropped jacket helped define my waist. The colors are bright and vibrant so the dress is very eye catching and I received lots of compliments, but this is definitely not my favorite piece.
i rented this for a cinco do mayo themed bachelorette party and loved it! was perfect for the occasion and such a fun dress!

I ran into the store and Jessica pulled this out for me for a brunch concert. I love wearing colour. It was fun and I stuck out in a sea of black. A friend did say he hoped I went to Rosa Mexicana for lunch though.

Wore this first to a nice dinner on my honeymoon in Hawaii and then again a few month later to a rehearsal dinner in Boston. Cannot suggest this dress enough. So beautiful, fun design, stays up and doesn't fall, always many compliments. Can dress it up or down. Will definitely rent in the future as well!!!

Sized down for this jacket per other reviews and it fits perfectly. Such a rich green jacket, medium weight, and almost ankle length. My only complaint is that it ja a little itchy (but totally totally worth it!)
The color is gorgeous, it's a nice weight, the length is perfection (I'm 5'10) and it was a nice fit over a sweater (got an L). Compliments? Yes. I also felt great in it. Highly recommend.

I rented this coat to wear on my wedding day for any outdoor photos. It's just an absolutely beautiful cut and color. I ended up keeping it for a month after my wedding. It's not the warmest winter coat, but with a scarf and a long sleeve shirt underneath, it's fine down to about 35 degrees.
Loved this coat. I was unable to button it comfortably so I'd probably try to size up next time.
Love love loved this coat!!! It ran a little boxy so I didn't keep it, but seriously considered. Deep green color is very classy and unique. Better in person than in my photo :)
Fun coat, didn't feel it was very high quality wool though. Fit well over a sweater and dressed up jeans and shirt.
Nice coat, makes outfits look just a bit fancier. Good for 50 degree weather.
I literally wore this everyday. I wanted to buy it so badly. It is a gorgeous green color and perfect long length. Love love love 1000X love.
Fits oversized, but it's def supposed to be that way. also matches perfectly with the tory burch green bag!
This jacket was supper fun to wear! I am docking a star because it was very itchy on my neck - the price you pay for a warm wool jacket. The color is great and I loved the length!

I have broad shoulders and was happy that the medium fit my shoulders perfectly, but the midsection was very wide and boxy. Thinner than I expected, but fine for 45+ degree weather (or colder with a very thick sweater). I'm 5'7" and it fell 3-4 inches below my knees.
An
Nice fit, but coat looked worn down. Wrinkles and not great quality

links_reviews_title: Great coat that's fun without being too much of a statement. Got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Surprisingly warm, given that it doesn't feel too heavy. Good size pockets.

I wore this coat a LOT over the "cold" winter months in Dallas, TX. It is a classic shape and fit, but the color makes it modern and on-trend. I got a lot of compliments on this one and I fully intend on renting again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments on this coat.
links_reviews_text: Unique color. Great fit/very warm. The outer material is not soft, but didn't matter because it did the job of keeping out the cold. And I got a ton of compliments!

Love this jacket. There's about a month between sweater weather and parka weather so this was the PERFECT in between coat. It's light but quite warm and the shape is fantastic. Putting it on with a black turtle neck, jeans and booties was the epitome of effortlessly chic.
Couldn't wear unless every part of my skin was covered where the coat touches. It's cute but awful fabric
Runs very large.
These jeans are awesome ! I wore a size 16 (sized up x2) the fit was loose and comfortable could of sized down after I wore them a couple times since they got baggy.
Worked awesome for my Stranger Things Eleven punk Halloween costume!
I am usually a size 28, but given the reviews, I ordered these in a 30, and they fit perfectly! Very comfortable, classic mom jean look.

Like everyone else said these are tight! I got my regular size, 25 which was the right size, they are just really tight with no stretch. The jean material is very thick. These were fun to wear but pretty uncomfortable to sit down in.

I went with my true size and these are SNUG - there is no stretch. If you want these to hug the body I recommend going with your true size and these will stretch throughout the day or going a size up if you don't like rigid denim. The next time I rent I will likely go with a 29.
Runs super small! I've worn the same size in other Levi's but I couldn't even pull these up.
These jeans are super cute, but they run really small. I've rented two sizes and neither have fit, I will try to rent again. I really think they run about 3 sizes too small.

I have Levi's shorts in the same size that are actually a little big, but I like my jeans a little loose. Got the same size in these. I couldn't get the buttons to come close to closing. Inconsistent sizing within brands makes me sad.
Never wore these. Too small. Couldn't even pull them over my hips.
My favs! Cute color and cut!
I typically wear a size 8, but based on reviews, I rented a 30R. I could not button the top button so unfortunately they remained unworn.
Going to try a larger size. I think I would have really liked them had they fit. Normally 29 is either perfect or a little too big and couldn't button it at all.
Didn't end up wearing them because they were too tight but it's a cute cut jean! Short.

links_reviews_title: Wore a few times, crotch was weird.
links_reviews_text: I wore these jeans a few times because I liked the initial look. But as I wore them, the crotch started to sag and bunch up which made them unflattering. Probably should have waited for another size.
Classic Levi fit. Lack of stretch, but to be expected with the brand. Cute fly button up.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't even get these up my thighs
links_reviews_text: I couldn't even get these past my thighs. They barely fit over my calves. My size 14 jeans are all too large, so thought I could get a 14 in these to have a baggier fit but instead ran into the mentioned issues.
I love these jeans and will likely end up purchasing them. I've gotten a lot of compliments on them and have paired with sweaters, hoodies, T-shirts and big fall jackets.

The back looked great but it was so high waisted on my short torso that it almost touched the bottom of my bra when I sat down. I sized up 2 sizes and it fit okay but was just too unflattering/tight in the stomach area when I sat down. Didn't end up wearing.
Definitley order one size up, but I loved the look of these! Comfortable in the waist. Thighs do run small but not uncomfortable.
Too Small, normally a 30 or 10 and this didn't fit.

links_reviews_title: These are so cute with a t-shirt and flats, or dressed up with a crop top and heels!
links_reviews_text: It IS a little tighter than I would imagine, but still so cute!

links_reviews_title: I didn’t get to wear them
links_reviews_text: Too small

I’m 6 weeks postpartum and haven’t worn anything big leggings and dresses in 11 months. These are the first jeans I’ve worn in close to a year and they feel so great. They’re very comfortable, not too tight, and flattering. Love these jeans!!
Went up 2 sizes and glad I did! Perfect length and liked the slim boyfriend fit.
Super tight around hips more like a boyfriend jean
These jeans ran SO small. I have a pair of the wedgie fit in a 30 and they are a little loose, where these would not go over my tush.

links_reviews_title: Hate to see them go love to watch me leave.
links_reviews_text: Great high rise jeans. Loved the overall feel. Definitely no stretch, which gave for smoothing effect. A few too big of knee rips for my liking.
Runs very tight around the legs and thighs

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but no stretch so not very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I liked the way these jeans looked, the distressing and hems are cool but I'm so used to wearing stretch denim that these were a bit jarring. Especially because I wore them in the extreme New York humidity during the summer. But if you're ok sacrificing comfort for fashion, they're a good choice.

I took the risk of ordering my regular size in Levis because the other sizes weren't available. I could hardly button these around my waist though they fit fine in length, hips, and even my curvy butt. I'll consider renting these again in the future one size up and hopefully that will solve the fit.
Super stiff. No stretch. Look great on but not the most comfy.
Cute jeans, bummed that they did not fit.
Go up a size or two for the more curvy girls. I rented a size up and they still wouldn't get over my legs.

Based on other reviews I went with the 28 instead of my usual 26. Definitely glad I did! They have no stretch, and were a little tough to get on the first time, but then they loosened up a bit and fit great. I wasn't sure if I would like the button fly at first, but I really did. I really liked all the details on these; the high waist, distressing, and raw hem. Great jeans, might rent them again.
At first they were a little snug, but they molded to my body pretty quickly.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't button not made for thick thighs
links_reviews_text: Runs small

links_reviews_title: Took off, digging in my hips
links_reviews_text: Fits tight through the hips. Jeans have no feminine shape, look like my boyfriend's Jean's.
Its hard to get jeans that they fit :(

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans but a little "rugged" of a look
links_reviews_text: Not my style

I felt that these ran true to size, based on the pair of Wedgies I've been wearing for the last couple of years. The denim is stiffer and less stretchy than some denims, which I like. Maybe that's what threw off other reviewers - expecting stretch that wasn't there?

links_reviews_title: Runs big! But cute for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Like all madewell items, this runs big. Ordered a size 2, but should have gone with a 0. Cute and felt perfect for spring!
Brought this slip dress to the Philippines, and it was so cool to the touch and easy to wear that I wore it multiple times throughout the week. Will definitely rent again

Love a great, easy to wear slip dress! The color was a lovely burnt orange shade with white polka dots. The straps were super thin and dainty. The length was perfect for work. This could easily be dressed up for after work.

The dress was beautiful and unique. I received so many compliments at the wedding we attended. It was perfect for an outside wedding in 90+ degree weather. I wore a slip underneath because it was a little thin. The straps were also a little long and not adjustable, but it wasn't that much of an issue.

This is the second time I've rented this dress and I've even decided to purchase it! It's so light and comfortable, yet classy enough to wear out to lunch, or just a casual day out with friends. The color is gorgeous and it's the perfect piece for hot weather!
Trendy, easy, loose, light, nice length. It's a nice dress, but nothing special or particularly flattering.
Comfy, cute, casual!!
The perfect summer dress! Easy to wear, great for 90 degree hot weather

links_reviews_title: I ordered 2 sizes big because the other sizes were out of stock but this was nice and cozy.
links_reviews_text: Perfect.

This falls nicely and fits true to size. Straps were a little too loose for me and I'm not comfortable not wearing a bra. A good strapless bra would be helpful! But cute, comfortable and easy to style.

I rented this for a baby shower and I received a handful of compliments. Very pretty, not too thin and can be dressed up, or down. I paired it with some mules and a jean jacket. The only issue I had was that the straps kept falling down - like every 45 seconds I had to adjust them. I wish thin strapped dresses like these came adjustable! It's a really nice dress for a casual event. I would rent again, just would have to adjust the straps myself somehow.
Fits loose, size down. I wore with flip flops and a denim jacket.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Should have gotten a size up
links_reviews_text: I have a pretty large chest, so this dress was perfect on me except for being too tight in my boobs. I'm going to try renting up a size because I love the soft fabric and cute print! Also, I'm 5'8" and this dress hit above my knee

links_reviews_title: pretty simple but nice with a jacket
links_reviews_text: good with a jacket.
I got so many compliments on this totally simple dress. I never even thought brown was my color but apparently it is!
Super cute and versitile
I'm VERY tempted to buy this dress! I paired it with a cheetah print belt to cinch in the waist and it was adorable. Also very comfy.

links_reviews_title: Easy, Breezy Slip Dress for Every Day
links_reviews_text: This dress is lightweight, comfortable and such a great find! Every time I've worn it, I've paired it with a medium-wash jean jacket and various shoes (fun cheetah print sandals, nude mules, etc.) I did have to tie the straps because it did fit a little large and that did just the trick! I'm obsessed!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress so much!! I love oversize dresses and this was just amazing!
links_reviews_text: The straps kept falling down or I would have purchased this dress.

links_reviews_title: Easy, comfy, perfect with a Jean jacket and tennis shoes

links_reviews_text: It fit too large in the waist area which made it look frumpy, also an odd length on my 5'6" frame. Would maybe try again with a smaller size. Typically love Madewell.
great summer to fall transition dress. lightweight fabric and fun dot print. Strap length is a little long and cant adjust so sometimes falls down. Can be worn alone or with a jacket
The dress was great! So many compliments

Great sundress. The straps were a little long and they slipped off my shoulders occasionally. I wore a white tee underneath so it wasn't that big of a deal. However, my bra band would have shown in the back if I wasn't wearing the tee.
Loved this dress for a fun date night. I threw on a jean jacket when I got cold. Super cute and flattering
I wore this with a jean jacket. It was a little long for my liking. I could have sized down. Would consider renting again but not a must.
I normally wear a 0 or 2 and am fairly flat chested but this dress had no give in the chest area.
Wore it twice. It was a great weekend slip on dress
couldn't wear. straps too long
Great color that stands out with fun print, good for a warm summer day for effortless style. Recommend belting to add some shape, fits TTS for Madewell
cute everyday dress

Super light fabric, ideal to throw on over a bathing suit -- which was the purpose of this rental! The color is unexpectedly flattering. The cut is pretty basic and the construction is pretty flimsy, but if you just need something light for a super sweaty day, this dress is ideal.
Honestly, I absolutely love this dress! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the straps are just a bit long on me.
The color and fabric of this dress is beautiful, but the straps are way to long and are not adjustable. I had to wear a jacket over this dress and it kept sliding down throughout the night.
Wore this so a summer bbq. Perfect for the occasion, super easy and cute.
Love this dress paired with Frye boots! Got compliments post Exhale that the outfit reminded her of the 60s. Did not want to return. Thank you RTR! #frye #globalbrandsgroup

I got this dress to wear to work but it was really short!!!! I kept pulling it down all day because I was serf conscious that it was riding up (especially in the back). The fit was true to size and the dress seemed quality, it was even was lined on the inside but again it was too short for my taste. I'm 5'2 for reference.

links_reviews_title: Love the style but too small
links_reviews_text: ...and short, even for someone short. I think a medium would be perfect and will try again.

links_reviews_title: Go go-esque: Swingy hemline, fun clasp neck.
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress, different from my usual sheath. Lots of compliments. I wouldn't wear it for most conservative work meetings, but perfect for non-executive encountering days. Reminds me of a 60's go go dress with that neck and shape.
Very well made and very flattering
Beware of the open back. It only worked at work for me because my long hair covered it. Cute and comfortable.
The dress is short but good work appropriate length if you are also short. Sleeves are also good length for petite.
It's a little boxy, but very comfortable and cute. I wore this to my firm's holiday party.
Cute winter dress! A little on the short side, but that's part of the retro look, was fine w tights. Very fun!

A touch short for me at 5'9". I'm most usually a medium but went with a large here and glad I did. I have broad shoulders and the shoulders are a touch narrow. Overall, still a great option for work - shortness was ok with tights.
Rented this in the same style different color about a month ago and loved both of them. Really cute and comfy. 5-month bump friendly!
I am 5,0 118, 32D and dress was true to size. It may run on the shorter end for people that are taller. The liner did tend to ride up ever now and again, but overall great rental!!!

links_reviews_title: Very comfy but shorter than expected
links_reviews_text: Loved the feel of this dress, it's lined with a soft slip that's very comfy. The material is a little clingy and the length was shorter than expected...I wore to work anyway but I felt a little self conscious. Would be cute for a weekend outing instead!
Comfortable and cute with kind of a go go girl vibe to it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I never wore it. I got it for work and it was way too short for the office.

links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun! It had a cute retro vibe. I ordered a S and XS and both fit. I'd say the dress runs true to size. I was able to wear the XS for date night because it fit a little shorter/tighter and paired the S with some tights and booties for work the next day.
The fastener at the top is a bit loose, but overall it's a warm, comfortable, and cute dress

links_reviews_title: Cute dress and loved the style but as other reviewers have mentioned it is very short.
links_reviews_text: Very short and I am not very tall. Besides feeling like I was pulling it down all day long this is a cute and very comfortable dress. Love the neckline and the detail in the back.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Perfect for a women's suffrage centennial event I went to at the National Archives in DC.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit at the shoulders, great length to wear with tights, felt very cute. Flattering shape.

This outfit runs tts and you can either wear stockings or leggings with this. The reason I couldn't wear it was because the triangle opening in the back was a bit large to be appropriate in my workplace. I wouldn't mind renting this in the future, but probably for a more casual outing.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, great winter dress
links_reviews_text: This was almost too short to wear without tights but I'm petite so I went for it. Very warm fabric great for a winter rental. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore with with green suede combat boots to funk it up.
links_reviews_text: Easy, comfortable dress. Fabric does not breathe...
I loved the look of this dress. I wore it with a black blazer and black tights and it really kicked it up a notch for work!

links_reviews_title: Perfect cut, perfect thickness. Compliments all day
links_reviews_text: Great fit, thicker, but loved.

links_reviews_title: Good to go from work to night
links_reviews_text: Wore it during the day with tall boots and switched to heels for a night time. Kind of a retro feel.
I rented this for work but end up not wearing it. I found it too short and tight. It Would probably go nicer with high boots and a jacket or sweater
I loved this dress. It hit above the knee, sleeves were a perfect length. The material is flowy (crepe) but on the thicker side and perfect for colder weather.

Although this is a really simple dress, it's extremely comfortable and has just the right amount of elegance to make it a classic. I'd rent it again. Pockets are a neat detail as are the sleeves. It's fully lined and quite warm however tolerable. I really loved the dress!
I felt pretty and classy in This dress. Quality garment.
really love the dress. the cut is perfect, fits so well. conservative enough for work while also very feminine. love the sleeve's design. a great dress. would rent this again.

This is such a great dress - feels super high quality, substantial weight textile, well lined, in deep navy color... flattering cut & nice swing to skirt... wore a scarf because neck line felt a bit low for work... but one of my favorite rentals to date.
Sleeves were rather large, but still loved this dress. Got lots of compliments.
The fabric is nice and stretchy, but wrinkles easily. It was hard to steam out the skirts. Comfortable to wear, but made me feel a little lumpy in the middle.

I thought this was just going to be a "nice" dress for work - but it's so much more! The sleeves are uniquely cool, the shape of the dress is feminine but not overly fitted - and it has POCKETS! I sized down from my usual & so glad I did because otherwise the fit might have been more matronly. I loved this dress far more than expected. My photos don't do it justice but this dress is more special than expected. Give it a try & you might be surprised ;-)

Pros: beautiful tailoring, interesting pleated arms, high-quality and heavy fabric, and full lining Cons: too dressy for work; ran larger than expected, so did not wear; could possibly have gotten by with a size 4; arm seams cut into the shoulder which enlarged the appearance of my upper arms- not a deal breaker, just an observation

links_reviews_title: Thick, rich fabric. Perfect for the office.
links_reviews_text: It is a bit low cut for the office. Had to wear a camisole underneath.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous top but too long and felt frumpy
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect on me. The skirt has a lot of fabric and it's a heavy fabric. Good for a cooler day. Length was below the knee on me and I felt so frumpy in the dress.
Fit but snug. Material is very heavy. Too long for my short frame. Did not wear.
Why don't more dresses have pockets? Fit slightly looser than Black Halo typically fits. Wore my usual size. Nice heavy material, great for nyc winter. Just ok overall. Would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic, simple dress for work. Fit great though a tiny bit roomy in the body. I wore it anyway.
links_reviews_text: Super, easy, comfortable dress for work. Wore it with fawn colored heels and bag. Super!
Can be very low cut.
The sleeves add a special touch to this dress & the color is like a beautiful alternative to black. Loved it.
Beautiful simple dress but a bit tight in the midsection

I really like this dress. The details in the sleeve add an extra touch that is fun and modern. Great style for work, if your office tends to be more of the business/professional dress environment. It was a little tight in the bust for me, but otherwise a good fit.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but you need to be a bit taller to wear it.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran small. After researching the company I found that most of their items run 1 - 2 sizes small. The top of the dress - mainly the sleeves make you look larger than you are. I would recommend this dress for someone taller than 5'4.

I love this dress. One, I am a sucker for a dress with pockets! The cut and fit are very feminine and comfy. I wore this dress twice, because I liked it so much and wanted one more wear out of it. I think the style would work for a variety of body types.

I sized down based on reviews and am so glad I did. The sleeve fit perfectly which helped display it's beautiful detailed tailoring (it tucks in at the bicep). It's forgiving and flattering. Will definitely rent again for an important work or formal event.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Great fabric. A tad large.
links_reviews_text: This is a high quality, flattering garment. The sleeves are fab and provide a lovely silhouette. If I had one criticism, there is a tad too much volume in the skirt if you are petite.

links_reviews_title: Tried on, didn't love and since I'm on the Unlimited plan just sent it back without wearing.
links_reviews_text: Like others have said, kind of matronly. Something lost in translation from model size to a 14. It felt true to size just not as cute as the picture. Good quality material and it has POCKETS though.

links_reviews_title: Too large for me. Too bad it was not available in petite
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were extra puffy; dress too long for me; nice neck trim and color
I really loved this dress dress so much I was tempted to purchase it the moment I put it on. It's an excellent quality material and flatters my postpartum body. I got compliments all day.
I really liked the dress. It just ran a little small and in the smaller size was a little too much cleavage for work. We'll see when I get a larger size
Would have been good for thanksgiving, get like a real Puritan in the dress. Felt like I was playing dress up, it was fun! Got a lot of compliments since it was out of the ordinary for work.
Perfect for a work day.
Stunning cut and quality fabric. Sleeve detail was a nice touch. Wore this to work and received several compliments.
I usually size up in Black Halo to a 12, but this was enormous. The cut is a bit matronly, with the longer sleeves and length. If it had fit better may have been more attractive.
Comfy and flattering! It even has pockets!! Rich navy blue color. Hits right below the knee (I'm 5'9"). I will definitely rent this one again!
As a full sized, curvy woman there are specific cuts that are most flattering. This is one of them. I received many compliments and felt confident.
I read the reviews and sized up for Black Halo, except I went too far. The dress was way, way too large for me. Lovely heavy fabric. This would be too warm for a summer event.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress - fit perfectly, super well tailored!
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly even for someone who is shorter.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to needing to size down
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great fabric and would hide all your flaws! Unfortunately, the sizing is off for proportions. The sleeves are too long for a three-quarter and the length of the dress is awkwardly between a full length and a midi. I think if you are a size 2/4 this would work but in larger sizes, it just becomes too much fabric.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: Unlike most Black Halo, this dress runs true to size. I sized up out of habit for this designer, but it turned out my true size would have been better. The neckline is deeper than photos indicate--just *barely* work appropriate. The sleeves were strange and didn't work as well on me as I would have hoped so I probably wouldn't rent it again but overall it was a flattering, well-made dress.
I sized up because this designer is snug on me

links_reviews_title: Loved this top with fun stars
links_reviews_text: I loved this top! Color was like a bit of a faded red and the stars were super cute. Wore this twice one to a friends house and once just for a regular day of shopping. Really liked it! The xxl was plenty roomy but I liked it that way.
This shirt is super comfy. Easy to dress down or up. Wore on it a date and planning to wear it work as well!
Fabulous fabric - high quality silk and a warm brick red. The fit is generous and flattering.
I liked this one - pretty color, cute little stars, decent material (though it did get kinda wrinkly). I sized up to be safe and it was definitely too big, but I didn't mind it being so comfy.

I got this top to wear to work. I loved the fun star fit and the top fit really well. I felt like the fabric looked a little worn/dusty from being cleaned too many times. It was very comfortable and easy to wear. I'm looking forward to ordering more Rails tops in the future.
This shirt is super flattering, cute, and comfortable. I would buy it but it seems a little pricey for a basic button down, albeit a high quality one.

links_reviews_title: Wish it came in a smaller size
links_reviews_text: A bit baggy and wrinkles easily, but cute. Lots of compliments
Fit well. Paired nicely with black pencil skirt.
Trying to decide if I want to buy this! It have broader shoulders and hips, but this fit so well and was very flattering! Love the color and the fabric!
True to size. Wrinkles easily but nothing a steamer can't fix.
I have rented this shirt now two times. It's so appealing and comfortable. Works for dressing up, dressing down, or just wear to work. If the percentage off was higher, I would purchase this one.

links_reviews_title: So soft and comfy, and fits beautifully. Makes your figure look great.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for everyday or semi casual. Flattering. Great color. Sexy and sleek yet sophisticated and profession!
I received so many compliments when wearing this shirt! Love the color, the design, and the fit!
Fit is great, fabric is high quality 100% silk

links_reviews_title: I may need to purchase this
links_reviews_text: LOVE this blouse! It fits great, is a fun print and is just something you can wear often. I have gotten so many complements on it too. Love this!
Great quality, fun and different for the workday. Fit perfectly.
This blouse is really pretty and I loved the print. The color is a lighter red than is shown in the picture. The material is also pretty silky.

links_reviews_title: Loved this silk top for work or casual wear!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful silk top. The red is a nice brick red and the cream stars are a lovely detail. I wore it to work tucked into a skirt or pants, but it would also look great with a pair of jeans. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great fun blouse, same fit as other rails tops.

links_reviews_text: Pros: Silk material, nice print with the stars

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, able to dress up and down.
links_reviews_text: I love this shirt! I usually wear a M in button ups and the L was a bit oversized, but not as much as I would have expected so I'd say it runs on the smaller size. I've been able to wear this to work and out with a leather jacket. I'll definitely rent again!!
Will absolutely rent again

I love this shirt - might have to buy it next time. It's a nice soft red and the stars are a fun but subtle pop. I usually have issues with button downs being too snug across the shoulders and the sleeves being too short, or just way oversized and boxy, but the small fit perfectly.

Love this shift dress, great style with tights and boots for a winter look. Usually, in a shift dress I feel like I can eat a dessert (or 3) and not notice, but this is a more form-fitting shift Still super cute - I wore several times!

links_reviews_title: More flattering than I was expecting
links_reviews_text: This dress is really comfortable and more flattering than I thought it would be. Good room in the arms and shoulders, and not too short (although it rides up some when you sit).

I wore this dress in the winter for work. I got compliments on it all day. And it has pockets! I love a dress with pockets. It has a lining on the inside so it's soft if you have fabric sensitivity and the outside material is quality. It doesn't wrinkle after you have been seated for an extended period. And I'm not usually one to wear high-necked items but the way this dress was cut it did not touch my skin so it did not bother me.
Oh my! This Trina Turk dress is amazing! It gave me all the Jackie O vibes!! Received so many compliments! And Trina Turk herself reposted my IG story!!!😍😍😍
Lives this dress! Perfect for a Christmas concert

Gorgeous dress. I'm 5'6" and measure 37-29-41 and the 8 skimmed my body like it was custom for me. Soft fabric with a little stretch, which was a nice surprise, I was worried the sleeves would be tight or itchy, but they were perfectly comfortable. Got three compliments before 9a! Considering a purchase of this, I will be wearing many, many times!! Only slightly annoying thing was the hem... I have a long stride, and the hem was a little restricting, which is typical for a sheath dress.

Nice work dress. I like the cowl neck! One issue is that it rides up really high when I lift my arms to adjust my hair or ponytail. Like NSFW high. Something to think about, especially if you're not wearing opaque tights.
Got lots of complements at work on this dress. Fit was true to size, wore with black tights and tall black boots. Would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Family, friends and candlelight Christmas Eve service.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for Christmas Eve - red, green, black and white plaid :) Adorable collar - a fun rent for the holidays!

Cute dress, I love the cut and easy to throw on for a polished look. The patter is red, black and green. I wore around the holidays, but I would be less likely to wear in nicer weather. Distinct winter/christmasy feel. It has a unique neckline and is very comfortable

links_reviews_title: A little short and tight, but great holiday work dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and I have rented a similar style from the same designer in the past. I either have gained some weight or this ran a bit smaller than my last one. It was relatively fitted and short (but ok with tights). There is a red and green plaid pattern in the dress, making it great for the holidays.

Perfect work dress. Fun neckline, great front pockets, awesome pattern and good length for work. I could have probably rented a 2. I love Trina Turk and this is another perfect TT dress. I may wear for Christmas, since the plaid has red and green subtleties.
Super cute dress that has both red and green in the plaid pattern. Perfect a December work dress. And it has pockets!!!
I'm a law student, and I wore this dress to class this week. I was super impressed with the quality, especially the built-in, lace-trimmed slip.
This was so cute and comfortable. The cut is forgiving of a little tummy. Pretty short when you sit down.

links_reviews_title: So comfy I could sleep in it
links_reviews_text: I didn't think this had the most flattering silhouette for my shape but I didn't care--loved it anyway. TTS.

This has no stretch so I had to size up for the bust, otherwise, I would have chosen a size smaller. It's conservative but a little different thanks to the neckline. This length of sleeves always looks a bit dowdy on me but I knew that going in, so no surprises there.

Loved this dress for work. Usually wear a 4 but the 6 worked great since I think it runs a bit small. Definitely more of a holiday dress with the subtle green but still worked with black tights in January. Would rent again!

This dress fit true to size. It was comfortable to wear. I loved the neckline and the fact that there were to big easy to access pockets. The only down size was each time I raised my hands while teaching the entire dress can up way too high and got very short.
Cute Mod dress. Nice material. A little short for work so wore black tights underneath and it was fine. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: The fact that I didn't have to spend time shopping and trying on outfits. This was perfect.
Cute and pockets! but really short
links_reviews_text: Loved the cowl neck on this structured dress. Got several compliments. It would be a great dress for work except that it is crazy short. Even with black tights I had to be careful not to lift my arms at all. Might be better for shorter ladies.

links_reviews_title: A Jackie-O type dress for the new age.
links_reviews_text: The stand up collar neck is just awesome and flattering. Loved have the two front pockets. However, as other reviewers have said, it is a SHORT dress. Too short for ease of wearing during the day, i.e., if sitting down in a chair others will see your hemline. If it was 3-4" longer I would have seriously considered buying it because otherwise it a fantastic dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress that can easily transform for dinner out!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable dress, easy to move in and perfectly professional for work, and cute enough to hop to dinner straight from the office. I wore it with flat black boots, made it more casual but can definitely dress it up with a pump!

links_reviews_title: So cute, many compliments. Purchased it.
links_reviews_text: perfect fit.
Perfect fit. Snug in the right areas, totally work appropriate as well. Great Quality.

links_reviews_title: This Dress Got Me a Job (Kinda)
links_reviews_text: I had an interview for a job I REALLY wanted and decided to rent this dress. I even added a spot to my monthly so I could get it sooner. It is ridiculously cute but also grown up. The collar is to die for, the sleeves are super flattering (and I have rather fat arms, so it's a pleasant surprise when the sleeves fit). It's just perfect. Then, I found out they want me to take the job. Maybe I'm awesome, but the dress sure didn't hurt. ;)
5'4, 125lbs, size 4 was a perfect fit!
Super cute and stylish dress !!!!
Simply adorable dress! Comfy, flattering. I love it!
Wore to my husband's company holiday party and this was the perfect dress. Went with the 8 for a little room to breath. Great material and flattering without being too sexy

This is a great dress. The six fit really well; however, it is very short. I couldn't wear it without tights and boots but since it is the winter, it was good. The fabric is heavy enough that the short sleeves in winter didn't make me too cold. I will rent again.
perfect snazzy work dress. plaid was perfectly matched up at the seams.

links_reviews_title: Smart looking and stunning!!! The pockets are a huge plus!
links_reviews_text: No cons at all!!! Rent this dress!!!!!
Big fan of the dress! Got a ton of compliments. I have bigger hips and thighs, so glad I went with the 6 instead of the 4. Was perfect for some work events and conferences!
Love the pattern, length, collar. Comfortable and stylish
Soft fabric and so comfortable. Love the cowl neck. Perfect for the office.

Lightweight cotton shmata with lots of interest and pockets! Very good at a casual family party, and specifically great for anyone who's PMSing. Also, you could be pregnant and no one would know! (I'm not, but good for people to know.) 5/5!!!
Loved everything about it...the print, the color, the fit. Could be work for just about any occasion!!
Loved this. Easy to wear, unique details, great quality.

I wore this three times. So comfortable (pockets!) and breezy. It was a tent in a totally chic way. I have broader shoulders but the volume of the dress and neckline balanced it out amazingly. It is hard to zip up by yourself though. 10/10!

Love, love, love this dress! The print and style are really fun, and it's super comfortable. It's easy to dress up or down and I wore it to work (thrice), out to dinner (twice), and roaming around Brooklyn on a Saturday. So yeah, I got a lot of wear out of it! The fit was pretty much true to size, but I would suggest going with whatever size fits you best in the bust and shoulders since the rest of the dress is quite full and forgiving. I'm normally a 4 or a 6 and ordered this in a 4 since I'm smaller on top, but probably could have gone down to a 2.
#gender reveal

links_reviews_title: I felt completely comfortable the entire day!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. Hard to zip at first but completely comfortable and flowy.

Wore this sightseeing around Lisbon all day. So comfortable and cute! Loved this statement print- I was stopped and complimented multiple times. I sized down as this dress runs big. I'm normally a 6 and went with the 4. I'm also 6 months pregnant so some might get away with sizing down 2x!

I wore this for a graveside memorial and it was perfect. Conservative, not too warm, and still interesting to look at. It did run a bit large in the arms and skirt overall, but the details and patterns are exquisite in person.

I love this. If you could define my style it would be Little House on the Prairie meets Stevie Nicks and this totally exceeded my expectations. It's breezy and loose, yet flattering. It could hide a bump, but doesn't make you "maybe look pregnant" like some dresses do. The DETAILS: the stitching, puff sleeves, square neck...this dress is everything. If it wasn't $400+ and super memorable, I would buy it!
This dress runs big. I suggest sizing down. I was not comfortable wearing it as I felt like my chest was exposed all day. The colors and print are great.

This was a beautiful style and super easy. Overall fit was true to size with room and is bump friendly. I did not wear this with a bra but there is room if you have a larger bust. I didn't want to return!
loose and comfy, perfect for day to night.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: Loved this easy breezy silhouette, and the best part? It had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Easy weekend or WFH stylish muumuu
links_reviews_text: The puff sleeves and vibrant blue looked fun for video calls. The dress was a comfortable easy fit. It looked cute with sandals, flats, sneakers... Overall a comfy, cute casual look. I usually wear a 4-6 and ordered a 4 in this one. Fit perfect. So if you're between sizes, you can probs size down.

Literally just ok. I will wear it because it's cute and comfortable and slightly more elevated than your every day sundress but it doesn't do too much for the figure.... if your large chested size up because the only tight part of this dress is the chest!
Fit was fine, but the colors and pattern felt more Little Women than boho
So flowy it makes you look pregnant, but fun and swingy for the beach.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable boho with a flattering bust area
links_reviews_text: So comfortable. Fitted busy and roomy around waist and hips, which meant I didn't have to suck in, ha. I dressed it up with jewelry and blazer one night and dressed it down with a sweater another night.
Beautiful rich color. Comfy cotton fabric. Details of hand stitching make it.
Love everything about this dress
Baggy fit but cute

links_reviews_title: Fell in love, once I put it on and placed my hands in the pockets.
links_reviews_text: I ended up liking this dress much more than I expected. I love the square neckline, fitted chest (which reveals modest cleavage) and puffy sleeves. These elements are a fun contrast to the full tiered skirt and pockets. The dress is also super comfortable, so feels effortless. I accessorized with flat silver sandals and fun long silver earrings.

links_reviews_title: Great casual dress with fun details
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress, and the cut and pattern makes it feel special.
So many compliments just walking down the street. Really comfortable. Love the color. I want to live in this dress
Super comfortable, great details, pockets. Love all the patterns.
A little loose at top so i needed to wear a bra, but it was hard to find one that wouldn't show due to the square neckline. But beautiful material, flow, and pattern.
Loved this dress! It was perfect for a NYC summer weekend of errands. The bust was tight on me, but still zipped and wasn't in your face cleavage. I bet this would be perfect if you're pregnant!
Felt a bit Little House on the Prairie but I was digging it. I wore it to a museum. Very comfy with pockets. My bra kept peeking out due to the square neckline.

links_reviews_title: So cute! I love a mew muumuu and Ulla did a great job bringing a cool girl vibe.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, beautiful fabric and stitching. Love Ulla Johnson!

I love the clothes Ulla Johnson designs but the price tag is too crazy for such specific styles- beauty of RTR. This dress is super cute, made well, love the sleeves. My boobs where a bit squashed where the seaming hits but you couldn't tell while wearing it. The fabric is heavier and the dress is very much a mumu style (my husband laughed when he saw me in it) but I love a good mumu.

I was SO excited to finally see Ulla Johnson on RTR! This dress is beautifully made and so comfortable. It has a Regency-style bodice (think Jane Austen) and the rest of the dress is loose and flowy. Can be dressed up or down. The sleeves are pretty poufy, but I like that look. Definitely recommend!!
Fabric is gorgeous and fit is great but overall look is frumpy-a little too little house on the prairie.
I ordered the wrong size-ordered 6 but should have gotten 4. Could have gotten away with it but it was too low cut for a larger size

I wanted to love this dress, I love Ulla Johnson, but it was terribly unflattering. It just fell from my widest point (chest) like a muumuu. The fabric is beautiful and it would work on the right body.

This dress was amazing. Loved the fabric, it was soft and comfy. The zipper was fun and reminded me of the 90s in the best way. Extremely flattering, not tight, but looked like I tried. Rented during quarantine and chose it over sweatpants many times. Very seriously considered purchasing. Super fun, différent, and just a fabulous rental.
Zipper at neck can transform the look. Comfortable dress and forgiving fit. Arrived slightly dirty with some loose threads.
The fabric is heavy so it feels substantial. I enjoyed the fun neckline! Good length! Was close to buying this dress!

links_reviews_title: I love love love this dress!!! Need to buy -
links_reviews_text: Perfect for casual or can be dressed up, it is a staple you'll want to keep!
Flattering high waist line, forgiving elsewhere. Wore for a girls night out.
I'm normally a 10 in dresses, got this in an 8 and it fit really well. Loved the pockets and the chest zipper. Could use for a date or work.

Fit was true to size but material was surprisingly heavy; it was a dense sweatshirt material. I went back and forth of whether or not I liked it, but once I wore it I got countless compliments -- people loved the retro sporty look.
Really enjoyed wearing this for a Friday night date. Its a subtle sexy and easy to accessorize!

Wore to work- super easy to wear all day. Comfortable and giving material, flattering to your figure. It fit true to size (though I'm in between a JCrew 6-8 and I wore the 8). I think this would be great for women with fuller chests, my chest (B cup) got a little lost in the top.
Loved the fit of this dress but the neck was too much for me.

links_reviews_title: Casual cotton fabric ... not for work
links_reviews_text: Love Tibi dresses for work so was excited about this. However, this is a cotton material that's comfortable, but feels more like a beach coverup than a work dress.

I liked this cute dress, it works for many different occasions. Appropriate for work and dressed up a little for a date night out. You can wear the neck zipped up for a different look. I will say that my husband didn't like the dress as much....said it was just okay and looked like elevated hospital scrubs.....but I did get compliments from the girlfriends. :)
Wore this to an evening work event in Ft Lauderdale at a beach hotel. Has pockets, is lightweight enough and the top zips down. Would wear this again.

Perfect for everyday. Material is a little heavy which makes this a great piece for fall and spring but wouldn't recommend for summer. I am pear shaped and this dress had plenty of room for my hips without being too large on top.
A little big in the shoulders. Probably should have order a size down.
Great fit, material is a good weight but not hot. Good transitional piece. It was great for work but could be dressed up or down.

I was 0, i rent 2 because my bottom is big. This dress is perfect for my bottom but the shoulder line is too wide for me. Also, this dress looks just like a nurse uniform or hospital uniform. I don't like it

links_reviews_title: very versatile style. Able to wear to work, wear on date night, wear everyday paired with sneakers
links_reviews_text: very versatile style. Able to wear to work, wear on date night, wear everyday paired with sneakers

I often look for RTR picks that are fun but also check the professional box. This piece was both! Note the fabric is much thicker than one would assume from the photos - almost an athletic knit. Lots of complements. Plus - pockets.
Heavy high quality fabric. Plus pockets! Super flattering and comfortable.
Wore this for a work conference. Fits perfectly
So comfortable and easy to wear. Wore it all day, and night! Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Got it for the wrong season
links_reviews_text: I think this would be a cute early winter dress. It was too warm for a summer work look but I would rent this again later
Day to night

links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress! Would buy in a variety of colors
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved everything about this dress! Beautiful light blue color, high quality fabric, beautiful details with the white top stitching and the gathered collar. Loved that the zipper opened to allow the wearer to manage how much they wanted to show - allowed flexibility for the work day or a casual weekend. The sleeves are about 3/4 which I really liked for summer, and the length was perfect. Plus - Pockets!
Fit great and has pockets. Cute for a casual outfit. Got a lot of compliments.
Very flattering dress and the material is soo comfortable.
Perfect fit and great look for work. Can dress up with wedges or dress down with sandals. Will rent again!
This is an unusual dress and a flattering one. The waist was a bit high on me but it still looked good. Felt snazzy wearing it to work!
Good fit, appropriate length for work

Was great for day one of my work conference where dress code was 'resort wear.' The material is breathable but looks like a beach cover up if you don't wear some jewelry. True to size, fashionable, and got lots of compliments. Definitely a nice change up from the usual work pieces.
Perfect fit and super slimming
If anything, ran bigger, but I loved it! So comfortable and has pockets!

i'm typically a 2, but tibi runs large so the 0 was great! love the length, simplicity, material, etc. the elastic waist was awesome as were the pockets. hit around the knees for me. overall, awesome work dress. worn w the zipper slightly down like photo

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear. So flattering. I looked at least a size smaller in this.
links_reviews_text: Easy, easy, easy. I would wear this every day! I wore it to my little boy's birthday party and even a work cocktail thing with heels. It did both surprisingly well.
I wore this to a day event that wasn't dressy but needed something that was cute and easy. This was the perfect dress! Wore fun earrings and shoes since the color is fairly neutral.
Great for the office and still stylish

This was a fun work > happy hour dress. perfect for spring. Material is stretchy and comfy...for some reason I thought from the pictures it might be like a light jean..it isn't! Medium weight-- not good for a summer day. Great for spring. Stretchy- so could have gotten my usual 4, but I liked the slight oversize look of the 6 (which was only one available)

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual work day, gatherings, and around town.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and loved the color.
Love this sweater. I wore it on the weekend and for work. Cute and cozy!
This isn't normally the color or print I would usually go for, but I loved this sweater! The pattern is bold, and the fabric is softer than you'd expect from a wool-like sweater.
Really high quality. Made of alpaca and wool, it was VERY warm.
Fit was typical and true to size. Design was fun and festive around Thanksgiving. I only wore a light tank underneath. It was very warm.
This sweater was really pretty and the fit was true to size. It was definitely warm and felt great. received several compliments and May rent again.
The material is a soft wool and not itchy. It's nicely cut and fell just right. Perfect to celebrate sweater weather!

links_reviews_title: This is a very warm sweater!
links_reviews_text: It has a boatneck fit on the neckline which wasn't obvious from the photos. And the sweater is very cozy and warm so be sure to wear on the coldest days or you will be hot!
was very fun and comfortable, wore many times over the weekend
This sweater is true to size.
true to size. a bit itchy so wore a tank underneath.
It was slightly more fitted than I wanted but not too small and I found it itchy. I wore it to dinner on a ski vacation weekend and liked the colors but wouldn't rent again.
Perfect for cold weather! Very warm, and the design keeps a basic sweater from being boring. Slightly scratchy around neck.
This is a nice twist on a fairisle sweater. It comfy, not too heavy, but doesn't feel particularly lux.
I love this sweater. Super soft and easy to wear with skirt or jeans
Fit very well and I got a ton of compliments on this. It was a little itchy but didn't bother me too much. I wore it on a cold day without a jacket and felt very warm.
Great sweater ! The colors are rich against most skin tones.
It is wool. So very hot. I wore to an outdoor event and it kept me warm.

This is a nice piece for a brisk fall day, but it didn't hold its shape well - and it came with tags so I wouldn't expect it to stretch out. Plus, the fabric was extremely itchy. Be sure to wear something underneath.
I wore this a couple of times and received plenty of compliments. My only complaint is that the knit is quite itchy, even with an undershirt on.

I wore this top to work and to a holiday family brunch. I got a number of compliments on it from a few people who thought it was a jacket though. The sleeves were a little long so I had to roll them up. There's a button enclosure inside so the waist fit perfectly and there isn't any stretch. I'm smaller on top so there was a little room to spare. Overall I'm glad I tried this piece and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Felt a little like I was on Star Trek
links_reviews_text: I'm not sure if blazer is the right way to describe this but it almost felt more like that than the top I was thinking of it as. Cool concept but the material just made me feel a little like I was on Star Trek. It was a cute silhouette but sizing wise seems to run a bit big.

links_reviews_title: It was a very classy pulled-together look. I wore it with my black faux leather spanx and booties.
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. I could have worn a 6. I am in between sizes right now, the 8 fit, it was just a bit big, I still wore it and loved it.
I did not photo this due to black not picturing well.
Did not end up wearing this. Elegant look. Very slenderizing. But sleeves were way too long for me.
Loved this top, such a unique design! I wore it with cropped black wide leg wool pants and a low bun.
This cute sweater was thick, soft, and kept this Texas girl warm in the New Mexican snow.

Curvy and busty girls understand that sweaters are risky. This one was a bit bulky but not as bad as I expected when I opened the bag. I wouldn't say this was flattering on me, but it wasn't as boxy and bulky as some sweaters. It was, however, comfortable and the length was good.
I did not actually need to wear this after all.
I loved this pattern, but it just didn't fit me great, and didn't end up being flattering.
comfortable material and kindsa light wieght for a swaeter

So pretty, so soft, very warm! Very subtle shimmer in the print- which was surprisingly classy and kept it feminine. Perfect for a winter work party. My boyfriend loved it too. Felt very confident and comfortable in it. Didn't want to send it back!
