links_reviews_title: This top is so cute and is beautifully made. I wore it with white jeans to a work-related picnic.
links_reviews_text: Fit great-- fell to just below the waist but did not look too flowy or sloppy.

I love this blouse. RTR told me to wear a 14, and I'm glad I listened even though I'm normally a 12 in sleeveless. It looks the best when I tie the bow at my neck rather than down at the neckline. But the pattern is fun, it fits great, and the silk is luxe and comfortable. A+.
Perfect for wearing under a jacket at work.
Wore with jeans and with jean skirt. Loved this top! Wore during day and at night. Easy and comfortable!
Loved this more than expected! Wore to work and an after work event with olive dress pants. Beautiful, classy shirt. True to size on me.
Great summer blouse to go from work to play, easy and light.
Nice, conservative top for work with a pretty print. The one I rented was in good condition. Would look good under a blazer.
I feel like I am in a Mucha painting. It really is splendid and it is 100% pure silk!
Fit true to size. Very light weight fabric that was comfortable in summer. Easy to dress up or down. I wore this a few times. Once with navy capri pants and once with demin. I would rent again.
I wore this with a white denim skirt. It was perfect for vacation wear,
Fits petite frame, fun pattern that goes from work to play.
Gorgeous print with rich colors. Fit was perfection and fabric was very nice.
IT fit well overall but was tight at the hips

links_reviews_title: Pretty top for spring and summer
links_reviews_text: Looks very nice with the Slate & Willow drape jacket in blush leather.
Cute and comfortable
Would rent again but nothing remarkable. Nice tapered fit. Print is large and busy.

I wore this to work one day, and a second time on the weekend dressed down with light denim, cut off shorts. It worked well both ways. The silk fabric and good construction makes it drape beautifully.

links_reviews_title: Chest snug the rest of the fit is ok
links_reviews_text: I rented for work and liked the print as much as I thought I would. I did not care for the overall cut/fit of the shirt. I wore a tank top with a shelf bra. I do not thin I would have been able to fit in with a normal bra.

This top is so cute! I love the pattern - it's fun without being too loud. I wore this to a day-long seminar for work with a slightly oversized blue suit. I loved the look! I think this would be a great desk-to-dinner top especially. I was happy with the fit on my figure. It wasn't clingy, looked flattering, and the silk was thick enough not to be see-through. I think this looks best worn tucked into something that nips in at the waist to give some shape. Really pleased with the fit, quality, and beautiful print.

Very versatile top. Fit was perfect - length, chest, arms - were all great. I wore it to a casual weekend event with jeans, and threw a military-inspired jacket over when it cooled in the evening. The top is a beautiful, silky material could easily be dressed up for work.
Fun and sassy for a Friday !

I love tweed, and I was surprised that this cute little dress was made of the same silky track dress material as the other P&G dresses. Very cute on, but just not my favorite. I purchased the tiger stripe track dress and the yellow floral one, but I wore this one to work, then sent it back.
Perfect for a business casual Friday!
This is a super cute minidress! Love the print and the button details. The material is pretty thick so it is warm just a heads up!

The dress fits just right-not too tight for work. I have a more progressive workplace though-so if you're worried about showing above the knee-this isn't the dress for you. I'm also 5'2-so it hits at a perfect spot. The fabric looks like real houndstooth but it's a poly blend that is much more comfortable. Perfect for a warmer fall locale. Got tons of compliments and the day isn't even over yet!

I marked this as running small because although I was able to wear my usual size I think the fit might be better if you size up - especially if you have a booty. Also runs short & sizing up could help with the length. Love the side stripes and zip & button neckline. If you're taller than me you're probably going to want to wear tights with this.
Great fit, soft and comfortable, nice for work and errands after. I liked it so much I ordered the same dress in a different pattern in my next order!

A little big in body area but didn't bother me Too much. Sleeves fit well not too tight or short Length is short though leggings or Tights are needed. I am 5'6 I'd say pretty warm- kept me warm in low 60s temps Can zip up to make turtle neck if desired No buttons all zip No itch yay I'd say dressy tracksuit vibe
The fit is great but the fabric is very thin and looks cheap.
Overall I liked the look but it was a bit short on me, I wore it with black tights to compensate for it .

links_reviews_title: Cute fit, but wasn't as flattering as I hoped. I did not wear it.
links_reviews_text: Accurate fit.
Na
This dress is cute looks better in photo. But the sleeves are stand out and hte best part.
Loved this dress. Could have gone a size down!

This just fit me, I think the xs would have been too tight. Was surprised by the material - it’s almost like a light scuba type of material, if that makes sense (Still looked great!) I’m petite and this was pretty short on me, so might not be the best for taller folks.
The look of the dress was just my style! When I got it, I was surprised that the fabric felt like "costume" instead of a nice dress. Would have loved if it didn't have that type of fabric.
Great dress and super comfortable! Can be worn with sneakers or high boots
I liked the mix of athletic fabric with houndstooth as a dress. It was so unexpected and really worked with tights and oxblood boots.
Perfect with white sneakers for an all day conference. 5'2 and couldn't have gone any shorter.
Easy to wear
It was cute, but I didn't like the way it looked on me. I have a small waist and large hips so it just didn't hang right. Plus I didn't like that the houndstooth was printed on.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. fun and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: I get a lot of compliments wearing this. I wore it to two large meetings and presented wearing it on one of the days. I wore it with opaque tights, square-heel ankle boots, and a hoodie scuba vest. it was a big hit. I kept it in the rotation for another month.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress and designer!!!
links_reviews_text: This is now officially one of my favorite designers. I got complimented, but more importantly felt amazing in this comfortable, elegant, and forgiving dress. A bit short, but the conservative sleeves and collar make up for it. Can't wait to wear this designer again!
Love the stripes down the sleeves. It was a little short for work so wore leggings with it.
Nice fit. Heavier material. Zipper in the front under the buttons.
My bottom was 1/4 from showing. I wore it with cheerleader briefs it was so short.

As soon as i put this cardigan on, i felt like it completed me. What a surprise. I never even wear cardigans! The style was loose enough to show off the lace on the side. Colors are true black and white. The knit is substantial and drapes well.

links_reviews_title: Where white for that Lacey pop
links_reviews_text: Love the stripes and and lace, wore to work and is just my style with a bit of flirt

links_reviews_title: Wonderful update on a classic silhouette.
links_reviews_text: Wore it with a mint top under for a pop of color.
Just ok.

Cute little cardigan - very unique, like the details. I would have kept it but almost fainted when I saw the actual price of this piece. I'd definitely rent it again, though! The fit was perfect - sleeves were a bit long, but I really like that!
Loved this top but I do agree with other renters that arms/shoulders are tight and slightly restrictive. It's worth it though!!

links_reviews_title: I LOOVE this top! Picture doesn't do it justice. Perfect for work
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly -- I'm usually and 8 or a 10 in sizes that run small and this 8 fit perfectly. I loved it. Very professional and comfortable
The draping is absolutely beautiful. Suggest sizing up because the upper arms/shoulder area is very tight and really limited movement. Would definitely rent again.
I received many compliments on this shirt. It was a little tight in the shoulder area, otherwise it fit great! It also has a long zipper in the back.

This top runs a bit small. My usual size 2 fit but was tight across the back and shoulders and would have made raising my arms difficult. I sized up to the 4 and it fit much more comfortably. The top is like a faux wrap and the front can gape considerably. I wore a black bralette with this and pinned the vee to try and negate any flashing. The top was well made, the material felt soft and silky and it draped nicely. A good top to wear to a company party.
Loved this top. The fit was amazing, but it did restrict my arm movement somewhat. Great for work, a date, etc

links_reviews_title: Not what I thought it would be.
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this shirt. From the picture I did not think this was low cut, but when I put it on it gaped and just hung weird on me.
Virtually unwearable without some sort of tape

links_reviews_title: Rented for a nice dinner out
links_reviews_text: The cut is so weird. Arm holes are big but sewn in a way that you cannot lift your arms without lifting the entire top up and opening the wrap-effect chest up to completely expose your chest. So uncomfortable and not even remotely functional. I said runs small b/c of my inability to move properly, but it was weirdly big in other areas.

links_reviews_title: I did not wind up wearing it, I liked the look and style a lot, but did not fit well. Disappointed
links_reviews_text: The shoulder area did not fit right, and so it did not look nice on me and did not wind up using it.
Couldn't even zip it up and I'm always a 4/S on top. Wasn't even close. Didn't wear but looked great. Re-ordering in a bigger size.
Don't expect to have full range of motion in this shirt!!! Cute top but odd fit in arms

links_reviews_title: Very cute and unique, but could barely move my arms.
links_reviews_text: I loved how this cinched at the waist, but the shoulders were way too tight. I could barely lift my arms and the neckline just kept opening. Seems to be meant for a very tall, narrowed shoulder person.

links_reviews_title: Really lovely lines on this blouse, perfect for dinner out for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: The waist fell perfectly on me, the draping a nice elegant touch. No worries about the front opening or being too low cut, perfect for a company gathering. Only problem, was the shoulders fit a little odd, they looked fine, but felt restricting and the sleeves were very long, I simply rolled them and they still looked great.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, wrap doesn't stay closed.
links_reviews_text: Had the potential to be a very cool shirt but runs small, couldn't lift my arms up in it and the wrap didn't stay closed even on my A cup chest. Went back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Great play on a men's dress shirt
links_reviews_text: Made me feel super feminine while wearing basically a men's dress shirt! The tie makes the shirt hug you in all the right ways. Got so many compliments - will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a business shirt
links_reviews_text: I work in tech so my office is quite casual. I loved this shirt as a way to dress up a pair of plain black pants. It is slightly larger than a small would typically be, but I think it's meant to be worn in an oversized style. It is quite low cut.

links_reviews_title: Love the unique style of the top
links_reviews_text: The tie on the side accentuates the waist line. Sleeves are long which is super nice for someone tall like me. I'm 6 feet and weight 170. I usually wear a L but the M fit better.

links_reviews_title: Soft and cute but low cut!
links_reviews_text: Pros: soft, comfortable fit, nice pattern Cons: low cut for work so I wore a cami Size: size down on this one!
Comfortable yet professional with a unique styling twist

Cute top! Comfy material. Arms are long so I flipped the cuffs up all day. Knot isn't too fit or unflattering. I had some trouble finding the sweet spot with the knot, if I was off center I felt it kind of pulled the shirt in a weird way. But ultimately really loved it! Got lots of compliments. Cuter in person than pic, recommend renting!

This was such a great top for work! I got so many compliments! The tie is very flattering. The shirt does get quite wrinkly but is hidden by the print. I love this top and would absolutely recommend it! (Sorry for the dusty mirror pic!)

links_reviews_title: Super cute, It either runs large or I ordered wrong size.
links_reviews_text: Super cute but felt large. Also a bit of a bump from the pleat in back- all said, I Rec'd compliments!
Easy to wear. Nice polished office look. Loved the front tie but the back was a bit ill-fitting. It bunched a little in the booty area and I had to constantly pull the shirt down.

links_reviews_title: More relaxed than in the photos
links_reviews_text: Had to give this shirt a good ironing when it arrived. The look is more relaxed that it appears on the model. Still, a cool concept and I did get compliments.
Although lovely on the model, this shirt was just meh. It was unexpectedly low cut and I felt that it became looser as the day went on.

I can't get enough of these tie-waist dress shirts. This one is so soft and comfortable (not stiff at all!), but still looks elegant. My only criticism is that the v-neck is a bit low. I didn't have to wear anything underneath, but I was on the fence about it...
Perfect shirt. Lightweight. Fits beautifully. Looks just like picture on.
A great fit and works well for work/ day events. I wore it with jeans, but I tried it with white pants as well and it looked great!

There is no way I could have worn this to the office without looking like a porn star - it was definitely not meant for larger chests! I could have worn it open with a tank underneath, but that would have taken away from how the shirt was supposed to look!
Loved the tie on side

links_reviews_title: Classy, yet edgy top for work!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Nice material that doesn't wrinkle easy. Work with black pants and heels. Cons: Runs a bit large, but not sure I would go smaller; first button is really low so wore a camisole under it; sleeves are very long so rolled them up.

links_reviews_title: Cute top-great for the office. I wore it with skinny jeans.
links_reviews_text: I loved this from the front! the back pleats puckered on me, no matter how tightly or loosely I tied the sash. Cute top and well made-buttons didn't gap which is great!
This is a unique & flattering style. Non stop compliments & it was very comfortable. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: it is a good shirt, but was too big
links_reviews_text: d

I loved the color in this plaid: mustard yellow, dark green, and pink. I'm 5'2 and length was below the knee. Jacket was thinner than I expected but still warm, would not suggest for a below 30 degree day though. Runs true to JCrew sizing. Knocked a star off in the review bc I did not like how it looked buttoned up. It shows every roll and lump due to the thinness of the jacket. Also the very top button is for show and not use so you have a button right on each nipple :-/
Fits well! Room for thick clothes underneath. Pits together outfit nicely
I normally wear 4-6 but rented 2 and it was perfect. Lots of compliments and it transitioned well between work and after work. Prim but coolish.

Always been a big fan of JCrew. This coat was super cute, nice pattern and colors. I'm usually a size 2 or 4 in JCrew and got this in a 4, it was just a tad big, I could have sizes down. Great for the fall-ish weather, not super thick and warm, as soon as it hits 30/40 degrees, I'd say you need something a bit warmer.
This coat is quickly becoming my favorite item for fall. It's longer length keeps me warm and the plaid is pink, green, and camel - perfect for autumn. I simply adore it!

links_reviews_title: Good go-to coat for in between weather
links_reviews_text: Runs big so you can wear a few layers or even a sweatshirt under it
Great for work and weekend
Wanted to keep it! A nice, warm, flattering wool coat. Easy to dress up or down.

This coat was great for a week in early fall! The colors and cut are professional yet fun. The cut was tailored and forgiving on me at 7 months pregnant. The quality is nice and it was easy to wear for work or play.

Other reviewers are right that the waist runs pretty small, the 36 still fit me but I would have been uncomfortable after a very big lunch. Soo glad I gave it a try though! Got tons of compliments and ended up wearing 3 different times, for work, a birthday, and work again (was seeing different people). Only thing is I have trouble imagining what other tops to wear with it - I paired it with the same black turtleneck every time.

Great basic skirt. On the longer side, which everything seems to be right now so I’m kind of ready for the next thing. Really nice fabric and weight, I loved the cut of the wide waistband and soft fullness over the hips (some may find this unflattering but I liked how curvy it looks). Pockets are placed a little to the front instead of the side seam which was a nice detail. The 40 ran just a bit large for me - it was fine but if I rent again I will go with the 38.
Nice silky fabric. Easy to wear. Nothing really special about it. Just a lovely black skirt that's well cut!
I rented it too big because I loved it but the drop waist with over the knee boots was hot

Paired with fine fishnet black stockings, black stiletto suede booties and a conservative ivory crepe tee for work. Skirt is long and flowy but without being dowdy. Fabric looks great. Could pair with more evening top and heels or festive pumps for party or with a sweater and heeled boots for more conservative, daytime event. Super quality.

You know how in the movies you see women in these mid length skirts that somehow beautifully move with the wind? That add movement and grace to their every step? This is that skirt. So silky smooth, it feels amazing on my legs. The slide slits give it an appropriate flirty feel and look without losing elegance. The high waist and a-line cut makes it so it drapes perfectly on your body, forgiving any bumps that may take away from the flow of the skirt. I will say its slightly tight around the waist, but you get used to it very quickly. Will rent again, may even buy.
I styled this with a white tee shirt and some black boots and got so many compliments! Beautiful skirt, comfortable and fits well.
Very pretty skirt but runs too small
LOVE this skirt. The hem is higher on the sides and beautiful. Lovely fabric. The waist isn't forgiving at all so it was too snug for me to wear.

links_reviews_title: Very fun but hard to pair a proper top
links_reviews_text: This skirt was very fun and looks great with black booties. I was having trouble pairing a proper style top with it. It may be the fabric finish with what I have in my closet. I'm going to rent again but in a smaller size, it was big and sat low on my hips but I think it would be more flattering higher up near my natural waist.
Such a beautiful piece, however it's LONG. At least for shorter girls, expect a near-ankle length skirt. And true-to-size fit across upper waist.

links_reviews_title: Not sure why everyone was saying this ran large ...
links_reviews_text: This skirt definitely runs small. I read so many reviews saying to size down but I'm always between a 0 and 2!and only usually order pants in a 2.... skirts and dress I'm usually a 00 or 0. This skirt, which I got in a 0 was so tight I didn't even wear it it looked so unflattering. So highly recommend sizing up.
Lovely fabric but runs large in the waist, had to return without wearing

links_reviews_title: I ended up just wearing this for a few hours to run errands.
links_reviews_text: Pretty long and a bit awkward to style. It's a beautiful material, but I had a hard time figuring out what to wear with it.
Put a belt on to add a little visual interest. Comfortable and classy

links_reviews_title: Awesome day to night classic sweater dress
links_reviews_text: Fits amazing; the red is a great accent; nice little flare at the bottom but nothing too crazy; the material is thick; got so so many compliments both at work and at night! Will definitely be keeping for a bit

links_reviews_title: Comfortable sweater dress with nice touches
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my office. Fit was great and the red adds a nice touch. Easy to wear and looked good. Wore with Spanx underneath so the bumps didn't show.
Although I'm petite, the dress still fit nicely.
Flattering style and cut and thick material. Looked great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a winter dinner
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a winter dinner at Blackberry Farm and it was perfect. The ruffled hem and sleeves give it a fun pop and the length was perfect for 5'8". I weighed 155 when I rented this and the MR fit great. Definitely figure-hugging, but a pair of Spanx smoothed everything out nicely.

links_reviews_title: Loved the look on my husband's face when we went out to dinner!
links_reviews_text: The dress is form fitting, but conservative in appearance with the higher neckline. The sweater material is a bit scratchy and tends to generate some static electricity.
Nice, stretchy material.
I was 6 months pregnant while wearing this for christmas. Super cute probably could have gone down to a medium but the large was fine.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and Professional, and a little flirty!
links_reviews_text: Pros: So comfortable, great material, loved the added red color. Cons: I wore tights under with support - you might need spanx! Honestly, will most likely rent again with RTR unlimited.
Really liked it. Wore it to dinner with my in-laws and it was the perfect amount of conservative and feminine
Great weight of fabric for winter but not too thick. Actually felt a bit slinky on but still warm. Can be worn with or without belt. Looks great with boots. Got lots of compliments.
So comfortable. Will definitely rent again
This dress fit nicely and was comfortable, but the fabric is a little on the thin side, so I'd recommend wearing Spanx or tights to keep it all in place!

links_reviews_title: Comfy bodycon sweater dress, appropriate for work
links_reviews_text: Appreciate that this sweater dress has thick opaque fabric - didn't need a slip. It is ribbed and a bodycon style, so a bit tighter than my usual work wear, but still doable and appropriate for the office (wore with tights and low black booties). The dress was true to size, so not super form fitting, but definitely hugged me around my stomach and hip area; would probably work well with spanx for extra comfort and security. The red trim makes the dress unique. I took off a star because the material does trap a lot of lint/hair, more than most dresses, so by 11am I was starting to feel a bit like a fuzzball.

links_reviews_title: Red at the bottom of dress adds a sexy vibe
links_reviews_text: Perfect for my hourglass figure. I did wear spanx only because i was bloated that day. Dress is great quality

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable but runs large. I wish I had rented the medium.
links_reviews_text: Runs large and fits loosely
What a gorgeous, sexy dress! Hard for me to feel sexy at 31/32 weeks pregnant, but thanks to this beauty it all worked out :). Pretty warm, and with boots and a coat plenty warm for Fall days
very fitted. wore belted for shower and work
A great dress for a tall person. Loved how it hung and has a little twirl at the bottom. Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Elegant and cozy, but runs large
links_reviews_text: This is a classy, comfortable work dress, which runs a little large. I typically wear a 10 and rented an XL but would size down to an L or even an M next time.

Rented this with my unlimited to wear outside on a cool fall day. Knit is warm without being bulky and soft not itchy. I went up to a small because I didn't want it to be too fitted and I still felt that it showed every lump and bump. Wore it anyway but if you are self conscious about that, may not be the best rental or you may want to go up 2 sizes.

Obsessed with this dress. I also wore it in the black print to work earlier this year. Super flattering with a tie at the waist. Great length for work. For more work looks follow me at @renttherunway_teacher
Great fit, flattering because of the adjustable toe waist. Light material, breezy and perfect for my vacation where we walked all day!

I usually wear a small or medium (I'm a solid 6) and wore a large and was very comfortable. It's a little big so maybe I could've gotten away with medium but best not to risk it. The fabric isn't shiny it's more cottony - making for more of a casual look than you might expect. Perfect for daytime work.
Love love love this dress. It's perfectly short & such a cute pattern. Will definitely rent again this summer!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and length for work or play
links_reviews_text: I snagged this for a casual summer work dress but it's even cuter than expected! Planning to bring this out for a daytime dress / weekend getaway too.

links_reviews_title: Comfy day dress! Perfect for a day outside.
links_reviews_text: I am usually between a medium and a large, and the large was perfect.
Quality fabric, pretty print, light weight. Shorter than I expected but I am 5'9". On a windy day it could be a problem. Great with heels and flats. Got multiple wears out of this.

I rented this for a day at the Masters. My typical size is 10-12 which was XXL in this brand. Wish smaller size was available. Too big in the top and waist. Skirt was flowy and dress was comfortable and cute with sneakers.
This dress fit true to size, was super comfortable, and I loved it so much I almost bought it. I will definitely rent this again.
Super cute! Easy-breezy and comfortable. Wore around the house during the quarantine to feel cute and it worked! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fun and casual dress. Runs a bit large
links_reviews_text: Beautifully made dress. Nice light material and fully lined. It can be casual, or dressed up. I wore it with a jean jacket and loved it! The top part of the XS was a bit large on me, but I'm petite.
The cutest fun floral dress! I wore this a few times, paired it with sandals and then also paired it with a jean jacket and booties

links_reviews_title: Being 6 mos pregnant..hard to find something cute
links_reviews_text: I wore the medium and it fit perfect. Being 6.5 months pregnant I gained 30 pounds so it's been difficult to find anything cute to wear. This was perfect for a dinner out. I paired it w a moto jacket, Balenciaga purse, and black booties. The length was perfect and the stretchy fabric went over my bump. I ate a little too much but was comfortable the entire time. I'm 5'5", 157 pounds now. Started off at 129 lbs before pregnancy.

This dress was adorable! Runs a bit large and I went with the Medium although could have pulled off a small. Thought the material of the light cotton was very comfortable. Wore once with wedge sandals and another time with white converse - easy to dress up or down. Perfect for spring and summer. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Got multiple uses from this dress. From every day with sneakers to a couple of casual evening event
links_reviews_text: Great transition piece for fall.
only problem is that the dress is a little on the short side for work
Rented this for a trip to NYC. However, RTR insisted i was a large in this dress. For all you on the fence, it has a drawstring waist so need to size up.
It runs large At the waist and shoulders but is also pretty short, and I'm only 5'5.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size and was an easy to wear dress.

I loved this dress so much more than I thought I would! I wore it twice, both for meetings. The material is super light--perfect for summer. I loved the ruffle skirt too. There is a drawstring at the waist, which is nice to be able to adjust how much it billows on the top. I would definitely recommend this dress!
Nothing over the top, but received several comments on it. I live in AZ and it kept me cool while running around in 108 degree weather.
I wore this to work and received so many compliments on cut and color. It's long enough to be appropriate for a corporate environment but still a little fun/flirty.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, casual, summer work dress. I am 5'8, 137lbs and a small fit great. Waist is adjustable!
links_reviews_text: Only con - the dress was a little short being 5'8, but definitely not unwearable! Not see through either.
I usually wear a size 8 or 10 in dresses and this was a little large on me - but still super comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect light and breezy summer dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful spring/summer dress. Wore to work and on the weekend. Lots of complements. Didn't hit me funny at the waist like I see in some of the reviews but I am quite petite and this worked well. Fabric was light and breezy, will definitely get this one again!
PERFECT - Great aline fit

links_reviews_title: Cute print and ruffle detail- weird fit!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but the fit is just weird. I went ahead and still wore it to work. I am 5'7" 140 lbs and the tie waist hits below my natural waist. I dont have a long torso but if you do, this might be for you. I got the L after reading reviews. I am not sure if the M wouldve worked. I wont rent this again, I put a black cardigan over it and wore it with some heels. The top is baggy (36B) and the waist hits weird.
This dress is comfortable and cute and can be dressed up or down. I loved it and would rent it again.
I wore this several times and loved it! I wore during the day with sneakers and out at night with sandals. Loved it!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this every weekend while I had it ;-)
links_reviews_text: I think it runs a little on the small side (short) so I sized up. Drawstring at the waist makes it fine for needing to size up ;-)
A little short, but very cute. More cotton, than silky.
Nice dress for work, but have to be careful when you stand up because the under layers and get stuck and you run the risk of flashing people.
Very cute. Bottom flared a little too much for my taste. But a fun day dress!
loved this for work and a great fit!
Wore to a work meeting with black heels and got a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, but a bit too young for me. Wore it anyway.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress online and in person, but just felt a bit too young for me. (53 years old)

links_reviews_title: Way cuter in real life than the photo!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cute in person, the picture does not do it justice in my opinion. It is a thicker/stiffer cotton than a standard sundress, but I think it would be perfect for spring rather than say a 90 degree day in July. Due to the fabric being thicker, the medium was just a tad too big and I had to fuss with it quite a bit. Returning it but will rent again when the small becomes available! (I'm a 4 in most brands)
Loved this dress! The length was great and the neckline made it appropriate for work or play as it could be buttoned up all the way or left more open. Lots of compliments both time I wore it!

links_reviews_title: Recommended a xxl. Was two sizes to small.
links_reviews_text: would have loved to exchange it for smaller size but not available

I am usually between a size 2 and 4--the small was unavailable, so I went with a medium. I think the small would have been a better fit for me, the medium was a little baggy. It was a little short for my comfort level for the office and the bottom flared out too much for my taste! Wouldn't rent again!

links_reviews_title: Big and awkward on top. Beautiful skirt.
links_reviews_text: PROS: the skirt is really different and flattering. It has two buttons so you can wear the skirt a couple of different ways (tight and fitted or loose and drooping). CONS: I really wanted to wear this, but I could not get the top to sit right. It is definitely made for women who can fill out the top. Smaller-chested women will have problems with the neckline bunching up. I just couldn't do anything with it. The sides were also very wide and flared out. It's too bad because the skirt fit perfectly, so sizing down was not an option for me.

links_reviews_title: Fun design and cut; if between sizes, go down
links_reviews_text: I agree with another reviewer that the chest pleating and cut here is a little weird, but it's more noticeable to the wearer than to others. I am generally between a 4 and a 6 and opted for the 38, but would get the 36 next time for comparison as there is extra space in the waist and front panel. That said, it looks more like a drop waist on the model and is more natural waist on me. Flow is amazing.

I really like this outfit. Over all the pleated / wrap combo is really flattering and different. I got lots of compliments on the dress. My only notes is that I think it would be better for someone with less chest than myself. The dress had some side pleated that fell oddly over my chest, a minor detail, still wore dress and really liked it.
It was a bit wrinkled when it arrived as it easily wrinkles. Other than that, pretty easy to use stylish dress
Honestly, I have a hard time imagining who this dress would fit. Definitely not for short girls, but really this one was weird. My torso was probably 6 inches to short. Lol do a stylist review!

links_reviews_title: Great for pirate or musketeer costume
links_reviews_text: The sleeves on this top are really quite large. It was almost too comical, but I ended up wearing it to the symphony. This top would be perfect for a pirate or musketeer costume. Ran a little short in the torso for me. I liked that it wasn’t see through; the material is thick and heavy.

Based on the picture RTR provides you can't really tell how much volume the sleeves really have. I figured out how to style it and wound up liking the weight of the fabric really well, but felt like I looked a little bit like I belonged in the three musketeers -VERY blousy.
The top was overall very heavy, and the arms are way oversized. Unfortunately not my style.

links_reviews_title: I rented this shirt to wear to work with slacks.
links_reviews_text: Blouse is cute, but heavier than I expected. Arms are also baggier than I expected.

links_reviews_title: Strong thick material that doesn't hold wrinkles but runs quite big
links_reviews_text: The thick material is good for cold weather. Definitely size down (maybe two sizes?). Get it if you like flowy.
Loved this! Wore with skinny black jeans for a brunch and again later in the week for dinner. Beautiful, heavy fabric. Perfect for work or casual!
I rented a small over the Holidays and it was a little big, so I ordered an xsmall and it fits perfectly. I typically wear small or medium in blouses.
I wore this to a luncheon and received so many compliments. The sleeves are awesome!
The sleeves are massive and the shirt was large. Didn't end up wearing.

Perfect top for work!! It's a little big in the sleeves and a little wide in the torso but any smaller and it probably would have been a little short on me so glad I went with the small vs extra small!! Can be dressed up or down with dress pants and heels or jeans and booties. Looks great with hair pulled back in a bun and statement earrings!
Love this shirt but it was constantly slipping off my shoulder and showing my boobs. The drapiness factor is what makes it stunning, but it's hard to get the fit right.

links_reviews_title: Very fun! Sleeves are blowsier than I thought!
links_reviews_text: It's a shorter top, so I got the large - which was too big - but I think the medium would have been too short. It's very cute though! I still wore it, just a little baggy.
A very pretty and elegant top. I wore it with black jeans to a nice dinner.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse and fabric, however a little low cut and constantly gaps
links_reviews_text: Fabric is not stiff enough for the neck to remain nicely in place as shown in pictures.

I grabbed this in store due to the unseasonably warm weather over the weekend and was able to wear out for a friends birthday and to work! Looked cute with dressy sneakers and heels, and the length worked well with both. The buttons are a little annoying, but ultimately worth the hassle.

Loved this dress. Fit like a dream--maybe could have taken an inch off the waist but definitely didn't want it smaller anywhere else. Great fabric that was fine for fall/winter and would be great in the spring. I had no button issues at all.
Cute and comfortable, definitely runs a little small. My favorite details were the pleats and gathering at the shoulders, which gives it a bit of a '40s vibe.

I loved this dress.. it's so pretty and I was thrilled to bring it on a work trip and find that it hadn't wrinkled at all. I'm usually a 6 and I wore the 8, which fit very comfortably. It's low cut so I had to wear a camisole underneath in order to make it work-appropriate.

I loved this dress so much, I wish I could've bought it. It's a perfectly made dress. It's slimming and can easily be dressed up or down. I wore it for engagement photos in Paris and am so happy I did.

Awesome on trend dress. Didn't want to give it back. It was great paired with white sneakers for work (at a tech company). I'm normally between a 0 and 2. The 2 well, probably could have also worn the 0. Great quality!
This would be the perfect day event dress!

Cool pattern, looked very on trend. The V is pretty deep, so it wouldn't be appropriate for a more formal work environment. The dress closes with a line of tiny black buttons that have a piece of fabric behind them so there isn't any skin visible through the buttons. I'm a 6/8, and I definitely needed the 8.

links_reviews_title: This is what I subscribe for!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. High quality fabric, classy design, & good fit. I have a curvier figure & I still sized down. I think my normal size 6 would have been too big. It's a little low cut for a conservative work environment but I plan to wear this on my more casual days. If I can find it somewhere for a little bit less, I'll buy it : )
Beautiful dress with great button detailing down the front. I am a B cup and this dress was snug on chest and ribcage area.
Comfortable and stylish.

Super adorable dress with a little more sass than I expected! Was a little snug than most 6's. The buttons kept coming undone -- and one popped off sometime during the day -- from my skinniest area. I pretty much stayed locked up in my office all day to avoid a wardrobe malfunction.

Love this dress! It's so slimming and so cute. Perfect for work. I wore it to an alumni event and got so many compliments. Will definitely be renting again. My only complaint it that one button kept popping undone but that could just be because I ate a big lunch lol

links_reviews_title: Love this! Gorgeous dress, good fit and well made
It is a beautiful dress but my regular size was so tight I could not button it up!
links_reviews_text: This was my first order so still learning how sizes work. Beautiful and classic, but would recommend going up from your regular size. I am a "pear" and it is pretty slim through the waist.
This dress is understated but can really be styled for any vibe you're going for. Pair with combat boots or heels and some bright red lips and you look good. Also very comfortable.

Wore this with black booties and with sandals. Too low cut without an undershirt for me, but maybe could have been ok with sticky tape. I don’t like having to wear an undershirt to accommodate cuts that will show my bra. Other than that it was cute. Wore this to weekend brunch
Fit pretty well even given how short I am.
Very flattering fit, slightly low cut, but still conservative enough for work because of length. Light and silky fabric. I ended up wear to work and to brunch.

links_reviews_title: This dress would be perfect if it had one more button on top.
links_reviews_text: Loved it so much but it was just a little low for my taste and for work. I pinned it so that I was more comfortable. Loved the length and style.

links_reviews_title: Way too tight in the bust
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the bust so I didn't wear it

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a dinner. Conservative crowd. Dress was appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Neckline is low. Only a concern when seated.
Not for work. Too low cut and long for petites.
Very flattering. Needed a black tank underneath to make it suitable for office. Pretty shoulder/sleeve fit. Tiny buttons down front. Slit fairly high.
Great fit and pretty design. Perfect for a wedding or night out. Will rent again!
love the dress but was too small all over-equipment runs a little small in general. beautiful dress though
Solid work dress. Don't love it or hate it
Not made for women with ample busts.
Gorgeous dress. Amazing quality!!! Love love loooove!

links_reviews_title: This is an amazing dress. I've worn it now 6 times and don't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: LOVE. Extremely slimming, hugs all the right places and really comfortable. This dress makes you feel like a million bucks, and the deep v-neck adds some sass. The only annoying part is buttoning the buttons that run down the front.

This was a very pretty dress, but I thought it ran small and more importantly, the V-neck is so deep that it was too deep for me to wear to the office. Perhaps if I had sized up I could have fit a tank underneath but that seem to defeat the purpose of this summery dress.
great
Fit was perfect.

I wore this to work. It is a beautiful well made dress, but could have used a side zipper so you don't have to deal with all the buttons. I wore a cami underneath to make it more work appropriate and was glad I did because one button kept popping open.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful in person--I liked the fabric even better when I saw it than in the pic.
links_reviews_text: Way too small, particularly on top. Order 2 or 3 sizes larger if you have a full bust.

This is one of the most beautiful items I've received through my unlimited membership. It was just a little too tight over my baby bump, so I didn't end up wearing, but I can't wait to get it again! The fabric and cut are perfect. It's so flattering without being too low cut for work. Love!

This dress is lovely. It's the perfect length for my 5'4 frame. It would have been a nice dress to wear to a dinner date on a summer night. Unfortunately, I couldn't button it up over my stomach and chest. Order a size up!

links_reviews_title: Was a little longer than I anticipated - I'm 5'4 felt like it came to ankles
links_reviews_text: great fit, maybe more appropriate for a slightly more formal occasion

links_reviews_title: Track style pant that isn't baggy!
links_reviews_text: Many of the track-inspired pants I've tried have just been really baggy and unflattering. These pants have just enough structure to give them a little more of a tailored shape. Heavy knit fabric, perfect for a cool spring day. Definitely not for warmer weather. Pants are pear-shape-friendly! Although I wish the waist ran a smidge smaller. Pair with the matching Rag & Bone Sandrine blazer! Would be great for travel.
Great fit! Not tight, but skims the legs. Thicker material

I really love these pants. They were super long, I rolled them twice cause I'm only 5'4" and they are definitely meant for someone 5'7" or taller, but I really liked them rolled. I wore them at the natural waist and I had to tie them tight to keep them there, but I thought they were super flattering. Very heavy pique fabric, but cool touch so good even in spring weather!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable pants that looked pretty sharp
links_reviews_text: these are made of a heavy knit type material, with a white knife edge defining the front seam. I actually found them a little big for me, but I think that's because I am losing weight and between sizes. I was speaking on a stage, so i wanted to stay covered up and professional looking no matter what the angle, and these pants did the trick. I don't think I would have liked them so much if I had to be outside for long, but in an air conditioned space, these worked great.
Loved them aside from the fact that every time I pulled/tied the drawstring tightly the pants would become loose again within minutes.
n/a
These are comfortable, but nice enough for my casual work environment. Although my daughter did ask me if I was wearing my pajamas. LOL They fit very true to size.
Perfect fit, fun little pant. Love them!
Paired with the matching blazer, this is a solid on trend work outfit. The only drawback is the waist has a rather long, ratty drawstring. I tucked it into the waistband.
too large
Great fit but a little long
You can tell that this is made with really high quality materials. I can wear this to work without feeling frumpy.

links_reviews_title: The comfy work wear I was looking for
links_reviews_text: Fabulous fit, flattering material although a little heavy for summer. Obsessed with these
Too heavy fabric for summer

links_reviews_title: These looked really sexy on my husband!
links_reviews_text: These pants are made extremely well and have great pockets - the works. I should have returned them and immediately ordered an 8 or 10. (Don't think they were available) I simply ordered too big a size and they seem to run large too! As they are trackish pants I had my hubby try them on! They were so cute! I would have had him wear them out to brunch or something here in the village - but I didn't think that was in my unlimited deal ; ) But I must say I was tempted to buy them for him! Smokin' hot! Lol Tres cute!
Elastic waistband with a tie. Tapered leg, pockets & a stripe down the front. Very comfy , casual & cute.

So I love rag and bone and though the pants looked super cute. But when the arrived and I tried them on, not so cute. Maybe this style just isn't me, but I didn't have a top that looked cute with it. The legs were super long and the waist is really high.
Ran too large and long, returned.
Fit like a glove! Perfect length and comfortable. Don't want to send back...
These are the most flattering jeans I've ever put on. Highly considering buying them. They are perfect for anyone who have some thighs/butt but a smaller waist. Love them!
Perfect fit. They go well with anything. Do it. More on @thanksitsrtr
Ordered these because Paige cuts true to size and makes the most comfortable jeans that I own. These are full length on me, but would also be cute as a cropped jean for someone taller

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Wish they were a little more cropped
links_reviews_text: Great for casual and can dress them up as well.

Perfect fit, comfortable, stretchy but look structured -- was worried the crop would be too short because I'm almost 5'8" but it worked. I've worn these so many times and don't want to return them, but also don't want to pay $200 for them, although they might even be worth it, that's how obsessed I am. Also they maintain their shape and fit without having to wash and dry after wearing.
I got a size up and did not need to. Should have ordered what I normally wear. But they are so cute and very comfortable! Will rent again.

I love these jeans - wore them a million different ways and the cropped flare didn't look weird on me which is shocking as I am 5'2 - I highly recommend!! Paige jeans are thick, stretchy and flattering - they always make my butt look like a million bucks!
Great fit, high waist, stretchy fabric. Thinking about renting again!
These jeans were super comfy and stretchy. I loved the fray at the hem. Not super high waisted but enough to get away with wearing a body suit. I would usually go with a 27/28 but the 26 was perfect!
Super fun pair of jeans that are right on trend! Very comfortable and great fit. I will rent again!
These jeans couldn't be a more perfect fit. And in my normal size! So happy with them!
Love these jeans! High waisted and didn't stretch very much after wearing all day. Also extremely comfortable- I might purchase!
I prob should have gotten a 29 but they stretch out so the 28 worked. Loved how they were cropped- super flattering.
So comfy! Loved these

links_reviews_title: very cute details, but very tight.
links_reviews_text: I would recommend sizing up
Great fit! Plan to purchase.
I am 5 months out from having a baby and I love the slight stretch the waist has with these jeans.
These jeans were so comfortable. They moved when I moved, but the denim didn't stretch out throughout the day. I loved!

links_reviews_title: Perfect amount of stretch and structure
links_reviews_text: Loved these so much I kept them! They fit well with some give, but not so much that they're falling down at the end of the day. Cropped flare is great for showing off cute shoes. Waist hit right at my belly button, so looked great with crop tops too.
More low-rise than I expected

I wanted a fun style for casual Friday- and these are adorable! I've been wanting to try the flare cropped style and these were a great intro without being "too much"! Fit was fantastic, I love Paige!
These jeans were great for my larger hips/thighs/booty and smaller waist. A rare find!

links_reviews_title: BEST JEANS I HAVE EVER WORN!!!
links_reviews_text: I could sleep in these they are so comfy!! Feel like they are the pants from sister hood of the traveling pants where they would look great on anyone! Love love love! Will rent again and again till the price drops more so I can buy.

links_reviews_title: These were the perfect fit! Sad to send them back...I may actually buy them!
links_reviews_text: Loved these so much. Perfect high waist (but not too high) and tasteful fringe. Comfy like sweats.
very slimming, TTS. I'm short but they were still slightly cropped on me!
Fit like a glove. Loved them.
Loved these jeans. The denim felt substantial and comfortably smoothed out stomach given the high waist. Not cropped on me - more ankle length, but still looked proportional.
This is light and airy jumper. I paired it with a black long sleeve body suit. I wore it casual w sneakers but I bet looks cute w a pair of heels too!
quality embroidery plus cute characters elevates this funky knit. soft and lightweight. long enough for a front tuck into higher waisted bottoms.

I got this sweater for fun because of the playful print and great reviews. I was so glad I did. The fabric is so soft, the pattern is a conversation piece, and it was functionally warm. I highly recommend it.

links_reviews_title: Snug and cozy fit. Fun design!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this fun sweater. Did wear a long sleeve shirt underneath to prevent any itching and also give it a tad more length.
This lightweight sweater was great! It fit in equally well at my office job as it did in the streets of Hogsmead at Harry Potter World. I absolutely loved it and would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Returning it to be cleaned only to rent again
links_reviews_text: Cozy and warm and cute. I got so many compliments on this whimsical sweater. Perfect garment for the Boston winter!
Rented this for my son and daughter's Greatest Showman themed birthday party and absolutely loved it!! So fun and unique!
Nice sweater for mini vacation.
I wore this sweater a few times and absolutely LOVED it!! It's lightweight & warm. Runs small so def size up.
I agree with everyone- soft and comfortable. Short but not cropped. A fun sweater, fairly warm considering how thin it was!

this is medium and fits great over all. Is just the tiniest short in length and sleeve. Long arm girls should def get a large. I'm this photo I have a long sleeve white Cotten shirt ( like from old navy) It's really good looking. Clearly something your not going to wear around the same group twice, so RTR is a perfect option. very well constructed and soft.
This was fun for a day. Cute. Compliments. Warm. A bit itchy but fine with layer under. On the short/fitted side. Dark blue, not black.
Cutest sweater ever. Compliments galore!
Love this; fit is flattering length in arm is a good length. Color and quality like new! This will be rented again as it's a fun peace for a girl that loves to wear art/make a statement.
Loved this piece. I volunteer at an elementary school, and the kids obsessed over the sweater. The arms were a bit short for me, and the sweater is showing signs of wear, but good rental overall.
Just the cutest sweater! Love the circus theme and the fact that the drawings are part knit and part embroidered. Got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: So cute!! Warm, high-quality. whimsical sweater with 10% cashmere. Large = 10-12.
links_reviews_text: I love this whimsical, high-quality wool/cashmere sweater by this UK design team, which specializes in high-end knits. The animals and stars are partially woven into the knit and partially embroidered. In terms of fit, this sweater runs true to size to slightly large. I am usually a size 8-10 (5'8", 154 lbs, 36C) and rented this sweater in size Large (8-10). That size fit a bit slouchy on me, but the next size down might have been too small. Therefore, I would say the size Large equates to sizes 10-12 in this sweater. Note that this is a warm sweater (great for New England winters) and a bit itchy. I wore a fitted long-sleeve T-shirt underneath the sweater to take care of the itching issue.
Fits nicely and true to size - great quality!
Not soft. Sort of itchy. Wanted to love this but just didn't. Somehow was blah...?

I wore this sweater a few times and received lots of compliments - my boyfriend said he loved the sweater because it reminded him of video games! The blend of wool and cashmere made the sweater warm without being bulky and it wasn't itchy. Love this brand!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for our family Thanksgiving/Christmas party. Cute as can be, warm and comfy.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Design unique. Felt good.
Really cute sweater. Fit true to size, we'll made and comfy. Good quality.
Thought I would like this more. Wore it a couple of times. It was fine. Just not a wow.

links_reviews_title: This is a great top and really high quality!
links_reviews_text: Very cute pattern, nice and warm and incredible quality! This si the second time I have rented this and I will do it again for sure!
This sweater was SO damn itchy. I tried it on and removed it immediately. If you're sensitive to itchy shirts/sweaters - don't order this.
I love this sweater! It is a little odd but that's what is fun about it! It's also very soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but collects lint like crazy!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top - everyone at work loved it too - even the men! Fit like a glove, super unique. Only downside was that it kept attracting lint/fuzz/hair ALL day - it certainly kept my lint roller busy! Fuzz aside, i'd definitely rent it again.
Cute sweater but got to hot where I was going.....didn't get to wear it. I would order again!
warm, fitted. liked it

There's no way I could love this sweater more! I would buy it if it was a little cheaper. Brought it with me on vacation and wore it over a long sleeve tee as well as a button down. It was nice and cozy and fit perfectly. Plus, the circus-themed designs are adorable. Such a fun sweater! Absolutely loved it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater almost every day for a week I loved it so much. I got compliments everywhere.
links_reviews_text: I liked it roomy so I got a medium. It was perfect without looking sloppy

links_reviews_title: Wore this around Europe and loved the fun vibe!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable (soft, thin material) but felt very stylish.

links_reviews_title: Compliments everywhere I go. Just puts everyone in a good mood when they see it.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
I love this sweater - so much fun and I get so many compliments when I wear it!

I rented this sweater for fun because where else can you find a sweater like this? I ended up wearing it to work with fun patterned pants and received so many compliments. It fit perfectly, although it is 95% wool so it might bother some people. I really loved wearing this sweater and had a lot of fun with it.
Fits true to size, comfortable, great design, not bulky, really fun during winter blahs.
Cute and I got a lot of compliments. The stitching on the appliqués was higher quality but the fabric of the actual sweater felt cheap and squeaky.
Very cute sweater. Warm. Easily rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice but definitely worn. Doesn’t look brand new. Overall I enjoyed wearing it
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater, colorful playful. Fits true to size.
Great fit, fun pattern.
#fun. #cozy

I originally passed on hearting this dress (even though I love Derek Lam) because I wasn't sure about the pattern. But I tried on the dress at a RtR store and loved it! The fabric is soft and beautiful, and the cut is really nice, slightly tapered at the waist. The neckline was low for work so I added a camisole.
The dress easily fit a five month bump due to a perfect and flattering cut. I would wear this non maternity as well I loved it so much!
There was no way you could wear this with out covering the deep V. Dress was otherwise great.

I really enjoyed this dress for a quick/easy option for work. It's pretty light weight but not see through at all. I wore a tank under, but I didn't really NEED to. If I wore to a baby shower or bridal shower I would have worn without.
Nice lightweight dress, very comfortable. It wasn't super flattering to my waist straight on, but I really like the print and got compliments all day so it was still great to wear.
Love this dress, very comfy. Probably could have sized down a bit. Colors are great.

The dress fit pretty well but wasn't terribly flattering without a belt. This one might not be best for bigger busted girls, but it was alright for work. I actually wore it to a dentist appt that ended up taking way longer than I thought it would and the back of the dress didn't wrinkle from the chair at all! Was pleasantly surprised by that. Overall, good work rental but not my favorite dress ever.

I was a little skeptical about this dress at first. It fit totally fine but the material is a little off. Swishy like a raincoat kind of. Not that extreme but close. And I thought maybe I looked like a grandma. But I got so many compliments on this, for both male and remain coworkers. It was very professional and super comfy.
I loved the pattern and colors of the dress, but it just fit oddly in the chest. I did get a few compliments, so could work on someone with a smaller chest.

While this dress is work appropriate it was not my style. I also can't tell if it's supposed to be so large but i felt like I was swimming in it . The material was also alittle odd and not very breathable.
Loved this dress! Very comfortable - lightweight, material was breathable. Needs a belt to add definition to the waist.

links_reviews_title: Best suited for a pear shape
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous colors on the dress. It's so light and airy. The dress does flow with a bit of extra fabric from the waist down that can tend to make your hips look a bit larger, but would be very flattering on a true pear shape. The arms run a touch small. Overall, very flattering.
Super comfy and flattering. Loved this dress. Wish it had pockets. Unlined.

This dress was super lightweight, yet not see through and extremely comfortable. It was very roomy without being frumpy. I wore it twice to work and once to church. The upper bodice was a bit different in fit, but not anything that would make you not wear it.
This was one of my favorite dresses I've rented from RTR. It complimented my athletic figure very well and I got many compliments! 10 out of 10 recommend!!
Really easy to wear and perfect for warm summer nights. Flattering fit.

Fits true to size. Yes, it fits very loose but I didn't find it unflattering. I found the chest/arms area a little tight but not enough so that I would've gone up a size. Received lots of compliments at work but would also be great for a dressier daytime event.

This is a very easy dress for a summer workday. Lightweight fabric but not sheer, well-cut, can throw it on and go. Fabric is vibrant. May be tight on the chest for a very large bust but was perfect for a medium sized chest.
Love this one.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a weekly Zoom podcast I host.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable every day dress!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely perfect length, very easy to wear!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! Insanely comfortable, great length, and was so easy to accessorize! Will definitely rent again

The cut was a little dowdy for me. The neckline isn't my favorite. Also didn't love the feel of the fabric, felt pretty synthetic. But the print is pretty and the fit was easy. I can see this working if you have a more conservative dress code at work.
Very comfortable and flattering. Will rent again.
I found it a bit of a tight squeeze around the chest but otherwise it was a really fun and flirty dress that can easily go from daytime to nighttime!
This dress is flattering and easy to wear. Super comfy and nice flow.

links_reviews_title: The midline V is SUPER deep. Had to wear a tank/camisole under to not flash people at work.
links_reviews_text: Loved the material and fit, not a fan of the super deep V in the front. Used fabric tape to close and wore camisole underneath. Just was not expecting that deep of a V.
Cute dress, nice comfortable pattern. Ran small in the chest, I had to wear a blazer over-top.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern, can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I wore this to the office with heels and tights and then switched to booties in the evening. Great pattern and transitioned well from office to dinner out. Fit is a little weird at the bust if you're larger chested like I am, but great length and fit overall
Gorgeous dress - I almost bought for myself! This was the best rental to date: quality is high, colors are beautiful and fit is fantastic. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: If you want to look older
links_reviews_text: Not a great dress for me, it was very grumpy and almost tent like. Others had better luck, I did not wear

I love the cut of this dress. The material and lose waistline are very comfortable and flowy. The longer sleeves, hemline, and shawl-collar make it work appropriate and flattering. I would buy it if it wasn't too expensive.

This dress has gorgeous colors and is lightweight and comfortable. It does seem to have some extra fabric to it, but in my case that worked out well because I rented it at seven months pregnant. I wore a size 40 but could easily have sized down to a 38 and still had some extra room to breathe. Overall, very flattering.

I really liked this dress and wore it to work a few times. It has a great, lightweight fabric. The sleeves and skirt are relaxed - not form fitting but fall very nicely. The stitching in the top of the dress I received was missing so I sewed it myself (so I could wear it) - probably a lot looser than it was supposed to be stitched. Worked well for me!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, quality dress, flattering cut
links_reviews_text: Would recommend. I chose to size up based on other reviews and I'm glad I did. Although I probably could have squeezed into my TTS, the cut was much flattering with a little extra room.
It's casual enough for day to day work wear but could definitely be appropriate for an important meeting. Thin enough for summer wear but not at all flimsy and wearable in the fall with a jacket.
The material of this dress was super light so it was very comfortable for a long day at work. It was a little tight in the bust but not unbearable. Will definitely rent again!

I really like the dress, especially the print and fabric. However the shoulders were cut strangely and didn't move as well as I would have liked. I still wore the dress twice, just didn't raise my hand or wave at anyone!

I adore this dress and also ordered it in a different print. Nice fit through the chest for medium chest and flowy. While I am narrow in my lower half, I loved the extra flow and room. The fabric is luxurious, but does not breath well, so it is nice that it is roomy!
Cute but low cut. I would consider something else if you plan on wearing this to work.
I am a 40DD and this large was only a little snug. The XL got lost in shipment and I had to get large to make due. Be prepared to go strapless, the shoulders constantly fell.

Loved this shirt! I would say I am typically a size medium in all shirts and this one ran a bit big. Definitely still wearable, but the shoulders were sliding down a bit. Still loved wearing it and thought it was super flattering and cute.

Cute cut and color. The fit wasn't great for me. The shoulders and chest area were too large. I had to use dress tape to keep the shoulders from falling. Also, the sleeves rode up my arms but I t's common for me to find sleeves tight.

links_reviews_title: Not a good fit for petites
links_reviews_text: Way to big in the bust and the shoulder. I rented a small (I'm usually between a XS and a S) and my 34Bs were swimming. I tried, but couldn't figure out a way to make it work.

Loved this top as far as material and color! However the busy area for great but because the sleeves kept sliding down my shoulders it kept exposing my bar every 2 minutes . Perhaps get a size down or maybe this is for more of a straight shoulder person vs standard or slope shoulder.

links_reviews_title: This top made me feel SO cool and confident.
links_reviews_text: This runs a little large. I wore it with a push up bra and still fit in the medium perfectly. But it was easily adjustable to my narrow ribcage due to the front tie and stretch in the back. SO cute. Maybe one of my favorite RTR items!
Loved this crop top. It does run big. The shoulders kept falling off. I'll be getting a L next time!

I'm usually an XL in full size tops or dresses. This was too big on my bust and shoulders, it kept falling down. I wore it to an outdoor party/bbq, and got several compliments on my outfit (I wore it with the skirt its paired with in pictures).

links_reviews_title: Cute top - runs big for petite gals!
links_reviews_text: I'm short waisted and petite - this shirt was so cute but a little large. The sleeves fell down but I didn't mind. Plenty of room in the bust I'm a 36D/DD and I feel like i could have worn a medium.

Great crop if you're big on top. I'm a 34E and the small was perfect. My only issue is the sleeves fell a few times. It's a super light shirt (wore it in July and it was perfect) the color looks even better in person. Loved this top will def rent again!

links_reviews_title: A crop top anyone can rock!
links_reviews_text: This was super cute and very flattering. I have narrow shoulders so the XL was slightly big in the shoulders, but overall it was a great fit. The waist tie is adjustable so you can tighten it to keep it put, or loosen it if you had a bit too much to eat ;)

I can either be a S/M and tend to lean towards mediums as far as crop tops go. This medium was big on me, wish I had gotten the small. If you're unsure, size down. It was cute to pair with my cowboy boots for a night out in Nashville but the sleeves kept coming down for me and gapping in the back. Either way, it was still cute and I got compliments.

links_reviews_title: Just comfortable airy perfect summer shirt
links_reviews_text: But loose on the shoulders. Tendency to slip
I love this too so much. I sent it back before realizing it was on sale for 80% off. I wore it with high rise jeans and white sneakers. So cute!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but shoulders fit weird
links_reviews_text: Really liked this top and wish I could have kept it. Everything was almost perfect except the shoulders would not stay in place. I ordered a medium based on the recommended size, but will try again with a small.

links_reviews_title: great with a high waist skirt or pant
links_reviews_text: good for a small chested person,

links_reviews_title: I should have rented the XL
links_reviews_text: The XXL ran a bit loose in the bust and I should have rented the XL instead. Otherwise this is a beautiful top

links_reviews_title: Cute too but is wide and short
links_reviews_text: This is a great top for people with a big bust. But it ran too big on me… And I have a full chest
Love this top. Next time I'd probably get the small. It was a bit big on me.

links_reviews_title: I was looking for something fun to wear to a music festival and step out of the "mom" box.
links_reviews_text: Based on the photos, I was not expecting this top to be as short as it was. That is my fault. I should have looked at the photos more closely. After realizing that the top did not go any lower than the underwire in my bra, I decided to not wear the outfit. I gave it three stars because the back is super cute.
It's really cute - a small was big enough in the chest, felt large in the shoulders for me.

links_reviews_title: Super cute top for busty women
links_reviews_text: the sleeves run big so I had to use safety pins!
These are light-weight and super comfortable, I consistently forgot I was wearing them and I typically only wear studs. They're classic and look super polished.

Selling real estate on the coast often requires looking pulled together but still less formal than an office job. this dress fit the bill and was perfect outside on a hot day for some photos for some upcoming ads. This may be one of my favorite rentals yet. The silky fabric and easy yet comfortable style made it a win for me.

links_reviews_title: Great and easy everyday dress or for more formal!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Easy and comfy. Wore backwards on accident (LOL) but still cute!! Switched to front and super cute !! Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material but very static and clingy
links_reviews_text: The material is beautiful, soft and pretty. However when I put it on, the material clung to my body and didn't flow as I would've expected it to. I tried to get rid of some static but it was still very clingy which didn't flatter. I didn't land up wearing it. Maybe someone else will have better luck because it is very pretty.
Tie the top for work, or untie for a more laid back every day look. Print is gorgeous! Such a beautiful, flattering dress. One of my favorite rentals. Light, soft, comfy material.

links_reviews_title: Great print but top did not work for me
links_reviews_text: I always love the way these Parker blouson dresses look on the model but I think I need to give up on them for my figure. I am petite and short waisted/torso. The top was too blousy and the neckline came down super low. If you look great in this Parker style, it's a fun and pretty print. For me, I had to send it back.

Based on the other reviews, I sized up (usually wear a 31, but rented a 32). Even then, when I started to put them on the first time, I still thought they might be too small. But they actually fit great! They are a rigid denim which I prefer to stretchy jeans. I didn't want to send them back :)

When I first tried these on they were very snug, but after wearing them for an hour or two they stretched out to the perfect fit. I am normally a 29 and ordered the 30, so if you are between sizes I would go up. I wore them at least six times and they never stretched out more than that the original adjustment. I really liked the fringe detail on the bottom. I wore them with booties, flats, and tennis shoes.

Obsessed with these jeans. In fact ended up buying a pair, just in a different wash. I loved the fit, not too tight not too loose. I wore than all day, they definitely were a bit stretched out at the end of the day, but nothing I would complain about.
Size up two sizes. I could not get them on.
Not the best fit.
I normally wear a 30 and these didn't even come close. Runs small.
These are so flattering! Run true to size, they're a really stiff sturdy denim that just look great with everything.

links_reviews_title: A flattering for every body type
links_reviews_text: I am a curvy 6 M-L on the bottom and a size 2-4 S on the top body type. Needless to say high waisted pants are a hard one for me. I always run into the problem where the fabric around my ass and thighs are to tight but the waist is perfect orrr the waist is to big and the fabric around my legs are perfect. But these pair of pants were a happy medium! The legs started off tight but after a few hours the fabric molded to my body type better and ended up looking really amazing! It was also a long enough cut for tall people, but not to short for short people (i'm 5'9'') Would have bought if i wasn't broke from the holidays !

links_reviews_title: Fit great & don't stretch out easily
links_reviews_text: Nice color too
Great fit - felt really confident in them. The fray at the bottom is a cute touch, but wouldn't wear them with booties - needs a flat. Very cute! Love them
These jeans were a perfect fit from top to bottom. The material felt great
These jeans fit true to size. There was not much stretch to them. I have a large rear and smaller waist and they were so flattering to my figure. I wish I could have kept them!
A great casual jean to wear to work or out with friends!

These were great. I wear 26 & 27. I chose 27 just in case these ran small, but they run true to size. I could have sized down, but the 27 fit well with a little room. At 5'8" I often can't find jeans that have the perfect frayed bootie cut - they're usually too short. These hit my calves perfectly for what I wanted. Comfortable, soft demin -- I'm happy!
Never tried this brand before and happy I did. Length as perfect, fit was snug, and overall wore these many times.
Really well made jeans - true to size. Not a lot of stretch, the denim is pretty thick. The wash is really pretty in person.

Love these! I wanted something in the 90s/mom jean trend, and these are great. Flattering fit, and comfortable. My only complaint is that they're meant for taller women - on me (I'm 5'4") they went all the way down to the tops of my sneakers (instead of being at the ankle, which is how they're intended to be worn)
Not the right fit for me because I have a straight body type. Would need small waist to hip ratio.

links_reviews_title: First time in shorts this year, ideal for this warm WFH day in the backyard
links_reviews_text: Oversized and requiring a belt to keep them comfortably up. Once on and in place, these are great. The material has a smooth-to-touch sheen with the weight of a heavyweight canvas. The side pockets the model is shown using don't hit where I'd ideally want such a pocket, but I doubt I'd be using them in any practical way anyways. These are certainly going to add bulk to a look, so if you're happy with that (as I am) I'd recommend giving these a try!
Love this dress! Wore to work but I would totally wear out as well. Cute and fitted in the back, forgiving drape in the front which is great for any figure. You won't regret renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: There's a zipper, but it fit snug!
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was okay. It didn't scream anything to me and it was quite blah. The dress fit okay after I realized there was a zipper!
Super cute dress that can be worn for any occasion. I got many complements on it! Can dress down with tennis shoes or dress up with over the knee boots!
Love this dress! The button at the cleavage keeps it from being too revealing. And the material is so soft and cozy. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Super soft, fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it was perfect for everyday wear walking around the city. Fit like a glove and not too short, but not too long. I have no complaints!

I wanted to love this dress so much but it had a lot of fit issues. The snap on the chest would pop off and fit too tight. Then the arms were way too long and also just huge and loose and so didn't look polished. But then the zip and torso fit perfect. So the chest pulled, arms sagged and torso like a glove.
I wore this to work with a pair of suede booties -- I love that it's flannel so it's cozy for the weather getting colder but it's also a very feminine fit

Dress was cute, nothing with a wow factor. I did not end up wearing it because the fabric had not stretch and my shoulders/bust felt a little constrained. It was very flattering on an hourglass figure but with no stretch, I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Good but might be tough for busty people. I had to wear a tank underneath
links_reviews_text: Fit well for smaller bust

Rented this dress for a February weekend trip to DC, and I unfortunately couldn't wear it — I tried it on with a couple of different bras and couldn't make any of them work. I was quite literally popping out of the top, and I'm not unusually busty. I may try it in a larger size, but while it's a cute dress, it is certainly nothing special quality-wise.

links_reviews_title: Oddly baggy on the chest zone
links_reviews_text: The dress is a great pattern and the material is very soft. The chest area has weird proportions and showed too much skin due to the material being a bit baggy.

This dress was a perfect fit from the waist down. Unfortunately, the chest was a no-go. The snap was nice but I still had a gap that made it look awkward. I'm about a 10-12 waist and closer to a 16 top, so top issues happen to me a lot. :-( . I loved the fabric and may try it again in a bigger size. This is strike two for sizes for me.
A little tight under the armpits. Really cute dress overall. Wore to brunch

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but size up if busty
links_reviews_text: This dress was so cute but way too tight in the chest. I am a petite girl and medium was my true size, but the chest seems to run a bit small. Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing this.
This dress runs super small and was SO short on me, definitely not for the taller girls or girls with a more full chest! The sleeves were also super short!
Very cute dress for the holidays. It can be dressed up or down depending on shoes and accessories. Lots of compliments on this dress
Really cool dress! Also super comfortable and flattering. the fabric was really soft and the skirt was perfectly flared not tight at all. I might never let this go!

I am in love with the fabric and pattern of this dress. It's warm soft flannel and it's so nice for winter dates. Unfortunately, the button at the front comes undone with the slightest movement and it just fits awkwardly around the shoulders/chest.
Perfect fit. A little low cut on me but overall I would get it again!

links_reviews_title: Had to wear a camisole, breasts were exposed, didn't close
links_reviews_text: Couldn't close the button in the front. Breasts were totally exposed.
