This is an adorable casual dress. It is open at the neck as other reviewers have said but works well with something underneath it. I wore it with a jumpsuit underneath + leggings and boots. The fabric is rayon with a flannel feel. Really fun dress.

This dress was soft and comfortable, sexy and conservative all in one. Just be careful was sitting as the wrap opens and will expose a lot of your legs. I fit in a 2, but would've been more comfortable in a 4 which is my true size. This one really seems to be true to size.
Super comfortable and one of the few dresses with button that didn't try to pop open every few hours. It was perfect for a fall day. This dress was fine for work FYI!
This was very. Comfortable for the office but kind of clings to your undergarments .

The chest opening was quite large on me, so it did a laughable job of covering my bra. The shoulders fit oddly. It was a bit pilled (flannel) from previous wearers. Didn't like it at all. No regrets sending it back. The length of the skirt was good. Could have gotten away with it at work (casual start up) if it weren't for the fact the chest and shoulders did not fit.

I bought my normal size and it was too small to put on. To be fair, I'm chesty. Even with the zipper undone, I could barely get both of my arms in it. The fabric is soft to the touch and looks beautiful. I may even size up and rent again.
Cute sleeve detail. Plaid can be dressed up or down for date or everyday.
This dress is meh! The bust area was pretty tight, I recommend going up a size if you are fuller in the bust area.

This is a cute, low-key goth sort of dress that I would have loved in high school. It was a tiny bit snug and the snap at the bust gaped quite a bit, so rather than trying to fix that, I added a black cami underneath. I wore it with fishnets and high heeled oxfords for a great night out!
tight on the ta tas but enough coverage to pass the one day worn.

links_reviews_title: Awkward fit - I'm a C Cup so I had to wear a cami under but even then the chest area was huge
links_reviews_text: There's a button near the chest that is meant to keep the neck together but didn't work for me. Overall the dress also didn't fall very well. Was excited for this for a fall work dress but was disappointed with it
Adorable! So many compliments
I got to wear this to a few events and just exploring a new city while on vacation. This felt like it was made for me. Highly recommend!

I usually hate jumpsuits / rompers because they don't tend to flatter my hourglass shape, but this one worked really well and was quite flattering. It was perfect for a weekend in Puerto Rico with a wicker handbag and a cute Panama hat. Highly recommend! I was truly tempted to buy it but didn't think I'd really end up having an opportunity to wear it other than on vacation, even though it is great.
Loved this look. Runs small so size up!
Fun to wear could have dressed up or down. I have a long torso felt a little small.
Perfect outfit for a fall transition weekend. Took me two tries to find the right fit- highly recommend sizing up!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but a little tight
links_reviews_text: This jumper was a little small but super cute and fun to wear day drinking while on vacation in New Orleans. I'm 5'1", 150lbs, and 34DDD. Perfect length and didn't wear a bra!

links_reviews_title: A little low cut, but otherwise I absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: This was great for vacation! I didn't wear a bra, didn't really need one, but it was pretty lowcut so I may have flashed a few people inadvertently lol. I thought it was great though, definitely suggest!
Fit JUST right. Straps are difficult to adjust. Almost a linen feel - breathes nicely on a hot steamy NYC day. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Another RTR jumpsuit for the win!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit and the color. Super comfortable and flattering. Great for summer, the material wasn't too thick. It was a little tight around my booty but I am a "Pear" shape. Otherwise I thought it was true to size! I would recommend!
Didn't eve have to wear a bra!!! More supportive than you'd think!!

links_reviews_title: Cute summer jumpsuit that actually fits tall people
links_reviews_text: I liked this jump suit a lot. Renting it was a risk since most jumpsuits don't fit me due to being tall and having a long torso. It wasn't a perfect fit but it was good enough for me to wear to several day time events. Would have preferred the legs and torso a smidge longer, but it's beautiful and exciting that I could actually wear a jump suit for once!

links_reviews_title: Really cute piece that can be casual for daytime or dressed up for evening!
links_reviews_text: Tie top is adjustable and can wear without a bra

links_reviews_title: It was a fun piece to wear! I got many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was not able to wear a bra with this item as the top was a little small but I didn't mind! I paired the jumpsuit with a denim jacket as well. Cute!

I love the style but this definitely runs small, I could barely zip. The color looks better in pictures too. I didn't love the brown in real life. I wore it out for a bit but was undecided if I liked it.

I enjoyed the fit of this jumpsuit, I'm usually between a S & M and M was perfect. Adjustable straps in back and can redo the front knot as needed. What kept me from loving it was the color - I was expecting brighter gold (I rented before there were pics from real people) and it's MUCH darker in person. Almost a muddy yellow and overall not that beautiful. I still wore a couple times because I liked the fit, but renters beware of the actual color.

I wore this for a day tour in Napa and it worked lovely with a jean jacket over it. The only downsides were that it doesn't have much give on the waistline (at all), it was a bit long on my frame, and unfortunately the top hook for the zipper was missing. I sized up based on the waistline but I didn't care because it fit lovely when I sized up and was light linen material.

links_reviews_title: So awesome! Only a little short in the torso.
links_reviews_text: Would absolutely love to own this. Got loads of compliments in this outfit. It fit very nicely. Was only a little short in the torso area but I also have a long torso.

I absolutely adored this jumpsuit! It's so flattering and cute. Perfect for a vacation or spring/summer outfit. The dress is great for bustier gals - I wore it without a bra and it held everything in place. It's also great for Pettit ladies, it wasn't too long for me and I'm pretty small! Would definitely rent again!
True to fit. I'm tall and sometimes rompers don't fit me in the midsection but this one was perfect.

links_reviews_title: One + Done! Easy to throw on for a complete look that's effortless. Loved this jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect, cut-out was fun and not too revealing. Definitely recommend!
it was way too small

This is such a cute jumpsuit for vacation. Believe the reviews - size up. I normally wear a medium but went with the large. It was still snug around my bum and I had a little trouble zippping up still. I would have double sized up for a more flowy fit if I could have. Overall really cute, flirty and perfect for warm weather.
I didn't end up wearing this because it was too tight through the thighs and not long enough in the torso.

Very cute jumpsuit with a flattering fit. Adjustable straps make it easy to get just right. I got lots of compliments. It was comfortable for all day. The color looked mustard-yellow to me in the photo but is actually more brown/beige. It's a warm color and is probably flattering on a range of skin tones.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. It was too small.

links_reviews_text: Great comfortable fabric + !pockets! Wore it to an outdoor summer party
Could zip, but so tight that the little cut out had my skin protruding out of it and was so not flattering that I couldn't wear it:(
The jumper was cute but pretty tight across the chest. The color was less vibrant as in the pictures but still nice!
It ran very small-- in both the torso and chest area. I was unable to zip it up even after adjusting the straps.

I read the reviews on how this jumpsuit runs small, but went for it anyway. And Wow, it really does run small:) I rented my usual XS and got the Small for back up. I couldn't pull the xs up my legs and while I was able to get the small on, it was obscene in the crotch area. So this was not a winner. That being said, it's still so cute! I thought it would be more of a mustard color, but ran more brown. The design and fabric are great, just runs so small. I might have been able to get a medium to work, but the torso seemed to be cut short overall.

Despite adjustable straps this piece isn't great for long waisted ladies like myself - it's a common problem with jumpsuits unfortunately. Additionally the waist is really small - could barely zip it up. Cute overall and good fabric just runs smaller.

links_reviews_title: cheap quality and runs like a junior sized item.
links_reviews_text: runs super small and petite.
I have a long torso, so I couldn't get the straps up without it pulling. Not as flowy as in the image

I'm usually a small but this fit better on me in the MR. Super cute and flattering, the fabric was nice and comfortable. Wore a strapless bra but could have gotten away with a nude bra probably. Wore this to work and got so many compliments! The cutout is cute but not too much.
Couldn't zip - fabric and cut were beautiful - so bummed! Had to send back without wearing
Runs very small in the waist/torso. I wasn't able to wear it as I could barely zip it up and it was pretty uncomfortable.
I loved this!! The color feels a little different in person, a little less yellow and a little more brown but it's still really cute

links_reviews_title: Runs small, which is surprisingly for this brand.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this to a brunch on Saturday with coworkers but I couldn't get it to zip all the way up unfortunately. I was surprised because I own a lot of Astr in a size XS or S. So this style definitely runs smaller than usual for this brand I would say! The material is also a bit heavier and thicker than I had anticipated.
Loved it
It’s similar to a flannel material and very warm. There’s a full body liner on the inside, which made the jumpsuit feel bulky.

links_reviews_title: These are just amazing. Statement and lightweight. Goes with so many things!!!
links_reviews_text: These are just the best. Love the statement of these earrings and they are lightweight and totally wearable. Rent these for sure !
Soft and comfy sweater! Warm enough to wear without any coat over.

I wanted to like this sweater more than I did. It's nice and thick and very warm. It's a bit boxy though. The fabric of the sweater has long hairs so it starts looking worn quickly. It was fine to wear once, but nothing too special.
Surprised by this sweater. Adorable, fairly thick and warm; however, extremely soft and easy to wear.

I wore this to work with a skirt and tights. I wanted to try pattern mixing; I think (?) it worked. I also wore it a bunch of times with the Trave black jeans too and it looked great, hit at just the right point on the hip.
This sweater feels great and can be dressed up with slacks/boots or worn casually with jeans. I don’t want to take it off.
Sweater is a bit boxy/bubble shape but on the shorter side so I liked it. Was not scratchy at all.
If your are warm blooded like me, you will feel hot in this sweater. It's super cozy and thick. I loved the look, but I got hot so fast.

This sweater fit like a true medium, not too tight and small and definitely not oversized. Very soft and pretty thick as well, wind wasn't blowing right through it which was so nice. Will def rent again and highly recommend for a fun pop of color this winter.

I LOVE this sweater. I wore with high waisted jeans and it was perfect. The best print, pop of color for work or even a weekend running around. Very soft and warm for winter weather! For more work week looks follow me on Instagram at @renttherunway_teacher
Fun print to keep you warm! Good length, not crop or too long. Very comfy. I ordered medium to size up...I like my sweaters loose fitting. Good for work or going out
So comfy and so many compliments. Will more than likely be purchasing. Arrived brand new with tags.

This sweater should be rented for very cold weather. It is extremely thick and warm. A small was a little too small for me in the arms and length. I would suggest sizing up, as the tightness is just too much for such a thick, heavy sweater.

I am someone who is always cold and even this sweater was too warm for me, especially indoors. The neckline felt too high to me as well. I loved the hot pink, but would only rent to wear agin if it was frigid outside!
Great, warm sweater with the right amount of bright for those of us who like to wear a lot of black. Will rent again.
very warm, slightly cropped. I loved that the bright pink design gave a nod to the animal print trend while also looking like hearts.
This was a cute sweater, comfortable and cropped on my 5'3 frame, hitting my just above the waist. It was a bit tight in the arms but overall it worked :)
Much softer than I was expecting! The perfect level of fitted and cropped.
Wore it a couple times, very cute sweater

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater for a casual workday or brunch
links_reviews_text: The quality of the sweater was lovely, and the fit was comfortable and flattering. I'm petite, but the sweater hit right at my hip bone, and looked great. Love the pop of pink!

links_reviews_title: DO NOT WANT TO GIVE THIS UP
links_reviews_text: loved everything about it! the cut the comfort the warmth and the overall look

links_reviews_title: Adorable casual sweater, but slightly itchy
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater and thought it was such a fun alternative and pop of color for the season. The XS fit great, was shapely but not tight, and I am a 34C and size 4 - for this reason I said runs large. At this fit, It's cropped but doesn't show belly. There's nothing wrong with this sweater - exactly as pictured. I dingged it 1-star bc my fiancé said it was the itchiest thing in the world lol I didn't find it to be too bad, but my arms did get a little itchy after a while
I love cropped sweaters but not TOO cropped. I don't need belly showing. This was a great length. This sweater is super cute with black jeans. Nice and thick, super warm. Will rent again for sure.
Very comfortable
Just okay for me! Fits TTS and the zipper in the front is fun. Very very light denim so could be good for the warmer months.
Wore with tights, booties and a fur coat to an art show. Fitted, has pockets. I usually wear a 2.
Form fitting denim dress makes for the perfect date night outfit. I wore this like 7 times. I would've bought it if it wasn't so expensive! Will def tent again
Obsessed with this dress! So much fun to wear, I wore it to work and to a basketball game. Lots of compliments. Super soft denim, stretchy, but doesn't get wrinkled. Winner!
Absolutely love this. Well-made. Nice thickness to the denim. Great detail in the zipper and the hardware highlights. Perfect length. Absolutely recommend to transition into fall.
Dress was easy to wear. Loved the inside pockets. Was a bit tight around the bust area but a bit loose elsewhere. Versatile dress. Ended up wearing more than I had anticipated.

links_reviews_title: So cute but just not made for me
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a straighter figure. Didn't work for my body type with hips.
It was too tight across my bust- a full 38C
Really nice dress. Wore it to dinner out with my friends. Got a lot of compliments. Will rent again
Great for a date night or drinks with friends
It is a bit tight on the chest but a little looser at the hips on me. I did like this and ended up wearing it on a cold day with tights and boots and liked the look.

links_reviews_title: Thin denim, fit like a glove! True to size.
links_reviews_text: I'm still contemplating buying this one - so wearable, long enough for the office, tight enough for a date!

links_reviews_title: Love love love this fun take on a denim dress
links_reviews_text: This dress has a great shape and some slightly western feeling details. I got endless complements on it and didn't want to send it back!
Fit good. I am just a little wide in shoulders so a little tight., but I loved it!
I rented this for an interview I had and it fit perfect. It can go with so many things, but I kept it simple for the interview.
A nice change from wearing a suit. Pop of color and fits true to size
Linen/tweed material? (What do I know?!?). But it's soft and has a nice fit (more fitted than oversized). Great blazer/light jacket.
Love this colorful jacket. A tad itchy tho

I've been waiting for the temps to drop to rent this! The pattern and colors remind me of textiles you'd see in central & South America, but the jacket has a classic/professional structure. It was fun to wear something different that reminded me of my travels, but still feel put together and professional. It fits TTS and actually has more give in the arms than I expected. The material is not soft, but also not itchy.

links_reviews_title: Great color but was a little big
links_reviews_text: Was a little big overall but I still wore it and got lots of compliments. Color is great. Was perfect for slightly cooler weather.

links_reviews_title: Work, date and easter pic perfect
links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets
Fit well great details feels expensive

links_reviews_title: Nice with jeans to dress up a casual Friday
links_reviews_text: Wore this with jeans and a white top to dress up my casual Friday look. Cute, comfortable, nicely fit/true to size, and a nice weight for a cool spring day. The pattern wasn't my favorite ever so I probably wouldn't rent again, but it was a nice piece overall.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable jacket that's a WOW!
links_reviews_text: I wore this over black dress for a business meeting and then paired it with jeans and heels for the work dinner at night! Very comfortable and I got lots of compliments
Love the bright pop of color. Jacket was comfortable and chic.
Fits great I love everything about it
This is stunning in person! The sleeves are a little snug. I wish it closed at the top, but it's definitely a "look" and worked well with a little black dress, pearls, and red lips!
Very nice quality fabric and nice pop of color.

links_reviews_title: Did not like the colors/pattern in person
links_reviews_text: Jacket runs a little small-consider sizing up. I have tiny arms, and the jacket was very tight at the wrists.
Love IRO! No lining to the jacket, FYI

I loved this jacket. I felt really grown up and confident. Only issue is that the fit is a bit oversized. I would have preferred it to be a bit shorter. I'm only 5'3" but I have a long torso and short legs. It hit me at the hips. Because of the length, I think it would have looked better with pants, but I don't like how my legs look in pants, so I wore a dress anyway!
Fabric is high quality. I don't wear a lot of red and I received lots of compliments on this jacket.

This jacket felt good; great texture. Shoulder pads a bit strange, poking up. With the color I felt a bit like a red and white peppermint candy. Fun to wear for one day. If it were available in different color I would get again. Liked the sleeve cuff detail trim, and the back yoke.
Wonderful colors and nice cut; runs a bit small, but nice jacket overall.
Wore this a few times - once with jeans and a black tee, and once to the office. Great cut and fit, I was tempted to buy it!
nice fit, material is odd, heavy but thin. colors are dull.
The fabric and print are like wearing an ethnic blanket as a jacket. Awful. Did not wear it.
It's a heavy fabric, so would be good for Fall. Shoulder pads make the shoulders a bit severe, but overall really liked this piece.
Felt very Chanel-esque in this jacket. Wore it to happy hour out and received a few compliments. Wore with a black tee and Levi's and it was great! I would rent again

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a conference and for work.
links_reviews_text: This jacket has a great fit and style. It can be dressed up for work or down for a casual dinner. Highly recommend.
This is a great fitting and flattering jacket. I wore several times and received many compliments. Will likely rent again.
I wanted to like this but it was just too big and baggy. Might consider a smaller size for fall.
Wore this several times, got lots of compliments. Great with jeans and a black tee.

links_reviews_title: Work is pretty forgettable, but at least I looked good.
links_reviews_text: The jacket was a tad tight in the arms, but otherwise perfect for work.
fun jacket - arms a little tight. lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: felt a little more dressed up on jean day at work
links_reviews_text: Nice fit, well made. Looked good with jeans.
didn't wear it. it has weird shoulder pads
Wore it to work and then an event after. Perfect.
Fit nicely I received many compliments

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket! Perfect for work.
links_reviews_text: Love love love this. Very striking red. Lots of compliments. Even has usable pockets. I'd buy if it weren't so expensive. As it is I've held onto it for a month and worn it a ton.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket - can be dressed up or dressed down.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Good for most seasons except it would be too heavy for summer. The jacket has small shoulder pads which provide structure but aren't too much.

links_reviews_title: Such a sleek yet fun blazer
links_reviews_text: The fit is snug, but structured. There a baby shoulder pads which made me feel trendy and professional!

This easy to wear closet staple fit true to size and was super comfy. I often find exaggerated arms a bit hit or miss (with some making me look like a line backer- and not a fashionable one) but there were great (probably because they start below the shoulder. Super cute- excited to rent again to try with other bottoms :)

I really like the thick cozy rib of this sweater - but it was just too large on me to wear. I know it's supposed to be a loose fit but because it's such a bulky fiber, it doesn't relax its shape like other oversized sweaters. If I could size down to an XS I would try it because it seems like a good alternative to a basic black knit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! I am totally on love with this!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very comfortable got tons of compliments wore wit firey red lip. So cute

links_reviews_title: Super stylish sweater for every day. From a topper for jeans or a knit maxi skirt.
links_reviews_text: perfect fit, heavy knit & very stylish. I would buy this were it not soo expensive!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this sweater as it did not fit
links_reviews_text: This sweater was huge at the top and fell off at the shoulders

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the look I wanted for my big day. I love RTR for its quick and dependable deliveries.
links_reviews_text: The medium was good, the large was better. In 5'8" slightly muscular, but also weigh roughly 205.
Fit perfectly. Looked like a Roman angel in Rome frolicking around in this airy comfortable dress

links_reviews_title: Easy breezy dress for weekend wear
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and cute. Label kept flipping out the back of the dress which was annoying. I'd just cut it out if I owned it...but of course cannot do that for an RtR dress!
Such a flattering fit. Loose skirt makes it perfect for events and you can wear it casually with sandals or dress it up with heels. Three length options on straps awesome for customizable fit on top.
I am in LOVE with this dress. Ran true to size and was perfect for a light weight vacation dress.

Very flattering and versatile dress. Wore it around the city all day and to an outdoor concert that night - received a ton of compliments. I have a somewhat small/average build with a large bust, so I loved how the material was super stretchy in that particular area.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering for everyday or a party..
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable, flattering and perfect for the start of summer. I got a million compliments as I wore it to run errands around town but it would be a great dress for a barbecue or picnic. I absolutely love it! The straps are adjustable (with buttons) but I didn't have to adjust.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a dinner while on vacation. Dress was perfect, casual but still cute
links_reviews_text: Incredibly comfortable and easy to wear!
Cute and comfortable. I wore this to a casual bbq party. I liked the detailed embroidery.

links_reviews_title: Cute, cool and comfortable for a warm, summer day
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, is very comfortable and a great length for petite frame. Received lots of compliments.
Wore this dress for a weekend in the Hamptons. It was very comfortable because of the stretchy top and adjustable straps. The little flower detail made it more than just a simple white dress!

links_reviews_title: So fresh, light and comfortable making it perfect for a summery dress!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a well worn item but it's lovely and wish it was something I always had in my closet

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress, so flattering! Wore it to a vineyard in the Hamptons and was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I"m 5'4", 140 lbs, 36C, and wore size 2R, which fit nicely. The smocking was still nice and fitted on the top, so going any smaller may have looked like I was squeezed in. Not too much fabric on the bottom, double lined, and pretty flower detailing. Needs a long necklace- I paired with a white tassel necklace and was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress for traveling around Europe in the summer! Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Good lose and comfortable fit and flattering shape

Great lightweight white dress for summer! Smocking on the top made for an easy fit, and the straps have two button holes for adjusting. I kept them on the shorter hole and had no issues with straps falling down! The skirt part of the dress has a yellow floral ribbon and a lace ribbon detail which made the dress look more interesting. Perfect alone or with a denim jacket.
Rented this for a day dress to wear in Hawaii. Was comfortable but wasn't flattering at all. It stayed home and I won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress!! Super comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: Great fit
I'm 5'7" and it hit me right in the middle of the calf. Perfect with some brown wedges and a denim jacket in the spring time and thick enough that I didn't even need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Wore it more than once on vacation and when I came back home. Easy wear to a restaurant or a beach!
links_reviews_text: Loved it and if it didn't have the shoulder straps would have been better. They kept falling done and I had to keep readjusting them. Finally, I used some scotch tape and hid them...strapless instantly.
Nothing too exciting, for as expected and good for casual day
I let my size zero friend where it. Too small up top for me and it runs small. It is a beautiful dress.
Perfect white dress for dressing up or dressing down. Loved wearing it during the day with a jean jacket.
I'm 5'2'', this dress went to my ankles and looked wild. I could not wear.

links_reviews_title: Lots of complements on the color and style

links_reviews_text: Rented for my company v-day party and got so many compliments! These are all classic made well cut and great for pear shaped bottoms.
These pants are so cute! Great cropped length and a perfect fit!

These are terrific pants, more versatile than I expected. The pic was taken at the end of the day and they were stretched out in a way I didn't like, so they went back after 1 wear. Next time, will order a size down and hopefully get a few wears out of them.
Super cute and fun to wear. Very comfortable. Ended up wearing a bunch of times. I am 27 in Madewell jeans, so these didn't seem like they ran big like other reviews said.
Great for my football season, great fit, cute.
So comfortable and fun. Regret wearing with a crop top because they're a little unflattering if you've got a small belly, but great otherwise.
These were great for my shape and made a statement! The only downside is that they do stretch out and felt a little too roomy by the end of the day.
No stretch to the fabric but they were still comfortable due to the excellent cut.
Fit a little loose through the waist, but overall fun and flattering pants!

I was walking down the street wearing these with a black t, and a man stopped me to say, "nice pants, bold move!" I find they run TTS if not a teeny bit larger fit in my normal madewell Jean size. Fun to rent because I don't think I'd wear them much if I owned them.

links_reviews_title: My first wife legged pants and I loved them
links_reviews_text: Chic and comfy!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! so cute I made Getty Images
links_reviews_text: very flattering

links_reviews_title: Super cute and wore them in the winter vs summer. Added calf boots and made for a fantastic outfit.
links_reviews_text: high waisted and it fit perfectly snug. If you have a bigger bootie, these may not be the right fit for you. Length was perfect to wear with sandals or boots.

links_reviews_title: Nice color and length but tight
links_reviews_text: This pant was the perfect cropped length but I had two issues with it. 1 It was tight around the thigh/hip area. Maybe if I had sized up that could've been solved but 2 it was very WRINKLED, which seemed ridiculous for pants that seemed like basically jeans. I refuse to iron my jeans. It was a shame though because I loved the color. I wore it once for work with a long white button down to cover up the unflattering hip area but that's it.
Great pant with a fun color. Fit really well and did not stretch throughout the day. They are Jean but felt nice enough for work with a blouse. Would rent again.
Runs a bit large but I love comfort. The color is so fun. I wore this 4 times. I'm short so it was a bit too long but still cute with high wedges.
These pants are great. I wore them to work, dressed them up for a party, and also wore them casual. They are flattering and fun.
Tight in the hips.

links_reviews_title: Awesome color, flattering cut. R length might be too long if you're under 5'3 & want a cropped look
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, super high-rise and heavy, duck canvas fabric. I'm generally too short for regular length pants, so I knew they wouldn't hit *above* the ankle as shown in the model's photo. The regulars were about ankle length on me (I'm 5'3" with a 28" inseam). Wore to the office on casual Friday and it was a nice change from my usual skinny jeans.
Too tight, I was unable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Luvd these. Great color. For well.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for 125 5'8 slender with a little hips

links_reviews_title: Was too big for me so I never wore
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size but just too big for me
High waisted, great color, great fit, super comfortable. The length is perfect- mid calf with flats. This is true love. A total home run.

Pretty cute...true to size. I am 5'7, 140lbs, athletic built, wore a size 28. Although they were super cute, I didn't have an opportunity to wear for a significant amount of time so I am not sure of the stretch factor of these throughout day. They are a weaved jean material with a smidge of stretch (2% elastane). The color is a bit more muted than the picture but overall, I enjoyed them.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, awesome casual summer pant to change things up.
links_reviews_text: Awesome fit - loved the structure of the fabric.
These were pretty cute, a nice alternative to plain jeans. I don't usually wear such a high waist, so that took some getting used to, and I dont think its particularly flattering over a mom gut!
super comfy and perfect fit
I feel like the legs were a lot wider than they are in the picture. They are comfortable but they are not great for people who are only 5'2.

links_reviews_title: Great color pop, comfy, but runs large
links_reviews_text: Great color. Got tons of compliments. I'd get a size smaller. There's a lot of stretch and these were falling off by the end of the day.

links_reviews_title: Received these brand new- still had the tag on
links_reviews_text: I really like these and am holding on to them so I can wear a few times. I would definitely size down!! One maybe even two sizes.
Love these! Wore with gray T-shirt but could actually be styled a lot of ways. Fit true to size and could see getting a little loose in the waist by the end of the day. Pop of color and energy.

links_reviews_title: My husband said these looked like JNCOs
links_reviews_text: But I loved them.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and fun to wear
links_reviews_text: Enjoyable, comfortable and very cool daytime look.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with these jeans! Very flattering!
links_reviews_text: These jeans were very cute to wear with a white T-shirt and strappy heels. Madewell jeans run large so while I'm usually a 28, I wore a 27 and could have even sized down to a 26. I'll rent these again and try the pink ones!

I work in an attic inside a warehouse. Super glamorous, I know. And it's ridiculously cold! I have rented my fair share of sweaters and this one was a favorite. The diagonal stripes were flattering and the turtleneck was soft against my neck, not itchy like some are. I'll be renting this again!

Fun sweater turtleneck. Some reviews say heavy and some say light. I would say it looks heavier than what it really is. Great turtleneck fit which is a big deal to me. I prefer a snug fit. Cute design for everyday wear. Nothing really fancy but looked great w/ blue RTR coat! Nice arm & body length as well.

links_reviews_title: I am wearing this as i type
links_reviews_text: Perfect sweater for a winter day. I put it on to try an hour ago and i am still wearing it. It is so soft, cozy and warm. Love it. I think the size M is a bit large on me, The fabric has seen better days. The sweater has started to peel a little. Still, i am going to keep this number for a while.
Perfect winter sweater with a bright color and great pattern. fits true to size, arms were nice and long and the turtle neck was nice and big. great sweater!

This was a very warm sweater yet surprisingly lightweight. I loved the asymmetry in the print across the front. A little piling developing from use but does not really take away from charm of sweater. 82% wool so a little itchy around the neck. Runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to Sundance and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy. Not scratchy. Great color
This is a great sweater for everyday wear during the winter months. It is true to size and very soft. I would definitely rent this one again.
Loved this sweater, cute design and very cozy. It fits true to size. I'm in between and XS and S, I rented the S but probably could have fit in the XS. Would rent again!
Loved the color and design of this sweater. The fabric was a bit pilled. Super cozy and warm. Best for wearing to an outdoor event.
Warm and comfy. Not itchy. It def shows signs of being worn a lot and that's the only reason why I didn't buy it from RTR. Would rent again!
Loved this - already renting it for a second time. So soft and cozy but loved how bright it was - perfect for a Carolina game day!
Soft true to size. Cute pattern. Good with jeans, leggings, dress pants. Will rent again!
It's a cozy thick sweater. Not very slimming but obviously because of the material. Well made and high quality.
This is a chunky knit which I found very warm. The diagonal design is an interesting modern take on the traditional Fairisle - but I didn't find it flattering on me.
This is warm and cozy. I liked it more and more the longer I wore it. I wore it to dinner, to a brewery, and out with the family for a pumpkin patch visit and hay rack ride. All good!
I got compliments when I wore it, but it was so big and hot that I only wore it once. I felt lumpy in it.
I received so many compliments! And I bought it!
This thick sweater was very warm for layering in below freezing weather. Also cute and comfortable. Soft, but a bit itchy. That really didn't bother me since I had on so many layers.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy sweater for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: The sweater didn’t initially feel as soft as I had thought, it was a pretty rough knit. But once you wear it, it’s very comfortable. Sometimes wool sweaters itch when I wear them, but this one was fine. The sweater runs a little large, you could probably size down if you like a snug fit. Being a little oversized worked perfectly for the comfy feeling I was going for though. The sweater is also very warm. I wore it outside at nearly freezing temperatures during the day and didn’t really need a coat. I received many compliments on the sweater.
This sweater was very cozy and warm - definitely a snow day / ski sweater.
Love this thick sweater and the colors. Wore on a trip to DC. Did not need a coat, as it was warm enough. Lots of compliments. Want to own!
I've worn this to the office a few times, and every time, I love wearing it. It is so cozy and warm in a chilly office. It's also very flattering and perfect for winter.
Loved it! Was warm and cozy. Looked like I was headed for the slopes. Runs a touch big.
Very soft and comfy. Neck was just too hot for me.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is so cozy and cute.
links_reviews_text: It is fairly bulky/oversized, so I wore it with leggings or skinny jeans. I got so many compliments. It was nice and warm.

The sweater was definitely well worn. It looks as though people have enjoyed wearing it.. however it was so well worn that it was too used for me to wear. It was disappointing because I'm sure it was a beautiful sweater at one point.
Great fit :) Not super soft, but not scratchy like wool either. Lots of compliments & really warm!
Absolutely LOVED this cozy sweater! I ordered a Large because I like sweaters to be a bit big and comfy. Tons of compliments on it.
This was much thicker than I thought. It's long enough to wear with leggings but it was much to heavy for fall.
Very warm and cozy
Exactly as I expected. Comfy, warm and paired with all my standard work outfits. Got lots of compliments on it too! Definitely considered buying it.
Highly recommend. True to size. I almost bought this but might wait for the price to go down! Love love love!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, warm, and extremely versatile
links_reviews_text: This jacket kept me warm even even in New England winter, but also looked casual enough where I could wear it inside without looking like I was walking around in a winter coat. Super comfortable and definitely recommend

This shirt jacket is my current obsession. I'm wearing it with everything and will probably buy it to be buried in. Runs large, oversized but in a thoughtful cut. Actually super warm and has good pockets.

Wore this coat to a tailgate and football game and got lots of compliments. I sized up because I wanted to wear a chunky sweater under, but the coat is definitely big enough for you to layer without sizing up. Love this coat because it's a really casual cut (kind of like a big, men's shirt) but it's lined and warm like a standard wool coat.

links_reviews_title: Heavy for a layer but super cute fall/spring jacket!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this jacket but would definitely call it that. It would be great for going out in the winter when it's too chilly to take your jacket off but you don't want to be in a puffy all night. It runs really large so definitely size down. I'm considering buying it!
Loved the look and feel of this coat, but it was EXTREMELY large! I would recommend sizing down one or two sizes!

links_reviews_title: I don't want to give it back
links_reviews_text: I've had this for over two weeks and am loving it. Have received many compliments. It's a decently weighted jacket but oversized so can easily layer under it. Once it gets colder I'll most likely be trading it in for something a little longer.

The jacket is super warm. (Not pictured) There are little slits on the side of the jacket that look like pockets but there aren't any? i thought it might just be the stitching that would need to be cut but it's not! it's really no big deal but i wish i has something to rest my hands in. it runs pretty big. i would of chosen an XXS if there was an option. size down! maybe double down! i really loved wearing it though!
The XS fit nice and snug, was long enough to wear to work. If there weren't so many other options to rent I'd get this one again.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting, runs small. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress overall but definitely runs very small
Rented this for my first day of work! The cut fit well for overall body shape and the length was perfect. The arms did dig in a little bit though! Other than that, really liked it!

I loved this dress! Got so many compliments on it at work when people never comment on my outfits! It fits like a glove and shows off my curves in a professionally cute way! I did have to squeeze into it a little bit as I have more hips and butt than I would like but once I was in it I was able to sit down, stand up and move freely even without fear of tearing it. I think I might keep this dress for a few more weeks or rent it more than once because it can be work or casual, dressed up or down!
Hard to zip up without help, but the dress overall was comfy and flattering.

Great dress for work, holiday party, and date night. Form fitting silhouette is flattering without being too tight. Lots of compliments on the red plaid print. Fits TTS, maybe a little small. Length was just right for work in a more formal office.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and festive but not the best fit
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this to my company holiday party. It was festive and cute but had some pleats on the back that were too high for my stature. I think this would fit better on a shorter person.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, thin material but cute dress
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I rented a medium even though I usually wear either a small or medium and I still had trouble zipping the dress up. The material is also a lot thinner than I expected. However , I rented this dress for my company's holiday party and it was definitely cute and appropriate for the occasion.
Depending on your shoes/accessories, this dress can go either professional or casual. It was really comfortable and a super cute December work dress.
This is perfect for winter or fall. Runs a bit small. I'm a size 8, and the medium was tight.
This dress fit like a glove! It hugged every curve yet so comfortable to wear! Received many compliments! Loved it so much I bought it!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but a little small on me
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress was a little small. Too small on the shoulders, snug around the bust, little tight round the hips. The fabric is stretchy, so that helps. The dress is not lined. I wore it with shaping sheers underneath and it was cute. A larger size would have been more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Looked great with a cropped black blazer! But pretty tight!
Worn for work, tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Almost perfect, the waist was a little high for me but I wore it at least 3-4 times with compliments each time.
I typically wear a small but chose M and glad I did. Paired with black belted blazer from RTR, black tights and black pumps. Received several compliments on the classic look.

This dress runs tight so if you would rather some room in the dress, size up. I wore it with some black Spanx tights and tall black boots and thought it worked well for a day in the office. I really loved this dress and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: This was my "back up dress" if the other one didn't work . It was very small for its size. I typically wear an 8 in Draper James, J Crew, etc. This is a dress for less curvy girls. I had to wear a sports bra and Spanks to zip it.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn this
links_reviews_text: Runs very small. No size change sent.
Fit perfect! Great for a work event.

links_reviews_title: Liked the dress, but it's way too small. Order up and you should be fine
links_reviews_text: It's a relatively thin material, but the pattern is very cute. I am usually a S but I am sizing up

I absolutely love this dress and maybe could have gotten away with it - if I wore a long cardigan to hide how tight it was. I typically wear a 10, but the large was snug all over - especially in the shoulders. The color is so flattering and the cut is incredible. If you're larger than an 8, you'll have trouble in this dress, but it's very flattering if it fits.
Too tight for my post holiday body. I need to lay off the carbs for a while and try again or accept that I need a larger size. So cute though. I will definitely give it another shot
A belt and/or a cardigan really add flair to this simple Christmas dress. The material has a slight stretch. I bought this one!
Perhaps a bit too form fitting for work, and fabric is a lot thinner than expected.
Nice dress, thin material but the style was very flattering
Hugs your curves. Added a belt and looked great for the office.

I fluctuate between a small and medium fit because of my chest size. Unfortunately, the chest was two small and the pattern made this much more noticeable. If you are deciding between sizes, go up. I was also disappointed in the material, it was much flimsier than I expected. If you are thinking of wearing this in colder temperatures, you will need tights and something like a blazer or sweater over the top.
Perfect fit, comfortable, good length, easy zipper, plaids are totally in and compliments the beginning of holiday time!
It was a cute print but the style was odd in the middle- it bunches up and didn't lay right and felt it made my hips look larger than they are. It was true to size but just overall kind of strange.

links_reviews_title: Great for work and going out
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Super flattering and comfortable at the same time.
Loved wearing this!! Lots of compliments and full of character. Very comfortable and flattering. Also, perfect length too - no too short or too long!

I loved this dress! The material is incredible and it's so comfortable. Modest but trendy and cute. Perfect for a family party or a work happy hour. I do think it runs true to size. RTR recommended I get a large even though I'm usually a medium and the medium would have definitely fit me better.
Loved this dress and got a ton of compliments on it! it is so flattering and comfortable. Material is multi-seasonal- you could just as easily wear strapped sandals as you could boots.
Absolutely adorable. Runs a little large, my waist was swimming so I could have gone with a L. Oh well, still looked great, got lots of compliments!
Dress is comfortable and super flattering! The style is very different but give it a chance! Got a million compliments.
I cannot fault this dress. Perfect for a bigger chested lady like myself. The print was Strangely flattering over my bloated belly. I would rent this again.
Arms run small if you don't like having a dress tight on your arms. Otherwise it's amazing.

links_reviews_title: fit in waist, huge on top
links_reviews_text: The waist fit but the top was huge and voluminous. The collar kept falling down my back back so the neckline being low was not an issue as it was pulling back the whole time, which was uncomfortable and looked ridiculous. Did not wear.

Unique fit that made this standard animal print dress much more interesting! Tons of compliments, even though I was a bit self conscious about the fit and style. Super cute on and very well made. Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it it didn't fit

links_reviews_text: Great animal print dress that can be dressed up or worn casually. There is a hint of pink in the print, which makes it interesting

Wanted to keep this gorgeous dress! Fit amazingly, looked cute with a belt or without, got so many compliments! I wore it 3-4 times while I had it, to work, date night, drinks with friends- so versatile! The only reason I didn't keep is the pattern is very distinctive and noticeable. Loved!!
I absolutely loved the pattern of this dress and received so many compliments on it overall. I paired it with black tights and black booties for a winter work-appropriate style.

I really wanted to like this dress, but it just wasn't flattering on my body. It has a weird drop waist thing that accentuated all the wrong parts. I'm pretty pair-shaped, so if that sounds like you, you may want to consider sizing up.

I had my eye in this dress for a while and was super excited that I had the chance to finally rent it - it did not disappoint! It fit beautifully and was very comfortable. I liked it styled with a black belt. Would definitely rent again (or buy!).

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a day out
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a birthday party. Fun and comfy

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern and would look great with a belt but the overall fit is not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Wouldn't recommend.

After the waist , the top of the skirt is pretty fitted with no stretch, it doesn't not completely flow out. I'm usually small but this felt a little snug for me. The top however fit perfectly so it seems like measurements are a bit off. Material was not silk but thicker, so it was perfect for a fall day.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an important dr appt and then mom’s night out at an elegant hotel restaurant.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fabric and drape. The other moms loved it. I have heavy legs and this skirt gave me plenty of room.
I liked this, I just live in chicago and it got too cold for me to wear it.
Very flattering - hugs around the hips but flows on top

links_reviews_title: My new favorite color is raisin
links_reviews_text: This may be a keeper! The cropped, close knit fit make this an ideal replacement for a blazer. I was able to wear with so many different things which surprised me. The leather is super soft, beautiful quilted and zipper details. Compliments didn't stop.

links_reviews_title: High Quality, Soft, Plum Leather Jacket
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this bad-ass, buttery soft, eggplant/plum colored leather jacket. The leather is lightweight so best worn in Spring or early Fall. The super cropped fit is perfect for petites. Leather quality was on point. Looks great dressed up or down. Paired here with a RTR knit dress from Nanushka. Didn’t want to return, will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: So soft and comfortable in all weathers from chicago winter to Thailand summer
Jacket is a cool look for both work and a night out!
links_reviews_text: Wore it with jeans - and in one look had a longer sweater underneath, and with the other just had a blouse! Looked great with both.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday, work, and out at night!
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket. The color is great because it goes with so much! The lining inside the sleeves is a little long and wants to peek out of the bottom but other than that this jacket is a love!
I love this jacket, great color, a little bad-ass, but still polished. Only downside is that it is very cropped, so for me it only worked with a couple of looks, higher wasted pants and dress.
Paired with skirt and it just made the Look!
Loved wearing this. I wore it four times and didn't want to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Just the edge I was looking for!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is extremely cropped and probably wouldn't be my favorite under normal circumstances, but it was just the edge this skirt (Delfi Collective Lauren Skirt) needed. Got tons of compliments on the outfit all evening!

links_reviews_title: Amazing find but right in the arms.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a concert bc I wanted to be edgy and I definitely feel like I rocked the look. I have fat girl arms, so it was a little tight. Loved it though and gave me the look I wanted!
True to size, adds a nice edge to any fall outfit. Not really warm so plan accordingly depending on time of year.

This is a great jacket in a beautiful plum-purple, perfect for autumn. I found the cut to be a little shorter than most leather jackets but not really an issue with high waisted jeans. I wore it over a sweatshirt one night and it was a little bit snug but overall good fit. Looking forward to renting it in black!

I found this to be too cropped for my height but I'm pretty tall (5-9). The overall look is too boxy for my taste given my curvy figure. The leather was nice and I liked the color a lot. The hardware was ok but made noise when walking. I did not wear this for my weekend plans as I had intended.

This was definitely a statement piece. The leather is super soft and the color is a beautiful deep burgundy that goes with everything and is perfect for Fall. I do wish it were a little longer as it's kind of an awkward length. My boyfriend asked me where the other half of my jacket was. Do with that what you will!
The color is a true purple, I thought it was more reddish purple. Fits well and sleeves are actually long enough for me!
The color is fantastic and the fit is true to size.. I wore the medium and was still able to wear a sweater underneath. I was seriously considering buying it- I loved it that much!

The color is beautiful but the fit is off. It doesn't taper at the waste even when zipped so it's boxy. I usually wear a small or xs. This was a small and it was just a bit too short at the waist as well. Maybe a medium would be better? But it was just very boxy and not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Not possible to love a jacket more
links_reviews_text: Second time renting this and I'm wearing it daily for "Spring" in SF. Cozy, fierce, and "neutral" without being boring. Looks great dressed up or down.
I loved this jacket. Wish i kept it for over a month and wore it constantly. I got so many compliments. Only returning it cause it's getting to warm out

links_reviews_title: Great color and design, but too tight in arms to wear for any meaningful amount of time.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and detailing on the jacket, but the fit wasn't great on me. It was a teeny bit too cropped for my long torso, although I could have made that work. The reason I ended up not wearing it was the arms/shoulders were too tight. I'd say my shoulders and arms are on the broader side so I wasn't completely surprised given the material. Oh well, on to the next!

The leather and detail on this jacket make it a show stopper. The color is plum and it coordinated well with several outfits. The hem sits at the waist. I'm short so the sleeve was a bit long but it didn't bother me. It was perfect for a day of travel. It's not too heavy but kept me warm in Canada!

This jacket was a great addition to my travel wardrobe, as it was versatile, unique and chic! The color is a muted plum so works with more outfits than I originally planned- highly recommend if you are petite and looking for a great, fitted leather jacket!
This jacket is amazing. It's buttery soft, so comfortable, and such a gorgeous color. Wish I could purchase this! Would definitely rent again.

Since every black leather moto jacket on this site is ALWAYS unavailable, in a pinch I decided to rent this purple one. Depending on what you wear with it and how you filter the photo, can be anywhere from plum to maroon. Comfortable enough to wear although the lining is rayon so I ended up sweating a bit in it uncomfortably. Was very glad I didn't own it and someone else would be paying for the dry cleaning ha. Wore it to work then out, felt like a cool girl. Sleeves were long enough for me and I felt it was flattering on, but if you're long-waisted I would not recommend as its very cropped and boxy.
Nice jacket. Beautiful color. I liked that it was a little cropped for a modern feel.

links_reviews_title: Well made, great color, a tad too short
links_reviews_text: Great plum jacket - was perfect for our night out. Paired with jeans and a black t-shirt. Very nice leather and great color. My only issue is I felt the length of the jacket was a little short. Loved all the details on it.

links_reviews_title: Just rent it! You won't regret it!
links_reviews_text: I got the medium after reading others reviews. My other leather jacket is a small but I couldn't have gone any smaller than a medium in this one. It fit perfect. The color is amazing. It's so so cute with basically everything. Be aware it's very cropped. I have a short torso and it came just below my belly button.

Flattering fit. The color is more purple than brown, but is surprisingly neutral and goes with a variety of colors. Paired it with purple on Fat Tuesday, and green on a Thursday. Goes with dresses, skirts, and jeans. Warm enough for an outer jacket, but lightweight to wear in a cold office. So versatile I may keep it for awhile.

I'm not sure how I'll send this back. It's amazing. The color isn't too purple, which i was worried about [not a big color person]. It's cropped, so I wore it with a pencil skirt to work and got so many compliments. I also wore with high waisted jeans and, again, everyone loved it. Highly recommend!

I love this jacket. I received a lot of compliments on it. It isn't too restricting and the length of the arms is perfect. I love the ribbed sections and the zippers - I felt and looked really cool in it! The only negative I have is that the lining is loose in it so when you put your arms in, it comes out the bottom of the sleeve.
High quality and gorgeous jacket. The XS was very tight on my 5"2" petite frame. I would've been more comfortable in a small.

links_reviews_title: Compliments galore on this eye catching moto jacket in a gorgeous shade of rich purple.
links_reviews_text: Cut close to the body and on trend, it hurt to send this one back. Surprisingly versatile and guaranteed to make you feel like a rock star.
Loved everything about this jacket. Buttery soft leather and flattering cut. Sad to send it back!
Wasn't expecting that much of a crop, but ended up loving the versatility.
Great! Want to keep this one! Fits great and arms aren't too tight!

Lightweight leather jacket with a beautiful eggplant color soft leather and matte zippers. Not so warm for winter use but perfect weight to wear to an event indoors. A little boxy and cropped in shape. I had plenty of room in a size small to wear a think sweater underneath. Lots of compliments.

I love this jacket, I am really tall and the arms fit perfectly. It's a shorter jacket. I wore a sweater underneath it and had no trouble zipping it. It's def not warm at all. More of a purple in person. Got lots of compliments!
Love this jacket the color is amazing and leather is super soft. Runs small!!
Hard to find a jacket with long enough arms - this jacket fit perfectly! Came with tags on. Feels so luxurious and expensive!
I love it! I love it! I love it! It looks so chic and stylish! It felt a little bit short in the torso, but still it's one of my favorite RTR!
It was so cute and so fun. My bday theme was astros colors, so this was perfect!! I wish I owned this jumpsuit. Soo cute
I rented this for a summer bridal shower. It was super fun and casual but you could dress it up with some wedges or sandal heels.
Such a cute jumpsuit. It's very comfortable. I found it to run a little small and I needed a large. Usually I am a medium. It is so cute and very sexy. My boyfriend wanted me to buy it.

I rented this jumpsuit for a trip with my husband to Puerto Rico. I rented the XS because it was the only one available, but I would have preferred the small. It was pretty tight in the rib cage/waist area, but stretched out a bit throughout the night. After it stretched out a bit, it was really comfortable. I received a lot of compliments and will definitely rent this again!
I was very surprised that this looked good on me. Normal jumpsuits are always too long on me so this cropped version was great and it is sooo light and airy! Perfect for Mexico weather!

Great casual jumpsuit for warmer weather. Was nervous the medium would be too big on top for me but the adjustable tie was perfect! Wore it multiple times on my trip. Would purchase for myself in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: breezy in the south of France
links_reviews_text: Comfy and wonderful, loved it! Fit perfect

Loved this cute and sexy outfit! The wide legged pants were so flattering and comfortable. It was difficult to get out of and back in for restroom purposes but totally worth the pictures. My husband loved it while we were out sipping wine on our anniversary vacation.

links_reviews_title: Revealing but easy jumpsuit for summer happy hour
links_reviews_text: Wore this down the shore for sunset drinks with the family. It has a plunge neckline, so not sure if it would be great for larger busts. It does run small so if you're between sizes, size up. The stripes and cut out make it very flattering. Would rent again and again, loved!
Couldn't love this more. Super flattering and a great light fabric for a sunshine-filled vaca.
It took everything I had not to buy this!! I wore it a few times and got so many compliments every time!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, gorgeous jumpsuit, and super comfy!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit got me so many compliments! I loved the way it fit and it was so comfortable to wear for a beach wedding. I think I'm going to purchase it! Went great with some wedged and rose gold jewelry. I ordered a Small and Medium as back up. I opted for the Medium since I wanted a more relaxed fit. The top was easily adjustable with the front tie!
Really cute but still appropriate

I am usually a medium and the medium fit better on the bottom but too large on top because it just ties in the front, so I wore the small. Wore pasties and was comfortable the whole night. Great jumper for a party/night out. Used this rental as my free B-Day rental so wore it out to the bars. Cute, stylish summer outfit! Sorry I didn't get a better picture but if you usually wear jumpers, this will look great!

links_reviews_title: No bra summer in full effect
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit! It's perfectly inline with my no bra summer wardrobe even though I'm a 34DD. It fit like a glove! Would rent again and again!

Loved this jumper! Wore it for my birthday and got some many compliments. Fit was very comfortable, didn't need a bra with the tie in the front. I'm 5'0 and 138lbs hourglass shape. Will definitely rent again.
A little loose on top but other than that it fit great. Lightweight
Love this jumper, loose in the legs and adjustable top, so it fit well no matter the situation. Very breathable and comfy.
Excellent fit! Tied in the back to cover my bra. Loved this, easy to get in and out.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to keep it forever!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was SO comfortable and SO cute! I got tons of compliments and the material is so light and soft that it was perfect for a summer night. When wearing previous rentals I have always fit the XS but this particular outfit the S fit much better. The top is so adjustable so both the XS and S worked but the bottom was much too tight on the XS.
This was beyond adorable, I received so many compliments. It was airy and comfortable for a hot summer day. I will most likely rent again!

links_reviews_title: SO cute!! Received so many compliments the entire day. Accentuated all the right places ;)
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered the Medium but got a Large as backup. Good thing I did because although the medium fit, it was tight around my hips. The large size was more flattering and comfortable to move around in. Very flowy, light and fun!

Loved loved loved this jumpsuit. So fun to wear on a city day in the summer. Nice and light material. I would consider buying it I loved it so much. Does run a bit small, tight in the waist but I liked the snugger fit. Highly recommend!!
Super cute jumpsuit that fits true to size. Wore without a bra and fit perfectly. Light material makes it perfect for the summer. Only flaw is that it wrinkles easily.
I would say this would fit best for smaller chested women. Go with a sticky bra or backless bra for modesty otherwise no bra would work too! Love this jumper. I wish I could have kept it!
I rented this for a bachelorette weekend wine safari in Malibu. It was perfect, a little sexy, but still casual enough and super comfy. I wore a brassy bra (sticky boob tape) and it worked great!
Had to take the whole thing off to pee. I wore without a bra. Super cute but the waist was very snug.

Definitely one of my favorite jumpsuits I've ever worn (coming from someone who's slightly obsessed with jumpsuits)! I would have preferred a medium but it wasn't available at the time so I went with a large. If I had the medium instead I would've bought instead of returning and am hoping a medium becomes available at some point so I can do just that. I wore this to a spring fashion photo shoot held in a park and it was so stunning in all the pictures. Wore again to lunch with my family and before I could even consider buying it, my mom told me I had to buy this one if I could because it was too fabulous looking on. It can definitely be dressed up or down depending on the shoes and accessories worn. Also love how you can change around how the front is tied to create slightly different looks. Since the top doesn't have any other closure besides the front tie, it's extremely adjustable, so I would definitely pick the size based on the bottom part of it. The large fit well but was a little big in the waistband, not enough that it was really falling down, but (especially when I sat) the waistband would sag down some/create a gap instead of staying flush against my waist. The length was great, slightly cropped on me at 5'8", but still at a trendy crop level, not looking like it was too short, especially since the legs are wide. Seriously cannot recommend this jumpsuit enough!!
Slightly small around the waist, but still looked fantastic

links_reviews_title: FITS LIKE A DREAM FOR 5' ATHLETIC BODIES
links_reviews_text: Hand down, the best thing I've ever rented. Perfect hem height on the pants, waist is perfect , and fits a booty too. I absolutely feel amazing in this. I'm buying it now.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and so glad they send a second size free
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments and perfect for casual attire weddings.

I rented this to trip around LA in during a family outing. It was soooo comfortable and super cute. I never wear tummy showing outfits but I felt completely at ease wearing this and thought it was appropriate. I wore the small instead of medium because it was more fitted and I don't have much on top so I didn't want the girls being exposed. I didn't wear a bra with this outfit but more voluptuous gals may not be able to get away with that. Overall super fun and casual to wear all day
Wore this with a group of girls to wine country. Loved this romper but wish I would have done a large. I am definitely curvy and the bottom was tight. Would rent again but in a different size!

links_reviews_title: Didn't have to wear a bra!!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, super comfortable (minus using the bathroom) and got a ton compliments. The pants come up to the perfect part of your waist and are very flattering.

I usually wear size 0/XS and I ordered the XS and S. The fit was very strange because the size SX had wider and longer pant legs than the S. I ended up wear the small because the pant legs were narrower. The creasing of the linen was never very obvious and it was extremely comfortable. I wore this for a sunset sail and it really fit the vibe!

Very comfortable and easy for a hot day walking around DC. I have a long torso but had no problems with the fit. I am small chested so I had to do some creative pinning to keep my bra from showing the whole time (wore a real bra instead of a NuBra)

links_reviews_title: This was so fun to wear! You could easily dress it up or down depending on your need.
links_reviews_text: I thought it ran a little small, but mainly thru the waist only. I typically wear a small, and although the small did fit, I didn't like that when I sat down, the waist kind of dug into my stomach. With it being exposed, I didn't want to look like a sausage anytime I sat down. I decide to wear the medium, which fit pretty baggy. I felt like there was a lot of extra fabric in the M and really wish the S had 1 more inch in the waist. Either way, it was a cute romper for a night downtown with my man. It paired nicely with platform sandals and would look good on either tall or short gals, as the wide leg would look nice as a full length or cropped length. Again, I liked the length a bit better on the small and really wish that size fit better!

Loved this from the moment I saw it, just hoped it fit well when I received it. Well, it runs true to size/large. I definitely could eat all the chips and queso, tacos, and margs that my heart desired this Cinco and still look cute lol plus it's fun to dance in. Olé.

links_reviews_title: The most perfect jumpsuit of all time
links_reviews_text: I looooved this! Wore it for my rooftop birthday party during the day and I felt amazing! No bra needed, insanely flattering. I was so worried that my bloated lower stomach would show but it really didn't at all! Didn't want to send this back at all. LOVE, rent it!!!!!
I absolutely loved wearing this jumpsuit. The fabric is so light and airy and it fit like a glove. It was comfortable and easy to wear without a bra. I wish I could've kept it!

links_reviews_title: Great work top! Not super warm but does the trick in 40 degrees
links_reviews_text: Small fit pretty well (I'm 5'3, 32C)! Wasn't super warm and insulating but it was great for 35+ weather
This sweater had a comfortable fit, not too tight, and not too lose. Cowl neck as shown in the photo. Color is more like teal. Definitely a casual item that would be hard to dress up.
The XS had a comfortable loose-ish (but not too loose) fit. Didn't itch
Easy and comfortable. Loved! A bit short in torso but covers everything.
It is shorter than pictured, but very soft and comfortable.
This sweater was just ok for me? Wasn’t really warm.
It goes well with my beige pants. It's very comfy and warm.
Cute everyday sweater, nice fit, not bulky at all. Flattering and loved the color.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, comfy and soft. Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: Super cute, comfy and soft. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress had a very awkward fit and was really small/tight around the waistline which made the dress poof out in all the wrong places which was not flattering at all! I even ordered a size up to try and avoid this but unfortunately I think it's just how the dress is made. I would not rent this again.

I wore this with leggings and rain boots and I loved it. It's a little tight in the waist (by design) but stretches, and the sleeves were a little bit in the way at times, not the easiest to pull up when needing to wash hands or something. Otherwise it's fabulous. I got lots of compliments and would definitely recommend and rent again. TTS.
Very pretty but didn't seem especially high-end.

links_reviews_title: Love the relaxed fit. Wore with tights for a Chicago wedding.
links_reviews_text: Was a little bit short for me bc I am short torsoed/long legged, but still worked. Easy to wear, comfortable, tended to ride up a little bit on me due to elastic in waistline. Fun to dance in.

I loved this dress. The fabric was beautiful and the top was great. But it was very short. I'm 5'6" and was worried about flashing someone. If it had been a few inches longer it would be perfect. I may try again in a large to see if it gives more length.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for lunch and shopping
links_reviews_text: So comfortable. Hemline is sexy but not too short. Fabric doesn't wrinkle for travel
Very comfortable with slightly awkward sleeves. Great for a date night.
This dress was cute with booties and jewelry for date night. Would also work with thick tights and a blazer for the office.

I thought this dress was so cute online and would be great for fall. I also thought there was velvet detailing on the dress. I must not have been paying enough attention when I ordered it! The dress was very baggy in the sleeves, but extremely short (and I wear some short things). I might have worn with leather leggings if I liked the fit of the dress, but it was unflattering so I just returned it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric, feminine flare, perfect work-to-dinner outfit
links_reviews_text: Love how this dress cinched at the waist and was longer on the sides than in the middle. The only minor draw back is the arm pit area. It was very large on me there and looked a bit strange when my arms were lifted.

links_reviews_title: So so comfortable but definitely order down! After a few hours of wear, these were super loose!
Flattering & I felt so confident in them!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with these jeans - keeping them for the weekend after wearing to work. I felt so amazing in them, the cut is really flattering and not a color denim I own. I would say TTS, the stretch out a little after you put them on which makes them comfortable!
I am a post Christmas size 8 here and I liked the fit of these jeans. They were fun to wear for traveling. I kept thinking of the Whitesnake song, "Here I Go Again." Very 1989.
I liked these...they ran a bit short but I was able to style them game day with no difficulty
Love these jeans! They're very high waisted which is what I wanted. Super cute to dress up or down

Everything about these jeans was perfect. First time RTR unlimited and new with tags. Fit like a glove. High waisted. The corset design was a nice touch. I am 5 2 and they came up to my ankle though !

Did I mention I love these??? I'm always hesitant to rent something without reviews but I love Sevens and these did not disappoint. Very high waisted, structures pant hugs all your curves while also making you look long and lean. They are surprisingly comfortable to boot. Will definitely rent these again and will probably cave and buy them at some point
Super cute jeans for a more retro look. Great with a sweater or T.
They were very flattering!

links_reviews_title: Corset Jeans Are a Brilliant Idea
links_reviews_text: These jeans were so comfortable. They had the 80s retro wash with a tapered fit through the legs. Sat perfectly above the ankle with a cute bootie. And the corset top was exactly what I wanted it to be—smoothing out and shaping without any discomfort.
There was very little stretch. Felt kind of cheap. Not flattering at all.
I’m not warming to the wash of these jeans. I like the fit. I’d rate higher if these were a solid black or dark denim.
LOVED this moto jacket. It is Hunter Green, not black, which made it so much more fun. Cropped and loose fit. Pretty warm, too!

Love this j crew collection jacket so much!! It's GREEN which is hard to pick up in the photos but trust me it's striking and gorgeous in person. The leather isn't very soft but that's a minor detail compared to the color & fit of it. 10/10 will be holding onto this one. More on @thanksitsrtr

This J.Crew leather jacket is unbelievable! Love that it's a twist on a classic with the dark green color. All of my coworkers loved it! Fit was great - I'm typically a 00 and probably could have used that size, but since RTR only had a 0, I got the 0 and it was fine. I received this jacket brand new with tags still on, so needless to say condition was phenomenal!

links_reviews_title: Cute piece to add to a basic outfit
links_reviews_text: This leather jacket is so gorgeous. The quality is what you would expect from a $500+ j crew jacket. I loved the dark green color. The fit is very cropped but looked good perfect with high waisted jeans and black body suit. I thought the cropped look made it more feminine. Just make sure you keep those two things in mind when renting.
Cute but the sleeves are so short that I couldn't wear it (I'm 5'10). Also, I was surprised at the deep green color. It looks black in pics. Sending back unworn.

links_reviews_title: Looks really green in person. Beware.
links_reviews_text: Good fit, bit didn't live the color.
fit true to size , worked well with black jeans, lighter blue jeans

links_reviews_title: I just received this and it did not arrive with the belt.
links_reviews_text: I did not read the description close enough and thought this was black. I like it but it just didn't arrive with the belt included.
But felt tight in the shoulders so alas, had to return without wearing. Super bummed.

links_reviews_title: Cute but long on sleeves and a little big
Get ready for the compliments and "where did you get that top?"
links_reviews_text: I wanted to buy this and might in the future. I rented as part of my month long rental and definitely got a lot of use for it - dinners out, work, and any excuse to put it on and go out that I could think of. Goes with denim or black jeans super well. Dress it up, dress it down. Hi-lo hem that I actually love as you can wear skinny pants and not worry about your butt being on display but the front is normal length and flattering. Big billowy sleeves that just work. I could have gotten a smaller size as the shoulder/chest area is quite roomy. Lovely button detail on the back for days you want to wear your hair up. Want to own this!
The material is very heavy and the top has a lot of material with the back longer. Good for cold weather. Wore it tucked in because felt the material was overwhelming.
Lose fit but super cute tucked in the front. Great for work or date night.

The shoulders fit fine (I have narrow shoulders) but overall there was too much billowy fabric that made this look clownish on me. I also have a short torso so the length did not work either. Fabric was lovely though.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing due to fit
links_reviews_text: Was way too big in all areas except for the shoulders. Didn't like how long the shirt was in the back.

links_reviews_title: Not navy, more royal blue, it's just ok.
links_reviews_text: Fits nicely but is a little boring. It's not navy so you need the right color bottom of your hoping to coordinate blues - it's more of a dark cobalt or royal blue. Would probably be adorable with jeans on the weekend rather than for work.

This fun sweater is lightly rubbed so it fits somewhat snugly. If you are busty you may want to go up a size. It also sits right at your waist so if you go for longer sweaters the same would apply. It's is not a heavy sweater but I was warm all day and the ruffled collar is a cut touch.
The fabric feels great and the sweater was really comfortable. The small with just a little too clingy so I would size up if I got it again. The ruffled neck is very cute and fun.
Comfy. Wore it on a day out hiking. Neck ruffle is cute.
Really cute and bright colors
