This sweatshirt is beyond amazing! As a HUGE Stranger Things fan, Montauk has like 3 nerdy meanings to me (read The Montauk Project book)! Definitely buying!

This should just a regular $60 j. Crew sweatshirt but I absolutely loved it. My husband even suggested I buy it it looked so good on (Although I resisted the temptation!) The XS was perfect fit for my small upper body. App recommended XXS but really glad I went with XS. Hit at hips and sleeves went to wrists but just barely. Could have gone larger for a looser fit but I liked wearing with jeans or cut off shorts on a Santa Monica beach vacation. Loved it with the sleeves pushed up and a slouchy purse and boyfriend jeans.
Perfect for a cool summer day. I wore this on a fishing trip. Fits great and super comfy. I wore it twice.
I wore this a bunch this weekend!
Basic cute sweater for lounging at home or out and about.
Perfect for WFH

links_reviews_title: Good, basic sweater for casual work environment
links_reviews_text: Cute, thick material. Shorter than it seems on the model, I have a long torso so I had to wear a tank with it.
Versatile every day casual sweatshirt
Cute sweatshirt runs a tad small in the waist and short. Looked cute with jeans and tennis shoes.
Wore this many times. Perfectly casual but put together. Worse with joggers to run errands
Little small. Order next size up
Wore this to and from spin and running some errands over the weekend. Super cute and really cozy. I got the biggest size for maximal relaxed look and really happy w it.
I'm 5'11 with long arms and normally would get a M but the L fit great. This is light weight and not frumpy - and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Great for day at the office + evening work event
links_reviews_text: Surprisingly comfortable, and not too heavy fabric. Fit perfectly, the back cut is a nice touch.
Perfect fit. Wore this for a picture for work. Lots of compliments.
Fits true to size, classy and elegant
This dress worked for my theme party but I easily could have used it for work too. It's a classic shape, great fit and gorgeous green color.
I like the boatneck neckline and 3-quarter sleeves. Great dress for any season. Did fit loose in the waist, so I wore it with a belt.

links_reviews_title: Would have bought it in Petite!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, the material is structured but has some nice give to it and the olive color is gorgeous! If only I was either 3 inches taller - it would have been perfect. If I wore it where the waste hit me properly, the top of the dress was bagging and gaped in the back. But would have been perfect if it was in a petite!!! Please RTR - get some petite options!!!

This brand is great but it runs one size large. I am normally a 10, with an inverted triangle body shape and large bust at 36DD. I sized down to an 8 in this and it fit perfectly and was extremely flattering. Very nice material too, it's almost a bit cool to the touch and not itchy at all. Highly recommend.

Beautiful dress for work or any professional event. The dress fit well in the shoulder/chest area, but the waist was pretty loose. I added a belt to help define my waist, which really helped pull it together! Would rent again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hourglass shape and cooler weather-but Size down !
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous- and perfect for fall weather. The fabric is a nice olive green color and has a nice thickness/weight; it's is stretchy and fully lined. The sleeves are the perfect length and have a fun slit at the elbow. This is perfect for hourglass shape bc there is room in the bust and hips. However, size down- I wore a 4 and I'm usually a 6. I may buy this !

The color was a beautiful fall green. The dress isn't particularly unique, but well designed in a quality fabric. My only regret is that it runs big. Had I gotten a size smaller, it would have looked flattering, but unfortunately it hung like a paper bag.
Great fit. Classic silhouette.

At first I thought it was too nice for my workplace but really fell in love. Considering buying but might need to wait! It's perfect for an interview or special meeting. This brand is my go to now for really excellent work wear. Stretched and moved - I was even able to ride my bike though not 100% modestly. This pic is after wearing for about five hours so it does not wrinkle much - would be great for a conference. Also my arms are not thin right bow and this covers them without being too tight. Love!

Really wanted to love this dress but while it fit well in the busy it ballooned out in the waist in an unattractive way. Just too much fabric and not enough fitting. Seems like it may run a bit large in that way.

I thought I loved this dress until I saw the photos from the event. The neckline is very pretty when standing, but loses its shape when sitting, since this was a formal dinner, I was sitting a lot. I think this might be more flattering on someone with a smaller bust. It was very comfortable and the dark green color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: True to size, professional for work.
links_reviews_text: True to size, professional for work.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but a little big.
links_reviews_text: Great color.
Fit well. Great with or without a jacket.

This dress was simply way too wide in the hips. It's for a curvy woman, not one that's more athletic. The top was slightly too big as well, but there were a solid twin inches of extra fabric on my hips. I loved the color and was really disappointed not to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Flattering! Must keep it in my closet!
links_reviews_text: perfect fit. Great color.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress but a little big in the hips for me.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a holiday party with tall high heeled black boots.
Great color!
Room for chest and still very flattering neckline.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. So comfortable and great color.
links_reviews_text: Everything about the dress was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but did not get to wear
links_reviews_text: The top half of the dress was exceptionally small. Did not get to wear.

I loved the ease and the ability to move around in this dress. It runs large so size down. I typically wear a 6 and went to a 4. I received lots of compliments at work. Perfect length and dark hunter green color.
Very simple dress, but quite elegant. Color was perfect. Loved- will definitely put this in the rotation for work as well!
I typically like Of Mercer dresses but this one was hideous. So massive in the hips that I couldn't even try to cinch it with a waist belt to save the outfit. Hard pass.

I rented this dress to speak at a conference. It was definitely a comfortable flattering and rocksolid work dress. The material was thick and did not wrinkle, it was a little roomy which was good for a professional look, and the overall look was quite polished. I wore a brown leather jacket over it to hip it up a bit, and I felt totally "on" the whole time. The only downside was there was a loose bottom hem, but nothing a safety pin couldn't fix.

This ran at least a full size too big. The color is a gorgeous forest green, but I wasn't happy with the fit. I think I would've liked it more in a smaller size. Good conservative dress for a more formal business event, but nothing special.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because too large. But I loved the neckline.
links_reviews_text: Runs big!

Dress is perfect for work and the color is very nice. It does run large but I had already made the mistake of getting a larger size after looking at the measurements so I recommend true to size or possibly sizing down unless you want that loose fit which seems is meant for this dress.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this item bc I was swimming in it.
links_reviews_text: This item runs large. I rented a size 2, but it was baggy and several inches too large everywhere for me.
Very flattering, easy to wear with a little stretch.
Very flattering fit!
Perfect fall color. Classic fit for work. Would rent again.
Really beautiful work dress so comfortable. Longer which I loved. Stretchy. Has a boatneck somewhat-but overall a really beautiful dress. Might buy at some future point!
This dress was very long, and I'm 5'10! You also should size up. The color was okay, the dress was not very spectacular. Might be a good work dress.
Much longer than the photo appears. Mid-calf length.
Classic work dress, with a comfortable, flattering fit. I am 5'4" and it fell a little long on me.
Super soft and not too warm but warm enough. Pretty and chic sweater.
Nice quality sweater. I enjoyed it, but not really a head-turner or anything.
The shoulder detail was really nice. The sweater looks tired and a bit dowdy, though. Mine had pilling at the mid-chest. Might have been better down a size!

links_reviews_title: Adorable Sweater! Would be perfect for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work one day. I got a large and I probably could have done a medium if I wanted a more fitted look. Loved the bell sleeves. Loved the details. Seemed very festive. It was nice and long. Material was not itchy. I paired it with the Lafayette New York Mercer Pants (also from RTR). May keep this for a holiday gathering.
Great medium weight sweater, fit is true to size with long-ish sleeves. Beaded details are beautiful and make it better than your average sweater.
Good staple. A little heavy, and not much to it.

links_reviews_title: It runs large, huge bell sleeves and fairly low quality
links_reviews_text: It runs large, huge bell sleeves and fairly low quality
I received so many compliments on this beautiful sweater!
Didnt end up wearing. I didn’t like the long bell sleeves on. Also there was pilling on the sweater.
Was comfortable.
Overall this sweater is great but the sleeves are really really long.

I adore this sweater. The bell sleeves, the embellishments, the warmth. Everything about this sweater is perfect. The sweater runs big, but I actually liked the way it fit. Several coworkers told me it as a beautiful sweater and they loved how it looked on me. The only thing I would alter is the sleeves, they ran all the way to my fingertips.
I like the details in the embellishments and this gray, but it was a tad long for the sleeves. It fits more like a tunic too. I think it's super cute and unique.
Very comfy sweater. Was a bit big on me and the sleeves were too long but was cozy
I liked the details of bell sleeves and sequins but the sweater did arrive with a loose string on one of the flowers. It was super cozy and a great piece for work.
Flattering fit and pretty sparkly details. Love the bell sleeves
This sweater runs big (in my opinion) - I usually would wear a medium, but based on the reviews I ordered the S and it fit perfectly - fitted but not too short or anything! M would have been too big.
Just a little bit of glitz. very comfortable and great material. Well made and I would definitely rent again

Wore this work and got SO many compliments. Ended up renting a second time for Thanksgiving. Only downside is the bell sleeves can be a little annoying, especially because the embellishment is heavy and drags down on the desk.
Wore with skinny black pants and heels - perfect for a chilly winter workday

links_reviews_title: Great sweater and got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were a little longer than anticipated

The sleeves are wide but cute and I like that there is a flower on the right sleeve. The sequin flower details add a nice touch to an otherwise plain sweater. The fit is perfect - not too tight or loose. It's not fitted so if you want that look, size down. But this definitely runs TTS.

links_reviews_title: Loved the embellishments and the oversized sleeves
links_reviews_text: Was able to wear this to work

links_reviews_title: Simple sweater with nice sequin detailing.
links_reviews_text: Could be worn everyday or to work. Comfortable but noticed some pilling after first wear

I wore this with skinny black pants for a party and it was great! I was a little dressy and super comfortable. I was busy running around and this sweater was weather appropriate but also lightweight so I was comfortable all night
Beautiful sweater with gorgeous detail. Body of the sweater felt big. Think I would have been happier with a Small but loved wearing this with black jeans and boots.

All around solid rental. The sequin flower details are a nice touch, and relatively subtle. Fits true to size, and could be a little large on a petite. Fabric has a little stretch. Would definitely rent again!
This sweater was huge on me. The worst part was the arms. They are this big bell sleeves and they are way too long for me. I could not wear it. The detailing is very pretty but far too large.
Super easy to wear, style and looks so good

This will be really fun to wear out when restaurants reopen and events start again. Easy comfortable fit, the fabric looks like it has been worn and washed more than a few times or that it might not hold up if owned....but still in wearable condition. Happy I rented it. I do wish it had pockets. I am 5' 3" 130ish pounds.

I wore this for dinner one night on vaca. It fit perfectly and was so comfortable. I am 4'10 and had no issue with the length like I normally do ... the only thing I wish is that the zipper on back wasn't all the way down! It would've looked classier without that so one star off but otherwise felt great in it.
Very flattering summer jumpsuit. Super comfortable. The 6 wasn't available so I took the 8. It worked out fine though a little loose. I will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Cute but the fit was off
links_reviews_text: I rented this jumpsuit for a date but ended up not wearing it because it just wasn't flattering. The top was lower cut than I was expecting and the crop length was odd even though I'm only 5'2". Wanted to love it and maybe I'll try it in a bigger size but this is going back unworn.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorites from RTR.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and a jumpsuit that is actually easy to zip up!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for brunch and wine tasting
links_reviews_text: Great stretchy/supportive material. Fun sporty fit! I have long legs and short torso. Might have been a weird fit for a long torso.
I wore this to a vineyards trip, and I was so comfortable. Great material, and for really well. I would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Just felt comfortable and sexy - fit great
links_reviews_text: Well fitted hugged the body in a flattering way

This jumpsuit is crazy cute and worked on me even though I'm 5"2! There are cute white buttons on the side - has a cute nautical theme throughout. May have to rent again - it was so flattering and a perfect summer staple!
Rented this for a night out. Hugged my curves in the right way. Super flattering and the bustier at the top makes it sexier
Wore this to dinner for a bachelorette party. Material is thick and form-fitting. Love the fun button detail. Easy and polished. Recommend!

I'm a 10 normally but needed the 12 for my wide rib cage. I am 5'4 and the straps were almost too long for me, I think anyone shorter might have an issue with the straps and overall length. Fabric is great, no wrinkles after two all day wearings. Top has a bit of cleavage but OK for work with a sweater.

first of all i have got to say, i HATE how i look in rompers but this was the first time i felt comfortable in one!! really loved wearing it, the only con is the straps were a bit long and didn't have time to adjust, therefore i felt like my boobs were out half the time. i would rent again and make some temp adjustments to straps

Loved everything about this piece- flattering, comfy, just enough stretch and kept its form- a little sexy but not overtly so- might not be the case for smaller bust- I'm 36/8DD. Nice, thick-enough fabric to hide flaws but not so thick that it will make you sweat to death & didn't wrinkle. I might not recommend for shorter gals- for me at 5'11" this hit at just the right length but might look awkward on someone with shorter legs. Wore w/ a sticky bra but could have gone strapless or even bra-less (if that's your thing, my bra-less days are long gone). I'm likely to rent this again; just too cute not to!
I love jumpers. This one didn't disappoint, only issue were the straps were a bit too big, but I used a ribbon to cross them in the back

I wore this for Mother's Day it was perfect I was able to run around and play with my kids and felt beautiful doing it. It has a great stress it was so comfortable! I felt glamorous and got lots of compliments.
Perfect amount of stretch, great quality material. Structured but not too thick. Very flattering fit
Loved it. It's so incredibly flattering on a curvy frame. Looked great more covered up for office and less covered for the weekend. Nice quality fabric. Loved everything about it.
This romper fits like a glove and is super comfortable. It can easily be dressed up or used as an everyday outfit. I took it on vacation and it didn't wrinkle in my suitcase.

this jumpsuit is a stunner! the quality of the material is what we are paying for! wish i could own this piece, but it's too much for my budget. my only issue here are the straps keep falling off. but overall, the fit was perfect for my 34D bust size. the material was stretchy so it was forgiving around the tummy area, even though I am mostly a size 6 than size 4.
Fit is snug, but I think it's supposed to be. Only wore it to one occasion, but I enjoyed the look.

links_reviews_title: Super cute jumpsuit that's perfect for short people!
links_reviews_text: Love love love this jumpsuit! I usually have a hard time wearing jumpsuits because I'm short, but because this was cropped, it was the perfect length for me. The cut and fit of this jumpsuit is extremely flattering and hugs the body perfectly. The fabric is thick and the navy blue coloring is super rich. Couldn't have better things to say about this jumpsuit!
Normally I would wear a 2 or 4 but the 6 fit great. Super comfortable and cute for a night out! Also wore to work with a white long sleeve under it.
Great fit - perfect for hourglass shape.
Very cute. Slimming. But the fabric is a bit heavy.

Being 5'2" I was worried it would be too long but it wasn't! It was also SO comfortable! I have a larger bust and it was a bit too tight with a bra so I was able to go bra-less and it was a great fit! I will definitely rent this again next summer! I normally am a 6-8 and the 8R fit me best.
This sadly did not work for me. Way tight in the stomach and looked terrible on me.
loved the buttons on the bottom
This jumpsuit is so chic - I loved it! The neckline is a bit deep so sadly not well suited for work, but great for a day/night out
Love this jumpsuit. So sexy and cute! Tons of compliments. I might buy it.
I have kept this one for awhile now. I could have gone down a size, but the 6 is comfy. It's flattering and I received lots of compliments.
Comfortable and stylish
Very flattering and quality jumpsuit.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, classy, with a pop of fun
links_reviews_text: Comfortable stretchy material works well for day to evening. Liked the sweetheart neckline. Straps were not adjustable, needed to pin it, easily done. Wore it multiple times to work and out with friends- looked great with a short kimono style jacket- haiori. Would rent again.
Stretchy material is very forgiving and flattering. If you have a long torso it may be a little short in that area. Overall, comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: The material was nice and thick- but it was too small for me to wear.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight for me to zip in the back and I wasn't able to wear it. It also showed every little lump, bump, roll, etc. Wanted it to work. Maybe a size bigger would have.
This navy jumper was so adorable! Expensive looking, good weight, and very stylish. I wore this with flats for day and chunky heels for evening.

links_reviews_title: Looks weird on my 34 D top!
links_reviews_text: I so wanted to love this but it has weird stitching around the breast. It's stitching was made for a smaller breasted person. Great material!
I got a size larger than I normally wear and it fits nicely, I may have been able to size down. This is very comfortable and so easy to wear. I'll be keeping it for a bit.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, tight in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: It's a nice material, but a little uncomfortable around the shoulders/arms. Had no issue zipping it up though the fit is slightly loose

I rented this for a day at the office. Great length and details. I paired it with some patterned heels and a headband (rain boots were necessary for the walk to work). The arms were a little snug but I wouldn't size up or the dress overall would have been too large.
The dress has that 60's feel. Cute peter pan collar.
Cute 80%. Horror movie 20%. (See Shining twins). Good, not great. I think the fit was good, but it felt a little juvenile!

I'm not exactly sure what I expected of this dress but I was a tad underwhelmed. I ordered a size up to have some extra comfort in my hips, but don't think I really needed to. It's cute, but didn't WOW me, you know?
Well made, awesome color, funky and classic at the same time. Bow is a great touch without being over the top. And luckily not too short. I'm 5'6" and it came to my knees so very work appropriate.

I rented this for work. I got lots of comments/compliments. One of my coworkers told me he needed a minute for his retinas to adjust to the brightness. I've rented the same style before in the red/green print. Fit is generous on purpose but no need to size down.
Very cute and easy to wear.

Nothing beats dresses that are work appropriate but not boring and this one fit the bill! I loved the hot pink color (it's a little bolder than I was expecting from the photos) and the ribbon. I felt that it was true to size but the arm holes do not stretch at all and it was tight around my shoulders when I lifted my arms, so if that's a concern you may want to size up.

It wrinkles very easily. It came wrinkled, but I used a steamer before going to work. But it was re-wrinkled shortly after sitting at my desk for an hour or so. So just be aware of that. Also, it definitely ran big for me. I ordered my normal size (prepregnancy) but I am 6 months pregnant and it fit just fine with room to spare. Overall, the looks was very cute, but probably won't rent again.

Fit was true to size and comfortable. The hot pink along with the adorable collar details got me a lot of compliments. I wore it with nude almond toe heels, although I also tried it with my Stuart weitzman grey over the knee boots and it looked great with those too. Flattering color and style
flattering

This dress didn't work out at all. The concept and color are super cute, but the fit was way too big. I typically wear a size 6 so I rented the recommend Italian size 42. Huge! Too long (although I'm 5' 4'' so I guess on the shorter side) and the bottom was super baggy. The chest/shoulder area was also a little loose, but the bigger fit issue was definitely the bottom half of the dress. Would recommend sizing down for this. This dress is also probably better if you're taller.

I love peter pan collars and bows and pink so I thought this was going to be a major win. Unfortunately, it did not work on my body. I'm not sure how to explain it, it just ended up looking sloppy and sad instead of cute. Strong rose colour that would work in multiple seasons on the right body. Needs to be steamed upon arrival as it wrinkles easily and is a bit tight in the shoulders, otherwise TTS.
Absolutely loved this dress. I sized up (I'm a solid 4, and wore a 42), because Valentino tends to run small. Glad I did - it fits perfectly.

Beautiful color (smokey rose) and fabric. Skirt is slightly full and flouncy. Slight tendency to wrinkle if you sit at a desk during the day. Lots of compliments on the uniqueness of the color and style. Described as adult Eloise at the Plaza.
Beautiful material, but I this dress is better for a taller person. The entire fit was off for me.

I thought this was really cute from a perspective of pattern and look. But the thing is, the sleeves were really short (almost 3/4 length) , and the shoulders fit weird. It also had a cropped look, which it doesn't seem to have on the model. It was fine for a quarantine casual Friday (as every day is these days) but I wouldn't want to wear it outside.

I rented this for casual Friday at work but ended up just wearing it over my gym clothes because it was a little too cropped for the office. A medium may have been longer. However small fit in the body and arms. It's very very soft.
Love this little retro sweatshirt. It's made of a soft corduroy. Would be very short on a tall person

links_reviews_title: Cute top. I wore it once.
links_reviews_text: This was worn and kind of faded. Also it was shorter than I would prefer.
Trendy sweatshirt that I rewore many times. Loved it so much I considered buying it. Would rent again.
Great everyday top. Perfect weight, not too tight or loose. And fun on trend print and design.

This blazer is extremely well-constructed and high-quality. It fits well and true to size and is a lovely twist on a classic blue blazer. It looks expensive and is comfortable to wear. Would recommend!
Wore to an art opening! Loved it!!! Perfect amount of funk!
Loved the fit of this jacket and was glad both pieces were available to wear the look as intended as a suit. Not the most feel-good fabric, but it stretched and gave me the vibe I wanted!
Loved the cut of the jacket, tailored and comfortable. The color wasn't my jam. Didn't hate it, just not a great fit for my wardrobe and preferences. Otherwise, great blazer!

Truly such an amazing blazer. The material was lighter than I had expected but was appreciated given my office temps are always wacky. The buttons add another level to the look. Loved the colors as it gave me a different look than my usual black blazers

Good fit! Jacket is more "cottony" than wool, which surprised me. Twill is a good description of the fabric. The pattern also was not as cute as I was expecting at first, but I like it better now and styled up. Perfect for work or I might wear it again for everyday before I return it. I have ended up really liking this jacket and recommend it!
Wore to an interview. Felt the suit coat was a bit big. Would have preferred a more snug fit. But all in all really nice piece!
Ordered 8 but still so small
Nice design, just wish the print was more exciting. Fabric is not as soft, luxe as I would have expected. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this as it was far too big.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this as it was far too big.
This is poppy & cute. It was much less muted than the photos I saw, however, so it didn't match my outfit and I returned it.
Super high quality/structured fit, fit the shoulder and waist perfectly, which is nearly impossible for a blazer without any tailoring. Wore it with navy pants and a silk tank, felt like a boss.

links_reviews_title: quick and easy rented with pant but also liked to wear jacket with jeans and skirt
links_reviews_text: fit is true to size 8R - I really liked it with pant and also complete fall work outfit super easy
Tailor fit!
This jacket was snug around the middle but has crazy long arms. There's a reason the model in the photo has the sleeves pushed up.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. The shoulders dress it up. Very comfortable.
Felt great in this little number
Loved so much, I bought it
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for my first day at a new job. Got so many complements that I ended up buying it!
On the tighter side around the waist.

links_reviews_title: Great fit - comfy and easy for work
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and look of this dress. Super light too. I didn't love the fabric (thinner than it looks) but once I put it on the color shape and overall look changed my opinion.

This dress is fitted but professional. It hits a few inches above the knee and is a flattering blue/purple color. The ruffle adds a nice touch. Most Shoshanna dresses are cut to flatter, will rent again!
Comfortable but pretty basic. The ruffle is cute but halfway into the day I started worrying it looked to French maid ruffle.

I really liked this dress . It was a bit short but with tights was great. I loved the fun ruffles on sleeves and bottom of dress . It was a bit tight around my stomach but nothing I couldn't deal with. Great rental and work outfit
Great dress. Fits well. Easy to dress up. Very classic but the ruffles give it a fun twist.
Fits perfectly, and is a conservative enough length, shape, color for a corporate gala dinner but that ruffle kicks it up a notch.

I really liked this dress. Sizing up resulted in a comfortable work-appropriate fit. This brand consistently delivers (though I often size up in it). Material is thin - not in a cheap way, but in a good for warm weather way.
I needed a navy dress for this event. Material was great and fit in all the right places without being skin tight. Conservative and elegant
I loved this dress for work! It fit really well and worked well for my conservative work environment. Glad I followed the advice of RTR to go with a 10 versus my normal 8. One size up fit perfect!!!
Loved it! Perfect fit in chest. Roomy in hips. Ruffle on hip sticks out oddly, but still a winner!!

I rented this for work. I liked the color and the ruffles, but the fit wasn't great. It felt a bit oversized (shoulders are poofy on purpose) and was a tad roomy, but the material is thin, without much stretch, so I'm not sure if the 2 would have been better. I think the biggest issue is that the sleeves were too long, but I have short arms...
I was very pleased with this dress, it was perfect for a dressier work event. The fit was great, a little snug on my tummy but not terrible and the fabric was lightweight enough for year-round wear.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work and out
links_reviews_text: Work
Cute ruffle detail and love the blue! Classy look. Perfect from day to evening.
It was perfectly feminine without being too revealing. I loved the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and love the ruffles.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit; great for work. I ended up keeping it!
This dress is fabulous! I love the way it hugged all my curves in a flattering way! You can tell it's really well made!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, shows panty (even thong!) lines!
links_reviews_text: Great dress, fit great, lots of compliments. However, it is thin material, unlined, and shows all lines. I had on a hanky panky thong and a colleague privately shared she could see my line when I bent forward to grab something off of the table. I'm afraid you would see the top of shapewear as well.
Dress fit true to size; however, I didn't get to wear it because it was super difficult to get the zipper up. I was afraid I was going to break the zipper if I forced it.
Nice material, fit so well. I wore to work. Lots of compliments.
Hits in all the right places and so gorgeous on!!!!
This dress fit perfectly and was great for winter. The material is comfortable and flattering. I wore it twice - for work and church. I received many compliments.
This one looked very cute on! Not a fan of the fabric and it was a little loose on my small frame. But worked great for a business trip.

links_reviews_title: Avoid if you're on the taller side
links_reviews_text: I really wished this dress would've worked out. The material was great, and the dress was true to size. Unfortunately, the dress is short. I'm 5'6" and the dress fell 3 inches above my knees. However, when I raised my hands or moved around at all, the dress hiked up another 3-4 inches, making it impossible for me to wear to work.

links_reviews_title: Second Rental, STILL absolutely ADORE this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am still on my weight loss journey and not sure what size I will end up needing, but I will be purchasing this one for sure. Ladies, do yourself a favor and try this one! I have long legs and a short torso and this dress fits me as if it was tailored specifically for my body. Fabulous to wear to work, or an evening out. Love it! Material is nice and stays wrinkle free!
Great fit, very flattering.
Fit was fine and I did get some compliments but I felt like I was wearing an apron! The cut was also not too flattering for a curvy girl.

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. So professional!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: fit very true to size
Received many compliments on this dress. Conservative enough for work and cute enough for cocktails after.
Fitted, but with a little give in the fabric. Very nice for all day at work.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress and fit is perfect
links_reviews_text: Fits perfect and very polished look

links_reviews_title: Easy dress to wear, comfortable too

links_reviews_text: The dress zipper was a little stubborn on this; overall fit was good - but I didn't love the cut on me so decided not to wear.
Great deep navy color, beautifully made & super flattering!
Easy elegance! It is versatile for work to weekend in minutes! It is a beautiful blue!

links_reviews_title: My coworkers kept trying to convince me to buy it
links_reviews_text: Oversized fit, warm, so stylish! Loved this coat so much!
Wore this around London and it was perfect. Warm, stylish and has pockets! Would totally rent again!
Fun color, warm but the buttons need to be reinforced. All of them almost feel off after my 10 day vacation- for no good reason.
Love the coat but was big on me. Still wore it out but would need to tailor it if I were to buy. Great fall coat and well made.
A trench coat that delivers style and warmth. What else can you ask for?
Great coat! Soft and the pockets are nice and big.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this coat. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: fit true to size
Really warm and cute!
Donna Morgan is always my go-to when I want a nice and forgiving fabric -- loved the high neckline and tie.
Y'all need to rent this for work. Fits like a glove. The little built in scarf is adorable. And the small proof of the shoulders adds feminine flair. I LOVE this dress!

I'm usually a 4 or 6, but a 4 in this dress had a little bit too much fabric. It looked good when I pulled it down and flattened the fabric but if you sit down and stand up there will be folds of fabric most likely. Really stretchy and comfy but just a bit too big for me!

links_reviews_title: Great for a day at the office + evening work event
links_reviews_text: Got many compliments. Fit perfectly, very comfortable. The high neck and side tie/bow is fun but not over the top.
I loved the comfortable fabric - the dress was a beautiful hourglass shape without that uncomfortable squeeze I normally feel from pencil skirts. A one piece professional look.
Gave me flight attendant vibes but loved it for work. Very appropriate length and super flattering fit. Would definitely rent again. For reference I'm a 26" waist and hips are around 37"

links_reviews_title: Very professional and great for work
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work and it is very well made. I'm tall, so it was nice to have a piece that hit below my knee.

This dress fit me to a T. It's cut beautifully. And I love the way the classic lines and navy color allow for fun punchy styling like the red booties I paired it with. I felt elegant and professional and tall!! This is an elegant dress. The scarf at the neck is both classic and trendy. The fabric is flattering and luxe.

This dress was perfect for work. The material is comfortable and the look is classic. The material doesn't wrinkle at all. It was the perfect length for work even though I'm a talker girl with lots of leg. Great to wear all day long. Very deep navy color almost black.
I usually wear a 4 but the 2 fit. Beautiful and can be worn alone or with cardi or jacket.
Wore this with a strand of long pearls. Very Joan Holloway/Mad Men - curve hugging, yet demure as length dropped under my knees. Lots of compliments. Love this dress!
I loved this dress. I am considering buying it. The material has a slight stretch which was nice and the bow at the neck made it unique for a navy dress.

links_reviews_title: Fits very nicely! Lots of compliments and very flattering.

links_reviews_text: this was a beautiful, fitted dress. The length hit me just below the knee, which was perfect for work. I loved this dress so much, and received so many compliments, that I ended up buying it!
Dress was nice for work and could've have been worn to dinner. My only gripe it was a bit longer then I anticipated and it went past my knees.
The design and fit of the dress is perfect for work, an interview etc. I got a lot of compliments on this piece...I will rent it again.
I am 5'2 however the length is too long.
Love the delicate bow neckline. A bit long for being 5'3" but worked beautifully with heels.

links_reviews_title: Love Love Love! So many compliments. Am going to keep it.
links_reviews_text: Fits great, style is distinct - love it!
Loved it!
Runs true to size to slightly big; the overall effect is highly professional and effortless. Midi length also makes it versatile for taller women.
One of the best dress i've rented that I might purchase it. Sophisticated and Not too tight.
Great dress in a flattering length and fabric. The tire detail is nice. I wore this several times at trainings I was facilitating.

I wore this twice, for a conference and a board meeting. It was super comfortable and fits great. The sleeves and hem are nice and long. Tie neck is a cute detail, although I ended up pairing this with booties because with pumps I thought it came off as kind of flight-attendant-y.
Fit like a glove. So chic
Fit true to size. Very comfortable and the length made it appropriate for professional events.

I rented this for a work event and sadly ended up also wearing it to a funeral. It is a great classic dress with a nice neck tie details. I am somewhere between a 6/8 depending on designer and probably a true 8. This fits more like J Crew sizing and the 6 was perfect.
So tempted to buy it, it was gorgeous, fit like a glove and so professional. Absolutely loved it.

links_reviews_title: It fit perfectly and was fashionable yet professional.
links_reviews_text: Great dress

This dress runs large. I usually wear a 4 but it was really big in the hips and waist. 2 fit really well. This dress isn’t lined and should be, the fabric is light and semi- stretchy. Loved how feminine and pretty it is. Was great for a work to dinner event.
Loved this! I Buy a size larger so things aren't too tight. This was perfect!
I always love a Donna Morgan dress. I wish this cam in more colors!
Classic, modest, understated dress. Very dark navy, could pass for black.

It was a great fit for a work dinner. It was also very comfortable while being classy. I got great compliments on the dress. My only issue is that it was a little longer than I expected. I just made sure to wear higher heels.
Very comfortable, stretchy fabric. Good construction. Very classy
I'm 5'5" and 117. Zero fit perfectly.
The collar kept looking a little wrinkled, but it was simple and comfortable. Just ended up wearing something else.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful tailored cut that works well for work and for events.
links_reviews_text: Soft and stretchy but tailored cut- worked very well for a daytime wedding and I also plan to wear it to a work event. Unlined so definitely helpful to wear shapewear underneath.
Structured professional and beautiful
Loved this. Typical Donna Morgan fit- I range from a 4 or 6 and the 4 was perfect. Slimming and hugs the curves in the right places. Very Jackie O.

links_reviews_title: sizing is off, but so warm!
links_reviews_text: This coat is so warm but it fits WEIRD. My arms are thin and with chunky sweaters I feel like Ralphie from A Christmas Story. The chest and waist fit fine though. I really prefer a zipper too.

links_reviews_title: Keep me warm and dry, but ppl on nyc transit hate me haha
links_reviews_text: This coat is amazing, I love it. Wish there was colder weather to wear it during, but as a raincoat it has been very useful

This is the perfect coat for outdoor sporting events when the weather is terrible. I couldn't even tell it was raining or cold. It felt like I was in a giant sleeping bag. Not fashion but sure is function!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this coat - it kept me warm in very cold Colorado!
links_reviews_text: It took me a minute to figure out the buttons (and quite frankly, I'm not sure I got them exactly right as the bottom two did not button) but it was a very warm coat and I loved the look.
Way too big and way too Kung mom 5'8 and I was drowning in it immediately went back in bag to ups :(

Must be made for yoginis before and after yoga class. I'm thin and fit but I had trouble putting this on over normal winter clothing. Maybe you're not supposed to wear it with sleeveless tops. Otherwise style is cute.

Light weight like feathers and the warmest thing you've ever put on- friends say I'm wearing a sleeping bag but it's the warmest sleeping bag ever - it's bulky but warm - and it has no shape but did I mention it's warm - loved it

This coat is the best thing I've ever worn. It feels like bringing a down comforter everywhere with me. It's freezing where I live and I stay so warm. I want to buy it but it's much less to just buy it from the brand website so i think I'll do that
I was pleasantly surprised how light this jacket was for the size. Super cozy and comfy. I don't get to test it in super cold temps.

links_reviews_title: Nice top to pair with several other items
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work, and because it looked like it would pair well with several other RTR items. It does! The black stripes are sparkly with silver glitter thread. And you button up the neck of the top yourself. So I suppose if you didnt want to wear this as a turtleneck, you could do that as well. Slightly itchy, probably due to the glitter thread, but not too irritating. Great staple piece overall.
I ordered and wore an XS but should have ordered a Small. The XS showed off my post baby belly a bit more than I wanted and the sleeves were a little tight. The fabric is sparkly but not too itchy.
Very thin, slightly scratchy but loved the fit. Great styling with the neck and sleeves fit perfectly. Glitter was just enough. Overall good rental.
Fits great, nice details on the neck and cuffs. A little bit scratchy if you have sensitive skin I would maybe not rent this one. I don't so it was fine!
I rented this thinking it was going to be a normal ribbed sweater, but the dark stripes are glittery/metallic. Not a bad thing, but not my style.

links_reviews_title: Great, snug fit, hugs your body and curves nicely with the stretchy fabric.

links_reviews_text: Amazing fit! I love this dress. Very comfortable while having structure. Lots of compliments received.

This dress is very sweet and girly: it's long enough to wear to work. The lace details were really nice and it's comfy because of the flare skirt. Only thing: the button-front did pull a little. Could be an issue for girls with bigger chests.

My favorite out of everything I got in my shipment. Perfect for hourglass figures. Please note that the chest is a little small if you're too busty, mine was pulling at the buttons a little, but i got away with it. But I just love this dress so much!!
pretty, lovely lace but it fit me a bit tight.

Love a dress that needs no thought to be perfect on its own. My usual size is a 4, and I got a 6 because it was all that was available but in the end I'm glad I did. No fabric give in waist and shoulders for those who maybe run on a large (or muscular!) side of the equation. 4 would have worked but 6 is def a better fit for those reasons
Loved wearing this to work! Very flattering and easy to wear.
Nice but nothing special. Was a little big in the waist.
This dress was very pretty. The fit was fantastic and flattering for me. I would definitely rent it again.
Didn't wear this since it didn't arrive in time, unfortunately, but it was SO CUTE and I can't wait to wear it!
Great fit, comfortable for a vacation day.

links_reviews_title: Love! was a little loose on the was it, but overall great.
links_reviews_text: Love! was a little loose on the was it, but overall great.
I wore a size 8, usually a 4/6. The arms run very small and even the 8 was pulling at the chest, but plenty of room everywhere else, flattering, classic, tailored style I wore for a family dinner.
It was tricky to put on best over the head and undo side zipper

links_reviews_title: Stunning - incredible colors and so classy
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, perfect tailored look with gorgeous colors

FYI- the lining is a little longer than the lace in the back, probably due to dry cleaning. It didn't bother me at all for a date, but if I had been going to a more formal event such as a shower it might have bothered me

Sadly, this dress was disappointing for me. It was large everywhere, so I definitely could have gone down a size, and the fabric was rather itchy. However, even if I had rented a smaller size, I doubt I would have loved the dress--it was a pretty unflattering cut. The sleeves are cute, though, as they are made entirely of lace. I wore this to church with black pumps.

I'm between a 6 and 8 in Draper James because I have broad shoulders. The 8 fit really well. It is slightly big from below the bust down but it is still flattering. It was comfortable, long enough for a conservative environment and super cute. I'm excited to try the polka dotted one as well.

Love the dress. Bright colors but with a leaf design that makes it more fall-ish. I've rented other Draper James pieces and always found them to be tts. However, this one ran a little big. And was a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I purchased it!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments in this jumpsuit. Everyone wanted to buy one! It's easy, breezy and super comfortable. Perfect for summer in Texas! My favorite piece of clothing right now and I'm very happy I bought it after wearing it once :)
Edgy kindergarten art teacher. So many compliments!
I wanted to rent this all summer and it was never avail! I wore it to walk around soho. It was the comfiest jumpsuit and such a fun addition to my wardrobe.
LOVED!

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on full figured girls, but like I didn't care?
links_reviews_text: I didn't order this jumpsuit to show off my bod. I rented it to wear to the beach on vaca and I did so several times. So comfy and the pattern is so cute! I thought about buying it, but it really adds like 20 lbs and I could have sized down to a small (usually I aim for a large)! Photo originally appeared on @mackinstyle

Loved this! The M was a little too loose/low on top for me so I wore a fitted black tank underneath. But I still loved it and wore to multiple things -- a fall festival for my kids' school, girls night dinner, happy hour, and date night with a jean jacket. Super fun and cute!
It's kinda bold and certainly some people thought I looked goofy. But they were outnumbered by people who loved it. Several people wrote down the designer in hopes of finding one for themselves.

links_reviews_title: DID NOT WANT TO SEND BACK
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this jumpsuit and hope it's available next year to rent. It's super fun and so comfy!!

links_reviews_title: I was so excited about this rental
links_reviews_text: Super excited to rent this, but it was kind of a let down. I loved the pattern, unfortunately, it wasn't very flattering
So comfy and definitely an eye catcher. Thinking of purchasing.

Runs big, I could have easily worn the XS, but it wasn't available and S was fine too!! SO COMFY, POCKETS, COMPLIMENTS!! It's not supported to flattering, it's supposed to be fun! I wore with a black blazer over and pointy flats for work and with sandals for the weekend!

links_reviews_title: Love the print and how comfortable and lazy I can be in it
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this outfit I found my self wearing it on a daily basis and it's so easy to stylize and wear on the go
So comfy, so different, so fun. Only positive things to say about this one-of-a-kind jumpsuit

Gosh I loved this so much. Got a tonnnn of compliments from guys and girls alike. Really fun, super comfy. Didn't need a bra, and at 5'4" this was the perfect height. I wore it three times! Would rent a million times again!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing print, super fun and comfy!
links_reviews_text: I adored this piece - awesome fit, super comfortable and an amazing unique pattern!

Perfect for weekends and summer vacation. Light, easy, great colors, and doesn't wrinkle. Definitely a baggy style, and won't show off your curves if you got them. I have narrow shoulders, but straps stay put. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I had 3 people stop me on the street and compliment me.
links_reviews_text: This runs very large, but is super comfy. I wanted the oversized look. It almost looks like a dress sometimes, but I loved that it was pants. I also love the pockets.

I thought the romper was comfortable but boxy. The length was as described but, I did feel it creep up in the crotch a few times. I also had to put a sweater on the romper because the pockets, which were right at my waist, stuck out a bit. This was just enough to hide the curve of my waist and added 2-3 visual inches to my mid section - which I really don't need.

It's hot and you want something that's cute but fun and preferably doesn't touch you because #sweat - this jumpsuit is perfect. Plus it has pockets. Fit: straps are a little short (I'm 5'8), so would size up if you have a longer torso. It's loose for a reason.

I really liked this romper for a long day at work. The print was funky and loud, but it was still black like most of my clothes so it didn't feel too out there. It definitely was not particularly flattering but it was so comfy and fun, and I felt good in it. It's an oversized fit so if you want something body hugging, I don't think this is it. I gave it three stars because it wasn't anything special.
I'm first trimester pregnant and this was exactly the style I've been looking for: loose AND cute. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I was blown away by the easy and friendly process to rent clothes

links_reviews_text: Roomy

links_reviews_title: Super cute and can wear for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: I didn't know how this would work in the winter but I wore it with a black turtleneck and booties and it was perfect! It took a lot of restraint not to buy this piece because it was fun and artsy and I got a ton of compliments. Wore it for work and then again for dinner and drinks with friends.
clown pattern was fun and totally ridiculous (confirmed by family and friends) but i can't stop wearing it. this is the second best thing i've ever rented. 13/10 would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!!
links_reviews_text: Such a unique and memorable piece. The pattern is amazing and so many friends have asked about it.
So many compliments from strangers. It's unique and cute, definitely considered buying!

links_reviews_title: Loved this but it's short in the crotch!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this but needed to size up because the crotch was too short. Really cute but go up a size!

links_reviews_title: Cute and easy to wear. Got some compliments and stares on the street!
links_reviews_text: Just throw it on and go. I wore it to get my nails done on a beautiful Saturday afternoon. I didn't bother with a bra. I styled with a jean jacket. Its supposed to be baggy in the hip/leg area. So comfy!

links_reviews_title: Super baggy but short waisted. Rides up!
Could not get enough of this one!
links_reviews_text: Rent this NOW! I wore it to a concert, to a nice dinner in Jamaica, to brunch, around the house. It's so versatile!
This is such a great outfit for feeling a level above yoga pants but without losing any comfort.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could buy this one!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this jumpsuit!! I usually am between a small and medium but the small fit perfectly. This jumpsuit is great for so many occasions! I wore it casually with some sandals and a denim jacket during the day and then belted it and put on some heels for a rehearsal dinner in the evening.

Loved this. If it wasn't so expensive for what it is, I'd definitely buy. Very comfortable. Has pockets! Wore with no bra in spite of my large breasts. A strapless bra really didn't go with the easy breezy feeling I wanted. Great pattern. Lots of flowy space. Some people might think it makes them shapeless but I love this look. A sack, but make it fashion. Wore a fanny pack with it so I guess that cinched the waist a bit but that wasn't my intent. Would rent again.
Super comfy, but fun and chic.. got so many compliments
Are straps body length and width of pant leg was all spot on. Well made and overall amazing fit.

This dang thing is so comfortable. It doesn't wrinkle. I am pear-shaped, so the top was large on me, and I needed to wear a tank under it. If you are concerned about the shape of clothes, this is not for you. It is a full-fit and loose. And it has pockets. Great for walking around and traveling.

links_reviews_title: Cute summer jumpsuit with a fun pattern
links_reviews_text: I wore this this jumpsuit with a belt and shoes with a bit of a heel. The pattern is cute and playful. You could dress it up or make it a very casual outfit as well!

links_reviews_title: FUN beach jumper, wear it backwards
links_reviews_text: it was ankle length on me but still fit. I felt like a trendy child in it, but in a good way. Great, structured fabric that travels well. I wore it backwards because the front has awkward stretch/looked a bit tacky.
Wore to work, dinner and a party. Perfectly fun for anything. Runs large - could've done a medium, but I wanted an oversized look. Length was perfect for my height. May be too long for some.
Got many complements, was very comfortable too! I wish I could add this to my permanent collection!
I got this dress for a brunch. It's an excellent piece for warm days at outdoor events. Light dress, high quality.
I wore this dress for work several times and got many compliments. It is comfortable and with the tie detail at the neck it is perfect for work
I love this dress so much. I wore it for Christmas and it was comfortable all night. So classy and pretty!
Classic easy work dress for when you want to look super cute for an interview or big presentation/meeting but also want to be comfortable! This is a solid staple dress and i loved wearing it!
Loved this dress! It was so fun and flirty while also being professional for work. I wore it with leggings and without. Perfect for office to date night!
This was super comfortable to wear to work. Paired with boots. Has a smocked waist to perfect the fit.
Great dress - very easy to wear. Could have sized down but I don't think it would have made a dramatic difference. Overall great dress!

Enjoyed wearing to a low key party. Nice length would be good for work. Comfortable and not see through. Wished I'd worn sticky tape so my bra would have stayed in place and not shown occasionally at the v neck.
This dress was amazing. Flattering, comfortable, and gorgeous! Love love loved it!
So cute!! Shirt waisted but so comfortable with elastic waist! So excited for my first rent this was great!
The fit is true to standard K. Spade and the dress is light and comfortable. It was cute, but nothing super special.

I wore this dress to dinner and again to a bridal shower. It's great with tights and boots in the winter months! As I've found with most Kate Spade dresses with a similar silhouette, it runs a little big. I'm between an 8 and 10 and I had plenty of room in the medium and could have made the small work. I'm a sucker for a black floral dress so this was a fun take on a classic choice for me.
Perfect fit and lots of compliments
Loved it, this dress is very comfortable but also formal enough for work

I rented Kate Spade dresses before in my normal size and they were too small, so I was nervous about renting the brand again. I read all the renews though and the thing that was supposed deferent about this dress was the elastic waist. I decided to give it a try and I'm so glad I did. My interview was at my current company and everyone told me how great I looked in the dress. It was very comfortable. The dress was a bit big and because of this the neckline plunged very low. To fix this I just tied the knot in the dress to hit right where the neckline started. I'd rent this dress again and hope I am able to find more great Kate Spade dresses like this one.
Wore it to work a vendor show case. Super comfortable and fit just right. Cut is a little low but I liked that and the neck bow hides if needed. Want to own!
If I could buy alllllll these Kate Spade dresses I would. This style and material (and all the different prints and little tweaks each dress has) is soooo fresh and flattering. Can't get enough!
Easy to wear, flattering fit. Unexpectedly chic. Runts TTS. Good for curves!

I liked the fabric & styling. Comfortable with elastic waist. However, I'm large chested so the waist pulled up higher than I'd like. Maybe a larger size would've been better but it fit well otherwise. If your work environment is conservative you may need a tank underneath.
A little short and low cut. The bow in the front can cover up cleavage. Runs TTS.

Definitely my favorite of this month's pieces. I love the pattern and the polka dots in the tie that complement the flowers on the dress. I'm glad I rented it while it was still cool enough for tights, because this would be a bit short for work otherwise.
Second time renting this dress! So many compliments and extremely comfortable. May have to buy this one!!!

This was honestly the best experience! The dress was perfect for the wedding I attended. I normally wear 10/12 and I ordered a large, medium would have fit also but I liked the fact that it was roomy enough to eat and drink whatever I wanted without worrying about it getting too snug.
Fit was great and so comfortable, XS would be perfection on someone a little shorter - waist was a tiny bit short on me (5'6") but such a perfect spring transition dress!
Very comfortable and lightweight! A little low cut, but you can knot or tie the ties to hide that. I liked it so much I want to buy it!
Love this dress. The elastic at the waist and wrists makes it so easy to wear. The length is woke appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Adorable cut and fit perfectly! Loved for a winter day.
links_reviews_text: Classic dress with perfect details.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an hour class figure!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about this dress! So comfortable, stylish and flattering.

I'm going to have a hard time sending this dress back. The patten is pretty, the fabric is floaty, the elastic waist is both flattering and forgiving, and the details are wonderful. It's a bit low cut, but the tie can be positioned strategically so I was comfortable wearing it for a business meeting. I'm 5'7" and was okay with the length with tights, but probably wouldn't wear it with bare legs. Overall, love this dress and will definitely rent again.
Fits TTS, I'm 5'5 and the length was just fine with flats. It would probably be a tad short if I wore heels and my workplace is conservative. Really comfy and transitions easily from day to night.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was super comfortable and I got tons of compliments. It's pretty darn see through so I suggest tights or a slip. It's also a tad on the low cut side but the knot in front helps with that. Overall very comfortable. My only issue was that the sleeves are a little short.
Comfortable and cute! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: The elastic in the waist is a game changer!
links_reviews_text: I got this for a regular day at work. It was good. I liked the fabric and the design. The elastic in the waist makes it very very comfortable (maybe too much! lol). The only thing I didn't love is that I feel is "too serious". It might looked better with other color of shoes. Overall, it was great.

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty while work appropriate
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!! Will be renting again!

I loved the fit of this dress. It is a little low cut but with the tie, it doesn't really show too much cleavage. I wore it to a meeting for my consulting business. It is the perfect weight for Texas winter. I wore it with black tights and boots. I'll definitely rent again!!

I am either a M or L (10/12). The M wasn't available so I rented the large. I think it fit great! The waist is elastic and the dress is flowy. I really liked the elastic wrists too. I am a 36DD and the dress was not inappropriate. The bow helps camouflage the lower neckline. However, if you are a size 10/12 with a small chest you may think the large is huge so try the medium bc I swear there's plenty of room.

links_reviews_title: Really cute, comfy dress! I got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, very comfortable! Perfect for the work Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: Works well for day to night
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfortable with class for work to dinner

I loved everything about this dress, the color, the fit, the style, the material, EVERYTHING. I will definitely be renting this one again. I almost bought it - but decided to hold off on a few more months of rentals just to see if I fall in love with anything else. But honestly, I already am looking forward to renting it again! I typically wear a size M/8 and the dress was a perfect fit. The tie was perfect too. It's a little low cut - but the tie hides that and gives it an extra flare of class

Fit was good, I could have sized down but one of my other Veronica Beard blazers I needed to size up. I got several compliments on it but I realized about an hour after wearing it that one of the buttons was missing. The buttons are the best part about the blazer!

I've been wanting to get my hands on a Veronica Beard jacket since I started RTR unlimited. It was everything I'd hoped it would be. The size 2, my normal size, fit me perfectly. The fabric is so nice and it just looks expensive. The shoulder pads are pretty big but they didn't bother me. I wore it twice, once with jeans and a black top, and once to work with black pants. Will definitely look for other VB jackets and will probably rent this one again.

Wore this for a meeting with my own VB pants and it was awesome! Fits more TTS than other VB blazers, which I usually find run small with the long arms. I was super excited that the sleeves weren't too long. Nice comfortable stretchy material.

I will start by saying I am a TTS 2 and this was a little big. Even so, I liked the slightly oversized look. This was a lightweight nubby tweed plaid and I loved it! I wore it to work with black pants then to a happy hour with jeans. It worked great for both. Will definitely rent again and consider purchasing.

Fits like a glove and very soft yet so substantial-- great lining and so much tailored detail. Loved it but this particular one was a bit worn in the buttons (tarnished silver worn off and missing buttons)
Very squared off shoulders, which initially I thought were too much but then I went for it. Nicely fitted, quality material, modern print.

links_reviews_title: So I just so happen to own the shorts and had a lot of fun wearing this as an outfit.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were a little long but still manageable. Otherwise fit great. Love the buttons and the shoulder pads.
Fit perfectly... well made. Jacket is amazing! Will rent again when the weather is cooler. A bit heavy for Houston weather during summer.
This blazer is such a great fun blazer. Her blazers are just amazing and fit great. Size up if you want a sweater under it.

I've never written an RTR review before but this blazer inspired me. Every person I saw at work told me how cute this was. It was so professional but fun, great material and fit. I'm normally a 4 so the 6 was a little oversized but it wasn't noticeable. Will be watching to see if this goes on sale!!
Finally had to give in and return this because I wore it to work so many times haha. This blazer made me feel SO good.

I wore this for weeks...with T-shirts, jeans, casual black athleasure paperbag waist pants. (it is Off white and black so I paired with color more than white-white). Loved it and only sent it back because...well it's RTR. If I was still purchasing clothes, this would be a purchase! And I definitely will rent it again. Thought it was time to let someone else have a chance. It is cotton, not lightweight but perfect still for SoCal summer evenings. It does have shoulder pads and the only time they were annoying was when I was trying to put a luggage strap over my shoulder, although besides that it was a perfect non-wrinkle jacket. Minor 1st world issue.
Very comfortable, loved it!
VB makes some of the best made blazers hands down. Excited to switch things up with this bold checked print for a work event. Grown up Cher vibes. Impeccably made. Perfect fit. Looks $$$.
Love this brand and love this jacket. When it first arrived I was worried the print was too loud, but paid it down with simple jeans and a tee and it was a hit. Will def rent again.
Got lots of compliments. Love this fun blazer.

links_reviews_title: Loved the jacket! Perfect for travel and work
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, feel and polished look of this blazer. Great designer
I loved this blazer. The materials was woven and wasn't too heavy making it the perfect trans-seasonal blazed. The blazer creates a good shape and has silver buttons.

links_reviews_title: Actually feels like a nice blazer
links_reviews_text: Rented it for Easter and wasn't sure if I was going to wear it since it wasn't the easier thing to match but when paired with something simple it actually looks super cute! I wore with a crop top and shorts and it looked great. Will rent again for the right occasion!
Perfect fit, so comfy & chic. Love this piece!
This jacket is perfect
Super well made and versatile blazer Lots of compliments

Great blazer! I am so excited RTR is carrying Veronica Beard now. Clothing is fantastic but always pricey so this is a great option to now have. This is a classic blazer and a perfect spring transition piece. Fits true to size (maybe a tad big) and goes with black pants for work and jeans for the weekend. A++ rental!
looked like i was playing dress up w those shoulder pads typically love VB blazers but this one was a "miss"

links_reviews_title: Substantial blazer! Very work appropriate. Love the thickness. Great for cold offices like mine!
links_reviews_text: Seam was a little off on the wrist. Other than that, you can tell that it's truly well made.
I paired this with a graphic tee and jeans. Would definitely rent again.
Loved the fir and modern pattern. Jacket is shorter and heavy weight. Great with slacks or dress. I wore with black slacks and a cream shirt.
Rented this for everyday/work but weather was warmer than predicted - will definitely rent again in fall!!
I got compliments

This is a great jacket that is comfortable and fits well. I've gotten a ton of compliments on it. My only complaint is that it doesn't really button flat, there should be an interior button for it to lay flat, but I wore it open and it was fine. I'm also busty, so double breasted can be tricky.
This jacket is missing 3 decorative buttons on the left sleeve. Pretty obviously damaged, so I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments. This blazer truly fits you.
links_reviews_text: This is a great transition piece from summer to fall, esp in NYC where its been cold in the mornings. I just wore with a white tee and black denim to work.
Love wearing this open with jeans, a black shell and heels for a workday. Got lots of compliments. Personally didn't like it buttoned

Loved this! The fabric and tailoring feel luxurious, the silver hardware is fun and different from all the gold around these days. I felt so comfortable in this and considered purchasing, but it's a little pricier than I am willing to pay. But I would definitely rent again!
Little warm for summer, but the material is just great, a nubby gorgeous check. I wore it unbuttoned, it hangs nicely when open. Love this coat.
Beautiful fit and construction.
Beautifully tailored

love these blazers to begin w. Always feel so put together just toss on pants and a tank and this blazer elevates the whole outfit. Thought it was navy but it is definitely black. All season wear. Could have also dressed it down but I only wore it to work. Lots of compliments.
bulky
Fit and material were nice. Wore for a big presentation and felt confident in it. I didn't care for the polished silver buttons though.
This skirt was cute and fun to mix it up on a winter day. There's a bit of sparkle in the fabric, which doesn't show on photos.

This skirt is gorgeous! I would have bought it, but the knit is delicate and had a bunch of snags. Very versatile. I wore a variety of outfits with sweaters, tees, sneakers, boots, etc. Got endless compliments on this. Even a man at the airport shouting out that he liked my skirt! Lol I usually wear a 4-6 and wore the M. I'm 5'4" and it was pretty long on me.

This skirt is the best!!! The waist is stretchy. If you have lumps and bumps to hide on your belly, skip this skirt- the stripes in the pattern will show everything. If you have lumps and bumps in your legs and tush, have no fear! Everything is hidden. Compliments all day long. Men, women, every single person. Everyone thought I was more fabulous than I actually am and it was a great day!
This skirt moves beautifully, and the photos don't highlight the special sparkle in the thread of the fabric. It's a standout without being loud. Would rent again.
So comfortable, tons of compliments! Runs large. Which might be good to tuck a sweater into.
A little hard to style but the brown sweater and beige booties worked well!! Absolutely LOVE! I want to buy it. So different and fun!

links_reviews_title: Pretty skirt, too long for shorter people
links_reviews_text: Color and material is very nice- it's a heavier feel. The waist fit me fine, but the length was too long for my frame. Likely would not rent again unless petite sizes were offered.
Fun winter skirt. Love the bits of sparkle in the fabric. The skirt runs a bit small, size up.

This look was perfect for a weekend away. I received compliments from several strangers. The skirt has a subtle shimmer and gorgeous movement. It's heavy knit, better for spring or fall. The knit snags super easily, so I did watch to make sure it didn't catch on anything rough or any edges.
Fun skirt with a lot of great movement. It has metallic thread running through it which makes it a bit scratchy but didn't bother me. Waist is stretchy so I feel like the sizes are forgiving.
Pictures don't do this justice. There is a sparkliness about it that makes it super fun yet it's still classy. Someone told me they had "fashion envy". Score!
Loved the colors on this skirt and the fit. I wore it tucked in and with an over sized sweater. It was versatile and very pretty!

A comfortable shimmery skirt that reminded me of Alice in Wonderland with its whimsical diamond print. Elastic band, hits right below the knee, and lined. Easy to wear to work or dinner. It did make me feel a bit lumpy in parts because it's not structured, but was still a fun item to wear

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments. Subtle sparkle -not too much.
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the waist, I ended up purchasing this item as I loved it so much.
I didn't get a chance to take a photo but no surprises in look or fit. Elastic waist so forgiving fit. So much fun to wear, garnered many compliments!
Great skirt that got lots and lots of compliments and looks.
The quality was great. I didn't expect the sparkly bronze and lilac colors. Picture doesn't really reflect these tones. Liked the fit and length. It was just not what I was expecting.
This is super cute but ended up returning bc it was too big in the waist. If you want it to sit at your natural waistline consider sizing down!

Fun sparkle. Colors in the knit include copper, black, lavender and gold. I wore with a casual black cotton long sleeve tee, black tights and kitten heels. Comfortable waistband. Seems prone to snags.
Loved the skirt. Fits well. Has a little room in the west because it's elastic but doesn't look elastic. Fun skirt to wear to work with a blouse or just on a Saturday.

links_reviews_title: A little color in the office!
links_reviews_text: Another skirt I love! Loved the color combo purple, copper, and silver, so chic! I got tons of complements and the skirt has a bit of shimmer. You can wear this in the office or dress it up and take it to an office party! The fit was perfect, I did feel it was a bit to long but I folded it and it was fine. I will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this incredibly beautiful piece. I would rent it again!
a cute change from my typical long sleeve and jeans weekend look. nice color of purple.
great twist on an everyday top
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, very comfortable neck, and I'm usually v claustrophobic with turtle necks. The openings are in the front, not the elbow like I thought so really not even noticeable

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute but not very flattering
links_reviews_text: I tucked this in to my jeans, but it's probably worn better out and loose. It has a boxy fit. I was confused by the cut outs in arms but actually didn't mind them. Very comfortable sweater, could have worn to work

This shirt was super cute but looked really pilled and ratty. It also had a pen mark on the sleeve. RTR was really great about taking it back and opening up another spot so I could get something else.

This top fit me perfectly, not too short. It's very comfortable, didn't get too warm with the turtleneck and I absolutely adore the arm cutouts. Considering buying this because I love it so much. Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Cute but sleeves are too long for short people
links_reviews_text: This sweater is purple... I thought it was white and was very confused when received. However, it is a very pretty lilac so I was pleasantly surprised. Cute slit detail but the sleeves are very long. I rolled them up and still received a few compliments

The fit was good, Ran true to size or even a tiny bit small. I'm a medium but only the large was available and it was fine. Color is pretty. For some reason the elbow slits didn't line up right for me. Wore just for a regular day with friends.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves too long but fabric and color good!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves on this were long on me, so the placement of the slits in the elbows was a bit off. Besides that, I did like the color and fabric. The length was good on me too - but this may be a bit short on people with longer torsos. Would be ok with high rise jeans though.
This is cute ! Its oversized elbow pit cleavage !!
I loved the retro feel and quality. I like weight of the dress. It feels casual but easy to dress up. Perfect dress for transition from winter to spring, I'd rent again.
Not my favorite dress, but it's different from anything I normally wear. Fit true to size
The fabric was cozy and eye-catching. Loved wearing it.
Form fitting but still flattering.
This dress fit well enough but it wasn't very special or memorable. If you are short the proportions could be off. On the plus side, it is comfy.
Comfortable and looks great. Perfect work dress

This dress is pure magic, the pattern and color are unique and playful, the fit is superb! It fits like a glove and accentuates my pear shape. It will be flattering on any curvy body type. I feel confident, comfortable, and happy wearing this dress! I have been getting compliments all day at work. It would be perfect for weekend brunch, a photoshoot, the possibilities are endless as you can dress it up or dress it down! This is a must rent ladies!
Fits a bit large. Comfy sweater material.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a conservative office
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress to my conservative office. It is a nice break from traditional black and grey. Primary colors with a twist. The knit fabric is soft, thick and has enough structure for a good flow. Lots of compliments!

I enjoyed wearing this dress for a dinner out with girlfriends. The weight of the fabric is quite nice, although it is very long. Worked great with off white boots and nice jewelry to dress it up a bit. Gives a well defined waistline.

I wore with converse high tops, with little off-white leather booties, with wine-colored suede pumps and small matching bag, and with black suede boots. Everything works with this dress. It was warm enough in snow (under a coat) but not too hot indoors. An everything dress
This is not only comfortable, but so so flattering. Perfect for colder months. This print can easily be mixed with other prints - like snakeskin boots !!! Loved!

I wore this dress for several work events as well as Christmas Eve and it was comfortable and I got so many compliments. I love this dress and is the first piece I would consider buying and keeping. I didn't because it's pretty distinctive, but I'm so glad I got the chance to wear this!
Really nice heavy (but not hot) fabric with a built in waistline. Comfortable. Conservative neckline. I wore it with a blazer and other times with more jewelry. I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, but without the blazer (mine) could be an evening dress. Very flattering
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, but work appropriate. Heavier material, not a summer or spring dress. Lots of compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for cold weather with the thick material !! The colors are lovely for fall/ winter.
links_reviews_text: Nice vertical pattern. I am 5'4 usually wear a size 10 this for well I would assume even up to a 14 could fit in the dress it does stretch.
Great material. Heavy gauge and smart style
Loved wearing this dress for a meeting at work with the higher ups. Lots of compliments at work. It's the perfect length and weight for a fall dress. Warm but not hot.

links_reviews_title: Hugs curves in the best possible way
links_reviews_text: This is my first rental and I am officially in love. The dress feels expensive - it fits like a glove but doesn't look to form fitting for work. I've been getting compliments all day. The weight is heavier - perfect for a fall dress! Love love love.
...The color, the pattern, the fit. Super comfortable and elegant at the same time. So tempted to buy
The dress fit perfectly. The material stretches, and it was comfortable. It is a well made dress, and I received a lot of compliments.
Loved the weight of this dress and the fit. Really nice fabric. Wore some shapewear to help smooth but the fabric was heavy enough to be pretty forgiving
